Iqqim-d ɣer tama-w.
Ssuliɣ-t-id armi d abrid.
Nniɣ-as: ḥemdulleh imi tselkeḍ.
Ur yeqqaṛ azul arama tennid-as-t kečč.
D aberrani ula d netta di tmurt n medden.
Maca nugi ad nebru i umrar is aɣ-zzuɣuren.
Ad tt-id-nessukkes si tebrek ideg texnuber.
Ur neẓri anta tasraft ara aɣ-d-igren irebbi.
Amzun ilaq fell-aɣ ad neddu di lǧerra n uḍar.
Armi d yiwen wass, isubb-d di kra n tkessert.
Am win ṭṭfent temlella, imdel allen-is acemma.
Ad neḍfer lkar n leḥsab-is am nekkni am med-den!
Ur nezmir ara ula i tmuɣli-nneɣ, ṭṭfent temlella.
Nnan-d d akken d imsulta i yenɣan Maɛtub Lwennas.
D urḍan-is i yegan akka, ay akka d rriḥa i d-ttaken!
D tamacahutt n yiwen yilat neɣ ma teqqarem-as acacfal.
Ula d yiwen seg at taddart ur yuder ɣur-s, anagar nekk.
D abudali ma tebɣam, neɣ akken i awen-ihwa get-as isem.
At taddart, nnan-as: Awah, ad yili d yelli-s i yegubbeṛ!
Ula d annect-nni n ɛeyyu ur yezmir ara ad as-tent-yeqqen.
Nekk welleh, ar s nniya-w i yuzzleɣ ɣur-s ad t-id-sellkeɣ.
Am akken yebɣa ad yerwel i ɛeyyu i t-yurzen, maɛna ulamek.
Yeǧǧa-yaɣ wakud-nneɣ, neǧǧa-t, neǧǧa imeḍqan-nneɣ, ǧǧan-aɣ.
Akken ara nemsaɛaf nekk yid-k ɣer isemṭal neɣ ɣer tmeqbert.
Armi yeqqel ula d agellid n tmurt yettasem si mmi n tasa-s.
llan daɣen yiselmaden n tesdawin-nniḍen n tmurt n lezzayer.
S tallelt n usemmas n tegmi deg tutlayt d yidles n tmaziɣt.
Ad neddu am iderɣalen di lewhi iɣer icudd umrar i aɣ-yurzen.
Ussa-agi yezrin , yusa-d yiwen n uɣrib ,yewwi-d yid-s avilu!
Iḥar ad yemlil tameddakelt-ines Ḥayat, tarwiḥt n terwiḥt-is.
D ayen  ara nẓer deg wuṭṭun i d-iteddun, ma bɣan at Numidya.
Amennak yeddem aqerru-nni, iger-it ar ucekkaṛ amzun d arraz.
Azekka-nneɣ ur d as-nufi leqrar neɣ tawwurt ɣer-s yessufuɣen.
Dayi, iwehha s uṭad-is ɣer kra n teḥdayin εeddant zdat-neɣ.
Stut-nni i d-yeɛreḍ ugelliḍ ɣer tmeɣra teɣra timsal n tudert.
Ur nettemfraq ara alamm dɣa ad nekcem ɣer dagi kan ad nefteṛ.
Kkreɣ ad d-cnuɣ taɣect-nni n Mengellat "Rğiɣ i turğa teryel".
Ticenfirin-is amzun d ḥebb lemluk-nni n Larebεa n At Iraten.
D Ɛemmaṛ Mezdad i yuran imeslayen n taɣect: Yemma tedda ḥafi.
Awal yak d awal, tikwal yettnawal yessawal, tikwal yessefcal.
D aɣbalu i win yebɣan ccbaḥa n wawal akked telqayt n umeslay.
Mi ara tt-id-yaf terna-yas aseḥlelli i tεekkazt i d aɣ-yerqa.
Massa Linda Waṭaḥ deg wawal n tazwara n temlilit-agi tussnant.
Assa, ur nekfi ara abrid s tikli mi aɣ-yefka yinijjel i yifri.
Xas akken negza timsal, xas akken nessen ula d nekkni i wurar.
Ad uɣaleɣ d agellid ɣef tegduda n bururu s teɣratin n tulawin.
Ama s tezrawin n unadi neɣ s tselḍin n yimussnawen n tmedyazt.
Nekni teḍṛa-yaɣ am uḍebbal yetthuzzun tuyat, ula mi yesselqaf.
Yeṭṭef-it s tfenṭazit amzun tella tebɣest di lexdeɛ yecban wa.
Aten-in sin irgazen d yizazrafen, ad ten-tamneḍ ɣef tudert ik.
Maca yewwid icciwen-is deg culliḍ-is yessers-iten zdat ugellid.
Tella d taneɣmast s tutlayt n tyemmat deg sin yiɣmisen n tmurt.
Ulac win yettawin učči ar umeẓẓuɣ, medden akk ttawin-t ar yimi.
Yessefk fell-asent daɣen ad d-afent tifrat i unbeddal n unezwi.
War ma tjeggeḥ lerẓaq i yessefk ad d-qqimen i tsutwin n  yimal.
Yiwen wahil amaynut n  tneflit timezgit yesɛan asirem ameqqran.
Ayen i s-d-yeḥka i Aṭlas iban-as-d i uneggaru-ayi d axayel kan.
Ad negzu daɣen d akken mačči d tuccḍa ma nusem ɣef win nḥemmel.
Ar tama-nniḍen n lkanun wallaɣ-tt tesfeḍ allen-is s yijufar-is.
Ad yuɣal d ṭṭir ad tt-id-yexḍef deg ifassen n tmeṭṭut n baba-s.
Aseggas daɣen seg wasmi i d aɣ-teǧǧa tmarut-tnaggalt Dihya Lwiz.
Ad tuɣaleḍ ad tettwaliḍ aberkan, rnu ad d-teqqareḍ wa d amellal.
Iqqim akken kra n tiremt, ildi-d allen-is yessaked akin d wakka.
Yal asefru d tamacahutt iɛeddan ɣef uqerru-yagi yeffɣen iberdan.
Tesɛiḍ aɣbalu n tudert mačči d lḥerma n taddart gar yiḍarren-im.
Tettnadi zzalamiḍt akken ad tessiɣ tafat ma yella kra i d-yellan.
Ad nezwir ass-a s tullist "kker a mmi",  n umeddakel-nneɣ Smaɛil.
Deg ussan i d iteddun ad awen-d-nernu tayeḍ sɣur Mass Yazid Bulma.
Atan ar ad tettwaliḍ mačči drus n twuɣa i aɣ-iccan aksum d yiɣsan!
Nebberttex ɣer temda n layas i aɣ-yeččan, yennejla ula d iswi-nneɣ.
Werɛad nekfi asmekti wis ɛecrin n tmenɣiwt n ucennay Maɛtub Lwennas.
Mazal ccama n wass-nni mi tejreḥ ul-iw ar ass-a yal mi ad d-mmektiɣ.
Ttaɛṛadeɣ ad as-d-kkseɣ ifassen-is s tbuxasin-iw, acu ur zmireɣ ara.
Imir-n, ur gziɣ ara d acu i yebɣa ad yi-t-id-yini s tawat neɣ s laẓ.
Yewwi-yaɣ wasif n zzman d asawen, nḍeqqer amur ameqran si tirga-nneɣ.
Icubaa-yas Ṛebbi , amzun d taruṣruyt ideg ileḥḥu, ur ihedder d yiwen.
Akken ,iruḥ ad yeɛḍes,iserreh i ugidun, dɣa sbeṭ! Srid ɣer uḥecraruf.
Negra-d ur neẓri aniwa i d akud-nneɣ, i d tallit-nneɣ, i d tasuta-nneɣ.
Xas nessen i umeyyez, maca neqqim akken, am zun yura di twenziwin-nneɣ.
I win yugin ad yili d menwala, i win yugin bellu, d asnulfu i d ddwa ḥellu!
Udem-is yekkaw, yuza-t lḥif t-yeṭṭfen gar wuglan-is acḥal n yiseggasen-aya.
D acu i izemren ihi ad aɣ-d-issukkes seg wayen i aɣ-yurzen sennig n usnulfu?
Taluft-a n tneflit timezgit i d-yersen deg wahil tigawt tis waḥedd u ɛecrin.
S leḥzen d ameqqran i yi-d-yewweḍ lexber n tmettant n temdakelt-nneɣ Dihya Lwiz.
Uleḥlu yenna ɣef Lwennas At Mengellat: Afiluẓuf-nneɣ yeɛya yuɣal yettseṛfiq-asen.
D tasemmamt, d tazefrant, texleḍ deg-s tidi akked waman n leɛṭer i d-yerra, ḥqaḥqa!
Nugad ad yili d nekkni i d tiɣri taneggarut n tsuta ur neẓri ma tedder neɣ tesselqaf.
Deg rebɛa Yunyu zuǧ alaf u ɛecṛa, Aselway Ferḥat Mhenni yesbedd Anabaḍ Aqbayli Uɛḍil.
Ma d leḥsab n wid ur t-d-newwi ara, yewweḍ ɣer teltmiyya u sebɛa uɛecrin n yinelmaden.
Ferḥat Mhenni ilul deg xemsa Meɣres alef u tteɛmiyya u yiwen uxemsin deg Illulen Umalu.
Ɛemmaṛ Mezdad yura ddeqs n wungalen, gar-asen: Tagrets urɣu, iḍ d wass, tafunast igujilen.
Deg useggas n walef u tteɛmiya u setta usettin, Muḥend Aɛrab Besɛud yesbedd Agraw Amaziɣ.
Dda Lmulud ilul ass tmenya u ɛecrin Duǧember Alef u ttɛemya u sbaɛṭac di Tewrirt Mimun deg At Yanni.
Saɛid Seɛdi d aduktur n yiderwicen. Yenna-as ucennay Uleḥlu: Ṭbib n yimexlan yemxel neɣ seččen-as iḥeckulen.
Ma nger tamuγli ar yisem n wungal-a "tagrest d wurγu", ad naf deg-s sin yismawen mgaraden: tegrest d tasemhayt
Ferḥat At Said mmusan Ferhat Mehenni neɣ Ferhat Imazighen Imula, d Aqerru n Umussu n Timanit n Tmurt n Leqbayel
Di tefsut taberkant, imsulta n unadabu azzayri, nɣan ddeqs n yilmeẓyen iqbayliyen, ddeqs-nniḍen ɛeggben ilebda.
Muḥend Aɛrab Besɛud ilul deg useggas n walef u ttɛemya u rebɛa u ɛecrin deg Tgemmunt Lejdid, deg tɣiwant n At Dwala.
Dda Lmulud At Mɛemmer d amyaru, d amdan yefkan azal ameqqran i yidles d tutlayt n tmaziɣt, d netta d amezwaru i yeslemden tamaziɣt di tseddawit n Zzayer.
Deg Unabaḍ Aqbayli, llan tesɛa ineɣlafen: Arezqi At Hemmuc, Lyazid Abid, Idir Djouder , Lhacene Ziani , Djamila Amgoud,Mouloud Merhab akk d Makhlouf Idri.
Iɣrem aɣyul s teḍṣa.
Itess Yidir?
Ttaggaden akk Yidir.
D yessi-m tigi, a Newwara?
D yessi-k tigi, a Yidir?
Yeqqim Yidir deg uxxam.
Acimi i teskiddibeḍ, a Yidir?
Yeɛya Yidir seg yinejmaɛen.
Ẓriɣ belli tcedhaḍ Yidir.
Yessared Yidir takerrust-is.
Mi ara yetqelleq Yidir isusum kan.
Ur heddreɣ ara Tafransist am Yidir.
Yidir d amecḥaḥ
Ur ẓriɣ ara acḥal ara yeswu tkerrust-agi.
Ur ẓriɣ ara acḥal ara teswu tkerrust-ihin.
Ur teffer ara fell-i, a Yidir.
Ẓriɣ aql-ik da, a Yidir.
Melmi kan i yezweǧ Yidir.
Yidir d aḥeddad n wawal.
D acu i teffreḍ deffir-k, a Yidir?
Ur teẓriḍ ara acḥal ara d-tesqam?
Acḥal aya ur yuri tabrat.
Ḥemmleɣ ad qqimeɣ weḥd-i.
Acimi ur truḥeḍ ara s aɣerbaz iḍelli?
Acimi ur truḥeḍ ara ɣer sbiṭar?
Ilaq-awen ad tiliḍ zik dagi azekka.
Ur bɣiɣ ara ad snuɣniɣ Yidir.
Ayen i d-yenna Yidir yewqem.
D ṣṣwab i d-yenna Yidir.
Neḥwaǧ-iken, a wid yettarun taqbaylit.
Mačči d asṭuqqet n wawal ara yessalin taqbaylit.
Taqṣiḍt n sin watmaten.
Ɛacen s wayen i d-ttakken lexlawi-nsen.
Lḥaṣun, cerken kullec.
Wissen d acu i tt-id-yewwin gar-asen?
Qqimen akken mɣunzan aṭas n wussan.
Yiwen wass, yesla i usṭebṭeb di tewwurt.
D yiwen i la yettnadin axeddim.
Yella kra ara k-reqqɛeɣ ?
Bɣiɣ ad iyi-txedmeḍ yiwen akken n ccɣel.
Bɣiɣ ad iyi-tebnuḍ yiwen n lḥiḍ n snat lmitrat di leɛli.
Iruḥ yunag.
Kra n wussan mbeɛd, Mḥend yuɣal-d.
Yufa-d axeddam-nni yekfa ccɣel-is yakan.
Yewhem Mḥend.
Mačči d lḥiḍ n snat lmitrat di leɛli i d-yufa, d tiqenṭert!
Imir-nni dɣa, gma-s n Mḥend yeffeɣ-d seg uxxam-is.
D lewhayem! Annect-nni akk i k-ḍelmeɣ, tekkreḍ tebniḍ tiqenṭert!
Ad ruḥeɣ kan; aṭas n tqenṭyar i yi-d-mazal ad tent-bnuɣ!
Mačči d taɛkemt, d gma!
Deg yiwen webrid yessawnen yerna d aẓru.
Mlaleɣ-d yiwet n teqcict tamecṭuḥt.
Tbubb gma-s amecṭuḥ.
Tbubbeḍ taɛkemt ẓẓayet.
Qqimeɣ, qqureɣ.
Awal i yi-d-tenna teqcic-nni tageswaḥt yeḍbeɛ deg wul-iw.
Kkawen yifadden-iw.
Ad d-mmektiɣ awal n teqcict-nni.
Mačči d taɛkemt i tbubbeḍ, d gma-k!
Rwin-aɣ s wawal.
Yuḍen uzger, qqden aɣyul.
Azger yesserwet-itent, aɣyul yečča-tent.
Srewteɣ, ɛebban wiyaḍ.
Tuqqna n uzger s aɣyul.
Lukan ad teẓreḍ acḥal i kem-ḥemmleɣ!
Ah lukan ad teẓreḍ!
Tebra ma yeẓra Ḥemza anda yenza!
Ur yeswi tibṣelt yerkan!
Lḥaǧ d nnefṣ, tarbaɛt d nnefṣ!

Ul yejreḥ, tasa tuḍen.
Ur ufiɣ ḥedd d amɛiwen.
Ur yufi ḥedd d amwanes.

Yiwen ur t-iṣebber.
Anwa ara t-iṣebbren?

Lḥila n ṣṣber tenɣel.
S anda i truḥeḍ yella yiṭij.

Yečča Sliman taxsayt!
Ibennu Sliman ixxamen.

Ur iḥemmel ara timellalin deg waman.

Aru kan!

Aru ayen akk ara d-iɛeddin deg wallaɣ-ik.

Lḥila n ṣṣber tenɣel.

Teḥwaǧ teqbaylit arraw-is.
Anda-ken a Leqbayel?
Tajmilt i yimsidag iqbayliyen.
Am wassa ad d-inṭeq uselkim s teqbaylit.
Aṭas n yisenfaren n usideg ɣer teqbaylit i yellan.
Amaḍal umḍin iger-as arebbi i teqbaylit.
Mačči d ul kan i teḥwaǧ teqbaylit, d allaɣ daɣen!
Tebda tsuqilt n Facebook ɣer teqbaylit.
Tendeh tsuqilt n Facebook ɣer teqbaylit.
Imsidag iqbayliyen xeddmen am tweḍfin.
Imsidag iqbayliyen d ibaḥanen akken ma llan.
Imsidag iqbayliyen, ulac tamtilt-nsen.
Imsidag iqbayliyen d igazuzen.
Imsidag iqbayliyen ɛussen igenni rnan lqaɛa.
Aḥuddu aḥunnu ɣef yimsidag iqbayliyen.
Imsidag iqbayliyen ur berrun i ṭṭbel deg waman.
Imsidag iqbayliyen ur ɛeggun ara.
Imsidag iqbayliyen ttwalin mebɛid.
Imsidag iqbayliyen swesɛen tamuɣli-nsen.
Imsidag iqbayliyen fkan-as ddḥis.
Imsidag iqbayliyen ur gganen ara.
Imsidag iqbayliyen skecmen taqbaylit ɣer tatrara.
Wissen ma ad as-neḥder i wass-nni.
Ad d-yas wass ideg ara d-inṭeq tilifun s teqbaylit.
Anef i weɣyul ad yeεlef!
Yeqqes-iyi uzrem.
Yeqqes-itt uzrem, yeǧǧa-yas ssem-is.
Yetɛedda ɣef lḥerma-s.

Ack-itt taqcict-a.

A lbabur bu leḥwaci!
Ttaznen medden leḍyur.

Dɛut-as ad d-yuɣal bxir.

Ur lummeɣ yiwen!

Ur ttezzem ara deg yiman-im!
Fiḥel tuzzma.
Aql-i di lhemm-iw.
Aql-i di lhemm-iw, ur yi-d-rennu ara lhemm-ik.
Anef-as, ur as-rennu ara.

Eǧǧ-iyi nekk d ṛṛay-iw.
Mazal ur as-d-ssukkseɣ ara.
Ass-a teḥǧeb tziri.
Iḍher-d waggur.
Ilul waggur.
Ilul deg wučči n yibawen.
Tugar-it Faḍma-nsen s sin n yiseggasen.
Armi ččiɣ aqenṭar n lmelḥ i d-tluleḍ keččini.
Ulac ayen i as-iruḥen.
Yettgalla iḥennet.
Waqila d iɣerdayen ara d-iɣlin, mačči d adfel.
Aḥlil, ma yedda-tt akka!
Kellxen-as-d si ssuq.
Ɛerran-t di ssuq.

Hettken-t-id si ssuq.
Ssuq, ṣṣbeḥ!
Yeṭṭes armi d azal.
Yeṭṭes armi d azal, yeqqar mazal lḥal.
Ṭṭes, ṭṭes, mazal lḥal!
Mačči d kečč i d-iṣaḥ wawal.

Ddu d uḍar-ik!
Yuker aḍar.
Yerra aḍar.
Iger aḍar.

Yerra-tt ddaw uḍar-is.
Din i tuḍen aḍar-is.

Ddan iḍarren-is!
Lukan mačči d iḍarren-iw i yi-isellken, tili ass-a aql-i ddaw wakal.
Jmeɛ iḍarren-ik!
Ǧǧan-t iḍarren-is.
Uffgen iḍarren-is!
Teqqen axelxal deg uḍar.
Yettwaqqen uɣyul seg uḍar.
Skerkren-t meskin seg uḍar.
S anda i la tteddud ay aḍar?
Ččuren yiḍarren-is d tifexsa.
Ttazgen yiḍarren-is.
Uɣeɣ-tent deg uḍar.
Err akkin iḍarren-ik!
Jmeε-d iḍarren-ik!
Afus-is deg ufus-inu.
Afus-is deg ufus-inu, ṣṣut-is yewweḍ agemmaḍ.

Ur yefki ara afus.

Ur yettak ara afus.

Acimi ur d-tefkam ara afus?

Acimi ur d-tettakem ara afus?
Ad aɣ-d-tefkeḍ afus azekka mi ara nger azeṭṭa?
Yessuter afus n teqcict i baba-s.
Γezzif ufus-ik!
Yeṭṭef-as afus i baba-s.
Yettaṭṭaf afus ccɣel-agi.
Yeṭṭef taqcict seg ufus.
Ifla ufus-ik.
Iɣleq afus-is.
Irfed afus-is ɣer baba-s!
Terfed afus-s ɣer yemma-s!
Refden ifassen-nsen.
Dayen, refdeɣ ifassen-iw.
Irfed ifassen-is s igenni, ad iεenni.
Yuɣal d afus ayeffus n baba-s.
Hrawit tuyat-ik!
Tefkiḍ-as tayet.
Yesεa tuyat.
Ur sεiɣ ara tuyat.
Ibubb mmi-s ɣef tuyat-is.
Kečč, d bu tuyat!
Iclex-iyi tuyat-iw.
Yekkat s tuyat.
Yefka-yas tiyita ɣer gar tuyat.
Lexliqa n uxellaq, tiyita ur tlaq.
Yezga d tiyita di medden.
Yewwet-is almi ur ittwali tigert!
Yewwet ugeffur ɣur-wen!
Tewwet agejdur.
Wwet ṭṭbel i wiw ara k-iceḍḥen!
Ad k-wwteɣ, ad ak-teεreq yemma-k!
Teḥma tiyita.
Anwa i k-yewwten, a mmi?
Anwa i kem-yewwten, a yelli?
Fkan-as tiyita n leɣder!
Wtet afus, a lɣaci!
Waqila d adfel ara d-yewwten.
Tewwet lḥenni deg ufus-is.
Yewwet deg yifassen-is.
Yewwet-iyi yikerri.
Wwet-as ad tekker!
Awal, d awal!
Awal, i t-iferrun d awal!
Mazal ur yefri ara wawal.
Ur d-tkeffu ara awal zdat baba-s.
Eǧǧ-iyi ad d-kfuɣ awal.
Yefka awal.
Yuɣal deg wawal.
Ur uɣaleɣ ara deg wawal.
Nniɣ-d awal, uɣaleɣ deg wawal.
Ini-d kan yiwen n wawal.
Ula d yir awal ineqq.
Yir aɣyul, ur t-ttdeqqim.
Yir asɣar, ur ttleqqim.
Yir bnadem, hder neɣ qqim.
Tamazirt mm yebriden.
Lmaεun yesqerbuben.
Tameṭṭut mm yerbiben.
Tarewla ay iḥbiben.
Yezzwer lmaεun, yegga izgaren.
Yeqqen azger s aɣyul.
m leḥnak n sisnu
nettili gar-asen
amek i t-xeddmemt?
amezruy yettuɣal-d
ass icuba ar gma-s
taɣect-is, awal-is
tilawin di taddart
ad iteddu ɣer nnger
aɣref itettu s zreb
ɣef tlelli d tugdut
ɣas ma iberdan nnḍen
nettidir am yimehbal
almi  d-yewweḍ lmijal
ɣas ma ɣuzzif umecwaṛ
igenni ur inegger ara
katia, udem n sbeɛtac
lemmer terbiḥeḍ a yul
snulfan-d tilafsiwin.
ur yezgi yettwabdar-d
yal mi ara tili tikli
waṛda tecba taseḥḥart
isnawanen n tallit-nni
ur negzi ara acimi aya
wayeḍ iwwi-t ar uquccu
axeddam s lxuf iheddeṛ
iṛuḥ baba iwwi-d tamuli
ma d kemm tzedɣeḍ ul-iw
maca amennuɣ-is d amatu
maca nekcem di tmuɣnest
s tidett mačči s lekdeb
ssiwḍen ɣer libɣi-nsen,
ulac tin yedlan iman-is
seg uzṛuṛeq ɣer ucṛuṛeq
yes-s kan i nwala tafat
ziɣ mačči d kečči i dir
akken tebɣu tili talɣa-s
ala netta i yellan ɣur-s
ara d-yettaddren isem-is
bɣan ad iyi-kksen leḥbab
d acu i d anamek n wayeḍ
d aqerru n teryel i nɣiɣ
d asnerni n tutlayt-nneɣ
ddunit d aɣerbaz n umdan
deg-s tarwiḥt n lmalayek
i aɣ-tt-iḍeggren d amjaḥ
ihi terra-tent d itbiren
iṛuḥ-d umẓabi ar ugellid
izger-iyi nek d-amezwaru
kra ara tekk tudert-nsen
ladɣa timunent n tmeṭṭut
llant-d mraw n tmenniwin
ma d iswi n temlilit-agi
mmi-k d izem gar yizmwen
nekk yid-k zun d-atmaten
nesɛa akk tafrit n yiman
qqim akken tufiḍ iman-im
ur d-ɣli rehhba deg-sent
s wakka ara mmagreɣ lmut
sseqsan-d ar tewwurt-nni
ssers iɣsan-ik di talwit
tameɣra teqqel d tanṭelt
tameṭṭut-is tebbuṣa aṭas
tezwar tfenṭazit tamusni
temẓi d tayri n yemdanen
tis snat tessen i uẓawan
tudert-nni taḥnint n wul
ur yettuɣal timendeffirt
yeddukel umnay d uterras
yesrafeg rric ar yigenni
yessefk  ad ttwasɣellsen
yezger mačči yiwet teẓgi
ɣas yemmut ḥeznen seg ul
yecrew-d ddeqs n tzemrin
yiwen yebɣa ad isew coca
uɣaleɣ uliɣ ɣer tkerrust
dagi yufa talwit n yiman
imi tugi ad teffeɣ seg-s
imi taḥnint-is di lmeḥna
ad kem-yexneq ɣef yidra-s
amzun d nutni i d-inefqen
ccɛecɛen am yiṭij n ttnac
ddeqs n yiseflan i yeɣlin
ɣilleɣ d lxir i s-xedemeɣ
la tettnerni tettenbeddal
lemɛun fell-am a tislit !
lyaqut teqqel-d i tmeddit
lyaqut teqqel-d war axlul
ma d lεebd yellan d aḥrur
mi yewweḍ ar yiwen n uẓru
nekni ad aɣ-imneɛ ṛebbi !
nettxellis ayen ur nexdim
segmi ara d-iwali ungifen
tattut d aṭṭan n yiɣerfan
ulac win ara tt-yejjebṛen
yella-d usfugel ar tagara
tetett ayen d-yefka ugama
ttalasen deg-s akk leǧnas
tudert teqqel d tamettant
tuɣal-d lyaqut, a tawaɣit
ur ten-wwiḍeɣ ur ten-ɛniɣ
yesserbaḥ deg yexṣimen-is
yeṭṭef afus i tin iḥemmel
s wallen-is asmi yessusem
yettnadi ad d-yegri yilem
itbir yeshurruy d ashurru
akrar d asbaɛa i yesbaɛay
yessewa-as qeḍran d ilili
yeḍmeɛ ad iḥăz cwiṭ seg-s
tetteddu di ddiq d uxessu
ẓran d acu i d tikli ḥafi
tagrest aseggas-a teqqseḥ
ḍeggreɣ tiṭ-iw ɣer beṛṛa
akken ad s-yessenqes lḥif
am-umɣar bu sebɛa n leqrun
anida akken yeqqen i yebra
d ssbeṛ i d ddwa n lmeḥnat
di nndama i yeɛziz umdakel
di tallit taberkant yezrin
i zeggwaɣit tcenfirin-is!
itezzi ɣef tedyant n katia
llant-d kra n tmesbaniyin,
nnger ass-a ad s-nettḥulfu
tilufa icudden ɣer rrebrab
xeḍbeɣt m iḍaṛṛen yeččuren
sbeɛdemt anda i kent-yehwa
yesseglaf deg yiḍ deg wass
yeẓẓul fell-as deg iɣeẓran
akken ad yettwassen s ulac
ttennaɣen ɣef wayen-nniḍen
mačči d wid n llaẓ d tugdi
di tesnawit, deg usssan-nni
ɣeḍlen-tt yiɛdawen n tudert
qleb tablaḍt ad tafeḍ miyya
yal ass nettidir-it s tugdi
ad d-nesmektay katia bengana
ahil yettwahegga, yettkemmil
ansa i d-yekka ssus n waya ?
iǧǧa-t din ɣef  yiri n wasif
nella d ilmeẓyen,d icawranen
s usaḍuf n butefliqa s tatut
ansi i d-squccḍeḍ i d-zedmeɣ
yal tasebḥit akken nuɣ tanumi
neɣ daɣen mgal adabu amesbaṭli
tekkat-aɣ tderrit ticki nteddu
ssawlent ula win ara ad-yerren
ɣas ma nettmagar-d yal-as ẓẓerb
ur gzint ara taluft akken iwata
i yeɣunzan tiktiwin n tidderwect
iɣil d netta ay d-iḥerren tamurt
tudert n yimawlan-is, n tmurt-is
si tayeḍ imi d isnawanen i nella,
win ur lemmed si tuccḍiwin yezrin
yal ass nettaṭṭaf tiɛebbiḍun-nneɣ
seg mi i d-yeɣli rrebrab ɣef tmurt
amennuɣ-is yewweḍ-aɣ-d,  nesla-yas.
awal ama gar irgazen neɣ gar tlawin
d acu yewwin rrebrab ar yilmeẓyen ?
deg uxxam neɣ di taddart, ussan-nni
i nekni akked tisutiwin i d-iteddun
segmi teḍra tedyant n katia bengana
si tama-nniḍen meẓẓiyyet di leɛmeṛ.
yal tullist deg-s anamek-is, iswi-s
katia d tameɣras mgal ddel, d leqyud
maca llan wiyaḍ n yiɣallen inemlayen
meɛna ur neǧǧi ara iberdan n umennuɣ
ad nesḥissef ass-a imi neɣli di tatut
ikabaren fiɣef nettkel, ukud i nuzzel
timetti meṛṛa tebra i ṭṭbel deg waman
ass-n mi d-yewweḍ lexbaṛ n tmenɣiwt-is
anwa ara d-yernun ar tebdart n lmeyytin
bɣan ad jeggren tamurt s wudem abeṛṛani
ečč a lḥaǧ ass-a, azekka d asfaḍ n yimi
acuɣer ? d acu yewwin imcumem ar tullas?
ar ddel mgal  amdan, ladɣa mgal tameṭṭut
ɣur-wat a tasuta n wass-a, ɣur-wat tatut
ihi yessefk fell-aɣ ad neḥrez agerruj-is
nella am yal tasebḥit nteddu ar tesnawit
neqqar-as kan, neẓra ulac win ara tezgel
seg tesdawit n tizi wezzu ar tin n bgayet
imugda ɣlin deg tazla ɣef imeḍqan d usuṛdi
tɛeddan ɣef teqcic n sbeɛṭac n yiseggasen ?
amennuɣ-is d win icudden ar wamek ara nidir
deg useggas n walef u ttɛmye u ṛebɛa uttɛin
isallen qqaren-d katia tugi ad tdel iman-is
d tanelmadt di tesdawit i d-yegren leqdic-a
ur yezmir ad yerẓ leqyud swayes yettwaqqen.
d asfuggel i tebɣest n katia anida i neḥdeṛ.
iceqqeq ifsex igenni,  lehwa tessared aẓekka
iṣeggaden n tmusni,ɣef tmurt ɣeḍlen-d rrehba
katia truḥ d asfel, d asfel i tmetti tatrart.
qqimen-d imeɣnasen n tidet d wid tḥuza taluft
xas neqḍen acḥal d itri igenni ur inegger ara
ɣef lǧerḥ iqcer ad yali,  ad d-nban gar tmura
d acu i d aɣ-d-ssegra tedyant n katia bengana?
seg wass-n mi ḥebsent tefranin, neɣ ahat uqbel
ttaggaden tira acku tettawi-d asaki n wallaɣen
d azamul-nneɣ n useḥbiber ɣef yizerfan n tudert
taqcict akken kan i d-tewweḍ ad tmudd i tmetti,
ttnadin ad tt-ɣeḍḍlen send ad tefrari gar uɣref
teṭṭafar itbiren n wuḍan, bɣiɣ ad d-iniɣ bururu
at-ah yemxudneq yixef-iw, tameddit ad tett lḥal
ay ayen ad d-yefk igenni, ad as yizmir wakal-iw
tarwiḥt a-tt-a di cedda-s, sseɛd yugi ad inaqel
ahat yiwen n wass ad nales talalit, ad d-nduqqes
yessefk fell-aɣ ad d-nemmeslay ɣef katia bengana
tekker-d teslit tenna-yas:ass-a ad eččeɣ yemma-k
xas terka lǧessa tefsi,  tikti ur tettmettat ara
ṭṭuqqutent-d tkerkas, afus ad ten-tyefsin yefcel
acu kan ḥulfant d akken tamurt tetteddu ɣer yifri
deg yiwet n tizlatin-is: ɣas neqqḍen acḥal d itri
tuget seg-neɣ nella d imeɣnasen n yidles d tugdud
fran-tt fell-aɣ zik-nni, uqbel ad d-yeḥder wass-a
ad tefaṛes seg-s twacult-is, timetti-is, tamurt-is
d tadyant n tmenɣiwt n yiwet n tesnawant am nekkni
ddeqs n tlawin d yirgazen, gar-asen katia tilemẓit
katia ur tebɣi ara ad tmudd udem ubrik i tudert-is
timucuha, timseḍsa akked timseɛraq daɣen d tasekla
xerṣum d yiwen ad-yegwri,  ad aɣ-id-ismekti azekka
teǧǧa-yi teqbaylit-iw, ma d nek i tt-yeǧan la smaḥ
agraw n yidles d tugdut, tirni n yiɣallen inemlayen
amennuɣ fiɣef teɣli katia mm sbeɛṭac  n yiseggasen,
tid i xeddmen di beṛṛa neɣ tid yettɣimin di taddart
ddew tmedlin teffeɣ-d teɣri, tesṛaṛeh abbuh a tarwa
xas fell-aɣ qessḥet tizi,  i facal ad d-naǧǧew ddwa
ssbeṛ-iw ad s-ṛebbi-ɣ imɣi, xas ẓriɣ yenza yixef-iw
amaray yettu taɛzizt-is, nettat la tettnadi fell-as
i d-yeglan s lmut n luluf n tlawin, arrac d yirgazen
tugi azaglu,  tebɣa ad tidir d tilellit deg tmurt-is
ulac fell-asent lḥerṣ ɣas ma ur dlint ara iman-nsent
tafat-iw tɣab, teǧǧa-yi. rnu-yas crab, ruḥ tixeṛ-iyi
semmḥet-iyi a leḥbab-iw,  xas fell-i tthubbun leryaḥ
teɛreq cchada i yilles-iw, ad d-inniɣ yenjeṛ-d arwaḥ
yal targa ad tremmeg ad tneggi,  ad ttseggixent tɣezza
nessaweḍ neqbel ad nsemtawi gar katia d wid i tt-yenɣan
tadyant-is tekkes taduli ɣef usenfaṛ i d-wwin yinselmen
tarwa-nneɣ ad d-tennerni,  xas akken deg urebbi n tlufa
ggareɣ-ak-n tiɣri a zheṛ-iw, ttexil-k ma ad tarreḍ awal
ugadeɣ azekka, ugadeɣ aẓekka, ugadeɣ ayen ur d-n-ttuɣal
mazal-aɣ neqqaṛ deg tesnawit ɛebban ṛemḍan di tizi-wezzu
neɣ sekra n tiddukli-nniden anida leqdic icudd ar tugdut
ɣas akken di tmurt n leqbayel ur ṭṭuqqtent ara di tazwara
maca ulac taqcict yeɣlin di tefɣett n yirebraben inselmen
ur s-uffiɣ ddwa i fad n tmara, ar ɣur-s i yesenned lmuḥal
ticki neḥka-d ass-a taqsiḍt n tmenɣiwt n katia i yilmeẓyen
ttmektay-d kan, ayen akken i yi-ǧǧan, ttakeɣ afud i laɛqel
d acu yewwin imcunen ad tɛeddin ɣef teqcicin ? ur negzi kra
ɛeddan wussan, smanat, agguren imenza seg mi teḍra tedyant.
nettawi-d iɣmissen s tefṛansist i d-yetteffɣen di lawan-nni
imawlan uɣalen ttawin-d s yiman-nsen tarwan-sen ladɣa tullas
katia bengana d azamul-nneɣ n useḥbiber ɣef timunent s umata
anfet-iyi kan, d nekk i yeḥulfan, i tyita i d-yerzan s iri-w
ma d leǧruḥ ḥelan, lɛib i d-segran, ad yesseqeceṛ di nnif-iw
maca katia ur tettwassen ara yakan gar-aneɣ send timenɣiwt-is
tiẓeḍt n wussan, ɣer yimdanen kan, i tt-ẓerreɣ ma d nekk fiḥel
imi aṭṭan-a n ukabar n yinselmen ur  yuɣ ara yakan amḍiq-is din
tadyant meqqren i d-yeǧǧan deg-neɣ ccama acku nella d isnawanen
tiqcicin n taddart ama d tid yeɣɣaṛen di tesnawiyin, tisdawiyin
yiwet yiwet, snat snat, arama quccen tamurt, ad ssnegren timetti
awal-nsen itezzi ɣef tsertit mačči ɣef tɣuri neɣ anadi ɣef tmusni
ihi, tikwal ur gezzunt ara akken iwata tamsalt n tmenɣiwt n katia
ur nessawed ara ad neḥdeṛ i temḍel-is imi seg tama nxuṣṣ allalen,
tetteɣiḍ tejra n lim, mi isɛawden ttelqim, teḥced tuɣal d isɣaren
tadyant-is tesban-d amennuɣ gar tlelli d uzaglu, gar tafat d ṭṭlam
acu yewwin inselmen irebraben yeffɣen mgal adabu ɣef sebba n tsertit
ddeqs ur ngezzu ara acku tamurt ur tmudd ara azal n usegmi i tarwa-s
newweḍ-d ar teswiɛt anida uccen yettɛassa ɣef texsi s yisem n usaḍuf
tallit-nni ur aɣ-tunef ara ad neddu deg tɣuri am yisnawanen n umaḍal
tatut d anagraw yettṛebbi udabu azzayri ama s uɣerbaz neɣ s leǧwameɛ
ayagi iban. tilelli n tmeṭṭut d ddwa qqessiḥen mgal ṭṭlam n yinselmen
kra n uqeddic sɣur akabar n yidles d tugdut di tizi wezzi, d tajmilt,
acku ur ttidirent ara di twennaḍt anida timsal cuddent kan ar tineslemt
tamettant n wid yemmuten ɣef tugdut d tlelli ur yessefk ara ad tetwaɣbaṛ
maca acimi tugdi n ccbaḥa, n tlelli, ntmeṭṭut, d wayen i d-yexleq ugama ?
win ur nerri aḍaṛ si temsirin i d-yettmuddu umezruy, ad asent-yales tudert
yal ass yettawi-d amur-is n tekriḍt, lmut, lejruḥ, lbumbat, leḥbus, timenfi
imawlan ur d aɣ-ǧǧin ara ad neddu akken nebɣa ɣef sebba n teswiɛt n yimir-n.
tamettant-is am tid d wid yemmuten deg wannar n yiseɣ mgal amnekcam afṛansis
tugniwin i nettwali deg tiliẓri neɣ iɣmisen, nettargu-tent, deg yiḍ deg wass
d icawranen ur nudir ara tudert akken i tt-ttidiren yilmeẓyen di tmura-nniḍen
ur yessefk ara ad ruḥen kan di rrayeɛ maca akken yeqqaṛ lwennas, asfel-nniḍen
am yal tikelt, nettaɣ-d tasebḥit iɣmisen akken ad nḍal ɣef tlufa n wass yezrin
imi ɣas amennuɣ n katia d win i d-yekkan mgal kennu zdat n yirebraben inselmen
maca terna-d daɣen tabɣest i wid yesseḥbibiren ɣef tmurt n zzayer, ɣef izerfan,
taluft qerriḥet, isalli yesgugum imi, iẓri yeqquṛ, taɣect tebbuḥbeḥ, imi yekkaw
tamesbanit neɣ sekra n leqdic icudden ɣer tugdut ama akked ugraw adelsan amaziɣ
yerra-yas lebṣel, ticcert, iɛeqqaṛen, lmelḥ akked tarnest, sakin iger iɛuras ad qqlun
timenɣiwt-is tesdduqqes-aɣ-d ugar n tidyanin-nniḍen n tmenɣiwt imi seg tama d tameṭṭut,
ɣef wudem n tmetti i nebɣa seg yidisan-is meṛṛa: idles, tutlayt, timagit, d wayen-nniḍen
tessaweḍ tesseɣli-d rrehba deg wid yettennaɣen ɣef tikti-nsen s ubeckiḍ, s ssif, s ddreɛ
nɣan racid tigziri,  smaɛil ur tezgilen ara, nɣan lyabes d flisi,  busebsi d wiyaḍ meṛṛa
ɣas tamettant-is d asuki i yimeɣnasen n tugdut d uḥareb ɣef yizerfan n tmeṭṭut di zzayer,
ɣas ulama aseggas n rebɛa u ttɛin d win n uheggi n ugerdas aneggaru n unekcum ar tesdawit
nelḥa d iseggasen lwaḥid deg ubrid n usbeddi n tegduda n yizerfan d tlelli, uɣen abrid-nniḍen
i yemudden tiṛwiḥin-nsen akken ad tidir tmurt n zzayer di talwit, di tlelli, di teɣdemt tinmettit
a kenza a yelli sbeṛ-as i lmeḥna, d iseflan neɣli ɣef lezzayer uzekka, a kenza a yelli ur ttru yara
taqcict meẓẓiyen i aɣ-d-yefkan taṛwiḥt-is ad nɣeṛ, ad nexdem, ad nečč,  ad merreḥ, ad nidir di talwit
maca tikti tekka-d seg udabu yessersen iẓuṛan-is segmi tewwi tmurt timunent-is mgal fṛansa di tniyen u settin
temmut ɣef lǧal n tsuta n wass-a i yettun ibeddi-is mgal tamḥeqqranit anagar imeɣnasen d wid mazal deg annar tagara-a
katia, taqcict n sbeɛṭac n yiseggasen tesseɣli-d rrehba deg ulawen n luluf n yinselmen irebraben armi ssawḍen ar tmenɣiwt-is
ur neǧǧi ara tikliwin i d-yekkaten s leqseḥ mgal inselmen n ukabar n tirni tineslemt n usellek d wid i ten-yeṭṭafaṛen i yulin s yibeckiḍen s adrar
Merrɣeɣ am uqjun.
Ttmerriɣen ass-a.
Iḥnucceḍ deg ubrid.
Tteḥnuccuḍ di zzit.
Ad imerreɣ ma yufa.
Ad tmerreɣ deg usu.
Imerreɣ gar tullas.
Ttmerriɣeɣ deg usu.
Itteḥnuccuḍ yal ass.
Neḥnucceḍ dɣa neɣli.
Yeḥnucceḍ di Ǧerǧer.
Tettmerriɣem iḍelli.
Ttmerriɣent aggur-a.
Teḥnucceḍ akken tufa.
Tetteḥnuccuḍ di zzit.
Tteḥnuccuḍen di zzit.
Tteḥnuccuḍet di zzit.
Ad merrɣeɣ deg wakal.
Ur imerreɣ ara ass-a.
Tettmerriɣemt ilindi.
Ass-a nmerreɣ deg usu.
Ad ḥnuccḍeɣ deg udfel.
Ad iḥnucceḍ deg udfel.
Itteḥnuccuḍen yal ass.
Tteḥnuccuḍemt di zzit.
Tteḥnuccuḍent di zzit.
Ad tmerrɣeḍ di leḥcic.
Tmerrɣeḍ rrif n umcic.
Tmerrɣemt deg uɣebbaṛ.
Ur merrɣeɣ ara iḍelli.
Ad ḥnuccḍent deg udfel.
Ad neḥnucceḍ deg udfel.
Ad teḥnucceḍ deg udfel.
Ad yeḥnucceḍ deg udfel.
Teḥnuccḍeḍ akken tufiḍ.
Teḥnuccḍem akken tufam.
Tetteḥnuccuḍeḍ di zzit.
Tetteḥnuccuḍem di zzit.
Yetteḥnuccuḍ di Ǧerǧer.
Tmerrɣem ɣef tferracit.
Ur tmerrɣeḍ ara ilindi.
Ur tmerreɣ ara aggur-a.
Yettmerriɣ deg uɣebbaṛ.
Sqef-is ur yesɛi isulas.
Ad teḥnuccḍeḍ deg udfel.
Ad teḥnuccḍem deg udfel.
Win iḥnuccḍen deg ubrid.
Tetteḥnuccuḍemt di zzit.
Ad tmerrɣem deg uɣebbaṛ.
Amennuɣ n nnif d lḥeṛma.
Ad teḥnuccḍemt deg udfel.
Teḥnuccḍemt akken tufamt.
Wid yeḥnuccḍen di Ǧerǧer.
Ad nmerreɣ ɣef tferracit.
Ur nmerreɣ ara aseggas-a.
Ur tmerrɣem ara deg asif.
Yal tiɣmert teffud lqaɛa.
Ḥnucceḍ iḍelli di taddart.
Netteḥnuccuḍ amzal am yiḍ.
Tmerreɣ Ḥnifa gar tarwa-s.
Merrɣen ticki yella uzɣal.
Merrɣent azekka deg ufrag.
Win yeɣɣazen lsas, iṣṣeḥa.
Nteddu di lḥif i d-nɛedda.
Ḥnuccḍeɣ iḍelli di taddart.
Ḥnuccḍen iḍelli di taddart.
Ḥnuccḍet iḍelli di taddart.
Tettmerriɣeḍ ɣef tferracit.
Wiyaḍ teddun, cban izerman.
Ad yesbedd iɣerban d lḥara.
Ad yenfeḍ ula d ciṭ yebnan.
Manama d tamanxt n Beḥrayn.
Win ara iḥnuccḍen deg wakal.
Ḥnuccḍemt iḍelli di taddart.
Ḥnuccḍent iḍelli di taddart.
Ad merrɣen azekka deg ufrag.
Nettmerriɣ azekka deg ufrag.
Agdud yerran di ṭṭerf tigza.
Tubiret d tamdint taqbaylit.
Tteḥnuccuḍeɣ di zzit uzemmur.
Win ara yeḥnuccḍen deg wakal.
Wid yetteḥnuccuḍen di Ǧerǧer.
Tettmerriɣ ticki yella uzɣal.
Ad ḥnuccḍen deg udfel ma bɣan.
Tizi Wezzu d tamanaxt n Ǧerǧeṛ
Ass-a d tameɣra n lbaz d tnina.
Ad tmerrɣemt ticki yella uzɣal.
Ass-a d tameɣra n lbaz bu timmi.
Ad merrɣent tlawin gar yirgazen.
Ass-a d tameɣra n lbaz bu lḥerma.
Ass-a d tameɣra nufa zzin ɣlayen.
Afus deg ufus, nettnadi tiddukla.
Win iɛerḍen tament, ur yesseqneɛ.
Bgayet d tamanaxt n yiḥemmadiyen.
Akfadu tezga-d tama n yiɛekkuren.
Yettnadi kan ad isewweq ɣef selfa.
Wiyaḍ la seqḍaɛen tigusa d wuglan.
Ass-a d tameɣra n lbaz d temtilt-is
Ur merrɣen ara deg annar n userwet.
Ur ḥnuccḍeɣ ara makken yekkat ugris.
Ur ḥnuccḍen ara makken yekkat ugris.
Ur iḥnucceḍ ara makken yekkat ugris.
Ur ḥnuccḍent ara makken yekkat ugris.
Ur neḥnucceḍ ara makken yekkat ugris.
Ur neḥnucceḍ ara makken yekkat ugris.
Ur teḥnucceḍ ara makken yekkat ugris.
Ur yeḥnucceḍ ara makken yekkat ugris.
Ur teḥnuccḍeḍ ara makken yekkat ugris.
Ur teḥnuccḍem ara makken yekkat ugris.
Ax-n affus-iw a win yes-s yegla wasif.
Ur teḥnuccḍemt ara makken yekkat ugris.
Mačči d aḥebbaṛ d yineẓman i t-iceɣben.
Ur netteḥnuccuḍ ara makken yekkat ugris.
Ur merrɣent ara tlawin ass-a di taddart.
Tubiret tezga-d deg tmurt n yiqbayliyen.
Faqen ula d igerdan, d adabu i t-yenɣan.
Ur tmerrɣemt ara a tid yellan din iḍelli.
Afiluẓuf yeṛṛunda, yuɣal yettseṛfiq-asen.
Zzaɛim-nneɣ yeɛya, yesmeɛciq d Yinselmen.
Ceggɛen ar tesdawiyin, Wed Ɛisi d Ḥesnawa.
Kkrent tmesbaniyin, neggurreɛ-d dayen neɛya.
A sellaḥ n At Dwala, ḥerzet taṛwiḥt n Mumuḥ.
Nenna-d: BASṬA leḥqaṛa, di tmurt n Leqbayel.
Tsemmḥeḍ i wid izellun, Ad tneqqeḍ Leqbayel.
Acḥal d ilemẓi i wwin, ar lambaz d Beṛwagiya.
Yefsex yiṭij n unebdu, leḥzen,ṭṭlam, aḥlalas.
Imi t-walaɣ di Surya, Yettẓalla d yibeɛtiyen.
Asmi i d-yessuḍ waḍu, ass-nni mi yeɣli usalas.
Jemmɛet iqjan-nwen, xaṛsum ɛellet-asen snasel.
Ma d kečč ay Apukimun, yesɛukkuzen ɣef lbaṭel.
Adabu aqeṭṭal, adabu amesbaṭli, adabu aḥeqqaṛ.
Bumerdas tezga-d ɣef idis n umalu n Tizi Wezzu.
Ass-n mi yebda uslilu, ass-n mi d-ilul Lwennas.
Tura, nedda ar yiberdan, Ad as-tiniḍ nemsefham.
Fell-as i tekker lgirra, i yeɣlin acḥal d ṛṛuḥ.
Azul i wid yemmuten, ɣef nnif d tlelli d asfel.
Ɛecrin Yebrir di tmanyin, neṭṭerḍeq-d am lbumba.
Yesfex yiṭij deg unebdu, yeɣli-d lxuf d lweswas.
Walit anida ara wwten, nekni ur nennum ara ddel.
D izmawen i trebba tsedda, skeɛwiwen d wuccanen.
Ṭbib n yimexlal yemxel, neɣ seččen-as iḥeckulen.
Kanada akked Marikan zgant-d di Temrikt n Ugafa.
Sidi Ɛic d tamnaḍt i d-yezgan deg waɣir n Bgayet.
Beṛkat ur ttṛebibbet ara, ɣef wanwa i tettkellixem?
Di ṭerḥa n fetter zik iḥbuben s ufella n yiferrugen.
Acu ur fhimeɣ ara, ma yella win ara aq-t-id-isfehmen.
Ṣuɣ-d a Lwennas seg uẓekka, ala keččini i tt-itteqden.
Ineffusen d imaziɣen izedɣen adra n Neffusa deg Libya.
Paris d tamanaxt n Frans i d-yezgan deg umenẓaw n Turuft.
Acḥal ay-agi la nxeṭṭeb ur nufa, nnuda idurar ar at Dwala.
Imezdaɣ n tegzirt n Jeṛba di Tunes qqaṛen-asen: Ijeṛbiyen.
Acḥal ay agi la nxeṭṭeb ur nufi, nnuda idurar, nɛedda Tizi.
Sṭif d tamdint taqbaylit. Tezga-d ar tama n unẓul n Bgayet.
Tayerza s yizgaren xas ini tura tenger di tmurt n leqbayel.
Acḥal ay-agi la nxeṭṭeb s wallen, nnuda idurar n wat Yiraten.
Ma yella win i ken-id-yesteqsan, Init-as d Uleḥlu i t-yecnan.
Acḥal ay-agi la nxeṭṭeb s tuffra, nnuda idurar n Bgayet meṛṛa.
Tamenɣast d tamdint n yitergiyen i d-yezgan deg unẓul n Zzayer.
Icenwiyen d Imaziɣen yellan deg tama n udran n Cenwa di Tipaza.
Kaṭalunya d tamnaḍt di Spanya. Imezdaɣ-is ttmelayen Takaṭalant.
Ɛedmen ula d tiqcicin, amek ur asen-d-qqareḍ ara: Adabu aqeṭṭal.
Acḥal ay-agi la nxeṭṭeb ur nuyis, nnuda idurar nekka-d at Weɣlis.
Rrus d tamurt i d-yezgan gar sin n yimenẓawen: Turuft akked Asya.
Ata wul-iw irkeb-it wurrif, abbuh ya laṭif, Lɛid-iw akked imeḥbas.
Batent d tamdint n yicawiyen i d-yezgan deg yiɣil ufella n Zzayer.
Tiqbayliyin zik tegent tameɣra ticki yiwet seg-sent tger-d aẓeṭṭa.
Abrid n Zzayer ɣezzif, yak yenğer s lḥif, nekk bdiɣ-t-id d iqnaqen.
Fṛansa, Ṭelyan, Spanya, Swis, Biljik d timura i d-yerzan di Turuft.
Llant kuẓ n tsemhuyin di teqbaylit: Tagrest, Tafsut, Anebdu, Amwan.
Aql-iyi di lḥebs n Delles, snesla tqewwes, deg ucebbak la d-neṭṭili.
Icenwiyen ttmeslayen Tacenwit. Tutlayt-nsen tettemcabi ar Teqbaylit.
Abazin, arkul, tabsist, tirkimt d učči aqbuṛ di tmurt n yiqbayliyen.
A ṛebbi kečč d lfakir, ad k-id-nettfekkiṛ, efk-as ayen tebɣa nniya-s.
Bgayet d tamdint n yiqbayliyen i d-yezgan tama n Tizi Wezzu di Zzayer.
Llan Sa n wussan s teqbaylit: Acer, Arim, Aram, Ahad, Amhad, Sem, Sed.
Awi-d afus-ik, ad ak-neqqen lḥenni, keččini a yisli, ṛebbi ad k-ihenni.
Taɣerdayt d tamdint n yimẓabiyen i d-yezgan deg unẓul alemmas n Zzayer.
I tin i d-yennan sbeḥ lxir, Ad as–yefk di lxir, Mennaɣ ad yager fell-as.
Ufiɣ tizya-w tettkeyyif, tiḥdayin di rrif, arrac deg uzniq la ttqessiṛen.
Agadir d tamdint n yicelḥiyen i d-yezgan deg At Mellul di tmurt n Merruk.
Aɛmar At Ḥemmuda aẓar-is n taddart n Tasaft Ugemmun deg tama n Ibudraren.
Ikutamen d imaziɣen n Skikda, Mila, Qul akked temnaḍin i asent-id-yezzin.
S ẓalamiṭ ay ḥettbeɣ, kul sbeḥ yiwet ad tt-ṛẓeɣ, yis-sent sɛeddayeɣ ussan.
Akka i ttarun azemz s teqbaylit:  Acer Semmus Ɣuct Sin n Wagimen Mraw Ṭam.
Leḥsab-iw mi ara t-fakeɣ, a leḥbab ad aken-in-awḍeɣ, ma yebɣa Llah Ṛṛeḥman.
Buṛǧ Buɛrirej d tamdint taqbaylit. Tezga-d ar tama n unẓul asamar n Bgayet.
Yiwet am ta, ur d iyi-teḥqiṛ, mm taɛyunin n ṭṭiṛ, tessen-iyi nekk d aḥewwas.
Tabaṣkit d tutlayt i ttmeslayen imezdaɣ n temnaḍt n Bask gar Spanya d Fṛansa.
Brizil, Aṛjuntin, Cili, Urgway, Paṛagway d timura i d-yezgan deg Temrikt n Unẓul.
Imaziɣen n Zwaṛa deg Libya qqaren-asen Iwilulen neɣ At Wilul, tameslayt-nsen d tawilult.
Llan mraw n yizwilen s teqbaylit: Ilem, yiwen, sin, kraḍ, kuẓ, semmus, sḍis, sa, ṭam, tẓa.
Ini-as i m leɛyun Ṭawes, balak ad tayes, aql-iyi-n deg wussan-a, dayen tura tekfa lɣerba-s.
Takuṛsit d tutlayt i ttmeslayen imezdaɣ n tegzirt n Kuṛsika di Fṛansa. Bɣan ad awin timunent.
Tafriqt neɣ Taferka, Tamrikt n Unẓul, Tamrikt n Ugafa, Turuft, Asya, Ustṛalya d imenẓawen n umaḍal.
Kamirun, Uganda, Sinigal, Mali, Nijer, Nijirya d timura i d-yezgan deg unẓul n tefriqt neɣ n tferka.
Tuget n wučči ar leqbayel zik yebna ɣef iniɣman, zit uzemmur,  timẓin, irden, lbecna, ajilban, abelluḍ.
S teqbaylit neqqaṛ daɣen: Sebt, lḥed, letniyen, ttlata, larbɛa, lexmis, lǧemɛa. Maca si taɛrabt i d-kkan.
Kamal Buɛmaṛa yella zik d aselway n usqamu ussnan n tesga n tutlayt d yidles n tmaziɣt n tesdawit n Bgayet.
Ikurdiyen, Irifiyen, Icawiyen, Ikaṭaliyen, Ikuṛsiken, Ibaṣkiyen, Ikuṣiyen akked Iqbayliyen bɣan meṛṛa ad awin timunent.
Llan mraw sin n wagguren s teqbaylit: Yennayer, Fuṛar, Meɣres, Yebrir, Mayyu, Yunyu, Yulyu, Ɣuct, Ctamber, Tuber, Wamber, Dujember.
Ad d-tḍil tafat-iw.
Ad tini wagi d laman.
Acḥal i uɣalen a lɣiḍa?
Ad uɣaleɣ ar tedyant-iw.
Anagar urfan i tesseṛwa.
D uqeṣṣab-ik n deffir.
Acḥal  ẓid-it i usuden!
Allaɣ-iw yeffud tiḥkayin.
Amek i t-id-qublen dinna?
Ad ten-yessenger Dda Qiqi!
Ad fell-aɣ cehhden s ẓẓur.
Ageldun-nsen yeṭṭef abrid.
Anda truḥeḍ d axeṣ̣ṣ̣ar.
D acu ara yi-d-tawi tguni?
D ayen i wumi yezmer lǧib.
D ṣṣda tamihawt seddaw-as.
Dɣa yekkes afus-is fell-i.
A yemma deg wesfillet ḥbes.
Ad tili lḥaǧa i ten-yexḍan.
Ɣef tuyat yeɣli-d umzur-is.
Am wass-a ad d-yeḍher sseḥ.
Aneggaru ad d-yerr tawwurt.
Ar jida i yi-tettawi tirga.
D acu n tmara i ten-yerran?
Ad iruḥ ar tussna i iḥeṛcen.
Akka i truḥ Tanina tamɣbunt.
Akken kan ad as-yebru mmi-s.
Ha-t-an usfel n ugama awi-t.
Armi i d-yufa tifrat i wugur.
Ass-a ad-neqqim kan di tidet.
Yečča ameẓẓuɣ n yilef, yeḥla.
Inexḍaben ttasend di yal tama.
Ad k-id-yesduqqes ucelyaḍ-nni.
D ussan-nni n waṭṭan d wurfan.
Ad tili ugar gar sin imeddukal.
Amzun akken teḍfer-iyi tucerka.
Asmi ara d-tuɣaleḍ d tameɣra-k.
Axaṭer mačči kifkif-itent akk.
D nettat i ɣ-d-ineǧren iberdan.
D wayen i ɣef i yi-weṣṣa ass-n.
D acu issaɣay urkaḍ deg ulawen?
Dɣa ttaḍṣaɣ ula d nekk yid-sen.
Dd tafeḍ deg-s tamusni d tzemna.
Ad tzeṭṭ tilufa akken i s-yehwa.
Ad yettu uḍebbal ahuzzu n tuyat.
Ad zzizfent maḥyaf gar yimdanen.
ad k-id-yaweḍ wayen i ak-yehwan.
Am yiḍ am ass, ad ttemsetbaɛent.
Amɣar d temɣart akken bɣun dren,
Amzun kra yellan d ahuski yelha.
Argaz d targa, tamettut d tamda.
Argaz ikerrez, tameṭṭut tḥerrez.
Armi yewweḍ ar tlemmast n wasif.
Astan n tmetti d usili n lxedma.
Ayen d-tenna d wayen ur d-tenni.
Ečč a lḥaǧ, acku azekka ad ngaǧ.
Ḍefreɣ kan idis n yiwen n ubrid.
Ad d-tuɣaleḍ fell-aneɣ d agellid.
Akked imurar-nni swayes yejgugel.
Am win yeččḥen di tebburt n ssuq.
Ass-a yella gar-aneɣ yiwen wugur.
Aya, i tent-yettarran d tushilin.
Aya,  s uttiki n tmura yennuflin.
Azger ur ireggel ara ɣef yicc-is.
D tasekkurt i d-ifka ṛebbi deg-s.
Deffir-s kan deg umkan wis setta.
Dɣa, timeẓẓuɣin-nneɣ ad  ṭṭurcen.
Ad ak-heggiɣ tameɣra s yiḍebbalen.
Am akken yalla wacu i ten-iɣurren.
Argaz d tiqqit, tamttut d tabaqit.
Awren d awren, tiyita deg ifassen.
Aɣref yedduklen ur t-yettṛuẓ yiwen.
Akesser d akesser Ṛebbi yefka afus.
Dda Qiqi ad sent-id-yebḍu i seṭṭac.
Ha-t-an nezzi-d akk i temsal ass-a !
Akken akk i d-kkren warrac di tallit-nni.
Dɣa, twala-yi-d akken kan i d-ukiɣ seg ussu.
Akken qqaren:  Ur yečči seksu, ur isenna aksum.
Dayen, yeqḍeɛ layas, acku ass-a tuɣal d tameṭṭut.
Yesken-asen-t-id akken ad teẓren ma yecbeḥ neɣ ala.
A taqeddact-nneɣ, a Tiziri, a tin ɛzizen ɣef wulawen.
Ay at leεraḍ temlek-iyi Jeǧǧiga mm leɛyul tiberkanin.
Ay ul-iw gezment temqestin, tura yegra-d yebḍa ɣef sin.
Akken i tt-walat, tefṛeḥ, tɛeggeḍ: A baba! Acḥal meqqeṛ!
Ay ifassen ur kkatet ṭṭbel, ay timeccacin ur kkatemt zzedwa.
Taḥbulut ur tebḍa, aqjun yečča, lmal yeksa, tamɣart ur tris.
A bu tberna ḥiwel-d tissit, ticki tfukeḍ rnu ahuzzu n wammas.
Am terwiḥt n terwiḥt-iw, yal aḥulfu yesdubuy deg-s cwiṭ cwiṭ.
Ad anaf deg wahil-a yiwen wulɣu ɣef uqadeṛ n yizerfan n tbaḍnit.
Imawlan-is ffɣen ar uzemmur makken i tefka ttiɛad i Rabeḥ Ucaɛban.
Mi i s-yessiwel: Alḥaǧ, Alḥaǧ, yezzi-d ɣur-s yenna-as: Snat i s-ɛiɣ.
Akken i yella lḥal, yerza ɣur-s, iwwet-it s ubeqqa, yesseɛwej-as igumas.
Akken yeffeɣ ɣer tejmeεt ufella, yemmuger-d axenfuc-nni n ccix n taddart.
Agellid yenna-yas deg awal-is : a tagelliḍt, ur umineɣ s tgeldunt d ugeldun.
Mi twala aqcic-nni, bu teclaɣmin tarqaqanin d wallen tizṛaṛaqin, dɣa ul-is yeddeqdiq seg tayri.
Ad s-yettɣemmiz deg ubrid, nettat terra iman-is ur d-cliɛ, meɛna ul-is yeqqar-as: Rnu, ḍfer-iyi-d ar uxxam.
Yezger Saɛid Usliman ar tala, yufa din tameɛcuqt-is, dɣa tenna-yas: A Saɛid, tesneḍ baba, rzu-d tammedit-a ɣur-s.
Dehbiya Lḥusin tuɣal-d si tḥanut, dɣa Busaɛd Uṛemḍan yegzem-as-d abrid, yenna-yas: Ɣas mazal smana i zwaǧ-nneɣ, meɛna seg ass-a ara nemyeḥmal.
Ɣas akken tezweǧ s warraw-is, yemmeɣ yeẓmeḍ-itt-id ar wul-is, yenna-yas: Tura argaz-im d baba-m mmuten, ad kem-yehdu Ṛebbi, ula d nekk d tarwiḥt.
Yeṭṭef-itt-id Qasi waɛli zdat-s, yiwen ufus ɣef wayet, tayeḍ deffir n temgerḍt, iẓmeḍ-itt-id ar yidmaren-is, yenna-yas: Ḥemmleɣ-kem a Faḍma lḥusin.
Amek ih !
yiwen uqjun
nekk briɣ-as
yenna-yas ih
ṣṣenf amenzu
d ukebbuḍ-iw
yebwi arrazen
di yal tallit
ɛeddan wussan
ǧǧiɣ-d isefra
i tmeṭṭut-iw?

inṭeq umeqran
isekla qquren
iwwi tt yid-s
ldiɣ allen-iw
maḥsub ttaken
qqiment din-a
s yal taččart
ta sennig ta

yettu tayri-s

yezger izuɣar
yiwen n umalu
ultma di tira

argaz yuɣal-d
Tanaṣlit dagi
Uqbel ad-igen
D nutni diɣen
am Wayt Aḥmed
iǧǧa-yi wakud
iger-d nnehta
yiwen yiḍ ihi
Teɣli-d tduli
uɣaleɣ s iḍes
ur yezmir ara
wayeḍ yestufa
ur d-tusi ara
ur d-tusi ara
ihemmej yesseḍ
kullec ibeddel
lweqt d amuḍin
necceḍ nwexxer
rnu-yi-d wayeḍ
tbeddel ssekka
terwi tebberwi
ugadeɣ yal cci
ad k-snecweɣ !
d acu i yeẓra?
afriwen refden
akka d azedgan
akken i d-nlul
deg uɣṛum-nsen
di yal tiɣmert
ǧǧiɣ-d akk aya
ǧǧiɣ-d idlisen
ɣur-s tiklatin
ibḍa-ten wasif
ifrax d idurar
inna deg ul is
inumak si tama
iwwi-d abbuxen
ma ur tt-tufiḍ
muḥend u yaḥya
ṛuḥeɣ ad ttruɣ
s tezmert-nwen
s tutlayt-nsen
si tama-nniḍen

mi i d-yemmekti

yendeh uṭṭumbur
ihuh! dduqseɣ !
ma teɛyu, teɛya
inna-yasen-t-id
a yeẓra kullec!
afus yessen imi
di taluft ddreɣ
deggreɣ iɣes-is
ihi ula d nekki
kulci ad yefḍeḥ
mmi-s n temɣart
neḥsel gar-asen
TAƐRICT s Tcawit
gar-asen ungalen
isefra acek-iten
Yettgallan s Ḥemza
ad tettsummu deg-i
Ihi, tanemmirt-nwen
d tamedyazt igerrzen
Saɛad Silya: TANEKWA
Nettkel-it fell-asen
netta yeẓra annect-a
Afud igerrzen a Yunes
Nɣil dɣa ad t-εellfen
Wid yeɣran llif el ba
Uɣalen-aɣ d icawraren
walaɣ unuɣ n tɣellaft
ya ddin uqabac yeḥfan
Tarwa-s ddan d irbiben
Crif Lasḥeb: YIR TUDERT
Nefka aεejmi i wuccanen
Yid-sen mi nezdi tamurt
Ad t-budden ad t-εetqen
acku werǧin texla lexla
akka i ires di lekwaɣeḍ
Bgayet d Tizi d Tubiret
Wis kraḍ yeḥbes-d ɣur-i
iwwi arraw is ar uɣerbaz
ihi walit-tt di tensa-agi
Ad yeks i lεedra n tefsut
ttrağuɣ Ḥayat akked linda
ama s uziraz neɣ s uselkim
Kksen-as tuṭṭḍa s wacburen
Daɣnetta akka i d as-teḍra
I yicenga-s ad ɣ-tt-ḥerzen
Taggara leqqmen-tt s el εa
Bdiɣ ttwaliɣ deg udlis-nni
Qqareɣ asefru deffir wayeḍ
Amer yella wacu deg i txuss
Tasmuḍi n tkerrust acek-itt
nettat tezwar, netta yeẓwaṛ
di meɣres zuǧ alaf u seṭṭac
Numen-iten asmi d aɣ-ṛeggmen
Ziɣ ɣer-s i d-nebbhen tafrut
lebɣi yella, tazmert teǧǧa-t
Iɛedda remḍan, yusa-d caɛban
A yeli a yelli tecbiḍ tiziri
wa nettḥir s axxam ad d-yezzi
ayen i d-teǧǧa, d ayen yelhan
isenned itekka, wayeḍ ittekka
wwet ɣer sdat, wwet ɣer deffir
Walit tura kenwi d acu d-tinim
Faḍila Becaṛ: ISUƔAN D YIḤULFAN
Iḍelli, uɣeɣ-d adlis n tmedyazt
Azul a mmi ! Ass-a ad ak-nezyen
Tzemrem ad twalim tamacahutt-agi
isemma-as bab-is Taḥbult n tatut
Bdiɣ keččmeɣ cwiṭ cwiṭ deg udlis
Tameddit-nni, refdeɣ-d adlis-nni
d tamuɣli n tiṭ yettnadin tifrat
ttaḍṣan-iyi-d s wuglan n tteryel
Ur ččiɣ seksu, ur seqqaɣ s lexliɛ
Ula wi yewwten agejdur s uqerdac!
Ufiɣ iman-iw, lbenna n teswiɛt-nni
ḥemmlen izamaren, hemmlen wakraren
Din, sekrent ṛṛeḥba i tukksa n sser
fkiɣ-awen-tt d tarzeft i warraw-nwen
Ar tayeḍ ihi, sɣuṛ Muḥend Akli Salḥi
S yin akkin dliɣ ɣef yiḍrisen n udlis
Mexluf Qasi neɣ Mexluf n At Qasi U Sɛid
tesderwec-iyi ḥnifa, terna-d ula d crifa
kkatent ṭbel mi tefsex "trugza d tfuḥlit"
wayeḍ nettmenni awer d-yezzi (ala aḍar-is)
A yelli, tegliḍ-d s rrbeḥ, segmi i d-luleḍ
axeddim yelhan, d win i d-yettawin tadrimt
Tagi d tamacahutt umi semmaɣ TISLIT N UDFEL
Amek akken, ufiɣ-d iman-iw ttaruɣ fell-asen
d asteqsi ɣef wamek i inekkeṛ umdan iman-is
mi tt-twalam, ur tettut ara fekt-d ṛṛay nwen
rrant urar mi neṭṭlent "azalen d yimenzayen"
Ɣef wammud n yisefra n Mexluf n At Qasi U Sɛid
Yunes ittekki deg waṭṭas n tfaskiwin n tmedyazt
D tiẓrigin Ɛeccab i t-id-isuffɣen ussan-agi kan
Wissen akken d acu i ttraǧuɣ, lliɣ di tkerrust.
ttalseɣ-asen taɣuri i setta uɛecrin n yisefra-nni
Taḥbult n tatut d asafar i yettnadi wallaɣ yuysen
D acu kan : taḥbult ur tettewwa ɣef yiwen n wudem
d iheṛcawanen, d aḥercawan, d ḥercaw, d iḥercawen
Mass Aɣugali atan daɣ la d-yettheggi idlisen-nniḍen
Tlata n yidlisen ara d-iffɣen deg waggur-agi n yulyu
Taḥbult n tatut d tiɣwist n win ittwaqerḥen sdat tmara
Tasmuḍi di tkerrust, teslafay, di beṛṛa azɣal yeslewliw
din yettaf iman-is "uḥeccad", tettaf iman-is "teɣyulit"
acku amdan akken i isseḥluy lejruḥ i yettili d yir ṣṣbuḥ
d netta i iɛerken, d netta i imeslen, d netta i isewwayen
tettaf iman-is "tzelgi", tettaf iman-is tlufḍa d "tiluxxext"
Daxel n tkerrust, tasmudi acek-itt, di beṛṛa azɣal yeslemliw.
d tamxaleft : texleḍ lehna n tasmuḍi-nni d ccbaḥa n yisefra-nni
d asteqsi ɣef wamek i ibeqqu ad yuɣal umdan d wayeḍ (mačči d netta)
Akka i d taḥbult, sin n wudmawen i tesɛa : udem iqebqeb, udem d lemri.
win akken yenɣa "wuzzu n wissen", win ittuɣellben : nnig tezmert d ulac
acku nfeṛṛeḥ mi d-iruḥ win nḥemmel akken i nfeṛṛeḥ mi iruḥ win ur nebɣi
yettmuqul deg-s s tmuɣli n umuḍin ur nezmir ad yekker seg tesga i t-yeṭṭfen
Akka i t-id-yenna Mexluf (d Qasi neɣ n At Qasi U Sɛid) : "yella win, yella win"
neɣ Mexluf n At Qasi U Sɛid, akka i as-yehwa, d isefra icebḥen, d iḍrisen yelhan.
walaɣ awal i d-yeddan deffir n udlis, taɣellaft tis rebɛa : d tukkist seg usefru wis rebɛa
Taḥbult n tatut (diɣen) d tiṭ n leɛqel di tegnatin icebken acku ddunit teɛmer s temlel d tebrek
asebtar yettakk-iyi i wayeḍ almi i d-ufiɣ iman-iw ttnemḍareɣ gar yisefra n Mexluf n At Qasi U Sɛid
Ha-t-ah kra n wayen i uriɣ :    Taḥbult n tatut d tagella n win i as-iḥedren i tudert amek i tzelleg
Amek akken ara kfuɣ awal-iw : uriɣ-d kan aḍris-agi akken ad awen-d-iniɣ belli isefra i d-yeddan deg wammud-a n Mexluf Qasi
Yetqelleq Yidir ɣef Newwara.
Ur yettcukku ara Yidir di Newwara.
Yeɛreḍ Yidir Newwara ad ččen.
Teɛǧeb Yidir lɛeqliyya n Newwara.
Isawel Yidir i Newwara.
Yal ass isawal Yidir i Newwara.
Iḥemmel ad yeqqim Yidir netta d Newwara.
Yefka-yas Yidir tajeǧǧigt i Newwara.
Iḥemmel ad isel Yidir i Newwara.
Yidir akked Newwara d tizyiwin.
Ur yugar ara Yidir Newwara di leɛmer.
Yerza Yidir ɣer Newwara.
Iruḥ Yidir ad d-iẓer Newwara.
Waqila yettasem Yidir si Newwara?
Yesnuɣna Yidir Newwara?
Yessuter Yidir ssmaḥ i Newwara.
Ur yefhim ara Yidir Newwara.
Ur yerǧi ara Yidir ayagi si Newwara.
Ur yexdiɛ ara Yidir Newwara.
Ur yerwil ara Yidir ɣef Newwara.
Acimi i d-yenna akka Yidir?
Acimi i as-yenna akka Yidir i Newwara?
Yugad Yidir ɣef Newwara.
Yuɣ-d Yidir takerrust.
Melmi ara yezweǧ Yidir?
Melmi ara iruḥ Yidir ad d-ixḍeb Newwara?
Ikukra Yidir ad iqerreb ɣer Newwara?
Isetḥa Yidir ad as-yini i Newwara.
Iɛreq-as wawal i Yidir zdat Newwara.
Isawel Yidir i Newwara di tilifun.
Yuɣ-d Yidir aqrab i Newwara.
Twalaḍ acḥal i iḥemmel Yidir Newwara?
Twalaḍ acḥal i yettergigi Yidir ɣef Newwara?
Twalaḍ amek ur yettak ara Yidir afus di Newwara?
Qeblen Yimawlan N Newwara Yidir?
Anda i yessen Yidir Newwara?
Si melmi i yessen Yidir Newwara?
D acu ara tiniḍ di Yidir akked Newwara?
Ur yeǧǧi ara Yidir Newwara.
Yeggumma ad yeṣber Yidir ɣef Newwara.
Yesbeɣ Yidir axxam-is.
Iɛawed Yidir asbaɣ i wexxam-is.
Yuɣ-d Yidir kra n leḥwal.
Acuɣer i d-isawel Yidir?
D acu i yebɣa Yidir ɣur-i?
D acu i yeḥwaǧ Yidir?
D acu i yeḥwaǧ Yidir ɣur-i?
D acu i d-yewwin Yidir?
D acu i yewwin Yidir ad d-yini lehdur-agi?
D acu i d-yesseḍṣen Yidir?
D acu i d-yesseḍṣayen Yidir?
Amek i d-yesseḍṣay Yidir Newwara?
Tettaḍṣa aṭas Newwara.
Aṭas i turǧa Newwara Yidir.
Urɛad tekfi Newwara leqraya.
Di tesdawit i teqqar Newwara.
Isseḍṣay-d Yidir Newwara s temseḍṣa?
Tḥemmel Newwara timseḍṣa.
Iḥekku-d Yidir aṭas timseḍṣa i Newwara.
Aṭas n temseḍṣa i yessen Yidir.
Tugi ad teṣber Newwara.
Yeggumma wul ad tt-yettu.
Ur yuksan ara ugeswaḥ n Yidir.
Iḥemmel Yidir tibexsisin.
Itett Yidir aṭas timellalin.
Itett Yidir aṭas n tmellalin.
D acu i tḥemmel Newwara ad t-tečč?
Iḥemmel Yidir ad isewweq.
Ittruḥu Yidir ɣer lexla.
Tleqqeḍ Newwara azemmur.
Tuɣ-d Newwara lḥaǧa i Yidir ilmend n umulli-s.
Tḥekku aṭas Newwara i yemma-s.
Tettsetḥi aṭas Newwara baba-s.
Teffeɣ Newwara d yemma-s ad merrḥent.
Ittɛawan Yidir baba-s di kra n lecɣal.
Ɣas d tanelmadt, tettɛawan Newwara yemma-s di ccɣel n wexxam.
Yal taggara n ddurt, tkeččem-d Newwara si tesdawit.
Tuɣ-d Newwara amendil i yemma-s.
Yuɣ-d Yidir tacacit i baba-s.
Ifreḥ aṭas Muḥend s tcacit i as-d-yuɣ mmi-s Yidir.
Ruḥent-as tsura n tkerrust i Yidir.
Melmi i ak-ruḥent tsura n tkerrust, a Yidir?
Yufa Yidir tisura n tkerrust.
Anda i tufiḍ tisura n tkerrust, a Yidir?
Yeffeɣ Yidir ad imerreḥ.
Iṣubb Yidir ɣer lexla ad ikkes lxiq.
Yennuɣna kan Yidir ass-a.
Wissen d acu i yesnuɣnan Yidir?
Yerfa mliḥ Yidir ass-a.
D acu i yesserfan Yidir?
Yesteqsa-d yiwen ɣef Yidir ṣṣbeḥ-agi.
Anwa i d-yesteqsan ɣef Yidir ṣṣbeḥ-agi?
Sawlen-as-d i Yidir si tejmaɛt.
Yeffeɣ Yidir ɣer tejmaɛt.
Iɛeṭṭel Yidir di tejmaɛt.
Ur iɛeṭṭel ara Yidir di tejmaɛt.

Anwa i m-d-yeɣṛan?
Anwa i k-d-yeɣṛan?
Acḥal i tettlusum?
Acḥal i tettlusuḍ?
Teḥla cwiṭ yaya-m?
Teḥla cwiṭ yaya-k?
Ixeddem ɣur-k Tom?
Tom ixeddem ɣur-k?
Anda i yezdeɣ Tom?
Yexṣeṛ lḥal ass-a.
D abaḥan uqcic-agi.
Ḥulfan-as i wezɣal?
D taselmadt n yoga.
Awi-tent ma tṛuḥeḍ.
Awit-ten ma tṛuḥem.
Awimt-t ma tṛuḥemt.
Ad tt-awin yid-sen?
Ad t-tawim yid-wen?
Ad tawi cwiṭ yid-s?
Ad yawi cwiṭ yid-s?
Ad iniɣ tḥemmlem-t.
Ad iniɣ tḥemmleḍ-t.
Anda-t ukursi-nwen?
Anda-t ukursi-inem?
Anda-t ukursi-inek?
Diri-t wurar-nkent.
Mazal-ik kan akken.
Dhu kan d yiman-im.
Dhu kan d yiman-ik.
Wali kan ma jban-d.
Neẓmet i lhem-nwen.
D ta i d ayla-nwen?

Tisekkadin-a, inem?
Tisekkadin-a, nwen?

Ad testufuḍ umbɛed?

Tecfiḍ ɣef zik-nni?

Tḍemɛemt kra seg-s?

D zzhu kan i tebɣa.
Tebɣa kan ad tezhu.

Tezwar teqbaylit-ik.
Zwiret allaɣen-nwen.
Acḥal i wen-d-mazal?
Ddmet amur-nwen kan.

Tḥulfam-as i wezɣal?
Tḥulfaḍ-as i wezɣal?
D acu i k-id-yewwin?

Ad am-d-inin azekka.
Ad ak-d-inin azekka.

Ad t-awint yid-sent?

Ad tawiḍ cwiṭ yid-k?
Tebrez-d taxxamt-is?
Yebrez-d taxxamt-is?
Aẓet akin tettfuḥum!
La itezzi leɛqel-is?
La itezzi leɛqel-im?
La itezzi leɛqel-ik?

Ur heddeṛ ara yid-i.
Ur ttɣimi ara yid-s.
Ur ttɣimi ara yid-i.
Ur tbeddlem ara akk.
Ur tbeddleḍ ara akk.
Yettban ɣef udem-ik.
Yettban ɣef udem-im.
Ad wen-ceɛleɣ tafat?
Ad wen-senseɣ tafat?

Wali kan ma yejba-d.

Ur heddṛet ara yid-i.
Ur ttɣimit ara yid-s.
Ur ttɣimit ara yid-i.

Mazal-ikem kan akken.
Ur tbeddlemt ara akk.

Keṛheɣ amkan am wagi.

Ad iyi-texḍum neɣ ala?
Ad iyi-texḍuḍ neɣ ala?

Ur ttɣimimt ara yid-i.

Ttxil-k da tlaq tsusmi.

Tettaxṛemt i txeṣṣaṛin?

Tzemreḍ i usemmiḍ am wa?
Ɛni tettarumt deg ṭṭlam?
Tettḥibbimt ad teffɣemt?
Ad tawimt cwiṭ yid-kent?
Berzent-d taxxamt-nsent?
Tessared akk leqlud-nni?
Yessared akk leqlud-nni?
Tsefḍemt akk leḥyuḍ-nni?
Tezmer ad texdem weḥd-s?
Yezmer ad yexdem weḥd-s?
Tessen ad texdem kullec?
Yessen ad yexdem kullec?
Ahat tebɣiḍ ad d-terreḍ?
Ahat tebɣam ad d-terrem?
D acu i kent-yuɣen akka?
Ixuṣ-iken aɛeqqa n sser!
Ixuṣ-ikem aɛeqqa n sser!
Bɣiɣ ad teɣṛem tabrat-a.
Bɣiɣ ad teɣṛeḍ tabrat-a.
Ur ttmeslayet ara yid-s.
Ur ttmeslayet ara yid-i.
Ur ttmeslay ara yid-sen.
Ur heddṛemt ara yid-sen.
Ur heddṛet ara yid-sent.
Ur ttɣimit ara yid-sent.
Ur ttɣimimt ara yid-sen.
Tban tuzert ɣef udem-im.
Tban tuzert ɣef udem-ik.
Dhumt kan d yiman-nkent.
Xezzṛet kan agejdur-agi.
Ad d-gezmen tamtunt-nni?

Ad d-gezmeɣ tamtunt-nni?

Ad iyi-tawiḍ ɣer sbiṭaṛ?

Jeddi-k mazal-it yehlek?

Anda i llan warraw-nwen?
Ɛni ṛṛẓiɣ-am aqeṛṛu-yim?
Ɛni ṛṛẓiɣ-ak aqeṛṛu-yik?
Tettemsefhamemt yid-sent?
Tettum d acu i s-txedmem?
Tettuḍ d acu i s-txedmeḍ?
Tettum d acu iyi-txedmem?
Tettuḍ d acu iyi-txedmeḍ?
Tzemremt i usemmiḍ am wa?
Waqila xuṣṣen deg leɛqel?
D acu i ken-yewwin ɣur-s?
D acu i kem-yewwin ɣur-s?
D acu i k-yewwin ɣur-sen?
Meɛna uɣalet-d ttxil-wet!
Tberzemt-d taxxamt-nkent?
Tessardem akk leqlud-nni?
Tessardeḍ akk leqlud-nni?
Ssnent ad xedment kullec?

Xdem-as akken i k-texdem.
Xdem-as akken i k-yexdem.

Bɣiɣ ad teɣṛemt tabrat-a.
Ur ttmeslayemt ara yid-s.
Ur ttmeslayemt ara yid-i.
Ur ttmeslay ara yid-sent.
Ur heddṛemt ara yid-sent.
Ur ttɣimimt ara yid-sent.
D kemm i d ssebba n waya.
D kečč i d ssebba n waya.
Yettban ɣef udmawen-nwen.
Ttxil-wet da tlaq tsusmi.
Xezzṛemt kan agejdur-agi.
Ad d-gezment tamtunt-nni?
Ad d-gezmemt tamtunt-nni?
Ad iyi-tawimt ɣer sbiṭaṛ?
Semmeḍ lḥal deg uxxam-im?
Semmeḍ lḥal deg uxxam-ik?
Akken i s-txedmem kifkif.
Akken i s-txedmeḍ kifkif.
Ɣur-m ad teɣliḍ deg aluḍ.
Ɣur-k ad teɣliḍ deg aluḍ.
Tewɛeṛ fell-i tefṛansist.
Yeḥla mmi-twen neɣ mazal?
Baba-tkent ur t-yuɣ wara?
D acu i yuɣen imawlan-im?
D acu i yuɣen imawlan-ik?
Amek i yuɣalen warraw-im?
Amek i yuɣalen warraw-ik?
Anda i llan warraw-nkent?
Ṛṛẓemt iqeṛṛa-nkent cwiṭ!
Anti i wen-yeslemden aya?
Anwi i wen-yeslemden aya?
Anta i wen-yeslemden aya?
D taqbaylit i k-id-yefkan.
Zwiret seg teqbaylit-nwen.
Fell-i i turam asefru-nni?
Fell-i i turiḍ asefru-nni?
Waqila xuṣṣent deg leɛqel?
Waqila txuṣṣem deg leɛqel?
Waqila txuṣṣeḍ deg leɛqel?
Fell-am i la tzuxxun akka?
Fell-ak i la tzuxxun akka?
Tessnem ad turarem diminu?
Tessneḍ ad turareḍ diminu?
Ur zmireɣ ara kan ad gneɣ.
D acu i kent-yewwin ɣur-s?
D acu i k-yewwin ɣur-sent?
D acu i k-id-yewwin ɣur-i?
D kemm i yesxeṛben kullec.
D kečč i yesxeṛben kullec.
Tessardemt akk leqlud-nni?
Tzemreḍ ad txedmeḍ weḥd-k?
Tessnem ad txedmem kullec?
Tessneḍ ad txedmeḍ kullec?
Ahat tebɣamt ad d-terremt?
Diri-t wamek i tetturarem.
Diri-t wamek i tetturareḍ.
Ur ttmeslayet ara yid-sen.
Anda ara k-id-afeɣ umbeɛd?
D kenwi i d ssebba n waya.
Ttxil-kent da tlaq tsusmi.
Acḥal i tzemrem ad taṛǧum?
Acḥal i tzemreḍ ad taṛǧuḍ?
Yella lgaz deg taddart-im?
Yella lgaz deg taddart-ik?
Teǧǧam weltma-twen weḥd-s?
Ɣur-wet ad yenz nnif-nwen!
Akken i s-txedmemt kifkif.
Tfukkem almad n teqbaylit?
Tfukkeḍ almad n teqbaylit?
Tessnem ad tessiɣem times?
Tessneḍ ad tessiɣeḍ times?
D acu n tkeṛṛust i tesɛam?
D acu n tkeṛṛust i tesɛiḍ?
Tleqḍem azemmur aseggas-a?
Tleqḍeḍ azemmur aseggas-a?
I yemma-twen amek i tella?
Teddmemt-n leḥwayeǧ-nkent?
Ayɣer i tneǧǧɛem gma-twen?
Taqbaylit tesɛa azal mliḥ!
Anti i kent-yeslemden aya?
Anwi i kent-yeslemden aya?
Anta i kent-yeslemden aya?
Ɣef umi i la theddṛem akka?
Ɣef umi i la theddṛeḍ akka?
Fell-i i turamt asefru-nni?
Fell-as i turam asefru-nni?
Fell-as i turiḍ asefru-nni?
Tettum d acu i sen-txedmem?
Tettuḍ d acu i sen-txedmeḍ?
Tettumt d acu i s-txedmemt?
Tettumt d acu iyi-txedmemt?
Waqila txuṣṣemt deg leɛqel?
Fell-am i la tzuxxunt akka?
Fell-am i la tetzuxxu akka?
Fell-am i la yetzuxxu akka?
Fell-ak i la tetzuxxu akka?
Fell-ak i la yetzuxxu akka?
Fell-ak i la tzuxxunt akka?
Fell-i i la tetzuxxum akka?
Fell-i i la tetzuxxuḍ akka?
Ur zmireɣ ara kan ad ṭṭṣeɣ.
D acu i ken-yewwin ɣur-sen?
D acu i kem-yewwin ɣur-sen?
Meɛna uɣalemt-d ttxil-kent!
D netta i yesxeṛben kullec.
D nutni i yesxeṛben kullec.
D kenwi i yesxeṛben kullec.
Zemren ad xedmen weḥd-nsen?
D lɛib ma tennam-iyi-d ala!
D lɛib ma tenniḍ-iyi-d ala!
Xdem-asen akken i m-xedmen.
Xdem-asen akken i k-xedmen.
Diri-t wamek i tetturaremt.
Ur ttmeslayemt ara yid-sen.
Ur ttmeslayet ara yid-sent.
Tettban tuzert ɣef udem-im.
Tettban tuzert ɣef udem-ik.
Zeɛma d kemm i ixedmen aya?
Zeɛma d kečč i ixedmen aya?
Uɣen-tent msakit deg allaɣ!
Yuɣ-itent meskin deg allaɣ!
Semmeḍ lḥal deg uxxam-nwen?
Akken i sen-txedmem kifkif.
Akken i sen-txedmeḍ kifkif.
Ɣur-wet ad teɣlim deg aluḍ.
Tfukkemt almad n teqbaylit?
Yelha usmel-nni neɣ diri-t?
D acu n tkeṛṛust i tesɛamt?
Tleqḍemt azemmur aseggas-a?
Teḥṛec yelli-m deg uɣerbaz?
Teḥṛec yelli-k deg uɣerbaz?
Jeddi-twen mazal-it yehlek?
I yemma-tkent amek i tella?
Uɣalen watmaten-im s axxam?
Uɣalen watmaten-ik s axxam?
D acu i yuɣen imawlan-nwen?
Amek i yuɣalen warraw-nwen?
Ɛni ṛṛẓiɣ-awen iqeṛṛa-nwen?
D taqbaylit i ken-id-yefkan.
D taqbaylit i kem-id-yefkan.
Zwiremt seg teqbaylit-nkent.
Ɣef umi i la theddṛemt akka?
Fell-as i turamt asefru-nni?
Tettum d acu i sent-txedmem?
Tettuḍ d acu i sent-txedmeḍ?
Fell-as i la tetzuxxum akka?
Fell-as i la tetzuxxuḍ akka?
Fell-i i la tetzuxxumt akka?
Tessnemt ad turaremt diminu?
D acu i kent-yewwin ɣur-sen?
D acu i ken-yewwin ɣur-sent?
D acu i ken-id-yewwin ɣur-i?
D acu i kem-yewwin ɣur-sent?
D acu i kem-id-yewwin ɣur-i?
D nettat i yesxeṛben kullec.
Ad tsellek aqeṛṛu-yis dinna?
Ad isellek aqeṛṛu-yis dinna?
Tessnemt ad txedmemt kullec?
D lɛib ma tennamt-iyi-d ala!
Xdemt-as akken i wen-texdem.
Xdemt-as akken i wen-yexdem.
Ur ttmeslayemt ara yid-sent.
Ur k-id-ufiɣ ara din iḍelli.
Anda ara ken-id-afeɣ umbeɛd?
Anda ara kem-id-afeɣ umbeɛd?
Zeɛma d kenwi i ixedmen aya?
Tessnem ad tṛebbim llufanat?
Tessneḍ ad tṛebbiḍ llufanat?
Tettaxxṛem i ccṛab d dexxan?
Tettaxxṛeḍ i ccṛab d dexxan?
Acḥal i tzemremt ad taṛǧumt?
Uɣent-tent msakit deg allaɣ!
Tuɣ-itent meskint deg allaɣ!
Yella lgaz deg taddart-nwen?
Semmeḍ lḥal deg uxxam-nkent?
Teǧǧamt weltma-tkent weḥd-s?
Ɣur-kent ad yenz nnif-nkent!
Akken i sent-txedmem kifkif.
Akken i sent-txedmeḍ kifkif.
Akken i sen-txedmemt kifkif.
Tfukkem aselmed n teqbaylit?
Tfukkeḍ aselmed n teqbaylit?
Tessnemt ad tessiɣemt times?
Jeddi-tkent mazal-it yehlek?
D acu i yuɣen imawlan-nkent?
Amek i yuɣalen warraw-nkent?
D ta i wumi tsemmam tilelli?
D ta i wumi tsemmaḍ tilelli?
Ayɣer i tneǧǧɛemt gma-tkent?
Anti i m-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi?
Anti i k-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi?
Anwi i m-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi?
Anwi i k-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi?
Anta i m-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi?
Anta i k-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi?
Anwa i m-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi?
Anwa i k-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi?
D taqbaylit i theddṛem akka?
D taqbaylit i theddṛeḍ akka?
Ɛni tettḥessisem-as i winna?
Ɛni tettḥessiseḍ-as i winna?
D taqbaylit i kent-id-yefkan.
D taqbaylit i k-id-yessekren.
D acu akka i la txeddmem din?
D acu akka i la txeddmeḍ din?
Fell-asen i turam asefru-nni?
Fell-asen i turiḍ asefru-nni?
Ḥemmlen llebsa n yeqbayliyen?
Tḥemmel llebsa n yeqbayliyen?
Iḥemmel llebsa n yeqbayliyen?
Tettumt d acu i sen-txedmemt?
Fell-as i la tetzuxxumt akka?
D acu i d ssebba n waṭṭan-im?
D acu i d ssebba n waṭṭan-ik?
D acu i kent-yewwin ɣur-sent?
D acu i kent-id-yewwin ɣur-i?
Ayɣer i tesxeṛbem tibḥirt-is?
Ayɣer i tesxeṛbem tibḥirt-iw?
Ayɣer i tesxeṛbeḍ tibḥirt-is?
Ayɣer i tesxeṛbeḍ tibḥirt-iw?
D nutenti i yesxeṛben kullec.
Ad sellken iqeṛṛa-nsen dinna?
Ad tsellkeḍ aqeṛṛu-yim dinna?
Ad tsellkeḍ aqeṛṛu-yik dinna?
Tzemrem ad txedmem weḥd-nwen?
Xdem-asent akken i m-xedment.
Xdem-asent akken i k-xedment.
Anda ara kent-id-afeɣ umbeɛd?
D kennemti i d ssebba n waya.
Tban tuzert ɣef udmawen-nwen.
Muqel kan d acu i la iḍeṛṛun.
Tessnem ad theḍṛem d igurdan?
Tessneḍ ad theḍṛeḍ d igurdan?
Tbeɛɛdem tura i tlufa, dayen?
Tbeɛɛdeḍ tura i tlufa, dayen?
Tettaxxṛemt i ccṛab d dexxan?
Mɣin-d ibawen deg tebḥirt-im?
Mɣin-d ibawen deg tebḥirt-ik?
Yella lgaz deg taddart-nkent?
Akken i sent-txedmemt kifkif.
Ɣur-kent ad teɣlimt deg aluḍ.
Tfukkemt aselmed n teqbaylit?
Yelha usmel-nni neɣ ulac akk?
Uɣalen watmaten-nwen s axxam?
D ta i wumi tsemmamt tilelli?
Ɛni ṛṛẓiɣ-akent iqeṛṛa-nkent?
Ihi wwet aqeṛṛu-yim ɣer lḥiḍ!
Ihi wwet aqeṛṛu-yik ɣer lḥiḍ!
Ccan n teqbaylit meqqeṛ aṭas!
Meqqeṛ aṭas ccan n teqbaylit!
D taqbaylit i theddṛemt akka?
Ɛni tettḥessisemt-as i winna?
D acu akka i la txeddmemt din?
Fell-asen i turamt asefru-nni?
Fell-asent i turam asefru-nni?
Fell-asent i turiḍ asefru-nni?
Ḥemmlent llebsa n yeqbayliyen?
Tḥemmlem llebsa n yeqbayliyen?
Tḥemmleḍ llebsa n yeqbayliyen?
Tettumt d acu i sent-txedmemt?
Fell-asen i la tetzuxxum akka?
Fell-asen i la tetzuxxuḍ akka?
Ayɣer i tesxeṛbemt tibḥirt-is?
Ayɣer i tesxeṛbemt tibḥirt-iw?
D kennemti i yesxeṛben kullec.
Ad tsellkem iqeṛṛa-nwen dinna?
Zemrent ad xedment weḥd-nsent?
Xdmemt-as akken i kent-texdem.
Xdmemt-as akken i kent-yexdem.
Xdemt-asen akken i wen-xedmen.
Ur ken-id-ufiɣ ara din iḍelli.
Ur kem-id-ufiɣ ara din iḍelli.
Tban tuzert ɣef udmawen-nkent.
Kemmel axeddim-im skud teḥmiḍ.
Kemmel axeddim-ik skud teḥmiḍ.
Susem deg leɛnaya-m la qqaṛen!
Susem deg leɛnaya-k la qqaṛen!
Susem deg leɛnaya-m la teqqaṛ!
Susem deg leɛnaya-k la teqqaṛ!
Susem deg leɛnaya-k la yeqqaṛ!
Susem deg leɛnaya-m la yeqqaṛ!
Muqlet kan d acu i la iḍeṛṛun.
Tessnemt ad tṛebbimt llufanat?
Tbeɛɛdemt tura i tlufa, dayen?
Ad teččem čekčuka d tmellalin?
Ad teččeḍ čekčuka d tmellalin?
Ur tezmirem ara ad trefdem wa?
Ur tezmireḍ ara ad trefdeḍ wa?
Teḥṛec yelli-twen deg uɣerbaz?
Uɣalen watmaten-nkent s axxam?
Taqbaylit mačči kan d tutlayt!
Anti i wen-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi?
Anwi i wen-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi?
Anta i wen-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi?
Anwa i wen-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi?
Ɛni tettḥessisem-asen i widak?
Ɛni tettḥessiseḍ-asen i widak?
D taqbaylit i k-yerran d amdan.
D taqbaylit i ken-id-yessekren.
D taqbaylit i kem-id-yessekren.
Tefriḍ-tt d yiman-im neɣ mazal?
Tefriḍ-tt d yiman-ik neɣ mazal?
Fell-asent i turamt asefru-nni?
Tḥemmlemt llebsa n yeqbayliyen?
Fell-asent i la tetzuxxum akka?
Fell-asent i la tetzuxxuḍ akka?
Fell-asen i la tetzuxxumt akka?
D acu i d ssebba n waṭṭan-nwen?
D lbaṭaṭa yeqlan i tessewwayem?
D lbaṭaṭa yeqlan i tessewwayeḍ?
D acu i la txeddmem seg zgelli?
D acu i la txeddmeḍ seg zgelli?
Ayɣer i tesxeṛbem tibḥirt-nsen?
Ayɣer i tesxeṛbeḍ tibḥirt-nsen?
Ad sellkent iqeṛṛa-nsent dinna?
Ur kent-id-ufiɣ ara din iḍelli.
Zeɛma d kennemti i ixedmen aya?
Susem deg leɛnaya-m la qqaṛent!
Susem deg leɛnaya-k la qqaṛent!
Muqlemt kan d acu i la iḍeṛṛun.
Tessnemt ad theḍṛemt d igurdan?
Sarameɣ fukken fell-am iɣeblan.
Sarameɣ fukken fell-ak iɣeblan.
Ad teččemt čekčuka d tmellalin?
Mɣin-d ibawen deg tebḥirt-nwen?
Ɛni d kemm ara ydebbṛen fell-i?
Ɛni d kečč ara ydebbṛen fell-i?
Tekksem-d cwiṭ n tẓuṛin zgelli?
Tekkseḍ-d cwiṭ n tẓuṛin zgelli?
D wa i d asteqsi-nwen aneggaru?
D wa i d asteqsi-inem aneggaru?
D wa i d asteqsi-inek aneggaru?
Ihi wwtet iqeṛṛa-nwen ɣer lḥiḍ!
Seg ansi i m-d-kan idrimen-nni?
Seg ansi i k-d-kan idrimen-nni?
Seg ansi i s-d-kan idrimen-nni?
Anti i kent-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi?
Anwi i kent-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi?
Anta i kent-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi?
Anwa i kent-iḥettmen ccɣel-agi?
Ɛni tettḥessisem-asent i tidak?
Ɛni tettḥessiseḍ-asent i tidak?
Ɛni tettḥessisemt-asen i widak?
D taqbaylit i kent-id-yessekren.
Fell-asent i la tetzuxxumt akka?
D acu i d ssebba n waṭṭan-nkent?
D lbaṭaṭa yeqlan i tessewwayemt?
D acu i d ssebba n umennuɣ-nsen?
D acu i la txeddmemt seg zgelli?
Ayɣer i tesxeṛbemt tibḥirt-nsen?
Ayɣer i tesxeṛbem tibḥirt-nsent?
Ayɣer i tesxeṛbeḍ tibḥirt-nsent?
Lemmer ad s-ssutreɣ kra ad tagi?
Lemmer ad s-ssutreɣ kra ad yagi?
Ad tsellkemt iqeṛṛa-nkent dinna?
Tzemremt ad txedmemt weḥd-nkent?
Xdmemt-asen akken i kent-xedmen.
Xdemt-asent akken i wen-xedment.
Tettban tuzert ɣef udmawen-nwen.
Tessnem ad tesselḥum tamacint-a?
Tessneḍ ad tesselḥuḍ tamacint-a?
Tzemrem ad trefdem akk annect-a?
Tzemreḍ ad trefdeḍ akk annect-a?
Tuɣem-d tabagust deg tḥanut-nni?
Tuɣeḍ-d tabagust deg tḥanut-nni?
Mɣin-d ibawen deg tebḥirt-nkent?
Ɛni d kenwi ara ydebbṛen fell-i?
Ɛni d kemm ara ydebbṛen fell-as?
Ɛni d kemm ara ydebbṛen fell-aɣ?
Ɛni d kečč ara ydebbṛen fell-as?
Ɛni d kečč ara ydebbṛen fell-aɣ?
Ayɣer i teffrem fell-i annect-a?
Ayɣer i teffreḍ fell-i annect-a?
Ur tezmiremt ara ad trefdemt wa?
Yelha usmel-nni neɣ cwiya-t kan?
Tekksemt-d cwiṭ n tẓuṛin zgelli?
D wa i d asteqsi-nkent aneggaru?
Teṛṛẓiḍ-d aqeṛṛu-yiw s lḥess-ik!
Sɣur wumi i m-d-kan idrimen-nni?
Sɣur wumi i k-d-kan idrimen-nni?
Sɣur wumi i s-d-kan idrimen-nni?
Ɛni tettḥessisemt-asent i tidak?
Tefram-tt d yiman-nwen neɣ mazal?
D acu i d ssebba n umennuɣ-nsent?
Ayɣer i tesxeṛbemt tibḥirt-nsent?
Lemmer ad m-ssutreɣ kra ad tagiḍ?
Lemmer ad k-ssutreɣ kra ad tagiḍ?
Tettban tuzert ɣef udmawen-nkent.
Kemmlet axeddim-nwen skud teḥmam.
D kemm i yeẓṛan d acu i m-ilaqen.
D kečč i yeẓṛan d acu i k-ilaqen.
Tsellem tikwal i uẓawan aklasiki?
Tselleḍ tikwal i uẓawan aklasiki?
Sarameɣ fukken fell-awen iɣeblan.
Tuɣemt-d tabagust deg tḥanut-nni?
Ɛni d kenwi ara ydebbṛen fell-as?
Ɛni d kenwi ara ydebbṛen fell-aɣ?
Ayɣer i teffremt fell-i annect-a?
D tigi i d tisutriwin-im s umata?
D tigi i d tisutriwin-ik s umata?
Ihi wwtemt iqeṛṛa-nkent ɣer lḥiḍ!
Seg ansi i sen-d-kan idrimen-nni?
Seg ansi i wen-d-kan idrimen-nni?
S teqbaylit ara d-nban gar tmura.
Lemmer ad sen-ssutreɣ kra ad agin?
Ttxil-m ḍebbeṛ-iyi-d kra n lxedma.
Ttxil-k ḍebbeṛ-iyi-d kra n lxedma.
Xdmemt-asent akken i kent-xedment.
Susmet deg leɛnaya-nwen la qqaṛen!
Susmet deg leɛnaya-nwen la teqqaṛ!
Susmet deg leɛnaya-nwen la yeqqaṛ!
Tessnemt ad tesselḥumt tamacint-a?
Tsellemt tikwal i uẓawan aklasiki?
Tzemremt ad trefdemt akk annect-a?
Sarameɣ fukken fell-akent iɣeblan.
Ɛni d kemm ara ydebbṛen fell-asen?
Ɛni d kečč ara ydebbṛen fell-asen?
D Ṛebbi i yeẓṛan! "Amek i teẓṛam?"
D Ṛebbi i yeẓṛan! "Amek i teẓṛiḍ?"
D acu i tugadem ma tennam-d tidet?
D acu i tugadeḍ ma tenniḍ-d tidet?
Tessneḍ ad tessiɣeḍ times neɣ ala?
Tufiḍ iman-im deg uxeddim amaynut?
Tufiḍ iman-ik deg uxeddim amaynut?
Teṛṛẓam-d aqeṛṛu-yiw s lḥess-nwen!
Seg ansi i sent-d-kan idrimen-nni?
Sɣur wumi i sen-d-kan idrimen-nni?
Sɣur wumi i wen-d-kan idrimen-nni?
Seg ansi i kent-d-kan idrimen-nni?
S teqbaylit ara d-baneḍ gar tmura.
S teqbaylit ara d-baneɣ gar tmura.
S teqbaylit ara d-banen gar tmura.
S teqbaylit ara d-banem gar tmura.
D taqbaylit i ken-yerran d imdanen.
D taqbaylit i kem-yerran d tamdant.
Teframt-tt d yiman-nkent neɣ mazal?
I nekk i wumi txedmem akk annect-a?
I nekk i wumi txedmeḍ akk annect-a?
Ɛni ulac d acu ara ad txedmem tura?
Ɛni ulac d acu ara ad txedmeḍ tura?
Lemmer ad wen-ssutreɣ kra ad tagim?
Susmet deg leɛnaya-nwen la qqaṛent!
Tsellem i ṛṛadio taqbaylit yal ass?
Tselleḍ i ṛṛadio taqbaylit yal ass?
Tṛuḥem ɣer din ur iyi-d-tennim ara!
Tṛuḥeḍ ɣer din ur iyi-d-tenniḍ ara!
Ɛni d kennemti ara ydebbṛen fell-i?
Ɛni d kenwi ara ydebbṛen fell-asen?
Ɛni d kemm ara ydebbṛen fell-asent?
Ɛni d kečč ara ydebbṛen fell-asent?
D Ṛebbi i yeẓṛan! "Amek i teẓṛamt?"
Ayɣer i teggummam ad d-tinim tidet?
Ayɣer i teggummaḍ ad d-tiniḍ tidet?
D tigi i d tisutriwin-nwen s umata?
Sɣur wumi i sent-d-kan idrimen-nni?
Sɣur wumi i kent-d-kan idrimen-nni?
S teqbaylit ara d-banent gar tmura.
S teqbaylit ara d-banemt gar tmura.
Ad tṛuḥ ɣer Sedduq neɣ ɣer Sidi Ɛic?
Ad iṛuḥ ɣer Sedduq neɣ ɣer Sidi Ɛic?
I nutni i wumi txedmem akk annect-a?
I nutni i wumi txedmeḍ akk annect-a?
I nekni i wumi txedmem akk annect-a?
I nekni i wumi txedmeḍ akk annect-a?
I netta i wumi txedmem akk annect-a?
I netta i wumi txedmeḍ akk annect-a?
I nekk i wumi txedmemt akk annect-a?
Ɛni ulac d acu ara ad txedmemt tura?
Wicqa ma txedmem-as ifelfel aberkan.
Wicqa ma txedmeḍ-as ifelfel aberkan.
Lemmer ad sent-ssutreɣ kra ad agint?
Kemmlemt axeddim-nkent skud teḥmamt.
Susmemt deg leɛnaya-nkent la qqaṛen!
Susmemt deg leɛnaya-nkent la teqqaṛ!
Susmemt deg leɛnaya-nkent la yeqqaṛ!
D kenwi i yeẓṛan d acu i wen-ilaqen.
Tsellemt i ṛṛadio taqbaylit yal ass?
Tesɛiḍ cwiṭ n waman deg tkeṛṛust-im?
Tesɛiḍ cwiṭ n waman deg tkeṛṛust-ik?
Ɛni d kennemti ara ydebbṛen fell-as?
Ɛni d kennemti ara ydebbṛen fell-aɣ?
Ɛni d kenwi ara ydebbṛen fell-asent?
D acu i tugademt ma tennamt-d tidet?
Ayɣer i tḥemmleḍ ad teqqimeḍ weḥd-m?
Ayɣer i tḥemmleḍ ad teqqimeḍ weḥd-k?
Tufam iman-nwen deg uxeddim amaynut?
D tigi i d tisutriwin-nkent s umata?
D wigi i d isteqsiyen-nwen ineggura?
Teṛṛẓamt-d aqeṛṛu-yiw s lḥess-nkent!
D taqbaylit i kent-yerran d timdanin.
Ad ṛuḥen ɣer Sedduq neɣ ɣer Sidi Ɛic?
I nutni i wumi txedmemt akk annect-a?
I nekni i wumi txedmemt akk annect-a?
I nettat i wumi txedmem akk annect-a?
I nettat i wumi txedmeḍ akk annect-a?
I netta i wumi txedmemt akk annect-a?
Wicqa ma txedmemt-as ifelfel aberkan.
Lemmer ad kent-ssutreɣ kra ad tagimt?
Ttxil-wet ḍebbṛet-iyi-d kra n lxedma.
Susmemt deg leɛnaya-nkent la qqaṛent!
Tṛuḥemt ɣer din ur iyi-d-tennimt ara!
Ayɣer i teggummamt ad d-tinimt tidet?
Ayɣer i teffrem fell-as akk annect-a?
Ayɣer i teffreḍ fell-as akk annect-a?
Ur tessinem ara ad tesxedmem aselkim?
Ur tessineḍ ara ad tesxedmeḍ aselkim?
D wigi i d isteqsiyen-nkent ineggura?
Win ur nečči ara seksu-yagi d ameɣbun.
Wid ur nečči ara seksu-yagi d imeɣban.
Ad ṛuḥent ɣer Sedduq neɣ ɣer Sidi Ɛic?
Ad tṛuḥem ɣer Sedduq neɣ ɣer Sidi Ɛic?
Ad tṛuḥeḍ ɣer Sedduq neɣ ɣer Sidi Ɛic?
Ḥemmlen aqellal n Tmurt n yeqbayliyen?
Tḥemmel aqellal n Tmurt n yeqbayliyen?
Iḥemmel aqellal n Tmurt n yeqbayliyen?
I nutenti i wumi txedmem akk annect-a?
I nutenti i wumi txedmeḍ akk annect-a?
I nettat i wumi txedmemt akk annect-a?
Ḥseb ad tafeḍ ma ixuṣ neɣ ma izad kra.
Ala kemm i yeẓṛan amek ara ad txedmeḍ.
Ala kečč i yeẓṛan amek ara ad txedmeḍ.
Tessnem amek ad sen-telḥum i yigurdan!
Tessneḍ amek ad sen-telḥuḍ i yigurdan!
Tesɛam cwiṭ n waman deg tkeṛṛust-nwen?
Ɛni d kennemti ara ydebbṛen fell-asen?
Ziɣ yewwi-k zhu n lxalat akked leqmeṛ.
Ayɣer i teffremt fell-as akk annect-a?
Tufamt iman-nkent deg uxeddim amaynut?
Ad tṛuḥemt ɣer Sedduq neɣ ɣer Sidi Ɛic?
Ḥemmlent aqellal n Tmurt n yeqbayliyen?
Tḥemmlem aqellal n Tmurt n yeqbayliyen?
Tḥemmleḍ aqellal n Tmurt n yeqbayliyen?
I nutenti i wumi txedmemt akk annect-a?
Ttxil-kent ḍebbṛemt-iyi-d kra n lxedma.
Ala kenwi i yeẓṛan amek ara ad txedmem.
Ɛni d kennemti ara ydebbṛen fell-asent?
Meyyez uqbel aneggez, ddunit tettɣuṛṛu!
Ayɣer i teffrem fell-asen akk annect-a?
Ayɣer i teffreḍ fell-asen akk annect-a?
Ur tessinemt ara ad tesxedmemt aselkim?
Ayɣer i tḥemmlem ad teqqimem weḥd-nwen?
Tin ur nečči ara seksu-yagi d tameɣbunt.
Tḥemmlemt aqellal n Tmurt n yeqbayliyen?
Tḥemmleḍ ad telseḍ llebsa n yeqbayliyen?
Tḥemmlem ad telsem llebsa n yeqbayliyen?
Ḥesbet ad tafem ma ixuṣ neɣ ma izad kra.
D kennemti i yeẓṛan d acu i kent-ilaqen.
Kemm tessneḍ amek ad as-tṛuḥeḍ i ddunit.
Kečč tessneḍ amek ad as-tṛuḥeḍ i ddunit.
Tessnemt amek ad sen-telḥumt i yigurdan!
Tesɛamt cwiṭ n waman deg tkeṛṛust-nkent?
Ziɣ yewwi-ken zhu n lxalat akked leqmeṛ.
Meyyzet uqbel aneggez, ddunit tettɣuṛṛu!
Ayɣer i teffrem fell-asent akk annect-a?
Ayɣer i teffreḍ fell-asent akk annect-a?
Ayɣer i teffremt fell-asen akk annect-a?
Tzemrem ad tkemmlem axeddim armi deg iḍ?
Tzemreḍ ad tkemmleḍ axeddim armi deg iḍ?
Tid ur nečči ara seksu-yagi d timeɣbunin.
Kenwi tessnem amek ad as-tṛuḥem i ddunit.
Meyyzemt uqbel aneggez, ddunit tettɣuṛṛu!
Ayɣer i teffremt fell-asent akk annect-a?
Tḥemmlemt ad telsemt llebsa n yeqbayliyen?
Ḥesbemt ad tafemt ma ixuṣ neɣ ma izad kra.
Ayɣer i tḥemmlemt ad teqqimemt weḥd-nkent?
Ad ddun ɣer Tizi n at Ɛica neɣ s at Ɛemṛan?
Ad ḥebsen deg Tasaft neɣ deg Iɣil n wammas?
Ad teḥbes deg Tasaft neɣ deg Iɣil n wammas?
Ad yeḥbes deg Tasaft neɣ deg Iɣil n wammas?
Ala kennemti i yeẓṛan amek ara ad txedmemt.
Ad ddunt ɣer Tizi n at Ɛica neɣ s at Ɛemṛan?
Ad teddu ɣer Tizi n at Ɛica neɣ s at Ɛemṛan?
Ad yeddu ɣer Tizi n at Ɛica neɣ s at Ɛemṛan?
Ad ḥebsent deg Tasaft neɣ deg Iɣil n wammas?
Ad tḥebsem deg Tasaft neɣ deg Iɣil n wammas?
Ad tḥebseḍ deg Tasaft neɣ deg Iɣil n wammas?
Yenna Meɛtub Lwennas: "bɣiɣ awanek aqbayli!"
Ihi ur ttṛuẓu ara akk aqeṛṛu-k sya d afella!
Ayɣer ur tḥemmleḍ ara ad teṛṛẓeḍ aqeṛṛu-yim?
Ayɣer ur tḥemmleḍ ara ad teṛṛẓeḍ aqeṛṛu-yik?
Ad tedduḍ ɣer Tizi n at Ɛica neɣ s at Ɛemṛan?
Ad teddum ɣer Tizi n at Ɛica neɣ s at Ɛemṛan?
Ad tḥebsemt deg Tasaft neɣ deg Iɣil n wammas?
Ayɣer ur tḥemmlem ara ad teṛṛẓem iqeṛṛa-nwen?
Ad teddumt ɣer Tizi n at Ɛica neɣ s at Ɛemṛan?
Tḥemmlem ad teččem ayen imellḥen mliḥ neɣ ala?
Tḥemmleḍ ad teččeḍ ayen imellḥen mliḥ neɣ ala?
Kennemti tessnemt amek ad as-tṛuḥemt i ddunit.
Tzemremt ad tkemmlemt axeddim-nni armi deg iḍ?
Ihi ur ttṛuẓu ara akk aqeṛṛu-m sya d tasawent!
Tḥemmlemt ad teččemt ayen imellḥen mliḥ neɣ ala?
Ihi ur ttṛuẓut ara akk iqeṛṛa-nwen sya d afella!
Ayɣer ur tḥemmlemt ara ad teṛṛẓemt iqeṛṛa-nkent?
Ur tḥemmlem ara ad theḍṛem d wid ur tessinem ara?
Ur tḥemmleḍ ara ad theḍṛeḍ d wid ur tessineḍ ara?
Yenna Meɛtub Lwennas: "ad ttarguɣ awanek aqbayli!"
Ihi ur ttṛuẓumt ara akk iqeṛṛa-nkent sya d afella!
Ur tḥemmlemt ara ad theḍṛemt d wid ur tessinemt ara?
Yenna Meɛtub Lwennas: "d awanek aqbayli i d targit-iw!"
Yenna Meɛtub Lwennas: "d awanek aqbayli i d asirem-iw!"
Yenna Meɛtub Lwennas: "sarameɣ ad yili uwanek aqbayli!"
Meɛtub Lwennas yebɣa mliḥ ad yili uwanek aqbayli, ɣef aya i t-nɣan icenga n teqbaylit!
Iɣef wis tlata: Akli n tayri.
Awal n yemma-s yerna deg wul-is.
Ala nettat kan i walaɣ tuklal-it.
Amẓabi-nni i s-iwwin tameṭṭut is.
Nekk bniɣ-tent s uɣanib n tira-w.
Cebbḥent igenni s wucṛureq-nsent.
D tiremt tis snat n temlilit-agi.
D wid amzun bran i ṭbel deg aman.
Dayen ur yezmir ad yeḥku i yiwen.
Ad ssusfeɣ s igenni am yal tikkal.
Am uɣerda n lexla, llaẓ d usemmiḍ.
Ansi i s-tekkiḍ i lqelɛa d asawen.
At wexxam ṣebṛen, imɛezzan kefṛen.
Azekka ad n-iliɣ din-a di taddart.
Deg-s tamɣart d mmi-s d teslit-is.
Aɣṛum, aɣṛum ad yečč uɛebbuḍ amcum.
Armi i d-iwweḍ ar tlemmast n wasif.
Asmi ilaq ad tt-nɣer ur ttneɣri ara.
Zerbeɣ ar tferka akken ad ẓerbeɣ ayla-w.
Yemlal-d yiwen seg imeddukal-is di Numidya.
Ixef wis setta: Ajenniw yeqqeḍ-d ar taddart.
I d-suffɣent teẓrigin n tiddukla Numidya n Wehran.
Ad nwali amek i yetḥeyyer umray ɣef win i iḥemmel.
Imir-n dɣa gziɣ taluft u kksseɣ akk ccek d usurdu.
Tidet ma tenna-d tidet ilaq ad t-xelleṣ̣ amur-is.
Usiɣ-d ad qeṣṣreɣ cwiṭ d yemɣaren-ayi n twaɣit.
Axxam ur nesɛi tamɣaṛt, am urti ur nesɛi tadekkert.
Yufa tayri-nniḍen, tayri n tutlayt d idles amaziɣ .
Akken teldi talelluct-is, sliɣ i uskeεkeε n teṭsa.
iwweḥhel-iyi wawal di tgerjumt seg akken ttaggadeɣ.
Smaεil iseddad-d ula d isefra am di tullist: Lunğa.
Telmed tira n tmaziɣt di tiddukla Numidya n Wehran.
Ad ilint d timezwura ara iɛassen amek teddun lecɣal.
I temẓin yekrez uzger, amek armi i tent iɛlef uɣyul.
Iruḥ d tazzla ɣer wasif userdun akken ad as-tt-yerr.
Udem-is iccur d sser xas akken ikwmec akw si tewser.
Ma d Dda Qiqi a ziɣen iruḥ yeḥḍer tameɣra n Numidya.
Wis sin, d wid izenzen atmaten-nsen s ubrid asertan.
D ungal d-yewwin asentel amaynut di tsekla taqbaylit.
Uffan-d iman-nsen di taggara ḥeṣlen d acu ara xedmen.
Acku aselḥu d  uqeyyem ara xedmen waẓiyen imeqqranen.
Medden si tteqdim n zzman ttemɛawanen di ddunit-nsen.
Tanaṣlit d taqbaylit i d-yekkren di temdint n Wehran.
Dɣa tečča-yi-d s wallen, am d nekk kmumseɣ ar tama-s.
Iger ma weṛṛeɣ yett-wamgar, allaɣ ma yefṛeɣ yessengar.
Yiwet n tikkelt issuter-as yiwen umsebrid ad t-yessens.
Aṭas deg-sen daɣen inɣan u i d-eǧǧan d igujilen d tuǧal.
Imi nekk d ilemẓi i lliɣ u iɣweblan-iw mačči d wid n tṛad
Ur yelli ufran wis sin i s-qqaren wid yennumen d umenṭer.
Akken ad tezzint deg uqecrur-ik yeqquren alama yuli wass.
Tikwal wwin aṣurdi d ipuṛsyunen u unfen-asen d yiman-nsen.
Tikwal tessalay di taɣect alamma tuɣal tkeṛṛeḍ deg ugerjum.
Am tmeṭṭut yellan s tadist mi ara yaweḍ wass turew-d mmi-s.
S udlis ar d-yeqqimen tameddit i win-nsen s ufella s wadda.
I zgiɣ zlazeɣ ɣef tikli n wakud ibeṭṭun tasa d wayen turew.
Cerweɣ-tt merriɣet akken ad rreɣ tikerkas d ṭṭlam deg idis.
xuḍi yessen-it, yemmal-d timucuha akken i tent-yebɣa netta.
Wid iqqal uṛumi neɣ wid i d-iqqimen seg-sen segmi ikfa tṛad.
Awi-d kan anda ad yeffer umdan iman-is ɣas ad yili d aẓekka.
Ur zmireɣ ara ad s-fkeɣ lḥeqq i Dda Qiqi i ikerhen tulawin.
Xas ma tikwal nγelli,urǧin neḥbes tikli,nessawaḍ di taggara.
Ad d-yader ayen yellan seddaw ubagus, ma d nekk zerbeɣ cwiṭ.
Arugg aneggaru, yekkemmel-as udabu amesbaṭli n tmurt n Zzayer.
Ayagi i d-yefɣen seg yimi-k yessefraḥ,  ad yili imeṭṭi n lferḥ.
Am yal tameddit, ad d-nezzi i yiri n lkanun, ad nsel i tmacahut.
War ma yella yeẓra Ṭeyyeb‟, tamentilt n lɣiba-yagi, dɣa yuɣal-d.
Yeggul deg bab-is ar ad t-issečč ugar neɣ ad t-iḥeṛṛem seg trika.
Mi d-refdeɣ iman-iw si tsumta, ukiɣ-d, tamɣart-iw tesfarfud deg-i.
Yezga yessawal i yicennayen iqbayliyen akken ad cnun ɣef timmuzɣa.
Yal yiwen ad-d ittwali, taseddaṛt fiɣef nuli, nnig-s ur d-ikki kra.
Iṭij ansa i d-neflali, ass-a azekka ad nili, mi nezga nbedd i tnekra.
Nezmer i tniri d tiẓgi, afus ur ittergigi,ɣef talwit nezmer i ccwal.
D ass-a i d ass n tlelli, d ass ideg aɣlan aqbayli, yufrar-d ger tmura.
nekkni d tamurt d igenni, nekkni d agur d tziri, nekkni d iseɣ d wazal.
nekkni d tiẓet d tayri, d talemmast  ak d yiri, nekkni d illel d wakal.
nekkni d aɣref n tlelli, nekkni d tafat i tmuɣli, nekkni d times d wuzzal.
Dda Lmud At Mɛemmeṛ, cfiɣ mi ara d-bdu awal fell-as, yettebdad deg-i rric.
Ccna d yiwen seg wallalen yesseqdec Ugraw Amaziɣ akken ad yessiweḍ izen-is.
Agraw amaziɣ yefka i yiman-is iswi amenzu ad d-issaki agdud aqbayli yeṭṭsen.
nekkni d azref d isekkim, gar imeqranen ad neqqim, nekkni d tifrat d umtawi.
Inna yas umɣar-nni: Ma yella azekka ur d kkireɣ ara, siweḍ lexbaṛ ar taddart.
D iǧadaṛmiyen i s-d-yessutren tijɛal, dɣa makken yugi, qqeṛsen fell-as s ṛsaṣ.
Isem-nneɣ Aqbayli d afzim, ɣef unyir d Amaziɣ d urqim, fell-as lḥif ad t-nezwi.
Ddeqs n yimeɣnasen iqbayliyen uɣen abrid n yidrimen, zzin abrid i uɣref aqbayli.
nekkni d afḍis d ugelzim, yeddan d tussna d uvelkim, fell-aɣ  teḥṛes neɣ d llwi.
Ddeqs n tid neɣ widyettazzalen ɣef tugdut, ass-a uɣalen ddan akked udabu azzayri.
Asirem n udabu yeqqim-d ass-a deg wayen yerki uɣerbaz azzayri akked yixxamen n ddin.
Abadu amesbaṭli azzayri iḥerkel ad ikemmel ayen i d-yeggran gar yimeɣnasen yugil azaglu.
Ass-agi tanemmirt i nutni imi amennuɣ yewweḍ ar uzgen ameqqran deg iswi i yefka i yiman-is.
Seg wayen yecna Maɛtub Lwennas: Ay Izem, ifenanen, tagrawla-nneɣ, aqlaɣ, Ay a lferh-iw,leḥbab-iw.
Aserdas n tredsa n Zzayer, yenɣa ass-a yiwet n tmeṭṭut, yessegra-as-d 8 n yigujilen d urgaz aneɛyabu.
Yessefk kan ur as-neqqaṛ ara: dayen, adabu yefsi tiyersi, dayen newweḍ s iswi, nezmer a nuɣal ar yiḍes.
Deg Pari, lamikkal n yizzayriyen n Fṛansa, tezga tettnadi amek ad teṛṛez ifadden i Ugraw Amaziɣ imir-nni.
Agraw-a yekka s waṭas deg usaki i yukin yiqbayliyen s twaɣit yeḍran yid-sen, tin i sen-yefka udabu azzayri.
Deg iseggasen n sebɛin, win i d-yenneflen, deg imaɣnasen, seg tmurt-nneɣ ar Fṛansa, lembat-is d Agraw Amaziɣ.
Ma ɣas akken lamikkal n yizzayriyen di Pari tesɛa idrimen s waṭas, maca ur tessaweḍ ara ad teṛṛez amennuɣ n Ugraw Amaziɣ.
Agraw Amaziɣ, seg ass-n mi i d-yennulfa, yuɣal d taqeṛṛabt n umennuɣ ɣef yidles akk tutlayt n yimaziɣen deg teɣremt n Pari.
Sliman Ɛazem yemmut berra n tmurt-is d twacult-is n tmurt ass n tmenya u ɛecrin  Yennayer Alef U tteɛmiyya u tlata u tmanyin.
Adabu azzayri s timmad-is, ur yessaweḍ ara ar yiswi-s ad yeṛṛez amennuɣ n yiqbayliyen ɣef timmuzɣa, ma ɣas ar ass-a ur yegzim ara asirem.
Tella tessexdam nniya n yixeddamen iqbayliyen deg Fṛansa akken ur d-ttarran ara i tiɣriwin n Ugraw Amaziɣ neɣ ad s-nerwin timliliyin iskarayen.
Sliman Ɛazem d amedyaz, anaẓur, d ameskar, d acennay aqbayli, ilul ass n seɛṭac Ctember Alef u tteɛmiyya u tmeṭac di taddart Agni Geɣran di tama n Iwaḍiyen.

Nna Ḍrifa teɣra cwiṭ ar yimṛabḍen n iṛumyen
Rnu ɣur-s arraw-is meṛṛa ɣran
Yiwen deg-sen d ajenyuṛ n tsenselkimt isem-is Maziɣ
Nna Ḍrifa tegza timsal
ur s-yenni ur t-yeǧǧi
Tuɣal tessen ad teqqen ar App Store akken ad tsebdedd isnasen
Tilawin deg taddart ẓrant meṛṛa d akken Nna Ḍrifa tedda deg tallit tamaynut
Tettidir am akken ttidirent akk tlawin deg umaḍal n umalu
yessefk ad d-yas
Temmla-asent daɣen amek ara rzunt ar tsanayt tilellit tamaḍalant Wikipedia
Din-a ad afent akk imagraden i ttnadint
Yiwen n wass tega tamsirt ɣef tmerna n imagraden deg Wikipedia yerna s teqbaylit
Nna Ḍrifa ur teqqim ara din kan
Yiwen wass tmudd ula d tamsirt ɣef tudert tabadnit tumḍint
