Teqqur tala
ttnadiɣ ad issineɣ
tasekla-nneɣ ddeqs segmi tenti asikel-ines
afulay yezdem seg-sen
ula d uxeldun yebder-iten-id yura fell-asen
ma d iḍrisen ɣezzifen d iseggasen aya ideg ntin ffutkin di lqern wis ɛecrin
ayen yeεnan ungal atrar d tidet d amaynut deg tuget meqqren n tmeslayin
llan yigduden mačči s waṭas i aɣ-yezwaren mi kecmen ɣur-s
iṭerkiyen d waɛraben akken kan yewweḍ lqern segmi ntin ttarun ungalen
ama d inelmaden neɣ d iselmaden
D tidet d tikkelt tis snat i d-usiɣ ɣer tesdawit n Tubiret
Usiɣ-d imi i ttwaεerḍeɣ
Mer ur ttwaεerḍeɣ ara tili ur d-ttaseɣ ara
Di tallit-nni medden ur ten-tceɣɣeb ara tasekla
Ahat tura tbeddel teswiεt wi yeẓran
Ɣur-k ad d-taseḍ
ɣur-wat azrem ad ken-yeqqes
Ma d amawal n tesnujjya allalen-ines d igraɣlanen
Aẓar-nsen d win i semrasen deg umaḍal akkit
D ireṭṭalen si tegrigit neɣ si tlatinit
Ama di tefransist ama di taεrabt ur ttcuḥḥun ara i yireṭṭalen
Di teswiεt-a ideg nella tidlisin n tesnujjya s teqbaylit uggaɣ ulac aḥiri deg-sent
Asmi ara laqent asmi ara tent-iḥwiǧen medden imir-n ahat ad d-ilint
Ɣur-wat tadimagujit yezgan di kra n yimawen
Aql-aɣ tura di rebɛa u ttɛin n wuṭṭunen
Wid izeddmen deg-s ha rennun-d ha neqqsen
Izeddamen-a zemreɣ ad ak-d-iniɣ ggten
Mer ad gten ugar ad nettuqenneε ugar

Yewɛer-iyi lḥal ad amneɣ
Ussan iɛeddan tella d taqcict am yakk tiqcicin tefreḥ taḍsa tezga deg yimi-s
Ur tettmeslay ara aṭas deg tesmilt maca mi ara tt-steqsiɣ tettarra-d akken ilaq
Azal-is ameqqran deg uɣerbaz teǧǧa-t-id yura
I aɣ-d-yenna uselmad-is n tmaziɣt
amacahu zik-nni tella yiwet n tmeṭṭut tesεa snat n teqcicin
yiwet deg-sent d tarbibt-is
yal ass ttruḥunt γer tala ttagment-d
yelli-s tettak-as tazeɛluqt ma yella d tarbibt-is tettak-as aγerbal
yal ma teččar aγerbal d aman ttenγalen-d
almi d yiwen n wass tefqeε tḍegger aγerbal-nni
tuggad ad as-tini yemma-s anida yella uγerbal
dγa tettbeɛ abrid i yeṭṭef uɣerbal-nni
tetteddu tetteddu armi i d-tufa yiwen n umeksa testeqsa-t
tarbibt ay ameksa ur teẓriḍ ara anida i iεedda uγerbal
ameksa err-iyi-d qbel lmal-iw ad am-d-inin anida iεedda
tarbibt truḥ terra-as-ten-d
ma yella tenna-am-d ad akem-d-ssuγ leḥrir neγ tazeggart ini-as tazeggart
imi tewweḍ γer uxxam n tteryel testeqsa-tt-id
tteryel ad akem-ssukkeγ s tewwurt neγ s tzuliγt
tarbibt s tzuliγt
tteryel tessukk tarbibt-nni s tewwurt
tteryel ad am-d-ssuγ leḥrir neγ tazeggart
tarbibt s tzeggart
tteryel tessa-as-d leḥrir dγa ṭṭsent
azekkuya n tifawt taṣebḥit
tteryel ad am-d-ččareγ aγerbal-im d tiwiztin neγ tiγredmiwin
tarbibt d tiγredmiwin
tteryel teččur-as-d aγerbal-is d tiwiztin
tameṭṭut d yelli-s usment
iḍ ur semmeḍ ara s waṭas xerṣum tisaεtin timezwura
mazal lḥamu n uzal am akken tettali-d si tmurt
yiwet n rriḥa d taẓidant yettawi-tt-id ubeḥri seg yisekla d yijeǧǧigen
ah lemmmer yesεa afriwen acu yesεa allen
am win ara t-id-yewten s waman di tguni-s yemmekti-d lila
amek allen-is ihi zemrent ad t-ssiwḍent ɣer tin iḥemmel
dagi kan yuɣal-d ɣer wallaɣ-is yettnadi gar lexyalat i d-yexleq s ttexmam
iwala lila deg umeṭreḥ d acebḥan tedla tessa telsa tessumet
i wumi ccbaḥa am tagi
acḥal qerriḥt ddunit xas ma tecbeḥ
ula d ccbaḥa deg yiman-is qerriḥet
amellal yacbeḥ maca yal tagnit amek
tikwal ccbaḥa d lferḥ tiyeḍ d imeṭṭi d leḥzen
iwellaqen-w saḥen
dɣa aɛawed n tmuɣli deg waṭas n tarrayin tiqburin i icudden ɣer lɣella n uzemmur
tifrat di timunent
ur telli ṛṛum d tiɣremt yellan am tiyiḍ
anagar di laɛwacer i tḥemmel ad ten-id-tebder
limer ass-a mačči d amerḍil amzun d laɛwacer ahat yiwen ur t-id-tettadder
yerna tneddef tasa-s tettqeḍririf
yekkat-itt uzenneqnaq
anda-t yiḍes ma ad tt-id-yas
lmut tezga yid-neɣ ur ilaq ara ad tt-naggad
d lferḍ fell-aɣ ulac win ara tezgel
iluxert llan d icawraren icawraren ad uɣalen d iluxert annect bɣun kken-t
akka i teɛmer
limer mačči akka imdanen ad myeččen gar-asen
ugar akka i d-yeǧǧa ṛebbi ddunit
limer d lebɣi mi yemmut yiwen ad t-neǧǧ kan deg umkan-is
dɣa sin neɣ tlata wussan meqbel zik zik i tettenkar
kra n wacu ḥemmlen ad t-id-theggi
amɣar iḥemmel aḥeddur deg uyefki
xemsa warraw-is d imeẓyanen i mmuten ur ṛwan tibexsisin
yiwen tenɣa-t tegdiḍt teddem-it kan akka ur tebna
tis rebɛa d tis xemsa daɣen d tiḥdayin ddrent kan kra n wussan
asgen asemmaḍ
kkren unagen ɣer fransa
netta imi meẓzi yufa-d amḍiq di lmina
ma d amɣar ur t-qbilen ara
ussan imezwura teḍra yid-s am uderwic
ur yeẓri acu iwumi i d-iberru
yettmeslay kan ur iga algam i yiles-is
am yiḍ am uzal d asnirmet neɣ d rregmat netta yellan d axewni
lmizirya mi ara teɣli ɣef yiwen tettarra-t d ilef aderɣal ur yeẓri anda iteddu
salem yedda di lmendad i baba-s
yufa-t aṭas di tegnit n ddiq
tamurt n usemmiḍ lɣerba lqella n usuṛdi yerna temɣer
asmi yella d acawrar yeqqar di llakul ccix-is ula d netta iɣil-it yebbuhel
iḥqer-it aṭas armi i as-d-iban yif arrac akken ma llan
yeɣra ddeqs
yesɛedda la bǧurse fkan-as-tt-id
yekcem ɣer llakul anda i d-ssufuɣen wid yesɣarayen
acu mmi-s n ufellaḥ meskin tewɛer fell-as leqraya
aseggas-nni kan amenzu yerɣa laɛzib
temmut-asen tyuga d snat testan d warraw-nsent
dɣa nnulen lqaɛa teɣli-d fell-asen lihana d tameqqrant
tuli-ten ṭlaba acku izgaren ziɣ d imnuṣaf ttekkin deg-sen medden
mačči d ayla-nsen kan i sen-yerɣan yedda ula d ayla n wiyaḍ
lgirra ɣef medden yakk i tɛedda
lebruj ssulin widak yessentellen tiqerray ussan-nni n rrɛud d lbarud
widak iteffren deffir n tsebbalt neɣ deffir n tedmarin n jacqueline dihin di fransa
neɣ di tunes yakk d titunsiyin
mačči anagar nettat i yeǧǧlen mačči anagar arraw-is i yeggujlen
d tidett, yella waya
aqedruref i teqqedruref ur yezmir yiwen ad t-yektil
tamurt ma tetett arraw-is yessi-s d aɛseṛ i tent-tettɛessiṛ
liḥala n tmeṭṭut i yiman-is akken texdem ur tettɛeddi ara
mi teqqen tabniqt am wezger yeqqnen azaglu
ad tt-terr i ddel d tɛekkmin
ur tt-id-iṣaḥ yiḍes ar ad yali wass
ur tt-id-iṣaḥ ad terr awal ma ur tt-yeɛǧib
tadist deffir tayeḍ dderya d inilban am lbaṭaṭa wa ur ireffed wa
tamɣart d wemɣar si tama ad ttneẓman fell-as
tilewsatin si tamadderz-nsent ad yesnunnut aṭas d aseggas
aya iḥuza ula d ixeddamen i d-yufan iman-nsen mebla axeddim
yella-d usmekti deg waṭas n temnaḍin n tmurt
qqlut-d timẓin-nni daxel n tmeqqlit alamma uɣalent d tiwraɣin
mi qqlant temẓin rnut lḥemmeẓ-nni diɣ kifkif
ternum daɣen teẓdem lḥemmeẓ-nni
sxelḍet tura awren n temẓin d win-nni n lḥemmeẓ
syin terrem-as lmelḥ
tzemrem ad teččem arkul-a s tbexsisin d asisen
s tezmert-nwen
isufar n wučči
Mitin u settin igṛamen n uwren n temẓin
Miyya igṛamen  n lḥmeẓ
lmelḥ d sskeṛ
tibexsisin d ubakuṛ
ciṭ n zzit n uzemmur
Am rrezg-ik a yaqbayli!
tasenduqt d tamecṭuḥt i uḥraz n lekwaɣeḍ abeɛda ad d-tekker s tlata alaf n yidinaren
ɣlayet aṭas
i d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ n ayt smaɛel
d asɣar i yulin di ssuma
ur nezmir ad t-id-naɣ i wakken ad nexdem s txessart
ilaq ula d nekni ad nawi lfayda-nneɣ
d awal n yiwen n uneǧǧar seg ayt smaɛel
taẓrigt tamezwarut n tfaska n tmedyazt timezdit
tgerrez dayen kan teẓrigt-a tamezwarut ɣas xussen wallalen
i d-tenna tselwayt n tddukkla timheggit
walaɣ taggara-a imedyazen wa ijebbed akka wa akkin
ula d arraz n temlilit ad yili daɣen d imezdi
dda lwennas isel i yilmeẓyen ticki ttmeslayen ɣef ayen icudden ar internet
yeẓra d akken d aẓetta i yesdukklen ibenkan n umaḍal meṛṛa
acu kan meskin ur yessin ara ad yaru dɣa yeḥruri aṭas
tikwal yesḥissif deg iman-is
dda ḥemmu iḥemmel ad d-yeffeɣ ar tejmaɛit yal tameddit
ibiri deg idis tafelwit n uselkem gar ifassen-is
deqs i yeɣilen d aselkim aziraz ameẓyan
dda ḥemmu yezga yeqqaṛ-asen ala tagi qaṛṛen-as tafelwit n uselkem
tetteddu s yiwen n unagraw n wammud isem-is android
llant tfelwiyin-nniḍen n apple qqaren-asent ipad acu kan teddunt s unagraw ios
dda ḥemmu yezga yessefham deg-sen acu kan ahbuh
gullen ur gzan
ḥatan ihi yerna-d dda lwennas ɣur-s
dda lwennas ɣas akken ur yeɣri ara acu kan igezzu timsal imir imir
ur tettunefk ara tegnitt ad yeddu ar uɣerbaz am netta am wiyaḍ
imi yekker-d d agujil deg tallit-nni n tegrawla mgal fṛansa
d acu-t waṭṭan n ubeḥri
d acu-t waṭṭan n ubeḥri
d aṭṭan n tawla i d-yeslalay ubirus n anflwanza influenza yesɛan ddeqs n leṣnaf
igellu-d s umata s tawla ɛeyyu asiḥḥi n tanzarin atg
acu-t ucṛaḍ mgal lehlak-a
d ttawil yettḥaraben si temsalmit i d-yettakk ubirus n anflwanza
anwi imdanen yeɛna ucṛaḍ
s wacu yezmer ad d-yeglu wecṛaḍ
s umata tallit-is tettɛeddi di liser bexlaf
taggara n leɛmeṛ
ala s ucṛaḍ n yimdanen yesɛan tafekka yeɛyan i nezmer ad nḥareb aṭṭan n ubeḥri
aṭṭan n nnaqsa migraine yesɛa assaɣ akked thurmunin hormones
nnaqsa akked beddu n tarda
sumata aṭṭan n nnaqsa yettlal ɣer teqcict segmi ara tebdu tarda umbeɛd telṭac n yiseggasen
tilawin ttcetkint seg uqraḥ-a imi yettɛeddi tilas ula s ddwa ur yettrusu ara
nnaqsa akked tɛeqqacin n uḥbas n dderya
ɣas ma ḥebsent tiɛeqqacin-a leqriḥ-is ur yettruḥ ara deg wussan-nni imezwura
nnaqsa akked tadist
sumata tameṭṭut uɣur yers lehlak-a uqbel tadist yettkemmil akken arma d keffu-s
nnaqsa akked keffu n tarda
yewwi-d ad tesɛeddi tallit-a uqbel ad as-yekkes waṭṭan-a ad iruḥ
ayɣer i d-ttakeɣ isteqsiyen-a
ay abrid ttun medden
yemɣi-d leḥcic di later-ik
ma tecfid di ddula-nsen
wigad-nni i yettawin lewhi-k
ma tecfid di ddula-nsen
wigad-nni i yettawin lewhi-k
ma tecfid mmel-iyi-d kan
tezriḍ nekk yid-k i necfa
di later-ik ayen iɛeddan
nekk yeǧǧa-id ccama
maɛni kul lwaqt s zzman
zzman ur as-nezmir ara
nettru ɣef lweqt i aɣ-yeǧǧan
nezra ur d-ittuɣal ara
taslent-nni akken i yeɣlin
nejreɣ-d seg-s tacita
tecfa asmi i nɛedda di sin
tura gezmen-tt si lǧedra
qeddren-tt-id wid ur nessin
ur quddren ayen teẓṛa
ssusem ay ul-iw i d-yettmektin
ayen akken iɛeddan yekfa
ahat tebɣiḍ ad teẓṛeḍ
ay abrid i aɣ-icfan
ahat tebɣiḍ ad teẓṛeḍ
s anga i aɣ-ḍegṛen wussan
bedleɣ mačči d win i tessneḍ
nettat iɣdeṛ-itt laman
nɣil nefreḥ ziɣ neɣleḍ
nemger-d irebbi n wurfan
iẓra-k nettḥadar-iten
nekk yid-sen nleḥḥu s laɛqel
amer wid i aɣ-d-isellen
nugad yewɛar lbaṭel
yella win i aɣ-d-idɛan wissen
mi i nɛedda ad aɣ-d-imuqel
ruḥet ncallah ferqeɣ-ken
yedɛa-aɣ rebbi yeqbel
hatan yewweḍ-d lawan n tbeddi deg uxxam n teɣdemt
nekk ɛerqent-iyi irkelli ur ẓriɣ ara acu i ilaqen ad xedmeɣ
awezlu yewɛer lexyuḍ-is mcubbaken mačči d kra
d lbumba yundin nettraǧu kan melmi ad teṭṭerḍeq seg teswiɛt ɣer tayeḍ
yernu ẓriɣ ulac ccek deg waya ulac win ara s-imenɛen
anagar asfel i izemren ad as-yekkes urfan wa ad t-yesserked
zik-nni d tikci n yiwet n teqcict tahuskayt d taḥurrit d asfel iɛumm
aṭṭan-a anagar agzam ur yesɛi ddwa ḥellu
acu yebɣa ɣur-i umseḍḍeɛ-agi deg tlemmast n yiḍ
ahat d anemhal n uɣmis yebɣa ad iẓer ma beddlen azemz n uzmaz
neɣ ahat d yemma-s n umeḥbus
ala truḥ-d ɣur-i ass-a ɣer tnarit-inu
igguma wul ad kem-ittu
muḥal ad kem-ittu
ay aggur mu zzin itran
ṣṣuṛa-m tugi ad temḥu
muḥal ad temḥu
dayen tekcem gar iɣsan
igguma wul akem ittu
yid-m isɛedda ussan
ay itbir siweḍ-as slam
deg tezwara iban-iyi-d ssut-nni am wakken yettergigi yettnegzam ur yemmid ara maḍi
teɣli-d gar-aneɣ yiwet n tsusmi d taẓayant tesxelxel-iyi mliḥ teɛreq-iyi tririt
d nabil i yemmuten d yir lmut wagi dayen iḍehren
ma yewweḍ ad yeṭṭenṭen akka almi qessiḥet tiyita i yečča
srugemteɣ tarsast n tmeẓyant
imir-n kan ulɣent deg uqerruy-iw tiwlifin am wakken d asaru amsaltan i ttwaliɣ
aneḍlib yebɣa ad ineɣ baba-s maca tarsast tḥuz mmi-s
lḥiɣ s temɣawla deg tlemmast n yixxamen ijdiden yeṭṭsen deg tsusmi d ṭṭlam
lḥemdullah aseggas-a ageffur iɛeṭṭel
am wakken i d-yeqqar umeddakkel-iw racid s usqecmeɛ
akal ttun-t medden yeqqim d asuki ulac win ara t-ixedmen
lbaṭaṭa d yirden nettawi-ten-id seg tmurt n kanada
akka ulac acu ara naggad ɣef rrezq d nneɛma-nneɣ
d tidet tikwal yettaḍsa umdan seg lehmum d twuɣa i d-iɣellin fell-as
asedeger gar uxxam-iw d uɣerbaz alemmas ibn badis ur yewwiḍ ara sin n yikilumitren
yenɣa-yi uḥebber yenneqbaḍ wul-iw
zegreɣ tawwurt n lemraḥ allen-iw ttqellibent kan ɣef teɣtest
sellmeɣ ɣef wid yellan din
rran-iyi-d s usrugmet ur tfehmeḍ tigert deg yimeslayen-nni
yernu d acu lfayda n yimeslayen sdat n tmettant
rriḥa-ines tergel inzaren tettarra algam i yilsawen
ḥebseɣ walaɣ sya u sya
walaɣ racid yeqqim ɣef tmurt isenned ɣef uɣarab aqerruy-is gar yifassen-is
ruḥeɣ ɣer umeddakkel-iw serseɣ afus-iw ɣef tayet-is
imir-n kan i faqeɣ yemmut mmi-s
lḥiɣ sakin ɣer umkan ideg teḍra tmenɣiwt
imuyag-ines d imeqqranen banen-d mliḥ iban yeḍɛef mliḥ ɣef zik
ɣas akken ɛeqleɣ d acu-tt tɣawsa-nni taberkant
d tameẓyant tutumatikt
ɛerḍeɣ ad as-sfehmeɣ ur lliɣ ara d aberrani ɣef twacult
yennecraḥ wudem n umsaltu sakin yečča-yi s wallen ɣas akken tetwelles liḥala
yettbin-d am wakken d tinɣiman
maca ur nezmir ara ad nefru tamsalt-a seg tura
ɣef temgarḍt-is d yidmaren-is idammen gersen ɣummen adeddic
ḥala tasleḍt n tfekka i izemren ad aɣ-yinin acu yeḍran s tidet
tamaziɣt d asenfar n tmetti seg bulifa ar mɛemmeri abrid yenǧer
ad d-yili diɣ uskasi ɣef temsal akk icudden ɣer tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ
ad nesmekti kan belli deg wussan-agi iɛeddan xedmen yakan snat temliliyin-nniḍen
tayeḍ tella-d deg waggur-agi iɛeddan sɣur yinaggalen-agi buxerrub racid akked ali ḥeǧaz
nutni si tama-nsen meslayen-d ɣef tirmit-nsen deg tira ladɣa ungal
wehmeɣ qqureɣ ur ufiɣ d acu ad iniɣ
tinɣiman
anwa ara yamnen d akken mmi-s n si racid ad ineɣ iman-is
ayɣer ad ineɣ nabil iman-is
ɣlint-d fell-i tikta am uḥemmal n waman
Yejbed umsaltu aɛessas iman-is akken ad yeǧǧ abrid i wid i d-yusan
yeldi sakin aqrab-is yessuffeɣ-d tayuga n tqeffazin d yiwet n teckart tamecṭuḥt tafrawant
yeṭṭef tameẓyant idewwer-itt s leɛqel kan yerra-tt daxel n teckart
yebda sakin aqelleb deg ljerḥ-nni s yiḍuḍan-is
uẓaɣ ɣer ukumisar n temsulta iban ur iyi-iwali ara
amek i tettiliḍ a si aḥmed
d acu-tent tikta-inek timenza
yezzi-d ɣur-i yewhem ah d kečč a ustad
ur iyi-d-tenniḍ ara deg uɣerbaz-agi alemmas i tzedɣeḍ
ad regmeɣ uqbel iman-iw
uqbel ad n-zziɣ ɣur-wen
ma ffreɣ-awen leɛyub-iw
uklaleɣ ad yi-tkeṛhem
ubqel ad ḍelqeɣ ifer-iw
ad ken-ǧǧeɣ ay at tmurt-iw
ad wen-menniɣ asirem
ass-a mi yecewwel lmux-iw
yegla ula s tezmert-iw
slet-d uqbel ad yi-tferqem
mi kfiɣ regmeɣ iman-iw
ɣur-wen ad n-zziɣ udem-iw
ass-a sserdeɣ-t s useɣwen
ẓriɣ deg wannect-nni ulac lxezna am tlawin
gulleɣ seg tizi wezzu
armi d akeffadu
ur ḥkimen deg-i akken llan
ad nerreẓ wala ad neknu
axir ddeɛwessu
anda ttqewwiden i ccifan
lɣerba tura deg uqerru
welleh ar d ad nenfu
wala leɛquba gar yilfan
ma ɣef lɛecṛa n yiḍ bdan leqdicat-agi s wudem unṣib
deg annar Ukil Remḍan
ay iṭij ḥader ad teɣliḍ
nleḥḥu madam telliḍ
nugad ad aɣ-d-ilḥeq yiḍ
iḍul s anga ad nṛuḥ
nessawwal-ak-in ma tesliḍ
neḥma nugad ad nismiḍ
nessarem yid-nneɣ tiliḍ
ḥman idammen i tikli
ɣas akka ifadden-nneɣ ɛyan
neḍmeɛ tagmatt di lɣaci
ad neɣsen seg ul wurfan
ɣas ma nteddu ḥafi
ad netbeɛ lateṛ i aɣ-d-eğğan
akken ad aɣ-d-lhun wussan
tiɣilt i yekfan fell-aɣ
ad tban mazal tayeḍ
lweqt ittɛedi iɛṛeq-aɣ
i d aɣ-d-icqan d asiwweḍ
leɛqel ma yebda yeffeɣ-aɣ
ɣas ma yettnuz ad t-id-naɣ
ad t-nernu uqebl ad aɣ-yennaɣ
a dunit a lbir n ssem
ṛẓageḍ amzun d ilili
ul-iw ibeddel-am isem
lbena-m deg-s teγli
luleγ-d ad leεbeγ yes-m
meqqreɣ tleεbeḍ yes-i
ṛṛuḥ yeεya di nnehtat
neqqaṛ kan i medden bxiṛ
ul-iw leεtab-is yufat
ɣas d leḥbab yettqeṣṣiṛ
ayen ad as-hdeṛγ iẓṛa-t
yeẓṛa dunit d tmesxiṛ
nettaf-d sebba nehlek
ɣas lehlak d aqdim yella
am tara deg-neɣ yecbek
sanda nṛuḥ yid-neɣ yedda
ayen ur nečči ad ten-sellek
a dunit tebγiḍ akka
nugad leεtab n uẓekka
nugad leεtab n ddunit
nugad ass-a d uzekka
nugad ṣbeḥ tameddit
di tektabt-im i d-yura
ilul-d lεebd-im meḥni-t
yeǧǧa-id jeddi abeṛnus
abeṛnus i s-d-yeǧǧa baba-s
yenna-d ḥader-it ɣef ammus
ma yumes teɣli lqima-s
fell-as ur ttak afus
neɣ areṭṭal n yibbas
yeǧǧa-id jeddi abeṛnus
abeṛnus ɣlay-t lqima-s
ɣur-i ulac i t-id-yessawḍen
ɣas akka texṣer ṣṣifa-s
s yes i dduriɣ deg ideflawen
i jeddi yeǧǧa-t-id baba-s
i yes nerḥa iεdawen
yeǧǧa-id jeddi abeṛnus
ma yumes ur yettirid
ilaq ur yettnal akal
anef akka ad yeqqim d ajdid
ur yettili d abḍan n lmal
kečč ay abernus n sεid
tbaneḍ-d di ṭṭlam i wazal
iǧǧa-id jeddi abeṛnus
ma yenza ur d-yettuɣal
ur tezmiṛeḍ ad t-id-tcefɛeḍ
si laxeṛt ur d-nessawal
fell-ak ma yeqwa leεyaḍ
sser-ik ur t-ttammal
fell-ak ur yeddes lbaεḍ
iǧǧa-id jeddi abeṛnus
i fell-i nekk ad hedreɣ
d lewrata-w si jeddi
ɛuhdeɣ-ken ur cciḍeɣ
ur ken-id-tekk ndama seg-i
ɣas imezwura ur ten-ssineɣ
later-nsen yegra-d ɣur-i
iǧǧa-id jeddi abeṛnus
a kra ireqqen deg izilan
d agrireb ɣef uɣrum amcum
win iruḥen ad t-nɣen wurfan
yers mi d-yeddem ad icum
ɣas asirem-is d aẓayan
d ayen i t-ittnamaren i d ameɣbun
a kra yettuɛayaren
tezzin d amrar i udrar
ma ur s-zmiren ara ad t-bibben
gullen ar t-erren d azaɣar
irgazen d imaziɣen
i lbaṭel ur tteddarin amnaṛ
d kunwi i d aɣ-d-imlan
d acu i d agerruj n talsa
seg i tettnekkar mi ara teɣli
leqder tidukla iseɣ tezdeg tayri
d usirem yessefsayen
idɣaɣen igenwan d waḍu
a kra iqeddcen tamara
deg ijufar acḥal d agrud
tcedham-d isem n tnafa
ɛawaz gar wallen yettmurud
ul yekwa tazmert tekfa
d urfan i d-smarent ur d-yettqadd
a kra ikersen tawenza
ɣef udriz i tent-ɣunzan
a kahinat n wass-a
a sut n wulawen yezzan
ur tesussumemt ara
ur tesrusumt deg wallen
d kunemti i aɣ-d-imlan
akerfa n tirect-nneɣ
ideg nenkeẓ ad t-id-neqqar
nenkeẓ di leqder n tlelli n tmeṭṭut
wi izemren ad ikkes i wiyaḍ
ayen i yettnadi i yiman-is
a kra umi teqqur tassa
mi d-yekfel tidett ar ad tt-imḍel
a kra isɛan ul yelsa
d aḥerki ɣer lbaṭel
i aɣ-temlam d timerẓuga
d iberdan i ɣef ara nreggel
ala dagi i xedmeɣ zik uqbel ad uɣaleɣ d amastan
yernu racid benɣusa anemhal aqdim d yiwen seg yimeddukkal-iw imeqqranen
ay itbir siweḍ-asen slam
i warrac akk n tmurt-iw
idurar n leqbayel
din-a i ɣlin watmaten-iw
letniyen yesser ceɛbet
wɛan abeḥri n lebḥer
ṣṣeḥ akk din-a ad tafeḍ-t
ɣef lewṭen seblen leɛmeṛ
ttsellim akk fell-asen
aqcic d ilemẓi d umɣar
iflisen d tizi ɣennif
d seğğaɛ akken ma llan
d tayasa rnan nnif
ssuq lḥedd beni ԑemran
i yeḍran din-a a lḥif
tuddar qlent d iɣeẓran
tamurt-iw a tin ḥemleɣ
a tin ɛzizen fell-i
isem-im draɛ lmizan
tefkiḍ-d irgazen lɛali
d tamurt n rṣaṣ d nniḍam
yecbeḥ fell-as ma ad nɣenni
kemmel akin i udrar
si tezmalt bdu amerreḥ
idurar n ssumam
ajahed din-a i yefleḥ
seg uqbu ar bgayet
d irgazen yerna d ṣṣeḥ
sfeḍ-asen akk imeṭṭawen
sirred-asen akk irkelli lejraḥ
bren-d s adrar n ḥiẓer
tubiret d palisṭru
buɣni ɛeddi aẓaɣar
lemɛatqa ar mirabu
i yeɣlin din-a d leḥṛaṛ
mi ten-id-nfekker ad nettru
ur tettu at smaɛel
d lɛerc-iw din-a i luleɣ
ad k-ceyɛeɣ ruḥ s leɛjel
ẓur-d akk wid-ak ḥemleɣ
ben ԑebderraḥman d lefḥel
aql-aɣ nehlek seḥlu-aɣ
err akin s at kufi
at ԑli d lemɛella
at mendas d at buɣerdan
ar letniyen uqbala
amcṛas d iwaḍiyen
dehmen-d iɣil lmula
err akin s at buwaddu
umerrri din-a i yella
ad tejbuḍ ar at wasif
ajahed din-a yeqwa
ḍewwer-iten-d axxam axxam
ad d-teffeɣeḍ deg at dwala
at yiraten d micli
din-a yeqwa ukerṭuc
si tasaft ar at yanni
d tin-a i d tamurt n ԑmiruc
a rebbi ḥader fell-as
ɣur-k ad t-yečč ubeɛɛuc
err akin s iɛeẓẓugen
seg uẓeffun ar at yeğğer
seṛwan i uɛdaw lehmum
sswen-as ula d lemṛaṛ
a rebbi ili yid-sen
leɛnaya n nnbi lmixṭat
ffeɣ-d ar tizi wezzu
ar wannar bedd ɣef ṣṣur
ad tferğeḍ ar idurar
ttafgen amzun d leḍyuṛ
acḥal i yeɛziz yisem-is
isem-is a yerna mechuṛ
tikwal tezgel-aɣ tmusni akken i tt-nezgal ula d nekni
asenfar-a agmanan yessefray-d daɣ wid ara yettekkin deg tkadimit assuddes d amuzel-nnes
yessefk daɣ ad sɛun taɣlent tazzayrit yernu ad sɛun aswir asdawan
ad tesɛu daɣ tamarit tadeblant
sebded firefox ɣef yibenkan-ik i tunigin s war aneḥbus
mozilla d tasbeddit ur nettnadi ara tadrimt i yellan deffir firefox iminig-nniḍen anaṣli
nesnulfuy-d ifarisen akked tsertit akken ad neḥrez internet i yimdanen mačči i yidrimen
ad d-yas wass anida ad nissin amberrez
tilufa n umberrez mazal ur frint ara
ass amenzu ul-iw yezha amzun yelli-d s tsarutt
ihi isɣi-nni ameɣbun d uwtul-nni n lexla ddan deg wawal-is
mi zrin kra n wussan ṭṭefen abrid-nsen ɣer txelwit n mḥend uccen
winna akken kan yesla yis-sen la d-teddun yekker yerwel
akken wweḍen ɣer txelwit n mḥend uccen kecmen ɣer daxel ufan-tt d tilemt
zzin-as-d ufan afaggu n yiɣsan di tekwat netta ziɣ yečča-ten
ihi awtul-nni n lexla iḥellel akk isɣi-nni yeggul ad as-d-yerr ttar
deg wass uɣalen akk d iqeṛmaḍen
ters-d tsusmi n bessif ɣef tmurt n leqbayel
tfuk ddurt-nni n lɣerba n tyaziḍt s aqwir
abrid ɣer tmurt ssawlen-d iɛessasen-is
ssawlen-d ad nesriḥ akal d idammen
i wuccayen-agi daɣen ansi d-kkan
amek i d-ssufɣen abrid ɣer tmurt n leqbayel
ula d wigi ala aksum-nneɣ i yebninen ad t-ččen
ar yiḍ d wass mɣin-d am ikerciwen n lexla
qeḍɛen i medden abrid ɣer wayen deg ttalasen
acḥal ara awin d asfel seg yeqbayliyen
cut! Ssusem!
susmet ad nsel i teɣwist n wid-nni ara teccelqef lmut
uccayen ad gezzren di medden ayen ara ǧǧen irebraben ad t-kemmlen
ad negren leqbayel
ur tufiḍ win ara yeslen yis-sen

drus yid-sen meɛna lebɣi meqqer

ansa i d-yekka
d acu ixeddem
samil rezki nunu samya mark facebook yeṣṣawaḍ tizeɣwin n uheggi ṣṣawaḍent

d isbayɛiyen wawalen i yessidir deg usefru

Aḍaṛ ma Inuda ad d-yawi lada
Aḍar ma inuda, ad d-yawi lada.
Adfel yekkat deg udrar, semm-is di swaḥel.
Adlis-agi n tmucuha ur d-tewwi ara ad t-necrek
adrar yuɣal d iftaten nbedd di tiɣilt nessaɣ taftilt
adrar yuli d asawen yunag inig d amerɣan
Aɛdaw d lexdeɛ, aḥbib d ṭmeɛ, ala Rebbi ma yecfeɛ
Aɛṛaben izedɣen tamurt n Imaziɣen
aɛwin ifukk-ak ad k-agint temẓin ad k-id-tessusef tgella.
Afus ur tewɛaḍ ad t-kerceḍ, suden-it axiṛ
Afus ur tezmireḍ ad tɣeẓzeḍ, suden-it axiṛ
Afus-is deg ufus-inu, ṣṣut-is agemmaḍ akin.
Agdud ur nesɛi idles am umdan mebla iles
Aggur mi yexẓeṛ ɣur-i, itran anda bɣun ṛuḥen
Aɣrum d zit Rebbi iεuz-it
Aɣṛum n tekwatt ma ur teččin ad t-ssigren

Aɣyul d aɣyul-iw rniɣ rrekba n uzagur

ahat ad d-afen kra ufetfut n wučči yeffren ddaw-nsen

ahat yal yiwen ad s-isslen
Aḥeqqar kkes-as, nneɣ rnu-as.
aḥerrek ulac
akal adrar tannumi yal asurif s tidi
akal yuɣal d aɣerbal yeţagmen aḍu yeţawi-t-id d aẓeṭa
akal yuɣal d ibidi tečča tkekkuct ulac amruj ur yezdiɣ kra
akal, taga, tata d wigi i yuɣen aẓar
Akka imir-a
Akka, i d-nnan imezwura
Akka, qqaren di temdint d akken
akked d udabu i aɣ-iqqazen aẓekka
akked lɣaci ukud ur neɛdil ara d lɣaci ur aɣ-nebɣi ara
akked llufan-nsen, Koyotito.
akked walef utmenmiyya u waḥedd usebɛin
akken ad idduri seg uzwu-nni iɣemlen
Akken i s-yenna wuccen, a wi yufan lexrif xerfayen, tafsut εamayen, tagrist d unebdu yumayen.
Akken yebɣu yeɣzif yiḍ, leqrari-s ar ad yali wass
akken yegget deg iger ucnaf bu tmecḍin
akken yegget di tnezruft yijdi awraɣ
Akken yella wass ad t-ikkes umeksa
Ala aɣyul i yenekren laṣel-is.
allaɣ-nneɣ tezdeɣ-it tatut neswa taxatemt n meţu kra din neţu-t

am wakken nferren si zik irgazen di tjemmuyaɛ-nneɣ

anagar ṭmaε n tudert d usirem a bab igenwan
Anda yella yir awal i tella yir tsusmi
anef ad run widak yesnejlan taḍsa
Anef, aεrur-iw din, wi bɣun yini

anwa akka i d-iberrun i layas urǧan iẓerman araǧu yeţnejbaden
anwa akka yebnan tillas win iteẓun di tsuqas
anwa ara sen-yerren aleggam makka temsusam ?
Anwa i kem-icekkṛen a tislit, d yemma teḥdeṛ xalti!
aql-aɣ la neskeɛwiw akken nella ! aql-aɣ nerra-ţ akk i usuḍu !

Argaz d targa, tameṭṭut d tamda

aru-yi-d tabrat mi ara tawḍeḍ
aṣeggad iselman
Asɣar yeɣlin si tezdemt, yenqes si tɛekkemt
askeɛwew i ɣ-d-yeţagem i d awal-nneɣ
Asmi ɣ-ttarran ɣer lehbas
asmi i aɣ-kkaten
asmi yedder iffud yerɣa, mi yemmut meḍlent rrif n tala
Ass imdemdem win yekkren ad ixdem win yeṭṭsen ad indem
Ass-a erran-tt d tunṣibt
Ass-agi ad as-tiniḍ Azwaw yeɛya
Ass-agi ilaq ad as-nekkes laman i udabu-agi
Ass-n mi tella nniya, aɛḍil yeddal miya
Ass-nni tazwawt ad tili d tunṣibt di tmurt n yezwawen
asṭeɛteaɛ i la d-yeţsuḍu i d tiremt-nneɣ
at tidi tezga temmar urǧin ggunin amnar

atan ihi yuɣal-d
atan la asen-qqaren belli Lezzayer tuẓa ɣer tugdut d izerfan

Aṭas aṭas tagi n uselmed d usegmi n weɣref-nneɣ
atenad la cennun s tmeslayt-nsen tinna n yizgaren
Atmaten d atmaten, aɛebbuḍ yebḍa-ten
Atmaten mara ad mweṣṣin, bnu fell-ak ay axṣim
Atmaten-nneɣ d urawen yal uraw deg-s isyaxen

Awal ma wezzil yefra, ma ɣezzif ad d-yinni kra
awal-is win i s-yeslan atan yezga yeţnadi fell-as

awi-yasen imekli
Axiṛ takemmict n tzizwa, wala agwlaf n warẓaẓen

Axiṛ tidett yesseqraḥen, wala lekdeb yessefraḥen
Axxam d axxam-nneɣ, aqjun yesseglaf fell-aɣ

Ay aḍaṛ jbu a tiṭ cfu

Cwiṭ cwiṭ Azwaw yettuɣal d Aɛrab neɣ d wayeḍ.
D acu i d ixef-is ihi ?
D acu i d-yegran di tcacit d aqarru yeǧǧa wallaɣ
D acu tettfeẓẓeḍ a ɛemmi, d llazuq n yilindi
d acu-t, d acu-t? D aqemmuc
d aḍref ur nreggel ur ntekkes ccama tuɣal d asalas
D agugam ttruγ imi ara ttγennin
d ajeɣlal kan, yerna d ilem
d asenṣeb n tmuḥqranit-is
D awal yersen di lkaɣeḍ
d iḥlalaḍen d iblalaḍen ulac tamurt ur wwiḍen
d ileqqaqen d iferruǧen tudert mi sen-ţ-sɣersen
d iswi ur yeswi d aman ur yewwiḍ
d Izwawen kan i yzemren ad utlayen s tezwawt
D lawan ad tekfu tugdi
D lecfeṛ iqeṛben ar tiṭ, d lmut iqeṛben ɣer lecfeṛ
D lmuḥal akk wayagi
D lqella n yirgazen i k-yerran, a bu txutam d argaz
d nukni i d-Izwawen wiyaḍ
D ṣbeṛ i d ddwa lmeḥna
D tebrek n wul i yerran iles d asennan
d tiberkanin neɣ d timellalin,
d tissirt la tezzaḍ deg aktayen
d tkerrust-is i yezzenz
d tmeṭṭut-is, Juana,
d ttṛebga n ttnefcic i d-isuffuɣen yir qcic
d wesɣar i d-kksen seg tmurt
d winna kan i teniceɣben
Dacu yezmer ad ittkel wemdan ɣef udabu am wagi ?
Dagi nefka tiyita i yiman-nneɣ
dayen terwi fella-neɣ
dayen teṭef-ik tcerkeţ taylewt swayes i d-tluleḍ teččur
Dayen yekfa laman asmi i yuɣalen medden d izerman
dayen yuɣal-aɣ ddkir s aɛrur ɛerqen-aɣ iberdan d ilem i neţagem
Ddan deg uzwu neţbibbi deg idmaren
ddan-ţ fell-as yerreẓ deg ammas yan yekkaten yekkat
ddu d umeksa ad tekseḍ ddu d ṭaleb ad teɣreḍ
Ddunit am uxxam bu snat tewwura, ekk sya teffeɣḍ syin
Ddunit tezreb, ayen ibeɛden yuɣal yeqṛeb
ddwa n tmusni d tasusmi
Deɛwessu n lwaldin tuwɛeṛ, tin n dderya ay kteṛ
Deg mi tamacahut-agi ssawlen-tt ayen-din d tikkelt
Ḍeggreɣ-tt s igenni, teqqen-d lḥenni
deg-s ala tiɣawsiwin n diri akked tid yelhan,
dɣa immuqel ɣer wemkuẓ-nni n tafat i d-tegga tewwurt
Di ndama i ɛziz lmut
di tegrest d agrireb cerreq neɣ ɣerreb
Di ṭṭiq i d-yettban werfiq
Ečč lḥeq-ik qmec tiṭ-ik
Ɛeddi-d kan di Tizi
Ɛeddi-d kan di Tizi neɣ Bgayet
ɛellfen teffẓen s tsusmi widak yemḥan ajerreḍ tejreḍ txabit
Ɛerdeɣ-d aεṛab, yečča-t akk
Efk-as ad yečč i yizem, ad d-yas wass d netta ara k-yeččen
efk-as i weqjun tiremt neɣ eǧǧ-it mebla imensi
Efk-iyi yelli-k, ternuḍ-i lεula-s d yirden
Ɛqel teǧǧeḍ
erran tiẓgi d tibḥirt swayes ddren
erran-tt deffir n taɛṛabt
Ɛuhdeɣ tirzaf n meɣres d win ɣur-s, alama iger ujdim tixellal
Ɛyan at kuk, iqqim ar lɛeṛc n ṭikuk
fekk-aɣ-d aman ad nesew
ferḥeɣ imi ken-walaɣ
gar izegzawen d iquranen tafsut d unebdu srewten
Gar sebɛa yefṛax
ɣas akken nenjeṛ-ed abrid
Ɣas akken nuki-d di tefsut n tmanyin
ɣas allen ldint asurif i nedda ɣur deffir i ɣ-yeţawi
Ɣas ma nttennaɣ, deg umennuɣ ad yekk nfeɛ
ɣef uḥezzeb yerkeḍ
ɣer akken ad tafeḍ axeddim

Ttexmim icban wagi ittawi ɣer uzaglu akked nnger
Ttif xiṛ win i d-yesnulfan taɣawsa
Ttmeslayen s lezwax
Ttruɣ af ṭlam id yeɣlin, nnan-d: Ɣef medden meṛṛa, nniɣ-asen : tejreḥ tasa, nnan-d: si zik ar assa
Ttruɣ, yettru, ḍsiɣ yeḍsa, anwa id amdakel i-yifen

Tuden taγect-iw
tuɣal d tarbibt di kullec
Tuɣal d tunṣibt deg wawal
tuɣal tṛeṣṣa deg wallaɣ n yal amdan .
tuɣal-asen tmaziɣt d abrid s akersi d uṣurdi
tuɣaleḍ-d zik
tuget n yeqbayliyen neɣ izwawen n wass-a
tura ad teẓreḍ acu yeḍran
Tura, ma yella tamacahut-agi deg-s kra unamek,
Turew tɛebbuḍt teqqim weḥd-s
tuzel aṭas
tuzleḍ deg ubrid
tuzlem kan ciṭuḥ
tuzlemt iḍelli
udem-is win i t-iwalan daɣen ur iṣebber fell-as
Ufhim s timmi, fihel imi, ungif ula s-nini
Ufiɣ mmis-s n ugellid gar snat teblawin, yiwet d udi, tayed d tament
Ula d allen n Juana ldint
Ula d imeɣnasen yeɛyan ad staɛfun
Ula i d am-d-iga ttexmim
Ulac aseḍsu ma ɣlint tuɣmas
Ulac axxam yebnan mebla lsas
ulac sbeṛ ur nesɛi tilas
Ulac ṭejra ur ihuz ubeḥri , ulac ul uɣuṛ ur terzif tayri
ulac tid i d-yusan di tlemmast.
Ulac tirect ur nesεi akerfa.
ulac wi yemmuten yegla s wayla-s
ulac win ara t-id-iqarɛen tugeţ tura malen ɣur-s
ulac win i ruḥen ɣer tmeɣṛa ur ičči cceṛba
Ulac win izegren asif ur yebzig
Ulac win izegren asif ur yellixs
ulac win yemmuten yegla s wayla-s
Ulama ɛzized a tit, timmi tekka-d s nnig-m
Ulamek ara nettkel ayen swayes i nedder
Ulamma nenna-d akka
Ul-iw yebḍa ɣef sin, ibɣa Ḥsen ibɣa Lḥusin
Ullac sbeṛ ur nesɛi tilas, ulac aṣeḍṣu ma huddent tuɣmas

Wa maɛduṛ wa d lḥaq-is
Wa yuγal d aɛṛab, wayed d aṛumi
wala win yeddren ɣef ayen i d-eǧǧan imezwura
wali kan anwa d-yusan
Walit kan dacu ixeddem udabu i yezwawen akk d tezwawt
werǧin i d-yufi allen n Juana qqnent mi ara d-yakwi
Wid i s-d-isellen agemmaḍ ɣilen d asrugmet nutni d imeṭi i ţrun !
wid i s-yefkan laman
Wid iḍemɛen deg udabu ad sen-d-yexdem kra
wid iɣran tilufa
Wid ikkaten ɣef taɛṛabt-tineslemt atnan feṛḥen
wid iqqaren di Tizi Wezzu
wid isteqnaɛen s wayen i d-yewwi s iɣallen-is
wid ittkelfen deg tɣuri ttwazenzen akk
wid yesefruyen ţun asefru
wid yeserwaten nutni serwaten
wid yeţcummun kksen ṭmaε wid yeţɣunfun ţun aɣunfu
widak i ɣ-d-yugmen lihana cerrgen-aɣ tasa
Wigi yeṭṭfen leḥkem
win i s-yennan yeshel qeḍṛan, ad yeddem ad yessisen
Win i s-yennan yeshel usennan, yeddu mebla arkasen
Win i s-yennan zemreɣ i lhem yezewwir-as neɣ ad t-yeddem
Win i wumi teεreq tikli n tsekkurt, ad yetbeε tin n tyaziḍt
Win ifehmen yefhem, win ur nefhim ad yefhem
win igezzmen igezzem win ineccren ineccer
Win ignen di temda ad yaf lǧaṛ-is d imqeṛqeṛ
Win iteddun s talwit werǧin yendem.
Win iwumi teɛreq tikli n tsekkurt ,ad yeḍdfeṛ tin n tyaziḍt
Win mi yekkes vava-s atan deg irebbi n yemm-as
win mi yekkes yemm-as, atan deg ugudu nḍent-as 
Win ur nfehhem yesserway lhem
Win ur nuriw yugad nnger, win yurwen yeṛwa amdegger.
Win yebɣan ad iẓuṛ lemqam ad izwir seg at wuxxam
Win yebɣan aɣrum d zit yekker ad ixdem tamazirt
Win yebgɣan ad ikkes lhif ad ikker mi ɛziz yiḍes
Win yeččan lḥeqq-is yeqqen tiṭ-is
Win yellan d lfahem yefhem win yellan d abhim yewhem
win yennulen taglimt-is dayen ur ţ-iteţu
Win yeqqes uzrem yettagad aseɣwen.
win yesraḥen tidi-ines tuɣal-as d ccemma n Sidi-Ɛemmar
win yeswan imetman i s-d-terqa yeswa aḥeckul n tayri
Wissen ahat imir-n ad kfun imeɣnasen
Wissen dacu ara xedmen imeɣnasen-agi ma ifuk leɛtab
wissen ma ad naweḍ di lawan
Xali yexla-yi ɛemmi yeɛma-yi anda-k a baba lwali
xas smektiyi-d azekka
Xdem ddin rnu lwaldin kullec atan din
Xdem isem i yiman-ik anef-as i jedd-k
Xedmeɣ lxir, yuɣal-iyi-d d ixmiṛ.
xemmlen i yiɣallen-nnsen

yenna-as a baba wwten-aɣ
Yenna-as udɣaɣ : ad fsiɣ
Yenna-yas waɣyul, eğğ-iyi kan ad serseɣ icenfiren-iw ɣef temzin
Yenṭeq yennayer ɣer Fuṛar,ina-as εemmi Fuṛar, smill-itt neɣ ad tt-smilleɣ
yeqlaleḥ ur yeǧǧa tardast tameţant la t-tezuɣur.
yeqqar
yeqqaren
yeqqel d agujil yiwen wass adrar yuɣal d amessas
yerna rnan taḍsa aruḥani i ten-izedɣen nutni d amxalef
Yerna ssufɣen-as-d idlisen ur ncudd ara ɣer yedles azwaw neɣ amaziɣ
yerna tura ggten akken yegget inijjel deg umadaɣ
yerna ur tezgil yiwen anagar wid i ţ-yeddan fell-as
yerna-yasen umdan ibezḍan n fateryul i d-ibecc yifis
Yernu, adabu illa d adabu ɣef wid i t-iqeblen
yerra-as ukkera : d acu ara ad d-iniɣ ?
yesmecṭiḥ

yewwi-yaɣ ṭṭmeɛ

Yif ulac-itt
Yir argaz yerna amuqel
Yir awal ineqq
Yir awal ur yettnawal
Yir leǧruḥ qqazen ḥellun yir lehdur qqazen rennun
Yir lqedd yerna aqluqel, yir qadum yerna amuqel
Yir tagmatt d ajgu ẓẓayen d azrem s nnig n lkanun
Yir zwaǧ am lmeɣṛeb ṭlam-is yezga yeqṛeb
Yir zwaǧ d daɛwessu
Yir zzin terna leɣla
Yiwen iniɣem yeččur akufi
Yiwen itturar s luqṛan wayeḍ ur yufi swacu ara yeẓẓal
yiwen ur ten-id-yeţwali ufan-as ixef i tmeddurt yeqqlen
yiwen waɛrab yeɛmeṛ ssuq
Yiwen wass i tkeḥel tyaziḍt, yeddem-itt ufalku.
Yiwen waεrab yeεmeṛ ssuq.
yiwet n tegrurt n yegḍaḍ sekkren aḥiḥa
Yiwet n tiddukla tamejṭuḥt am tin n yimaziɣen n Marikan
Yuɣ luḍu ur iẓẓul ara, yelsa ur yeǧǧi ara, iruḥ ur d-yuɣal ara.
Yuɣal yeɣli wazal-is ger inelmaden
Yuker ḥeḍreɣ , yeggul umneɣ

yuzel yid-sen
Ẓeṛ kan a baba, miyya kecment miyya teffɣent
Zgigu ibaḥ aɛrav ifuḥ
Zheṛṛ aɛiban kra xedmeɣ lxiṛ ur d-iban
Ziɣ d Juana i d-iqeṛṛben ɣur-s war ma tegga dderz
ziɣen qerreḥ ifelfel yeqqden aqcic
ziɣen terɣa tmurt tugar allaɣ yeţfurun
ziɣen yemsed rray yugar tafrut izellun
ẓran acu yeḍran
ẓran d acu i d-heggan izzayriyen i teqbaylit
ẓriɣ bɣant ad swent iɣi
ẓriɣ tessneḍ ad tsewweḍ
Zwaren erran-tt d tameslayt taɣelnawt
ẓzan irden megren aḍu rwin, la sen-yeţsuḍu deg uqerru
ihi imi kifkif-itent, acimi ur teɣriḍ ara s teqbaylit
seg wasmi i tumnem tɣilem yettmeslay massnsen
tutlayin akk kifkif-itent
twalaḍ ziɣ
ulac anda ara tt-ɣreɣ
tilawin deg-sent ad ssutreɣ asuref, wagi d inzi mačči t-tiyita deg-sent
ulamma ahil yella-d d amerkanti
d tagnit daɣen
sḥasfeɣ aṭas
yella-d d asissen iwatan ɣef wayen akk i d-yefka d wayen i d-yeǧǧa meɛtub ama d tamedyazt, neɣ d ccna
ulamma teǧǧa-aɣ
yiwen di meyya deg umkan wis tmanya
sebɛa uɛecrin n yiseggasen i tedder
s yiwen u sebɛin, tezga-d tizi wezzu deg umḍiq amezwaru
a baba uwten-aɣ, a mmi ɛeqlen-aɣ
ad d-yeqqel daɣen lawan ideg d-yettecrurud yiṭij am tsekrin γef tɣaltin
a ɛezzu ɛzizen tɛezziḍ i mmi-s n ɛziza?
a gma ɣas beddel tikli-ik
a mass inu
ammas-inu
ad nqeṣṣer iḍ-agi
a rebbi mačči d aqcic akken ad s-kellxeɣ
a rebbi ur telliḍ d amsellek
a ssiɛqa lmumnin !
abbuh a yinselmen!
ad s-tiniḍ d akniwen nekk yid-k
d tagnit daɣen
a stut m lebtut
a tafat a kemmi a tallast a nekki
a tafat i d-yeflalin fell-as
a taklit-agi.
a talwit win yeṭṭsen di tṛakna, ad as-yini ccetwa teḥma
a tayri i t-id-yeqsen
ad t-reǧmeɣ s yeẓra am cciṭan
ad tt-mmagreɣ am userdas-nni yeɣlin deg wannar n yiseɣ
a tunṭict mi d i t-ɣennu d cwiṭ llemḥibba i t-rennuḍ
awi yufan tamezwarut d lalla
a yemma : amek ara as-tsemmiḍ ?
a yemma: d acu ara d-taɣeḍ?
a yeẓra kullec!
a yiles yellan d aksum, d acu i k-yerran d asennan
a yiwet tɣeddart
abernus mellulen d tameṭṭut i  t-iḥerzen
abrid-is ar yilel
abuneggif-nni irekben yidir, ibda ittseffiṛ deg wanzaren-is, dɣa yelldi imi-s akken ad t-iḥbes
acḥal i iɛeddan d ussan d uḍan d ayyuren
acḥal teddal ulawen semmḍen s lḥamu-s
acku ayen ira yewwet-it umezwi-nni
acku yerra tamawt d akken tecbeḥ taddart
acku mačči d iyuzaḍ n wurar
acku win t-ilan neɣ ur t-yegzim ara iteqqel-asent i tmuffirin igenni d tansa iγef ttnadint deg iḍ deg wass
acku yemma ur ssineγ amek teḍṛa yid-s, gma diγen akken, ula d  baba
acu i la d-yeqqar wergaz-agi ?
acu i k-yerran d gma a mmi-s n takna n yemma
acu n tikti neɣ asentel iɣef i d-tewwi awal
acu tebɣiḍ a bu ɛeryan, yenna-as d taxatemt
acu xedmeɣ gar-i yid-k ?
acu yeḍran?

Azen Imayl
Ala, tanemmirt!
Amazray-inek n unadi yettwasfed
Amedya:taqbaylit.kab
Amesday n unadi amaynut ittwarna
Ammesten mgal asfuɣel yensa
Amsedday n unadi
Amtawi n Apple Handoff iteddu
Anadi-ik, abrid-ik
Aql-ak tettedduḍ ad teffɣeḍ si Firefox iOS
Armad n uɣewwaṛ-agi izmer ad yeglu s kra n wuguren di kra n yisebtar
Asewḥel n ineḍfaṛen-nniḍen n ugbur yezmer ad isewḥel kra n tvidyutin akked isebtar web ad d-banen akken iwata
Aseγwen i tneγleḍ: Firefox iOS
Awi-d asnas Firefox
Aya ad isireg asekles n tugna ɣer uzmam n tkamiṛat
Ayagi ad isireg asider d usali n tvidyutin
Ayagi ad ak-yeǧǧ ad teṭṭfeḍ neɣ ad tessaliḍ tiwlafin
Ayagi ad k-yeǧǧ ad tserḥeḍ i usnas
Azen isefka n useqdec
Bḍu aseγwen
Ɛreḍ tikelt nniḍen
Err-d imseddayen n unadi amezwer
Face ID yezmer ad iserreḥ i Firefox iOS ma yella tansa web teldi yakan deg usnas
Firefox: tunigin tusligin
Firefox iOS ad ak-d-yefk afus ad teqqimeḍ d aqeṛṛu
Firefox iOS ur yermid ara
Firefox iOS ur yizmir ara ad yesεu taččart tawurmant i ugar n rbeɛ miyya n tansiwin deg ufeggag n tansiwin
Firefox iOS yebɣa ad yekcem ɣer tewlafin-inek
d Firefox iOS i yebɣan ad yeldi App Store
d Firefox iOS i yebɣan ad yeldi asnas-nniḍen
Firefox iOS iga-t Mozilla
Tuɣdaḍ-nneɣ d aḥareb ɣef tulya akked tezmert yelhan n Internet
Fren afeggag n tansa
Fren asewḥel n uzegrir Firefox iOS, n waddad, imettiyen d ineḍfaṛen-nniḍen
ih, awi-t-id!
Dayen ur tettuγaleḍ ad twaliḍ adellel neγ imesfuγal i k-yeṭṭafaren, daɣen saẓẓayen tulya n yismal web
Iminig uslig ad yali deg uswir
Ineḍfaṛen n iẓeḍwa inmettiyen
Ineḍfaṛen n tiddadanin
Ineḍfaṛen n udellel
Ineḍfaṛen n ugbur
Ineḍfaṛen weḥlen
Inig am akken ulac win i k-id-ittmuqqulen
Isem ad id-ttwasknen
Isem n umsedday n unadi
Ismal web aniɣer trezzuḍ zemren ad sutren adig-inek
Issin ugar
Ittwarna deg kra n ismal akken ad isfuγel tirziwin inek , akken daγen ad d-yesken timahaltin am tqefalt n beṭṭu
Ittwaseqdec i welqqaḍ , Aslaḍ d uktili n wamud am usekcem n isekillen akked usenned
Kkes amazray inek tiγimit n tuinigin, awalen inek uffiren d wayen nniḍen d ayen fessusen s waṭas
Kra n udellel iṭṭafaṛ tirza inek γer izmal web, Γas ur tsit ara γef udellel
Ldi iγewwaren
Mozilla tettennaɣ akken ad telqeḍ kan ayen tesra i usnulfu d usnerni n Firefox iOS i yal yiwen
Nadi aḍris ad tesqedceḍ
Nadi deg usebter
Nadi deg usebter d-iteddun
Nadi deg usebter yezrin
Nadi deg usebter: Firefox iOS
Nadi Firefox iOS
Nadi neɣ sekcem tansa
Nadi udiɣ inig seg usnas

deg taεrabt, am tmaziɣt, yal imesli yettwaray s yiwen n usekkil
deg tira n tefransist d tin n tmaziɣt n zik, am tira n bulifa, ferɛun
deg tmaziɣt, asekkil amezwaru yezga d ussid : ssif, ṭṭbel, zzit, ṭṭir, ṭṭbib,nnif, rrif, nnefs
deg udlis n ilugan n tira, asekkil  ţ  ur yelli ara
deg udlisfus-a, ad ilin kraḍ n yiswiren: agemmay, aswir n wawalen, aswir n tezrarin
deg yimyagen yelan s y iwet n tergalt
deg yismawen i d-yekkan seg taεrabt, wid ibeddun s yisekkilen n yiṭij
deg umedya-nni amezwaru, d tafyirt ideg yella wawal ara d-yesseknen anamek-is

inɛel ddin n baba-k
iqemmuden iqermuden imectuqa n yiḥbuben abziz abziz i yiwen
iqettalen n unabu azzayri ttleqqimen di tarwa-nsen
isekkilen g, k, ɣ, x, q, lan, deg tmenna, azal n tanɣit
isekkilen n ugemmay swayes nettaru taqbaylit, d wid n tlatint,anagar sin-a: ɣ d ɛ
isekkilen o, p, v, nettaru yes-sen imesla yezgan deg wawalen imnekcamen n umalu
isekkilen t d z lan, deg tmenna, azal n teznaggaɣt, i ttarun zik ţ
isekkilen yettawin akafu nnig-sen, nettaru yes-sen izegnaggaɣen imezgiyen: č d ǧ
isekkilen yettawin tineqqiḍt ddaw-atsen, nettaru yes-sen imesla ufayen, anagar ḥ

izi mačči d iẓi

lexbar-iw ssiweḍ-it
leεyub n ugemmay n taεrabt ggten
lferḥ-iw ma d-yerr tili
llan wawalen ideg tella tussda deg kra n tmeslayin, maca deg tira nesmenyif talɣa war tussda
llan wiyaḍ ilaq ad msebḍun
llan yimesla yettwaran s sin neɣ ugar n yisekkilen yemgaraden
llant snat n taggayin n tussda : tin n tnumi d tin n tjerrumt
luleɣ di tciṭa n lqeṛn
lxiq mi ara d-yettseffiṛ
ma d asemmad imsegzi n umatar udmawan neɣ n umqim awṣil asemmad usrid deffir umyag
ma d urmir ussid n rwel, ad t-naru rewwe
ma deg sin n yimedyaten ineggura, ad naru eww
ma nerna-yas ineqqiḍen-nni n teqbaylit, ad tessiwen tira
ma tesḍehreḍ i mmi-k
ma ttwakksen yineqqiḍen-a, ad d-qqimen deg-s drus n yisekkilen
ma yettunefk-ak d umeslay
ma yettunefk-ak-d umeslay
maca kra n yisekkilen deg-s tettbeddil talɣa-nsen almend n umkan uɣen deg wawal
maca tanumiy-a temxallaf seg tama ɣer tayeḍ, seg taddart ɣer tayeḍ
maca, deg tira, ţ ad yuɣal tt, ž ad yuɣal zz
maca, ur neṭṭafar ara abrid-a ussnan, da.
malek hud d buɛlam messusi
mennaɣ amkan-ik
mennaɣ-as lehna

talɣa tilawt: yella wayen i ɣef d-nettmeslay
Akka, amyag di teqbaylit yebḍa ɣef sin isufar

Ur yekid ara maḍi, ad tɣileḍ yeqqim ɣef usennan
ad s-yeqqaṛ: Ad d-snulfum iẓẓan mačči d takadimit
Ad yeqqim kan di zzawiya-is, yerna din i yella din.
ɣer taggara yeɣli fell-as, yekkat, yekkat armi yeɛya
nettɣimi, tettɣimim, tettɣimimt, ttɣimin , attɣimint
neɣ talɣa tibawt: tigawt neɣ taɣara i ɣef d-nettmeslay
Irgazen ad kkaten settin n imelyan s unerfud n yiffasen
Llan sin n yesmilen n yemyagen, mxallafen kan di tseftit
imi d lexmis neɣ d lḥed ulac fell-as neɣ ahat ass n ttlata
Ay aɛessas n zehr-iw, Dawi-yi lɛeql-iw, Teẓṛiḍ anida ttwaɣeɣ
iṛuḥ umẓabi, yuɣal-d ucawi, yerna-d ucenwi, yeḍfer-it-id utergi

giɣ-as amkan deg ul-iw, tegla-yi s tayri-w, ttuɣ axxam deg i d-luleɣ
taninna iṛṛeba ufus-iw,  mennaɣ-tt d zwağ-iw, nekk d lxiṛ ay i s-buddeɣ
Yettwali-d ar muḥend ṭeyyeb, ad s-yeqqaṛ: acu i d-yewwin bu tzamumt-agi ar dagi?
Ur iṛuḥ ur yeqqim, yettezzi kan.
Anwa-t bu tjellabt-ihin yellufḍan?
Tifiwa ala ayen iεeddan.
Yuɣal weqcic ar teqdimin-is.
Eǧǧ kan afus-ik ɣur-k, win i iwehhan yewwet.
Tafatin ttreqriqent ula deg wazal.
Azal n sin yiseggasen ur tt-ẓriɣ.
A win yufan ad ṣedddent akk temkeḥlin.
Ma teεyiḍ lqeḍ idɣaɣen!
Cfen deg wasif yečča-ten.
Ar wass-a ur tefri gar-as d bu yiwtal.
Urgaɣ abrid yessa d ijeǧǧigen.
Axxam d axxam-ik, d acu ass-a kan!
Ttimɣuren yettimɣur unezgum-nsen.
Yufa-d sin iniɣman, yeddem yiwen.
Akken i s-yenna win: nessen abrid nexḍa-as.
Seddu kra n yizenziɣen, mačči d iḍrisen kan.
Ilaq ad d-taɣeḍ taɣerdayt, ta tceṭṭeḥ akk.
Ini-d akk ayen yellan deg tcekkaṛt-im.
Yewweḍ-d akken kan i yebda usarag.
Ula d tanalit ur yessin ad tt-yewwet.
Imɣaren-a ala ɣef ddabex ay ttmeslayen.
Rnu yiwet, neɣ terwiḍ?
Yeččur wul-is meskint, win tufa ad as-teḥku.
Tura kan i t-ssawḍeɣ ar usafag.
Azemmur leqḍen-t, zzit ur t-ṛwin.
Ufiɣ-ten qquren deg usemmiḍ.
Am win yegren amcic deg ucekkaṛ.
Wali-t kan, ad as-tiniḍ d Charlie Chaplin.
Mi ara ineqqec iger, wellah ar yif tayuga.
Ɣlint akk tuɣmas-is, ahat d cemma-nni yal ass.
Ur tezzi ara kan deg wawal, awi-d amaynut.
Yezga iḥebbes wegdil segmi i sbeddeɣ asnas-a.
Acḥal tefṛeḥ yelli-s mi twala inisi.
Aɣ-d aɣrum ternu-d ayefki, d aya i ulac.
Ar tura ɣef tlisa ay ttennaɣen.
Am tgiṭart am upyanu, d turart i yetturar yes-sen.
Ibeddel-as tabessast i mmi-s, wehment deg-s.
Zgan εyan yiɣyal n taddart-a.
Yečča qrib kilu weksum iman-is.
Uraren mgal Ifulka n Atlanta sendiḍelli.
Ihi ɣef waya i as-zzin yemcac.
Yella yeskeṛ, d acu tura tezri-as.
D tameṭṭut-nnu taẓelmaḍt i d-yeddan yid-s.
Deg tira tif tamacint.
Acḥal qeṛṛiḥet tegrest deg tmurt-a!
Yebda-tt s umenɣi, yekfa-tt s umenɣi.
Imawlan-is lhan, ma d netta d lxiṛ kan.
Yufrar-d deg tusnakt segmi meẓẓi.
Aṭṭan am win yerna ibeddi.
Tezxuxem am teslit mi d-kecmen.
Swiɣ-d lqahwa n tɣellayt terra-yi ar temẓi.
Anef-asen kan, d iferṭeṭṭa n yiḍ.
Kra ar tecwirt kra ar tayeḍ, ma ulac ad ɣlint.
Tekfa taggazt n New York s usubbu ass-a.
Isura am wa, ad ak-d-ččareɣ akamyun.
Yuɣ-itt-id akken tefla.
Yezga yesṛuḥuy tibṛatin n medden.
Amer ad as-isel gma-s, ad t-yenɣ.
Tagara-a, am wakken negrent tfiḍliwin.
Ala, walaɣ-tt deg wexxam n yidles.
Ɣileɣ yegza, ziɣ ifeɣ-t nekk ur neɣṛi.
Wis ma tesneḍ tamacahut n sin yiferḍasen?
Gma-k d win akken yezgan s tqemjet tadalt, neɣ ala?
Ula d setti tessen ad tseddu Windows!
D imerga neɣ d iǧeḥmam tura wi?
Atan yekkat afus aḍar.
Ur iferres, ur yettleqqim, ur ineqqec.
Yettas-d kan ad iɣellet.
Nusa-d ad nẓer addal-a amaynut.
Wa yeqqar i wa kečč d amcum.
Efk-asen tiẓurin, atenta am skeṛ.
Fru-aɣ-d aɣilif-a n tusnakt yerẓan aqerruy-nneɣ.
Abrid-a yessufuɣ ar taddart ɣef i nettmeslay.
Yettlus tiklakiḍin n tfednin ula deg tegrest.
Yeṛwa wegdud ameslay ur teḍfir tigawt.
Yezga deg wul-nneɣ ukukru ɣas nessen.
Tafellaḥt tesrusuy aqerruy tettaččar aεebbuḍ.
Iqreḥ-it umeẓẓuɣ-is, tura yerna-as-d ula d aqerruy.
Zhu yettufaṛas.
Mazal yekkat websis ɣef tɣaltin.
Ma drus kraḍ n wungalen i yura.
Sgunfu dihin akkin i uzegḍuf-nni.
Wali ma mazal aɣrum amessas.
Ččiɣ tabazint s weɣrum, ma teṛwiḍ-tt.
Ters-d ad tecḍeḥ snat tikal ass-n.
Yerna tettezzi, i s-yenna Galili.
Fran-tt d yiman-nsen, ur ttilin ara.
D taberkukest tura wa neɣ d seksu?
Ḥeḍreɣ mi tedda d tislit.
S tuffra n wexxam-nsen ay tt-yuɣ.
D netta i t-id-yessufɣen akka d acennaf.
Tesεa yiwet n tyaẓiḍt tesseṛwa-as-d timellalin.
Ssarden akk iberdan, glan ula s tzenqatin.
Teǧǧa-t tmacint n lxemsa d tin n setta.
D Tajapunit, yelha umutur-is.
Ferseɣ akk imɣan sεiɣ deg tebḥirt.
Wis ma ad taf iman-is tzemmurt-nni ay ẓẓiɣ.
Tuget deg-sen ɣṛan tiḥila.
Ula d aɣyul yegguma ad tt-yečč.
Acḥal qeṛṛiḥ yifelfel-a!
Am seksu mebla lmerqa.
Efk-aɣ ad nsew tiqit n waman.
Zwir deg qellu n tebṣelt.
Teqqim armi terɣa teccuyt.
Acḥal ziḍ seksu s yibawen!
Tiɛesbanin, seksu d ufettet ssneɣ-asen, ma d ayen nniḍen ulac.
Ur t-id-ttekkes ara, mazal ur yewwi ara.
Rnu-as aman neɣ ad ireɣ.
Seqqi-as-d i yemma-m ad tečč.
Aha beṛka ur tett ara deg uɣenǧa.
Awah, dayen ṛwiɣ.
Lluẓen i sin yid-sen.
I tura, wa d imekli neɣ d imensi?
Err-as zzit n uzemmur ad yiziḍ ugar.
D aqjun-im ad ččeɣ tisugar!?
Ad ldiɣ tawwurt ad yeffeɣ ucayaḍ.
Yal yiwen ad yeddem amur-is.
Ma yugar-d kra, ad rnuɣ.
Ččiɣ-as seksu s ubisaṛ, Wellah ma teṛwiḍ-t.
Tefka-as snat tcakulatin d tanalt i yelli-s.
Nnig lqahwa taberkant, ur zmireɣ ad rnuɣ kra.
D acu ara ak-d-fkeɣ? D tiferret neɣ d tamesruqt?
Ssefruri-aɣ-d taremmant ad nedhu deg-s.
Diri win yesnagaren.
Ala tiziḍanin i itett weqcic-a.
Bezzaf i ttetteḍ a wletma.
Ayen i d-iseww ad as-d-yeffeɣ d ččekčuka.
Err-as tibṣelt, tazṛudiyat d snat tbaṭaṭayin.
Teɛrek-d snat teḥbal n weɣrum.
Mačči d učči akk, ad tiniḍ s iḍarren-is i t-id-yexdem.
Mi dayen yeḥma lfur, tzemreḍ ad tegreḍ sin iḥitiwen-nni.
I ḥemmleɣ deg Yennayer, d seksu s ubisaṛ d uyaziḍ.
Wwet aɣrum d umureǧ ad tesɛeddiḍ tiremt.
Rfed-itt sers-itt d ifelfel d ṭumaṭic.
Ayefki n tfunast sɛan-t, ttaɣen-d win n tcekkaṛt.
Attan tfettel seksu i tmeɣra.
Seqcer-iyi-d kra n tkeṛmusin ma ulac fell-as.
Armi d ass-a, i yeččiɣ tibexsisin am ti.
Acḥal cedheɣ aman n tala n taddart-nneɣ!
Ger kra n tbaṭaṭayin ar tmes ad d-wwent.
Tezza-d iɛeqqayen n lḥemmeẓ deg uḍajin.
Učči am wa yif-it laẓ.
Ixeddem-d ala taga, taɣeddiwt d tbidest.
Ččan timellalin tuftiyin armi qebren.
Terra-as tasselt i lbaṭaṭa-nni.
Err kan kra, ṛṛuz ifetti.
Yesseknaf-as-d tasa ad d-terfed iman-is.
Ad tt-greɣ ad yimsismeḍ ma ulac ad tettwaɣ.
D tasraft, ayen yellan yebleɛ!
Aha kan, ad ssisneɣ aɣrum s zzit n uzemmur.
Theyya yemma acedluḥ i tɛacuṛt.
Efk-asen tiɛeqqayin n ččina.
D iẓem yemmugen kan deg wexxam i yelhan.
Yewɛer aṭas ad tessirdeḍ tikerciwin.
Seqdec tagezzamt ma ulac ad tent-yaɣ udekkan.
Awren-a ur yelhi ara i tesfenǧin.
Ssired akk isufar uqbel aten-terreḍ ar teccuyt.
Taccuyt, tasilt, tuggi: yal wa amek i as-yeqqar.
Yessames-iyi-d akk mi iṛuḥ ad yerwi s uxebbaḍ.
Smir-as aman alamma d talemmast.
Tekkes-as tadimt akken ad t-terwi.
Dayen yerkem lqut-nni, tzemreḍ ad as-tessenseḍ.
Yeswa tabuqalt n yiɣi iman-is.
Yebda yettkil uyefki-a, ɣas ur t-id-sewway ara.
Iɛreḍ-iyi Yuba ad ččeɣ.
Sɛeddi-t deg uɣerbal imceṛceṛ.
Tebɣa-d yemma-s izegzawen i d-yusan seg ssuq n Sidi Ɛic.
Tuɣal-asen d tannumi: yal mi ara mlilen ad d-zlun ayaziḍ.
Ula d taẓrudiyat ur tessin ara ad tt-tesseqbec.
Ddem ajenwi yelhan i uksum.
D tmanya mazal ur d-teffiɣ ara seg tkuzint.
Tesfeḍ ṭabla mi fukken učči.
Zzuzer-as sin yiɛqqayen n lmelḥ.
Ad ak-d-rnuɣ ayefki?
Yesseṛwa-as aɣrum s tament d wudi.
Tikkelt-a ulac akk tireɣla.
Nseww-d iskimen s tmellatin, neɣli fell-asen.
Cwiyya-t kan uksum-a, yeččur d tasemt.
Ad ak-d-smireɣ ttay neɣ lqahwa?
Err spagiti-nni ar tseksut ad yeqqiṭṭer.
Awi-d aman, merriɣ mliḥ wučči-a.
Tečča kan snat tmellalin tikiṛucin.
Tessenṭaḍ tmeqlit-nni, ɣas ḥiwel zzit.
Attan tesseqcaṛ tiskert.
Kkes-as akk ayen yerkan i texsayt-nni.
Lman akk yizegzawen-a.
Amek i tebɣiḍ timellalin-ik? D tuftiyin, d timerwiyin neɣ d tikiṛucin?
Yella wacu ara nečč neɣ ur d-teǧǧim wara?
Mazal, alamma ifuṛ-d snat tikkal.
Telha tberkukest i aɣ-d-tesres.
Ibelleɛ iman-is.
Teffeẓ aṭas ma ulac ad ak-yezɛeq.
Texdem-d timadlanin am tid n tḥanut.
Aksum-a i d-tuɣeḍ ala iɣsan.
Wexxeṛ akin ma ulac ad terɣeḍ.
Ɣeṛ-asen-d ad ččen atan yewjed.
Atan imecceḥ tarbut.
D wa i d imensi-w?
Ur yewwa ara, atan akken kan d arekti.
ihi imi kifkif-itent, acimi ur teɣriḍ ara s teqbaylit
seg wasmi i tumnem neɣ tɣilem yettmeslay massnsen
tutlayin akk kifkif-itent
twalaḍ ziɣ
ulac anda ara tt-ɣreɣ
tilawin deg-sent ad ssutreɣ asuref, wagi d inzi mačči t-tiyita deg-sent
ulamma ahil yella-d d amerkanti
d tagnit daɣen
sḥasfeɣ aṭas
yella-d d asissen iwatan ɣef wayen akk i d-yefka d wayen i d-yeǧǧa meɛtub ama d tamedyazt, neɣ d ccna
ulamma teǧǧa-aɣ
yiwen di meyya deg umkan wis tmanya
sebɛa uɛecrin n yiseggasen i tedder
s yiwen u sebɛin, tezga-d tizi wezzu deg umḍiq amezwaru
a baba uwten-aɣ, a mmi ɛeqlen-aɣ
ad d-yeqqel daɣen lawan ideg d-yettecrurud yiṭij am tsekrin γef tɣaltin
a ɛezzu ɛzizen tɛezziḍ i mmi-s n ɛziza?
a gma ɣas beddel tikli-ik
a mass inu
ammas-inu
ad nqeṣṣer iḍ-agi
a rebbi mačči d aqcic akken ad s-kellxeɣ
a rebbi ur telliḍ d amsellek
a ssiɛqa lmumnin !
abbuh a yinselmen!
ad s-tiniḍ d akniwen nekk yid-k
d tagnit daɣen
a stut m lebtut

a taklit-agi.
a talwit win yeṭṭsen di tṛakna, ad as-yini ccetwa teḥma
a tayri i t-id-yeqsen
ad t-reǧmeɣ s yeẓra am cciṭan
ad tt-mmagreɣ am userdas-nni yeɣlin deg wannar n yiseɣ
a tunṭict mi d i t-ɣennu d cwiṭ llemḥibba i t-rennuḍ
awi yufan tamezwarut d lalla
a yemma : amek ara as-tsemmiḍ ?
a yemma: d acu ara d-taɣeḍ?
a yeẓra kullec!
a yiles yellan d aksum, d acu i k-yerran d asennan
a yiwet tɣeddart
abernus mellulen d tameṭṭut i  t-iḥerzen
abrid-is ar yilel
abuneggif-nni irekben yidir, ibda ittseffiṛ deg wanzaren-is, dɣa yelldi imi-s akken ad t-iḥbes
acḥal i iɛeddan d ussan d uḍan d ayyuren
acḥal teddal ulawen semmḍen s lḥamu-s
acku ayen ira yewwet-it umezwi-nni
acku yerra tamawt d akken tecbeḥ taddart
acku mačči d iyuzaḍ n wurar
acku win t-ilan neɣ ur t-yegzim ara iteqqel-asent i tmuffirin igenni d tansa iγef ttnadint deg iḍ deg wass
acku yemma ur ssineγ amek teḍṛa yid-s, gma diγen akken, ula d  baba
acu i la d-yeqqar wergaz-agi ?
acu i k-yerran d gma a mmi-s n takna n yemma
acu n tikti neɣ asentel iɣef i d-tewwi awal
acu tebɣiḍ a bu ɛeryan, yenna-as d taxatemt
acu xedmeɣ gar-i yid-k ?

Ammesten mgal asfuɣel yensa
Amsedday n unadi
Amtawi n Apple Handoff iteddu
Anadi-ik, abrid-ik
Aql-ak tettedduḍ ad teffɣeḍ si Firefox iOS
Armad n uɣewwaṛ-agi izmer ad yeglu s kra n wuguren di kra n yisebtar
Asewḥel n ineḍfaṛen-nniḍen n ugbur yezmer ad isewḥel kra n tvidyutin akked isebtar web ad d-banen akken iwata
Aseγwen i tneγleḍ: Firefox iOS
Awi-d asnas Firefox
Aya ad isireg asekles n tugna ɣer uzmam n tkamiṛat
Ayagi ad isireg asider d usali n tvidyutin
Ayagi ad ak-yeǧǧ ad teṭṭfeḍ neɣ ad tessaliḍ tiwlafin
Ayagi ad k-yeǧǧ ad tserḥeḍ i usnas
Azen isefka n useqdec
Bḍu aseγwen
Ɛreḍ tikelt nniḍen
Err-d imseddayen n unadi amezwer
Face ID yezmer ad iserreḥ i Firefox iOS ma yella tansa web teldi yakan deg usnas
Firefox: tunigin tusligin
Firefox iOS ad ak-d-yefk afus ad teqqimeḍ d aqeṛṛu
Firefox iOS ur yermid ara
Firefox iOS ur yizmir ara ad yesεu taččart tawurmant i ugar n rbeɛ miyya n tansiwin deg ufeggag n tansiwin
Firefox iOS yebɣa ad yekcem ɣer tewlafin-inek
d Firefox iOS i yebɣan ad yeldi App Store
d Firefox iOS i yebɣan ad yeldi asnas-nniḍen
Firefox iOS iga-t Mozilla
Tuɣdaḍ-nneɣ d aḥareb ɣef tulya akked tezmert yelhan n Internet
Fren afeggag n tansa
Fren asewḥel n uzegrir Firefox iOS, n waddad, imettiyen d ineḍfaṛen-nniḍen
ih, awi-t-id!
Dayen ur tettuγaleḍ ad twaliḍ adellel neγ imesfuγal i k-yeṭṭafaren, daɣen saẓẓayen tulya n yismal web
Iminig uslig ad yali deg uswir

Ineḍfaṛen weḥlen

Isem ad id-ttwasknen
Isem n umsedday n unadi

Issin ugar
Ittwarna deg kra n ismal akken ad isfuγel tirziwin inek , akken daγen ad d-yesken timahaltin am tqefalt n beṭṭu
Ittwaseqdec i welqqaḍ , Aslaḍ d uktili n wamud am usekcem n isekillen akked usenned
Kkes amazray inek tiγimit n tuinigin, awalen inek uffiren d wayen nniḍen d ayen fessusen s waṭas
Kra n udellel iṭṭafaṛ tirza inek γer izmal web, Γas ur tsit ara γef udellel
Ldi iγewwaren

yemɣi ujeǧǧig
Yemɣi-d ṛṛbiɛ n tefsut
Ittemɣay-d mkul aseggas deg tefsut
D aman i yessemɣayen ayen yettwaẓẓan
Ẓẓu kra n tzemrin ara d-afen warraw-ik
Wa itteẓẓu, wayeḍ iqelleɛ
Iḥemmel ijeǧǧigen n tefsut
Ḥemmlen ad ḥewsen di tefsut
Ssnen imukan yelhan deg tefsut
Cebḥen wussan n tefsut
Tecbeḥ tefsut s yiṭij-is d wussan-is ḥlawen
Iḥemmel tamdakelt-is mliḥ
Myeḥmalen yerna mliḥ
Tḥemmel-it seg wasmi tella d tabesṭuḥt
Tebɣa ad taɣ argaz ara tt-iḥemmlen
D tayri i yebnan tudert
Tecbeḥ tayri n temẓi
Tecbeḥ temẓi s tayri-s
Tecbeḥ temẓi s wussan n wurar
D temẓi i ixeddmen ɣef temɣeṛ

Akka tura, aqeddac yecɣel. Ɛiwed ticki.

Teɛǧeb-as Newwara i Yidir
Iḥemmel Yidir Newwara.

Ur d-icliε ara Yidir si tullas.

Ur iεeṭṭel ara yufa Yidir axeddim.
Akken kan i d-yeffeɣ Yidir si tesdawit, yufa axeddim.
Aṭas i yeεteb Yidir di leqraya-s iwakken ad d-iffeɣ d ajenyur.
Imawlan n Yidir ḍemεen ad d-iffeɣ d ṭṭbib.
Iḥemmel Yidir ddabex n uḍar acu kan di tiliẓri.
Iḥemmel ad iɣer Yidir idlisen, ladɣa ungalen.
Yessebɣas Yidir atmaten-is imecṭaḥ.
Yessebɣas Yidir gma-s amecṭuh di leqraya.
Yettεawan Yidir weltma-s di leqraya deg wexxam.
Ur ixeddem ara Yidir maḥyaf gar warrac d tullas.
Yettqadar Yidir yessetma-s.
Ur itettu ara Yidir amulli n yimawlan-is.
Mi d-yehder umulli n yemma-s, Yidir yettawi-yas-d lḥaǧa.
Yessefraḥ Yidir imawlan-is s leqder i ten-ittqadar.
Yettεuzzu aṭas Yidir imawlan-is.
Yeεdel mliḥ Yidir d baba-s.
Ur iḥemmel ara Yidir asṭuqqet n wawal.

Tbubb-d tirint n yesɣaren.
D acu ara txedmeḍ s wannect-a n yeẓra?
I wacu annect-a n yesɣaren?
Ttif takemmict n tzizwa aglaf n yizan.
Aserwal bu tfawtin.

Yuli wass ɣef Teqbaylit.

Ur as-d-yewwi ara ad yečč.
Ur as-d-tewwi ara ad tečč.
Ur aɣ-d-wwin ara ad nečč.
Ur ak-d-tewwi ara ad teččeḍ?
Tewwi-yas lqut i baba-s ɣer lexla.
Thegga-yas aɛwin i wergaz-is.
Ur tt-yugar ara di leɛmer.
Ur t-tugar ara di lqedd.
Ur myagaren ara di leɛmer.
Acḥal i temyagarem di lqedd?
Yugar-itt di lqedd s tlata n yiḍudan.

Yegguni afrag n tesnawit.
Ṣṣbuḥ n uwtul!
Ur iḥemmel ara imcac.
Acuɣer ur tḥemmleḍ ara iqjan?
Acuɣer ur tḥemmlem ara iqjan?
Acuɣer ur tḥemmlemt ara iqjan?
Yefla lǧib-ik!

Ilaq ad t-id-tafem.

Ad d-tuɣalemt?

Ad d-uɣalent?

Ur d-tuɣal ara.
Ur d-uɣalen ara.
Ur d-uɣalent ara.

Tuɣal-d neɣ mazal?
Uɣalen-d neɣ mazal?
Uɣalent-d neɣ mazal?
Mačči d kečč i d-lhiɣ a Yidir.

Yelha-d yid-i.
Ur d-lhan ara yid-i.

Amek i tt-id-tufiḍ?
Anda i tt-tufiḍ?
Ruḥet-as kan s leḥder.
Ruḥ-as kan s leɛqel a mmi.
Iruḥ-as s leḥder.
Iruḥ-asen yiwet yiwet kan.
Ruḥ-as yiwet yiwet kan.
Lḥaǧ d nnefṣ, tarbaɛt d nnefṣ.
Ssem-is ddaw walim, ḥedd ur yeɛlim.
D times n walim!
D times n waḍu!
Teqqes-it times n waḍu.

D tiheddurin kan.

Yegrareb Muḥend deg ucruf.
Yerwa Muḥend amceččew.

Ur as-tufiḍ ara aqerru i taluft-nni?

Amek i as-d-tufam tifrat?
Anda i tufiḍ ddwa-nni?
Ur ak-ilaq ara ddwa-nni.
Ddwa-agi yesseggray-d aqraḥ n uqerru.
Ur stehzay ara di ddwa-inem, a yemma.
Ɣur-k ad tettuḍ ddwa-k, a baba.
Ad ruḥeɣ ad am-d-aɣeɣ ddwa-agi i ak-d-yefka ṭṭbib.
Yenqedwa ddwa-agi di tmurt.
Ilaq ad tceggɛeḍ ɣer Fransa ɣef ddwa-agi.
Yugi ufarmasyan ad yi-d-yefk ddwa-agi mebla ṭṭbib.
Ilaq-iyi ad uɣaleɣ ɣer ṭṭbib.
Liḥala-k, cwiya-tt kan.
Kker ad truḥeḍ ɣer ṭṭbib.
A baba wwten-aɣ.
A bu snat, bru i yiwet.
A ccuha-m a taneqqact gar tneqcin.
A ddunit a lebḥer n lhem.
A ḥeqq tagella d lmelḥ.
A Kenza a yelli sbeṛ-as i lmeḥna, d iseflan neɣli ɣef lezzayer uzekka, a Kenza a yelli ur ttru yara.
A kra yesseqdacen awal, init-aɣ-d ayen yellan!
A lɣaci ad trebḥem!
A lḥif-nwen ma d irgazen kenwi!
A macahu, idder ihebbej, immut ihebbej!
A mmi, ddunit d aḥebber mačči d aḍebber.
A nnger-ik ad yenger iles-ik d idles-k!
A Ṛebbi, efk-d ameččim, ad d-naf ssebba i weḥlul.
A ssiɛqa d acu-t uxeṣṣaṛ-a!
A ssiɛqa!
A ssiεqa ay iṣaṛen: aqelmun ar iḍaṛṛen!
A ssiεqa!
A tamurt-iw, a tamurt-iw, iwumi sriɣ i tezmert-iw?
A tettihiḍ fell-i?
A tid yenzan!
A ṭṭir yufgen ur iris!
A tufat! Ar tikkelt-nniḍen!
A wer d-tuɣalem ma tekkam anisa ay iken-iwelleh umexluq-a!
A wer tesεuḍ aɣilif!
A wi hedṛen alama d ṣbeḥ ɣef igrawliwen iqbayliyen!
A wi yeddren, ad iwali, a wi yemmuten ad n-yaf kra din yellan.
A wi yellan yid-m cehrayen n lexrif.
A wi yerran tudert akk d turart.
A wi yufan taqbaylit d tilellit.
A wi yufan yiwen d nekk wayeḍ am nekk.
A wid issnen, melt i wid ur nessin.
A wid yeɣṛan sizdegt taswaɛt.
A wigi sṭeṛṭuṛen kan s yilem, yemxel win i asen-iḥessen!
A win ɣef yeshel walluy, ḥader iman-ik di trusi!
A win ijebbden amrar ixef-is atan ɣur-i.
A win ijebbden amrar, ixef-is ata ɣur-i!
A win ijebbeden amrar ixef-is atan da ɣuṛ-i.
A win yeṭṣen fiḥel ma tuṛǧaḍ nnuba-k!
A yelli, d ta i d tameddurt.
A yemma d lawan n lmut, dεu-yi a d-teqqel tefsut.
A yemma ɛzizen.
A Zahya tεedmeḍ-aɣ aqcic.
A Zzayer ncalleh ad teḥluḍ, ad tuɣaleḍ am zik-nni.
A zzin arqaq, udem-im ireqq d asafu.
Aah wi, iṣurdiyen-iw!
Aah, acḥal i yecbeḥ wass-a!
Aakken ad d-nebgen amek i d-tella tlalit d tulmisin n talɣa iɣef yettwabna usefru ilelli.
Ababat d mmi-s.

D acu ara yexdem umeɣbun-a meskin?
D acu-t umsedday n uɛqal n taɣect?
D acu-ten iɛewwiqen i d-temmugreḍ?

Ḥwejeɣ aṭas n yimedyaten akken ad ẓreɣ amek yettwasemres wawal-agi.

Ihi, tikwal ur gezzunt ara akken iwata tamsalt n tmenɣiwt n Katiya.
Ffɣen akk wat taddart i wakken ad nadin ɣef uqcic-nni ur d-nban ara.
Iḍarren-iw deg-sen εecra tfednin akken sεan ifassen-iw εecra iḍuḍan.
Ikad-iyi-d imsestanen ur ṭṭifen ara tanila iṣeḥḥan di tsestant-nsen.
Ɣas nezmer ad nidir deg umtiweg n Meɣres, ilaq qbel ad naweḍ ɣer din.
Ɣef wakk-n d-qqaren, azekka ad d-yas uselway n tɣiwant ɣer tama-nneɣ.
Iḍfer-iyi-d yiwen urgaz, yettmala, ur yezmir ara ad ibedd seg tissit.
Gar ilugan n tjerrumt tacinwat d tin n tṭalyant yella umgirred ameqqran.
Iceyyeε-iyi-d, drus aya, asefru yessejraḥen i yura af tmettant n yemma-s.
Ɣas nedder d azgen-ilelliyen, ɣas yella wanida txuṣ tlulebt, aql-aɣ nezga!
Glu-d s tqendurt timreyyest akken ad truḥeḍ yess ɣer umezgun neɣ ɣer tmeɣra.
Ɛebderreḥman Al-Waɣlisi yeɣra, am Ibn Xeldun, ɣer Wedris di temdint n Bgayet.
Hwari Bumedyen yemḍel ɛmiruc ddaw n texzant deg yiwen n uxxam n yiǧadarmiyen.
Ɛelmeɣ ad s-tiniḍ d timmuxlelt, maca ikad-iyi-d ḥemmleɣ uletma-k-nni tamecṭuḥt.
Ɛeddan kra n wussan, Munir yuɣ-d akanic yerna-d abirmuda awezlan anect n tkiluḍt.
Ɛerḍeɣ ad ruḥeɣ ɣer lxedma s uvilu maca ɣer tagara ufiɣ mačči d ayen i y-iwulmen.
Efk-iyi-d ad ččeɣ aqerruy-im ad m-in-fkeɣ lgelba n temẓin i yenna yizem i teɣyult.
Ɣas ad yili kra yewεer i tigin, yessefk d lewεara-nni-ines ara k-yeǧǧen ad t-tgeḍ.
I wakken ad teddu tigawt-agi ddu ɣer iɣewwaṛen sakin efk tasiregt n tkatut i usnas.
Ihi, tamagit d asddukel n waṭas n yiferdisen: tarakalt, tameslayt, amezruy d yedles.
Iḥbiben n lekdeb am tfirellas. Ttasen-d deg tsemhuyt yelhan akken ad ruḥen deg n diri.
Ɣas akken llan d igduden at tɣerma, ur ṭṭifen ara sdat icenga i d-iddehmen : ttwaqelεen!
Ɣas tamettant-is d asuki i yimeɣnasen n tugdut d uḥareb ɣef yizerfan n tmeṭṭut di Zzayer.
Ɣef wudem n tmetti i nebɣa seg yidisan-is meṛṛa: idles, tutlayt, timagit, d wayen-nniḍen.
Ɣas ulama aseggas n rebɛa u ttɛin d win n uheggi n ugerdas aneggaru n unekcum ar tesdawit.
Ihi, werdin kan, Munir, mmi-s n Dda Remḍan, yerra-yas i Jack, yenna-yas: Ɣur-i taɣaṭ deg uxxam.
Ihi uqbel ad yerr tiririt i Jack, yedda ar Google akken ad inadi d acu-t unamek-nniḍen n wawal-a.
I yemudden tiṛwiḥin-nsen akken ad tidir tmurt n Zzayer di talwit, di tlelli, di teɣdemt tinmettit.
Ɣriɣ deg tesdawit n Mulud At Mɛemmeṛ n Tizi Wezzu, sakin ddiɣ ar tesdawit ɛeb Erraḥman Mira n Bgayet.
Ɣilas akked Amayas tessaki-ten-id yemmat-nsen, tessarred-asen, tesles-asen, syin akkin tewwi-ten ar uɣerbaz.
Ihi ur telli ssebba ɣef i d-ssawleɣ ; bɣiɣ kan ad d-sleɣ i taɣect-im. Tura ma tceɣleḍ ad kem-ǧǧeɣ ad truḥeḍ.
Ḥsiɣ, annect-a ad yiḥwiǧ akud, maca selmed-as, ma tweɛɛaḍ, belli adulaṛ i d-iḥella s yiman-is yif xemsa i yufa.
Iban yella kan kra n wassaɣ gar usuqel neɣ mara yaru yiwen isefra s yiman-is, ma d acu-t wassaɣ-a, ur ẓriɣ ara.
Ɛerḍeɣ ad d-afeɣ kra iḍebsiyen iqdimen n Linda Ronstadt ɣur bu-iḍebsiyen, maca d iḍebsiyen ikussimen kan i yesεa.
Farzen-d yinagmayen izzayriyen ladɣa Mulud Mɛemri, Yusef Nasib d Salem Cakir talliyin n unerni n tmedyazt taqbaylit.
Igduden-a n imezwura umezruy, ula d yiwen deg-sen ur yeṭṭif sdat tɣermiwin i d-ikecmen timura-nsen s lemḥellat-nsent!
Iban sruḥayeɣ aṭas n wakud deg isekkilen-a n tcinwat i lemdeɣ, ilaq-iyi ihi ad issineɣ ugar udmawen-nniḍen n tutlayt-a.
Ihi yewwi-d fell-am ad tettcebbiḥeḍ yal ass, ad teṭṭhellaḍ deg-s, ad tḥedqeḍ ɣuṛ-s, ad as-tesmeḥsiseḍ, ad tiliḍ d tuɣdimt.

Ala amlili ur ttemlilin ara.
Ala aqabel ara tt-tqableḍ.
Ala asaḍuf ara tt-id-iḥudden.

Ala deg win ara gezmen.
Ala din kan i zemreɣ ad ssufɣaɣ tirga-ynu?

Ala Nekk.
Ala netta kan i yeẓran liḥala deg wacu i yettidir.
Ala nutni i t-iḥulfan.
Ala nutni i t-yeẓran.
Ala steqsaɣ-d kan.
Ala tafekka-s kan i d-yeqqimen.

Ala tiḥdayin i yexḍa.

D acu-tt llebsa ara lsen.
D aḍebsi kan iwumi tessal.
D aɣelluy i d-ɣellint ɣef uqerruy.
D akellex kan.
D alsaq i telseq deg-s.
D amsaḥ i ten-temsaḥ deg wallaɣ-is.
D aqemmuc i t-id-yennan.
D aqesser kan i ttqessireɣ yid-wen.
D aseṭṭel.
D asirem i tzemreḍ ad tefkeḍ i win yebɣan tallelt.
D awezɣi ad tɛeddi sdat-k ur tt-ttetmuquleḍ ara.
D awezɣi ad yebḍu ixemmimen-is ɣef sin.
D awezɣi irfed allen-is.
D aya iyi-iǧǧan a Maziɣ ad xedmeɣ yid-k akka.
D ayen bezzaf iɛebba wul.
D ayen i tt-yeǧǧan tettemsefham akk d wid tesɣray.
D ayen i t-yettaǧǧan ad yesɛu tabɣest akken ad iɛawen yal win ara ten-id-iqesden.
D ayen i yebɣa ad yexdem ɣer sdat.
D ayen iɣer ur yettelḥaq.
D ayen iten-ittaǧǧan ḥekkun-as-d sseriya-nsen.
D ayen it-yettaǧǧan yettnaɣ d Maziɣ.
D ayen iyi-ǧǧan nniɣ-am-d mi ara ad as-awḍen ɣer sseḥ ad yerr aḍar.
D ayen iyi-ǧǧan qqareɣ-ak-d ad tt-ǧǧeɣ.
D ayen teɛya deg temɛayin-is.
D ayen tewwi-yaɣ ddunit.
D ayen yecɣel uqerruy-iw s wayen-nniḍen.
D ayen yellan yessarwayen.
D aymi i d-reggleɣ ɣer umezgun.
D ccyaḍ i d-yettalin ɣef wul-is.
D Dda Brahem itt-yeṭṭfen.
D ɛemti iyi-tt-id-ixaḍen.
D imelyan n lɣaci i yettbekkiren.
D kečč i yeẓran d acu i tebɣiḍ!
D kečč iyi-ɛerqen.
D kečč iyi-sexsaren deg dduminu.
D kečč kan i yegguman ad tfehmeḍ timsal.
D laman a Maziɣ.
D lawan n lmakla.
D lḍufan yettmuruden ass-a ara yuɣalen d amɣar uzekka.
D lɛib ad ḍelben i yimawlan-nsen idrimen.
D llebsa yelhan.
D llebsa.
D lṭufan.
D lxir a Massa.
D lxir i ak-m-id-yewwin?
D Maziɣ i d-yecreḍ lxaṭer-is.
D nekk i yebɣan ad naweḍ ɣer da.
D nekkni kan i yeǧǧuman ad nefhem aya.
D netta i d tigejdit.
D netta i d-yezgan d alemmas gar-asen.
D netta i tettraju akken ad temmeslay yid-s.
D netta i tt-iɣumen s yifasen-is.
D nettat ara ixedmen kulec.
D nettat i d-yellan d lmendad ɣef tezrawt n turagt-ines.
D nutenti ara ak-id-ṭṭafern.
D sseḥ ih.
D sseḥ neɣ ala?
D sseḥ xedmeɣ iyi-ihwan.
D ta i d tilelli iwumi ur zmireɣ ad as-serḥeɣ.
D ta i ddunit.
D taggara n turagt.
D tamsalt-a i t-yeǧǧan ad yemgired d tiziwin-is.
D taqcict neɣ d ayen-nniḍen i ak-yehwan.
D tatmatin.
D tawwurt ik-id-yewwin iḍ iɛeddan ara ak-yerren sbeḥ-a.
D tayi i tudert n Maziɣ.
D tayunin akken ad siwelen.
D tiḥdayin.
D tin i d-yezgan deg tlemmast n temdint.
D tin yebɣa seg wul-is.
D tin yurzen ɣer yidrimen.
D tiqcicin i yesheblen yal yiwen deg-sen.
D tiṭ iken-yewten neɣ d lmektub i aken-izeglen.
D ṭṭbiɛa taḥlawant s wacu i tettqabal wiyaḍ.
D tudert am ta iɣef d-ttmeslayeḍ?
D tukksa n lxiq.
D ul i t-yebɣan.
D ulaqrar ak-id-yeṭṭef ubrid.
D ul-nni aḥemmaq i tt-id-isersen.
D ungifen i yessadayen timetti.
D wa i d agdud iwumi yeɛreq ubrid.
D wa i d ccɣel-nsen agejdan.
D wamek ara yebdu adrar s walluy?
D win akken i yeɣɣaren deg tesnawit ara yimɣuren.
D win i d-yettakken asirem i win yuḍnen.
D win i ten-id-ttaren tameddit.
D yemm-as i as-d-yessawlen.
Da kan i ttafeɣ lebɣi-w.
Daye iyi-ǧǧan sufɣeɣ-ak-d ayen yellan deg wul-iw.
Dayen isehlen ad tafeḍ taqcict.
Dda Brahem iḥemmel aṭas mi ara d-kecmen.
Dda Brahem yesɛedda-d azgen n tudert-is deg lɣerba.
Dda Brahem yettara-yasen-d s taḍsa d unecraḥ.
Ddiɣ anda i as-yehwa.
Ddiɣ d yemma ɣer tmeɣra n twacult-nneɣ.
Ddreɣ akken bɣiɣ.
Ddren tudert i bɣan.
Ddwa n wussan-is d asirem.
Deg lawan-nni Maziɣ yella deg ubrid.
Deg lawan-nni Sima tfuk lmakla.
Deg lawan-nni.
Deg leɛmer i ak-d-sliɣ temmmeslayeḍ-d ɣef wannect-a!
Deg leɛmer i as-teḍra akken.
Deg leɛmer iḥuseb-it ɣef kra.
Deg leɛmer iqubel-it.
Deg leɛmer ixemmem ɣer waya.
Deg leɛmer izleg-ak-d wawal nnig wazal-is.
Deg leɛmer mlalent.
Deg leɛmer msefhamen.
Deg leɛmer niɣ-t-id.
Deg leɛmer sakdeɣ ɣer yilemẓi akken sakdeɣ-d ɣur-k.
Deg leɛmer teɛba-yasen.
Deg leɛmer teɛǧeb-ak teqcict?
Deg leɛmer yemmeslay-as-d neɣ yura-as-d taɣawsa yeffɣen ɣef leqraya.
Deg leɛmer yenna-iy-d ala.
Deg lehdur tɣelbeḍ tamɣart.
Deg leqraya d tdukkli-nni.
Deg lǧiran i qewmen.
Deg llḥif n ccfayat.
Deg srir-is.
Deg tceqqufin.
Deg temdint n lejnun d lmalayka.
Deg temsal n yimeqqranen.
Deg tezlatin.
Deg tlata n yiseggasen i tesɣaray.
Deg tudert-iw sɛiɣ ala yiwen n yiswi i yesɛan azal meqqren.
Deg txeqqufin neɣ ahat deg tezlatin kan.
Deg ubrid ameqqran.
Deg useggas ɣer wayeḍ.
Deg useggas-is amenzu.
Deg wacu i tebɣiḍ akem-nɛiwen?
Deg wakken deg drus yid-sen.
Deg wallaɣ-is i d-yeɣli.
Deg wayyur ɣer wayeḍ.
Deg wussan n usetaɛfu.
Deg-s d amedya.
Deg-s uḥwaǧen.
Deg-s zaɛma mɣuren.
Deg-sen i ttafeɣ lehna d wazal uffir n umdan.
Dewren-d anda i llan qqimen.
Dɣa teffeɣ-d ɣer tilawt.
Dima awal-is.
Dima ihedder.
Dima tettarra iḥulfan-is ɣer daxel.
Dima yettara-yas-d akken i tebɣa.
Din ara yaf amddakel-is Massi.
Din din ad tuɣal ɣer tirga-s.
Din i tzemreḍ ad targuḍ ayen tettmenniḍ.
Din kan i tettaf talwit.
Drus kan i as-izemren.
Drus n yinelmaden i d-yeqqimen.
E… mi ara d-mmektiɣ.
Ɛas kan nnuba-k ahat ad tɛeddi deg liser d talwit.
Ɛeddan qqimen dina.
Ɛeddi-d ad nemlil.
Ɛeddi-d ɣer tesdawit.
Ɛeddi-k ma ad beddlen.
Ɛelmen belli itteddu-asen deg lebɣi.
Ɛelmen s wayen iḍerrun.
Ɛerqen akk lecɣal-is.
Ɛerqen-as lehdur.
Ɛerqen-as yiberdan.
Ɛeṭṭlen deg lqahwa.
Efk-iyi-d aman.
Eɣli-d ṭṭlam ur faqen.
Ɛlem belli a-t-an deg lbir lqayen i tegreɣ.
Ɛlem belli mačči d kemm i yennum.
Ɛni ɛerqen-ak lehdur sbeḥ-a?
Ɛni tsetḥaḍ akken ad kecmeḍ!
Ɛnu-yi-d.
Err-itt ɛad ar uɛezri am nekki.
Err-itt-id ɛad i yilmeẓyen.
Ɛyan deg uktli iyi-ttektilin s wallen am wakken nekk ur sɛiɣ ara iḥulfan.
Ɛyiɣ deg uraju.
Ɛyiɣ kan.
Ɛyiɣ mliḥ.
Ffɣeɣ-d ččiɣ kra.
Ffɣen-d seg tesdawit.
Ffɣen-d syina.
Ffkan lebɣi i rray-nsen.
Filaman a Ɛemti.
Filaman ihi!
Fkan ṭṭuɛ i lebɣi-nsen.
Fkiɣ-tt d asfel i win tt-yebɣan.
Gar-asen azal n sin n yidudan akken ad mlilen.
Ɣas akka s unecraḥ i ak-d-ttaraɣ.
Ɣas akken ala drus n lweqt iten-ijemɛen.
Ɣas akken asaḍuf d yiwen.
Ɣas akken d tirga.
Ɣas akken deg tazwara isetḥa.
Ɣas akken iḥemmel taḍsa d uqesser.
Ɣas akken mačči ɣef yimelyan i d-nettmeslay.
Ɣas akken meẓẓi maca lebɣi-s meqqar.
Ɣas akken meẓẓi.
Ɣas akken tecbeḥ.
Ɣas akken tekkfa.
Ɣas akken ul yeččur.
Ɣas akken ula d netta tecɣeb-it temsal n lweqt-is.
Ɣas akken ula d nettat tesɛa amur-is deg tiktiwin.
Ɣas akken ur telluẓ ara mliḥ acku ur tt-yeǧǧi wallaɣ-is ad txemmem ɣef wučči.
Ɣas akken ur tesɛi ara ttiɛad d Maziɣ.
Ɣas akken ur tezmireḍ ara ad t-tɛefseḍ neɣ ad t-ttɛeddiḍ fell-as.
Ɣas akken ur yeɛlim ɣef wacu i nnuɣen.
Ɣas akken yedda d Sima deg tkerrust.
Ɣas akken yesɛa leqraya maca yeqqim d yid-s.
Ɣas akken yuɛer ad yebḍu lweqt-is gar leqraya.
Ɣas akken yufa-d tawacult-is d yimddukal-is ɣer tama-s.
Ɣas d izem ay telliḍ
Ɣas fkan-asen-d.
Ɣas llan ur ttmeslayen ara aṭas.
Ɣas mačči d netta i iḍelmen maca ad tabba kulec.
Ɣas rnu-ten d ssber i wul.
Ɣas tebɣiḍ ad trewleḍ.
Ɣas tizmilin ussant-d s useḥnunef maɛna ad yeffeɣ kan useggas.
Ɣas ulamma d anelmad deg tesdawit iɛerreḍ ad ibeddel tilufa.
Ɣas ulamma ur yesɛwi ara d acu ara d-yefk neɣ akken ad iyi-ixelles.
Ɣas ulamma wiyaḍ cceɣlen s uṭili ɣer ɣur-s.
Ɣas ulamma yeqɛed ad s-d-afen ccama.
Ɣas ur gtent ara.
Ɣas yella lixsas yerna-t wayen n lɛali.
Ɣef lbaṭṭel i iḍerrun gar lǧiran.
Ɣef leqwaɛi.
Ɣef lḥeq d lbaṭṭel.
Ɣef lutu-inem?
Ɣef tedyanin yeqqnen ɣer tmetti.
Ɣef tudert-im.
Ɣef wannect-a ilaq ad tt-ǧǧeɣ.
Ɣef wannect-a.
Ɣef waya.
Ɣef yixxamen.
Ɣelben iberriqen amzun leɛmer ẓran iṭij.
Ɣellin-as-d lehdur seg uqemmuc am lehwa seg yigenni.
Ɣellint-d deg nndama.
Ɣer ccbaḥa.
Ɣer ccna.
Ɣer teklut.
Ɣer temddukal neɣ d tidak ukkud txeddem.
Ɣer tfekka i tesɛa d zzin terfed.
Ɣer tin i d-iɛeddan.
Ɣer uḥewwes deg tmurt ɣer tayeḍ.
Ɣer wacu i yertaḥ wul-ik imala?
Ɣer wallen-is.
Ɣer wayen iɛedda.
Ɣer wazal i yezmer ad yesɛu umdan deg wallaɣ-is.
Ɣes d imddukal.
Ǧǧiɣ kulec ɣer rrif ɛla ǧal-is.
Ǧǧiɣ-ak lehna.
Ǧǧiɣ-am lehna.
Ǧǧiɣ-awen-d lehna.
Gguleɣ ur d-iris ufus n urgaz fell-i ma ur iyi-ihwi ara.
Ggumaan ad kksen wawalen i as-d-yenna.
Ggumaɣ ad d-ffɣeɣ sina.
Gguman ad ẓẓren deg-i tameṭṭut.
Ggumant ad kksent ccfayat n yiḍ-nni.
Ɣleq-as jeddi-s.
Ɣlint-d ɣer wid teffeɣ talsa.
Ɣur-s aya yif akk ayen yezmer ad ak-yefk umdan.
Ɣur-s d ass yecban akk wiyaḍ.
Ḥaca ma hedren yid-s ara yefhem.
Ḥader kan iyi-d-tettlaɛiḍ asma ara tɣerqeḍ.
Ha-t-an uɣaleɣ-d gar medden am wi.
Ha-tt-an tɛedd-a Sima.
Ḥbes kan tura ad temɣureḍ.
Heddren ad as-tiniḍ mačči gar tselmadt d unelmad.
Ḥekkun ɣef teqdimin d tejdidin.
Ḥekkun tizidanin d tquranin.
Ḥellun yimɣan.
Ḥemddulah.
Ḥemdullah.
Ḥemmleɣ mi ara akem-waliɣ.
Ḥemmlen kan ayen ẓẓaren s wallen.
Ḥemmlen mi ara sen-d-yettara s uqesser.
Ḥewwes ahat ad tafeḍ agerruj yeččuren d idrimen.
Ḥewwes taqcict i ak-iɛejben.
Ḥlaw i wayen tettḥusu.
Ḥlawit i tmesliwt.
Ḥlawit tiktiwin i d-yettawi yal tikkelt.
Ḥrec tura.
Ḥseb-it d amarkanti.
Ḥsiɣ llan wid yettxemmimen akka.
Ḥsu d ifassen-ik i d imezwura i d-yersen fell-i seld lweḥc-nni iyi-ɛedmen temẓi-w.
Ḥsu dakken terna lqima-m ɣer ɣur-i.
Ḥsu tuget deg-sen kecmen deg usugen.
I as-yerra Maziɣ.
I kečč a Maziɣ.
I kečči d acu i txeddmeḍ akka?
I sin yid-sen ṭṭalayen deg lebḥer.
I tikkelt tamenzut i d-ldiɣ ul-iw i ḥed.
I tikkelt tamenzut i d-tebder lebɣi-s.
I tikkelt tamenzut i heddren ɣef yisental n tudert.
I tikkelt tamezwarut i ẓriɣ iman-iw sɛiɣ azal ɣer umdan-nniḍen.
I tikkelt tamezwarut ur setḥaɣ ara s tfekka-w.
I tikkelt tis snat i as-d-yerra ayen tebɣa ad tsel.
I tikkelt tis snat.
I tikkelt-nniḍen ttaɛren-as yimeslayen iwakken ad ffɣen.
I tlemẓit-nni yettwaɣedren s ɣur amddakel-is.
I tmeɛcuq-it.
I tudert n laɛtab?
I tura ɛni nxus!
I uḥemmel?
I wayen icebḥen.
I wayen yurzen talsa.
I yidrimen anda ara t-nafeɣ?
Iban am yiṭij.
Ibedd sdat n tewwurt.
Ibeddel lebɣi-s.
Ibeqqa-yas slam i Sima.
Ibeqqa-yasen slam.
Iḍ iɛeddan i sḥuseɣ ɛawdeɣ-d talalit.
Iḍ iɛeddan yeǧǧa-as-d iḍes ɣef wallen.
Iḍ yewwi-as-d tirririt ɣef wayen tettxemmim.
Iḍ-a ɣezzif.
Iḍ-a yuɣal-as d netta i taduli-s.
Iḍelli nekkes ɣef wul-nneɣ.
Idrimen d wamek i yezmer ad yexdem lutu i yiman-is d wid i t-id-iqesden.
Iɛawen-itt-id deg ccɣel.
Iɛedda yessenhez-it Maziɣ.
Iɛennu-tt akken ad kemmlen asqerdec n temsal.
Iɛerreḍ ad yeǧǧ deg ṭṭerf ayen yessal d wayen yeẓẓar deg tddukli.
Iɛǧeb-as waya.
Iɛǧeb-iyi mliḥ.
Ifehhem isental-nniḍen.
Ifuk usendef n lesnin.
Ifuk yiḍ i d-yewwin tabɣest.
Ifuk yimenɣi.
Iɣeblan n lwert.

Iger-itt-id gar ifasen-is.
Iggar-itt deg lbir lqayen.
Ih a Massa.
Ih a yemma taɛzizt.
Ih ɣef leqraya d wayen-nniḍen.
Ih sneɣ-tt.
Ih ula d nekk!
Iḥebbes-iten deg uxxam.
Iḥemmel ad iqesser war aḥebbus.
Iḥemmel ad isɛeddi ussan-is deg umerreḥ akked uqesser.
Iḥemmel taẓuri.
Ihi ad ak-d-iniɣ ula d nekk ad ak-d-iniɣ tanmirt imi iyi-d-tḥesseḍ zgelli.
Ihi ɛlem belli tilelli iɣef tettḥewwiseḍ.
Ihi kečči ɣur-k.
Ihi ma tufiḍ ɣas xdem-itt-id ɣer ubuqal.
Ihi nekki ad ak-ǧǧeɣ a Maziɣ.
Ihi nekki ur ssineɣ ara?
Ihi tcerkaɣ tlelli iɣef nettḥewwis i sin.
Ihi ttḥadar iman-im.
Ihi tzedɣeḍ iman-im?
Ihi yal lheddra tɣelli-d deg umkan-is.
Ijeǧǧigen s wunjigen.
Ijmeɛ-iten ala sbaḥ lxir d mselxir.
Ilaq ad afeɣ anda ara kruɣ?
Ilaq ad iliɣ d ilelli.
Ilaq ad tesserseḍ aqerruy-ik.
Ilaq ad truḥ ad texdem.
Ilaq ad yerbeḥ.
Ilaq ad yerfed ayen yexdem deg-i.
Ilaq ayen bɣan ara texdem.
Ilaq d kunemti s tidak yeɣran ara ibeddlen aya.
Ilaq dima d yid-s.
Ilaq yiwen yeẓran azal-is.
Iletha kan d umddakel-is.
Ilmend n waya i as-d-mmeslay ɣef leqraya.
Iluɛa i yimddukal yellan yid-s deg tddukli.
Iman-iw.
Imawlan-iw rwan aḥewwes fell-i.
Imdanen akk iḥuza-ten.
Imdanen akk ssaramen ad ɣlin deg ugamam yelhan.
Imdanen ifazen?
Imdanen n tɣiwant-a d wid ikerhen adfel.
Imdanen ttun d akken sɛaya ur teɛni ara kan idrimen.
Imddukal rwan tiɣimit.
Imddukal uɣal am wakken llan iseggasen imezwura deg tesdawit.
Imddukal wwin-d l BAK.
Imddukal yellan dima ur ttemfaraqen ara.
Imddukal-is ḥsan d akken Maziɣ d teḥdayin am waman d zzit.
Imdukkal-is akk ttḥibin ad qqimen yid-s.
Imeslayen-is sɛan rruḥ.
Imeṭṭi yegguma ad yeḥbes.
Imeẓẓuɣen fehmen ayen ur yezmir uqemmuc ad t-id-yini.
Imi tebɣam akka.
Imiren ad yerr ɣer temsensut n tesdawit.
Imiren aqcic mačči d ahwawi.
Imiren ma yella ur tezmir ara i wayen tebɣiḍ.
Ina-s ad k-terfed axir.
Inelmaden akk ttnezihen-d deg tedyant.
Inelmaden akk ttrusun-d mi ara d-awwḍen yikayaden n umesḍis amezwaru d wis sin.
Inelmaden sikiden taselmadt d acu ara sen-d-tini.
Inelmaden ttweḥḥiden kan.
Inǧer-itt akken i tt-yebɣa.
Ini-as ayen ik-yerḥan.
Ini-as ayen tettrajuḍ deg-s.
Ini-d kan deg yiḍ.
Ini-yi-d amek ur tḥemleḍ ara yiwen ubuqal mebla lqaɛ am wa.
Ini-yi-d bɣiɣ ad ak-ciwreɣ ɣef yiwet n tɣawsa.
Iqeddem ɣer texxamt n yinebgiwen.
Iqerreb yeqqim akken ad kemmlen aqessar-nsen.
Iqubel ayen i as-d-teḥka s rẓana.
Irennu-as-d ala ccbaḥa d zzin.
Ireqqem-itt akken iwata.
Ires deg umkan-is.
Iruḥ deg-sent.
Iruḥ Massi yedda d yid-s.
Iruḥ-as deg yiwet n teswiɛt.
Iruḥ-as nnudam.
Iruḥ-as unuɣni-nni.
Isawel-as i umddakel-is Massi.
Iseggasen ttɛeddin.
Isem-is Sima.
Isem-iw Sima.
Isetḥa ara tt-iqablen.
Isfeḍ-it Maziɣ deg yiwet n teswiɛt.
Isteqsiyen-is cudden srid ɣer leqraya.
Itbeɛ-tt.
Iteddu ɣer temkerḍit akken ad iẓer Sima.
Iteddu-d s axxam.
Ittqerrib-d ɣer srir anda ḍelqeɣ.
Iwakken d aɣen ur tt-yeggar ara deg ddiq lukan ad as-isiwel s yisem-is.
Iwexxer akersi.
Iwexxer-as acekkuḥ ɣer rrif.
Iwexxer-itt deg umkan anda llan.
Ixeddem ayen yellan fell-as.
Ixeddem s wul-is.
Ixxamen neɣ tikkerrusin.
Ixxamen-nniḍen ttbanen-d ddaw-s.
Iya ad neddu.
Iya meqqar ad nemsaɛaf.
Iya-d kcem.
Izdeɣ-iten ulac.
Izeddeɣ-itt lḥir.
Izga ibedd ɣur-s.

Jebbden-tt ɣer ddunit leɛmer teẓri.
Jebbden-tt ɣer wayen leɛmer tesli.
Kečč d ayaziḍ ma d nekk qefleɣ.
Kečč tettaraḍ-tt ɣer usmesxer.
Kečč ttabaɛ-itt.

Kra yezga yettmeslay.

La dderya ternuḍ fell-as.
La lbenna?
La tameṭṭut.
La ttmeslayen kan ɣef wacu yellan d amaynut deg lawan-a.
La yekcem deg yixemmimen-is.

La yerfed lqec-is.
Ladɣa ɣef usentel n tezrawt-ik.
Ladɣa ɣef wid iɛedda lbaṭṭel.
Ladɣa ɣer wayen tessarameḍ.
Ladɣa Massi d tedyanin-is ur nettfakka.
Ladɣa Massi.

Ladɣa mi ara teqqim iman-is.
Ladɣa mi ara yewwet s waṭas.
Ladɣa mi ara yiliɣ deg yir lḥala.
Ladɣa nekk si zik mi iyi-meḍlen.
Ladɣa tamuɣli n medden ɣer teqcict.
Ladɣa tin akk itent-yifen;
Ladɣa tin yeɣran.
Ladɣa ula d yiwen ur yeggar afus-is akken ad ten-iɛawen.
Ladɣa wid i tt-yeẓẓaren kan i wussu.
Laman i as-d-tettak tektubt neɣ win tettaf deg tezlatin.

Lbaqi ad nẓer amek ara teffeɣ.
Ldi-yas-d kan tawwurt.
Lebɣi n wallaɣ-is.
Lebɣi-nsen meqqer.

Leɛca-ayi ad tawi tafat s wudem.
Leɛmer yettazzal.
Leɛmer ẓrin.

Lehdur ɣef medden.
Lehdur i as-d-yerra ur nquqlen ara.
Lehna n umeslay i tufa ɣer Maziɣ.
Lɛibad yiwen-nsen deg tfekka.
Leqder d liser.
Leqraya n ddunit teɣleb tin n uɣerbaz.

Lferḥ d leḥzen!

Lqahwa n Dda Brahem.
Lsiɣ taqendurt d tacebḥant.
Lukan ad feqɛeɣ nekki.
Lukan ad ffɣeɣ d teqcict.
Lukan ad tedduḍ d yid-i ad nidir tasaɛet melliḥen.
Lukan ad tesseqsiḍ yal yiwen deg-sen ad ak-d-yini.
Lukan ad tt-tezzuzneḍ kan akka kra ad tgen.
Lukan akk ayen tebɣiḍ ad as-tiniḍ.
Lukan am tura wellah ma kkiɣ-tt ɣur-s?
Lukan d argaz iyi-ixusen a-t-an seg zik i d-neǧǧreɣ yiwen.
Lukan kan nbeddu lxedma neɣ taɣuri ɣef lɛecra n sbeḥ.
Lukan kan tesɛiḍ kra n lweqt.
Lukan kan yal yiwen iletha d lecɣal-is.
Lukan mačči d Maziɣ iten-iferqen tilaq myuččen.

Lxedma yelhan.
Ma ad ak-ǧǧeɣ ad tesserseḍ afus-ik fell-i.
Ma ad ḥerken.
Ma d leḥzen ur tettaraḍ.
Ma d lferḥ ur yettdum.
Ma d Massi yezga yeṭṭunuc.
Ma d Sima.
Ma d tura urar kan.
Ma d wiyaḍ am wakken ulac-iten.
Ma ɣlint-d deg yirgazen itent-iḥudren.

Ma msakit ur sɛint ara zzher.
Ma tenna-d rray-is.
Ma tesɛiḍ akka kra n lweqt.
Ma tesɛiḍ-ten.
Ma tesken-d iḥulfan-is.

Ma tewweḍ ɣer lebɣi-s.
Ma tewwweḍ-ik-d!
Ma teẓriḍ ɣelḍeɣ.
Ma tkesbeḍ ul-is.
Ma tuḥwaǧeḍ kra.
Ma ulac fell-as?
Ma ulac lmeɣreb ur tettili lɛica.
Ma ulac ur tettelḥaq ara ɣer uxeddim.
Ma ur tbekkreḍ ara.
Ma ur tesɛiḍ ara idrimen neɣ ur texdimeḍ ara lutu.
Ma yebɣa ad yehder.
Ma yeɣli-d uḥewwes.

Ma yekker-d sbeḥ.
Ma yella d ayen iyi-d-teḥkiḍ.
Ma yella d ayen yerzan iḥulfan n Maziɣ.
Ma yella d Maziɣ ibedd yettraju.
Ma yella d Maziɣ.
Ma yella d tilemẓit-nni i ad aɣ-d-iɛnan.
Ma yella d tura mi d-nniɣ ayen iyi-yeḍran.
Ma yella fehmeɣ timsal akken llant.
Ma yella iqneɛ-itt s rray.

Ma yella kunemti teɣramt yerna teḍra-yawent akka.
Ma yella nfuk zik imiren.
Ma yella teffeɣ-d i lmul-nni n lxedma d leqraya.

Ma yella truḥeḍ s axxam-nwen.
Ma yella tuḥwaǧeḍ kra aru-yi-d.

Ma yella ur tkemlem ara.
Ma yella yal yiwen ur asen-iseɛɛu ara lweqt.
Ma yiwen yenna-d d acerqi.
Maca abrid-a a-t-an ad mlilen deg tilawt yerna alammi i myefken ttiɛad.
Maca acḥal ur steqsaɣ fell-as.
Maca acmumeḥ yugi ad yeǧǧ udem-is.

Maca ahat tefra.

Maca ass-a.

Maca aya.
Maca ayen i aɣ-ijemɛen.
Maca ayen refden deg sin.
Maca d acu i yeḍran?
Maca d Maziɣ.
Maca ɛeddi-k tura aɣ-yeffeɣ uḥebber d uqelleq.
Maca ɣef ttbehdayel yeḍran sdat n yinelmaden n tesdawit.
Maca ɣur-s mazal ixus kra.
Maca ḥsu tudert deg tesdawit.
Maca iḥulfan-nneɣ zdin.
Maca ilaq ad tqewwet.
Maca ireggel akk i waya.
Maca kečč tessumaḍ iman yellan deg-i.
Maca kemm a-t-an tessawḍeḍ ad tessufɣeḍ ayen i akem-iqerḥen.
Maca leɛmer iten-id-mmugreɣ!
Maca Maziɣ mačči am wiyaḍ.
Maca s tḥerci tzemreḍ ad tesseɣliḍ yiwen n usaḍuf s wayeḍ.

Maca ttakkent-d i wallaɣ rruḥ.
Maca ulac-it!
Maca ur as-d-yewwi ara lehna iɣef tettḥewwis.
Maca ur nwiɣ ara ad d-mlileɣ yiwen deg-sen.
Maca wissen anda tewweḍ akka.
Maca yeǧǧa-tt lweqt.
Maca yennum lqefs akked tlelli i as-yettwakksen.
Maca yettak-asen-d afud.
Maca yezga unecreḥ gar-asen.
Mačči akka i as-d-tban taluft iḍ iɛeddan.
Mačči akka i tennum.
Mačči akka i ẓẓareɣ.
Mačči ala arrac i yettxemmimen akka.
Mačči ala ccbaḥa n tfekka i yeẓẓar.
Mačči ala nettat ara irefden ayen yeḍran.
Mačči alamma tenṭeq-d.
Mačči alamma zewǧeɣ akken ad farseɣ temẓi-w neɣ akken ad ttuɣ imawlan-iw.
Mačči am kečči tqefleḍ.
Mačči am win n zik.
Mačči bessif neɣ s uḥras ara d-tas.

Mačči d ayen isehlen.

Mačči dayen ara teṭṭef.

Mačči ɣef wannect-a.
Mačči ɣer ɣur-s i sɛan ass-a.
Mačči ɣer tmeɛnanc ur nesɛi azal.

Maɛna ass-a.

Maɛna ur tugadeḍ ara ɣef yiman-im.
Maɛna wissen d acu i ixeddem akka tura.
Massi d Maziɣ rran ɣer daxel n tesdawit.
Massi deg leɛmer ihder-as-d akken umddakel-is.
Massi i ceɣbent teqcicin.

Maziɣ d yimddukal-is.

Mfaraqet s tin ziden.
Mgaraden deg uxemmem.
Mi ara awin deg-s ayen uḥwaǧen deg-sen.
Mi ara d-iwwet udfel.

Mi ara d-teqqel ɣer uxxam.

Mi ara s-tini yemma-s i teqcict. a yelli!
Mi ara ten-teẓreḍ ad as-tiniḍ jmiɛ i tteffɣen neɣ acḥal n lesnin i ddan.

Mi ara texdem akka.

Mi d-wwḍen.

Mi d-yewweḍ.

Mi kfan imensi.
