Mmeslayen.
Msefhamen ad mmlilen akka tasaɛet neɣ snat deg lqahwa n Dda Brahem.

Mselxir a yelli.
Myusanen gar-asen.
Nawa ara d-afen ɣer tama-nsen?
Neddlent fell-aɣ tewwura am lecfar ɣef wallen.
Neɣ ad ak-kkseɣ iḥulfan-ik.
Neɣ ad beyyen iman-is.
Neɣ ad tafeḍ mazal kan ur d-wwiḍen ara.
Neɣ ad tsel i tezlatin.
Neɣ aɛessas.
Neɣ ahat almi d tura i d-teffeɣ ɣer tudert.
Neɣ ahat ayen i-yeqqar ur yettwafham ara.
Neɣ ahat d nekk kan i iɛewjen?
Neɣ ahat iɛedda kan ɣer uɛebbuḍ.
Neɣ ahat mazal kan ur d-yewwiḍ ara.
Neɣ ahat tbeddel s wayen lɛali.
Neɣ ahat tewwi-tt-id akk d imeṭṭi.
Neɣ ahat tsetḥaḍ.
Neɣ ahat ur yebɣi ara ad d-yemmekti.
Neɣ ahat ur ẓriɣ ara d acu i ttafen mi ara ttmeslayen fell-asent neɣ mi ara ttxemmimen fell-asent.
Neɣ amek ara as-semmiɣ i win i am-ixedmen aya.
Neɣ d ssifa-s i tt-id-ijebden.
Neɣ d win ara wten.
Neɣ deg leqraya-s.
Neɣ ɣef wacu ara hedren.
Neɣ i wayen tessaram.
Neɣ iɛereq-ak ubrid!
Neɣ ma ulac ad ten-welhen abrid ara aɣen.
Neɣ ma yella tuḥwaǧeḍ kra aru-yi-d.
Neɣ ma yella ur iyi-ixdim ara azal.
Neɣ ssarament-tt.
Neɣ ṭṭewwileɣ amrar i yiman-iw.
Neɣ uma d wayi.
Neɣ ur ilaq ara waya.
Neɣ wina mačči d sseḥ?
Neḥsa d ta i tudert.
Nekk ad iliɣ ɣef lɛacra d asawen.
Nekk ad ldiɣ taḥanut.
Nekk deg uqerruy-iw.
Nekk ɣriɣ sbeḥ-a.
Nekk ḥemmleɣ akk ayen ara iǧǧen allaɣ ad yennerni.
Nekk imiren i ttkemileɣ.
Nekk leɛmer jerbeɣ tigi.
Nekk nwiɣ-k tfehmeḍ timsal akken llant.
Nekk rẓiɣ-as aqerruy-is s temɛayin am tigi.
Nekk ttmeslayeɣ-ak-d ɣef wayen bɣiɣ.
Nekk ttwaliɣ wid yeqqnen tilelli-nsen ɣer wiyaḍ am ufrux-nni yennumen lqefs.
Nekk ur d-qqsideɣ ara ad ak-qqneɣ.
Nekk ur zmireɣ ara ad qableɣ la laḥbab la imawlan.
Nekk ur zmireɣ ara i wannect-a.
Nekk yakan wellah ma ẓriɣ.
Nekk zgiɣ qqneɣ imal-iw ɣer lutu ara xedmeɣ i leɛmer-iw.
Nekki ad akem-ǧǧeɣ.
Nekki a-t-an ur sɛiɣ kra.
Nekkni ayen nezmer seg lǧiha-nneɣ ad t-nexdem.
Nella deg ufrag.
Nerra-tt deg ṭṭerf.
Nerwa tizli.
Netta d Massi ttemlilin sbeḥ deg lkar.
Netta d win ur neɛlim s wayen yeḍran i Sima.
Netta ila iteddu akken ad yečč.
Netta mi ara isel i lehdur am wi.
Netta ur d-yegri ara kra deg uqerruy-is.
Netta yebra i wallen-is.
Netta yerra kan lwelha-s ɣer ukayad.
Netta yezga deg wallaɣ-is.
Nettat ad tt-reggel.
Nettat d tagellidt deg-s.
Nettat d win i as-izedɣen allaɣ-is.
Nettat i iḥemmlen ticuqufin umezgun.
Nettat s yifassen.
Nettat seg lǧiha-as tefka-yas-d ayen i d-yewwi usaḍuf d wayen zemren ad xedmen uqbel ad taweḍ taluft ɣer uxxam n ccraɛ.
Nettat tennum tessal i wayen ur iqebbel wallaɣ.
Nettat tennum ttruzum aqerruy-is.
Nettat terra srid ɣer uxxam.
Nettat tezga tettqisi argaz deg lefɛayel-is d wayen yesɛa deg wallaɣ-is.
Nettat ur as-d-ittali ara wawal.
Nettat ur tessin yiwen.
Nettat ur tuqiɛ deg yiwen.
Nezga d aḥewwes gar-asen.
Nezga deg waluḍ.
Nezga nettmeslay.
Nezga nettnaɣ.
Nhdder-d ɣef ɛecraaf d ɛecrinalef.
Nkenti deg tmurt-nneɣ.
Nnec ur ten-ixeṭṭu ara.
Nnefs i d-yessuffuɣ Maziɣ yetteslaf i wudem-is.
Nnefs s ddraɛ i d-itteffaɣ seg turin.
Nnig n uɣerbaz.
Nniɣ-as ahat ad tcedhiḍ kan učči-ynu akem-d-yefk ubrid maɛna mmektaɣ-d belli tḥemleḍ ad teččeḍ deg berra lawan i telliḍ d taxeddamt.
Nniɣ-as akka kra n wussan ad uɣaleɣ ɣur-s.
Nnumen ferrun imenɣiyen gar twaculin.
Nrennu i wid yesɛan mačči i wid ixussen.
Nruḥ ɣer lebḥer.
Nutenti xḍant-as.
Nutni beɛden fell-ak.
Nutni deg leɛmer mlalen-d ula ɣef yiwet n tikti.
Nutni ḥemmlen ad sqejqijen deg-s.
Nutni uɣen tanumi ẓẓaren kan inelmaden n tesnawit.
Nwan-iyi ffɣeɣ i ubrid.
Nwiɣ ad ɛeddiɣ akken ad neffeɣ akka kra.
Nwiɣ ad ruḥeɣ ass-a akken ad ẓreɣ imawlan d acu kan wellah ar ɛyiɣ.
Nwiɣ ayen akken akk ur ufiɣ ara ɣer temddakelt-iw.
Nwiɣ ayen i iferqen gar win itteklen deg yiman-is d win ur yesɛin ara taflest.
Nwiɣ tebɣiḍ kra ɣer ɣur-i?
Nwiɣ ufiɣ iman-iw!
Nwiɣ ur d-tettfaka ara fell-i.
Nxeddem deg wis tlata?
Qesdeɣ taxxamt anda ulac ula yiwen akken ad ḍelqeɣ.
Qqaren-iyi-d ilaq ad farseɣ imawlan-iw akked d tlelli-inu uqbel ad inigeɣ ɣer win ara iyi-yaɣen.
Qqedmen-d akken ad ččen.
Qqim kra n tewiɛt dina.
Qqimeɣ kra.
Qqimen deg-s.
Qqimen sdaxel.
Qqimen ttqessiren.
Qqimen-d ɣer ṭṭabla.
Qrib ad tt-ssufɣen i leɛqel-is.
Qrib ad yali wass.
Refdeɣ aqerruy-iw.
Rekben deg tkerrust.
Rekben-d lkar ara ten-d-yerren ɣer uxxam.
Rekden waman n Massi.
Rewleɣ-as i tmetti yeǧan asirem-is deg tlemmast n ubrid.
Rewleɣ-d deg tlemmast n yiḍ ɣer uxxam-nneɣ.
Rnan akka kra n lweqt.
Rnu ɛad ma wessiɛet.
Rnu ɣer-s.
Rran srid ɣer temdint.
Rran tameṭṭut i ccɣel d urebbi.
Rran-iyi-d gar yimdanen am wi.
Rriɣ-tt i udewwer.
Rruḥ amaynut ara k-yeǧǧen ad tesɛuḍ asirem deg tudert.
Rsen-d seg lkar.
Rsen-d seg tkerrust.
Ruḥ deg talwit.
Ruḥ kan a yamusnaw ruḥ!
Ruḥ tura.
Ruḥen ɣer lebḥer.
Rwan adewwer.
Rwan aḥewwes d temɛict jmiɛ.
Rwan aḥewwes.
Rwel neɣ meǧǧed.
Rwel-as seg lǧiha.
S akken i d-yerfed aqerruy-is yaf-itt-id sdat-s.
S akken kecmeɣ.
S draɛ i d-yejmeɛ iman-is akken ad d-iffeɣ seg wussu.
S draɛ i qebleɣ ad ffɣeɣ d yid-s.
S kra kra alamma nefra-tt.
S kra kra kan.
S ssifa-s ifazen.
S talwit kan.
S umkan am wa i tzemreḍ ad tettuḍ akka kra.
S wallen n ccbaḥa.
S wallen n tayri.
S yes i ǧǧuǧugen yijeǧǧigen.
Sakken yeldi-d allen-is.
Sber i tesber urfan axir-is.
Sber kan ad twaliḍ amek ara yexdem dada-k Massi.
Sber kan.
Sdat-s yella ubrid aɣelnaw.
Sɛan akk iɛessasen.
Sɛan leqraya-nsen.
Sɛan tamuɣli-nsen ɣas akken meẓẓiyit.
Sebbaḍ ɣlayen d wamek i ilaq ad tbaneḍ s tugna iwatan.
Sɛeddan lawan n wučči-nni deg unecreḥ d uqesser.
Sɛeddan-d taswiɛt gar yigenni d lqaɛa.
Sɛeddi-t ayen i awen-d-nniɣ i wid ur d-yusin ara.
Seg tama-nniḍen.
Seg tjeǧǧigt ɣer tayeḍ.
Seg wakken cufent wallen-is.
Seg wakken iḥemmel ayen yeɣɣar.
Seg wakken nurar nekk d teqcicin.
Seg wakken qqureɣ deg lxelɛa.
Seg wakken teẓẓar iman-is tebɛed ɣef wannect-a.
Seg wasmi i d-yecfa d netta deg uxeddim-a.
Seg wasmi i d-yekcem ɣer tesdawit.
Seg wasmi i yemmut baba-s ur fursen tagnit am ta.
Seg wassen ddreɣ s tmara.
Seg wassen ur as-iserreḥ.
Seg wid yesɛan cci.
Seg zik i rriɣ akal i tudert-iw.
Seg zik i tbelleɛ tawwurt akken ur d-ikeččem ḥed allaɣ-is.
Seg zik i ṭṭfeɣ aya.
Seg zik mi as-briɣ.
Segmi ara d-yali wass alamma d tameddit d nutenti ur ḥebsent ara.
Segmi i d-tɛddaḍ ddurt iɛddan.
Segmi i yemmut baba-s ur qesren akka.
Sɛiɣ akk ayen ttmenniɣ.
Sɛiɣ ccɣel.
Sekkdent-d seg-i tin ur zmiren lemḥayen ad tt-sseɣlin.
Seld aya yuɣal heddren udem ɣer udem.
Selleɣ kan yes-sen.
Semmeḍ lḥal ula deg uxxam.
Serseɣ iman-w ɣef umeṭreḥ.
Sexsin tafatin yellan ceɛlent.
Shitrifeɣ.
Sḥuseɣ i yifasen-is ɣef tfekka-w.
Sḥusseɣ snesreɣ-d syina.
Sima acḥal d abrid i as-d-tura ur as-yerri ara.
Sima akken kan i d-tettmektay imeslayen i as-d-yeǧǧa Maziɣ.
Sima d Maziɣ seg wakken ttemsefhamen.
Sima d Maziɣ teddun alammi i wwḍen ɣer tkerrust-is.
Sima daya i tḥemmel seg zik-is.
Sima deg lawan-nni.
Sima i tikkelt tamezut i teldi tawwurt i ḥedd akken ad yemmeslay yid-s.
Sima kra tezga ixeddem akken d nettat teṭṭalay-it-id seddaw n tiṭ.
Sima mi as-d-yerra akken.
Sima mi as-d-yettmeslay akken Maziɣ.
Sima mi as-d-yewweḍ yizen-nni.
Sima mi tekfa lhedra d Maziɣ.
Sima tban-as-d d tamuɣli i weznen.
Sima tebɣa ad as-teldi ul-is i Maziɣ.
Sima tebɣa ad as-tini i Maziɣ ad yeqqim ur yettruḥ ara.
Sima tebɣa ad tessuffeɣ Maziɣ deg yir liḥala-nni.
Sima teɛreḍ Maziɣ ɣer yimensi.
Sima teffeɣ-d seg tneɣrit.
Sima teffeɣ-d.
Sima teɣleq tawwurt n win ara as-yemmeslayen.
Sima tegra-as-d lhedra i Maziɣ ɣef yisental-nniḍen.
Sima teḥbes.
Sima tekcem ad texdem.
Sima tekcem deg tirga ur nettfakka.
Sima tekcem ɣer tkuzint akken ad tessew lqahwa.
Sima tekcem ɣer tnawalt.
Sima tella tecbeḥ nezzeh.
Sima tella tezdeɣ iman-is.
Sima tella tḥemmel ad tas ɛemti-s d dderya-s ɣer uxxam-is.
Sima tennum thedder d yemma-s.
Sima tennum.
Sima teqqim-d ṭṭerf n Maziɣ.
Sima terra ɣer lebḥer.
Sima tesɛa ixeddim ɣef ttmenya alamma d lweḥda.
Sima tessers aqerruy-is ɣef yidmaren n Maziɣ.
Sima tessusem.
Sima tesxinfif.
Sima teṭṭal akka d wakka anda ara tẓer Maziɣ.
Sima tettɛassa melmi ara d-yekunikti Maziɣ.
Sima tettḥessis i wayen d-yeqqar Maziɣ s imeṭṭi.
Sima tettqerrib kra kra.
Sima tettserriḥ i wayen yessenguglen ul-is.
Sima tewwid iḍ gar yifasen n Maziɣ.
Sima tewwi-tt tnafa akken gar yifasen n Maziɣ.
Sima texdem-as ssker.
Sima teẓra d akken Maziɣ isetḥa mliḥ.
Sima tḥemmel akk ayen icebḥen.
Sima truḥ ad texdem.
Sima ttecruruqent wallen-is.
Sima tufa deg-s win yebɣan a yexdem.
Sima tufa-d tabɣest s wacu i teqbel dakken tettxemmim ɣef Maziɣ.
Sima twala-t-id seg ṭṭaq.
Sima ur as-d-terri ara awal.
Sima ur as-d-yuli awawl.
Sima ur as-iɛedda ara wayen i as-d-yenna Maziɣ kan akka.
Sima ur as-yekkis ara ucmumeḥ ɣef uqemmuc-is.
Sima ur tennum ara tseɛu assaɣ d yinelmaden-is.
Sima yetteffeɣ-as leɛqel s kra kra.
Sima yettezmaḍ wul-is.
Sima yewweḍ-d wass-is anda i tebɣa ad tehder.
Sima yezzuzun-itt dima wayen tessal.
Sima yuɛer-as lḥal ad tessuffeɣ ayen yellan deg wul-is.
Simmal heddren.
Simmal ittɛeddi lweqt.
Simmal tetteddu tceqquft.
Simmal tkeččem deg-s.
Simmal trennu sdat n lemri i as-tettruḥ teflest.
Simmal yettɛedday lweqt.
Simmal yettɛeddi lweqt.
Sin akkin kemmlen hedren ɣef yisental-nniḍen am leqraya.
Siwel-iy-d Sima.
Siwel-iyi-d s yisem-iw melmi i ak-yehwa d wanda i ak-yehwa.
Sliɣ i ḥed ikcem-d ɣer texxamt-nni.
Sliɣ tettɛawanem wid i ken-id-iqesden?
Srekben-t-id deg lbabur amezwaru qbala Bgayet.
Srid ad yerwel ɣer berra.
Srid ar daxel akken ad uraren dduminu.
Srid ɣer teɣrit.
Srid ɣer tkerrust.
Srid ɣer tnawalt akken ad d-tessew lqahwa.
Ssaɛa ad tili d zzuǧ d uzgen.
Ssalen-as yeqqar.
Ssarameɣ bxir i tettiliḍ.
Ssarament ad ilint am nettat.
Ssawḍeɣ-ak-d iɣeblan-iw.
Sserḥ-as akken i ak-yehwa ad d-yezzi alamma d ɣur-k.
Suref-iyi!
Suref-iyi.
Sya ad ifak Massi lehdur d temddakelt-is.
Syin akkin ad laɛin i yilemẓi.
Syin akkin.
Syin d asawen.
Tabɣest tesɛiḍ ulac-itt ɣer wiyaḍ.
Tabɣest-nni i d-tejmeɛ akken ad tqabel Maziɣ.
Taččaray-d tzeqqa-nni s kra kra.
Taččrant.
Tacebḥant.
Taceqquft ad tettwaxdem deg uxxam n yidles.
Taceqquft qrib ad tebdu.
Taddukli iɣer yettekki Maziɣ.
Taddukli neɣ lxedma akken ad yawi xersum amesruf n ddurt.
Taɛkemt ẓẓayit.
Tafat i yettakken tabɣest i yimdanen akken ad nnaɣen d tudert.
Tafat n sbeḥ i ttqabalen yixeddamen d yinelmaden s lferḥ.
Taɣawsa-ayi yiwen ur yezmir ad as-tt-yekkes.
Tagnawt tettibrik kter.
Tagnit-a d tamaynut ɣur-s.
Takerrust d yidrimen.
Takerrust-iw tettawi-iyi anda bɣiɣ;
Tamert neɣ snat segmi teḍra tedyant-nni.
Tamsalt ɣef wacu i d-temmeslay.
Tamsalt n yimmal.
Tanemmirt a Sima.
Tanemmirt-im a Massa.
Tanemmirt-nwen.
Taqcict mi tres.
Taqcict tekcem deg yixemmimen-is.
Taqcict tessetḥa.
Taqcict teṭṭerḍeq d imeṭṭi.
Tareqqaqt.
Tarewla ur telli.
Tarrayt n usɣray tbeddel.
Tasdawit.
Taselmadt allaɣ-is wissen anda yewweḍ d wanda ires.
Taselmadt asmi i ibda iɛennu-tt-id.
Taselmadt teqqim sdat-s.
Taselmadt tessawel-ad i Maziɣ.
Taselmadt tetteddu qbala ɣur-sen.
Tasnawit anda qqaren.
Tattales-as-d amek tella txeddem.
Tawezlant.
Tawiḍ-d tayeḍ.
Tawwurt i teldi mazal tettraju-tt-id tayeḍ.
Tayet i t-id-ifahmen war ma tegzem deg-s.
Tban d tin ad yewten d imizaben.
Tbeddel lqecc-is.
Tbeddel tudert n Sima.
Tbeddel yir tamuɣli i refdeɣ.
Tbeqqa i temddukal-is slam.
Tbeqqu ad temmeslay yid-s.
Tebda acetki d yimenɣi.
Tebda tettḥerrik-itt.
Tebda tettmeslay d yid-s.
Tebda tettserriḥ-d i tmiqwa.
Tebda-t ddeg-s aya.
Tebɣa ad ḍegger ayen tesɛa iceggeḍ-as ul-is.
Tebɣa ad mmeslay ula d nettat.
Tebɣa ad tehder ayen tesḥusay.
Tebɣa ad temmeslay yid-s.
Tebɣa ad ten-id-tessuffeɣ ɣer tilawt.
Tebɣa ad teqqim ad tehder yid-s.
Tebɣa ad teqqim iman-is.
Tebɣa ad ternu tiɣimit yid-s.
Tebɣa ad teṭṭerḍeq ɣer ɣur-s.
Tebɣa ad tettru s wayen i as-d-yenna Maziɣ.
Tebɣa ad t-tissin ugar n waya.
Tebɣa alukan ad terwel deg tmetti itt-yurzen.
Tebɣa alukan ur ttfakan ara lehdur n Maziɣ.
Tebɣa d nettat ara t-yextiren seg wid yestahlen akken ad as-d-tsiḥ.
Tebɣa mi ara tfak asɣray.
Tebɣa ula d nettat ad tessiweḍ ad temmeslay s tlelli ayen akk yellan daxel-is.
Tebɣa ur tḥebbes ara ameslay yid-s.
Tečča imensi.
Tečča-t lqaɛa tesbleɛ-it.
Tecɛel lanternet akken ad tẓer ma yerra-as-d Maziɣ.
Tecmumeḥ-d.
Tedda-d akka kra a-t-an iqubel-itt-id Maziɣ.
Teddem lqec-is.
Teddem-d srid tilifun.
Teddem-d tilifun teṭṭal ma yella Maziɣ neɣ ulac-it.
Teddewer-d ɣer Massi.
Teddun deg temdint.
Teddun heddren alammi wwḍen ɣer sdat n yiwen n uxxam.
Teḍra d yid-s am win yeqqes jjiḥ.
Teḍra yidi tedyant ur zmireɣ ad ḥkuɣ.
Teḍra yid-wen am tzizwa.
Teɛlem d akken yeqqen ɣer leqraya.
Tɛelmeḍ tuget n yirgazen ẓẓaren tiqcicin neɣ tullas ddaw-tsen.
Teɛna taxxmat-is.
Teɛreḍ acḥal d abrid ad tɣer adlis.
Teɛreḍ ad tessers aqerruy-is.
Teɛreḍ ad tɣer adlis.
Teɛreḍ ad t-id-tɛezzi maca ifut lḥal.
Teɛreḍ akken ad as-tessettu aya.
Teɛreḍ amek ara tessuffeɣ deg wallaɣ-is acku akken kan yettɛedday lawan.
Teɛreq-iyi tikli.
Teɛweq s wansa ara d-tebdu.
Teɛya deg lehdur am wigi.
Teɛya deg tudert iman-is.
Teɛya deg wayen tessal.
Teffeɣ seg texxamt.
Teffeɣ talsa ɣur medden.
Teffeɣ-d berra i tzeqqa.
Teffeɣ-d ɣer ɣur-s.
Tefɣeḍ yid-s.
Tefka lqima i tlelli-is.
Tefka-yas-t i Maziɣ.
Tefka-yas-tt-id i Maziɣ.
Tefruri taḍsa-s.
Teǧǧa-yasen-d isallen-ines.
Teǧǧelleb-d seg umkan-is.
Tegger-itt imi teɛyiḍ.
Tegguma ad taweḍ.
Teɣleb-iten nniya d yir lefhama.
Teɣli ɣer yifassen n Maziɣ ur d-tewwi s lexber.
Teɣli-d ɣer wid ur nettagad Rebbi.
Teɣli-d taselmadt-nni i ten-yesɣarayen akken ad ten-tɛas.
Teɣli-d tsusmi gar-asen.
Teɣli-d tsusmi sdaxel n tkerrust.
Tegliḍ-iyi-d s leḥnana i yezmer ad yesɛu urgaz ɣer tmeṭṭut.
Tegzem-itt deg rray-is.
Tegziḍ timsal bexlaf wiyaḍ.
Teḥbes-d sdat-is.
Tehmel seg mkul tama.
Teḥsa mačči d leḥya.
Tejba-d temddakelt n Massi.
Tejmeɛ gar zzin d sser.
Tekcem akken tuɣ tanumi.
Tekcem deg tirga-s.
Tekcem deg-s d akcam.
Tekcem gar ifasen n Maziɣ.
Tekcem ɣer fasebbuk.
Tekcem tejmeɛ-d lqecc-is teffeɣ-d ɣer ɣur-s.
Tekcem-iten leḥya-nni n yirgazen.
Tekkat deg-s zznezla.
Tekker akken ad tesseḥmu d acu ara ččen.
Tekker seg wussu ahat ad t-tettu kra.
Tekker-d sbeḥ zik akken ad teqqim sdat n lemri.
Tekkes ayen yellan ɣef ṭṭabla.
Tekkes-as leḥya.
Teldi-as-d tawwurt akken ad yemmeslay.
Teldiḍ-d ul-iw.
Teldi-tt tekcem.
Tella akken tebɣa.
Tella deg tirga-s.
Tella mi ara tɣer taqsiṭ.
Tella teggan ɣef sin n yimeẓẓuɣen am lṭufan.
Tella tenwa yettas-d ɣur-s akken ad ifares ula d netta deg tmuɣli ɣer ɣur-s.
Tella tettxemmim kan amek ara tesɛeddi lweqt deg wayen tḥemmel ad texdem.
Tella yiwet n lqahwa.
Tella yiwet n tceqquft umezgun.
Tella-d ɣef yiwen n tlemzit yeǧǧan taddart-is akken ad d-tas ad texdem deg temdint.
Temɣur lqima-m ɣur-i.
Temmed deg wallaɣ d tfekka.

Tenna-as.

Tenwa ad ternu ɣer wiyaḍ ziɣen teɣleḍ deg leḥsab.

Tenwim ahat d sseḥ.
Teqqar deg wul-is.
Teqqen ɣer tlelli-ines.

Tesɛa axxam deg temdint.

Tesneḍ ad telseḍ.

Tetteddu tettxemmim.

Tuɣal tebɣa ad tehder iḥulfan-is.
Tuɣal tedyant deg ccfawat kan.
Tuɣal ula d nettat tettak-as azal meqqren i yisallen i as-tettak.

Ula d imdanen akken.

Ula d kečči.

Ula d Maziɣ.

Ula d Sima tewweḍ ɣer uxxam.
Ula d Sima.

Ula d taselmadt tettara-yas-d s wayen tesɛa.

Ula d tiqcicin zgant ṭṭalayent-tt.

Ula deg yiḍ.

Ulac akk aɛewwiq.
Ulac anezgum.
Ulac aserreḥ.
Ulac ass ur hdiren ara ɣef tarrayt d wamek ara yexdem tazrawt.
Ulac aṭas n medden.
Ulac aṭas n unecraḥ d taḍsa am ussan iɛeddan.
Ulac aṭas n yinelmaden.
Ulac axemmem.
Ulac ayen ara ten-id-iḥebsen.
Ulac d acu ara xedmeɣ.
Ulac d acu i d-tenna.
Ulac d win ara tecrek ayen tebɣa.
Ulac fell-as a Maziɣ.
Ulac fell-as a yelli.
Ulac fell-as!
Ulac fell-as.
Ulac i d-yeqqimen.
Ulac i yuɛren am tamuɣli n wiyaḍ ɣur-i.
Ulac la lḥes la nnefs.
Ulac lexber-im.
Ulac tuffɣa ad as-tiniḍ d ahajer ihujren.
Ulac tuffɣa ɣer berra.
Ulac ul ara ilemden.
Ulac ul ara ixedmen.
Ulac ul ara yeɣren.
Ulac win ara iyi-tt-yekksen.
Ulac win ara sen-yeṭṭfen afus akken ad ten-yessiweḍ anda bɣan.
Ulac win izemren ad yili akken yebɣa.
Ulac win teǧǧa ur t-id-jbid ara ɣer ɣur-s.
Ulac-ik da?
Ulac-iyi.
Ulamek ad nehder ɣef waya ma ulac later.
Ulamma sdaxel n tneɣrit.
Ulamma tebɣiḍ ad temmeslayeḍ aqel-in da.
Ulamma yeɣleḍ.
Ulayɣer ad d-sendef lǧerḥ-is i tikkelt tis snat.
Ulayɣer ad yili uḥras gar urgaz d tmeṭṭut.
Ulayɣer leɛyaḍ.
Ulayɣer tudert.
Ul-is yefreḥ.
Ul-is yesfan yettban-d deg yiles-is mi ara yettmeslay.
Uma d iṭij ḥlaw ɣef wudmawen.
Uma deg wallaɣ-iw yella wayen yezwaren annect-a.
Uqbel ad tekker.
Ur ak-id-ufiɣ ara!
Ur as-d-tban ara d aɛewwiq.
Ur as-d-yerri ara awal.
Ur asent-rrin ara azal.
Ur as-tefki ara i Maziɣ fasebbuk-is alammi tettkel.
Ur as-ttgen ara azal i wayen tesḥusay.
Ur as-yessal ula d yiwen.
Ur bɛiden ara a nniya.
Ur bɣan ara ad tfak.
Ur bɣan ara i sin ad mfaraqen.
Ur bɣiɣ ara ad ttwaqneɣ.
Ur bɣiɣ ara ma yella nniɣ-ak-t-id ad tbeddel tmuɣli-k ɣur-i!
Ur d-heggan ara i waya.
Ur d-qeṭṭun.
Ur d-tekki ara seg-k.
Ur d-tenni ara awal.
Ur d-tettwiḍ ara.
Ur d-ttaɣen.
Ur ḥebbesen ara taḍsa.
Ur heddren ara gar-asen.
Ur ḥemmlen ara mi ara d-yewwet.
Ur ḥsiɣ d tafat.
Ur ḥsin ara ula d taqcict tesɛa ul.
Ur ibeddel kra deg-i.
Ur ikeččem ara ad iɣer.
Ur iyi-d-yuli ara wawal.
Ur iyi-ɛriqen ara?
Ur iyi-ixus uma d kra.
Ur izegged deg lehdur.
Ur k-ttarzeɣ.
Ur k-tteqneɣ.
Ur neḥtameɣ ara alammi i d-ɣlin.
Ur nesɛi ara aṭas n yidrimen.
Ur nettaweḍ ara ass-a ɣer wannect-a.
Ur nettemfaraq ara.
Ur nwiɣ ara ad d-yaweḍ wass ad ttruɣ sdat n ḥedd.
Ur nwiɣ ara deg-s aya.
Ur nwiɣ ara naweḍ ɣer wayen nexdem.
Ur sɛiɣ ara allaɣ.
Ur sɛiɣ ara sebbaḍ.
Ur sɛint ara zzerb.
Ur sɛint la azal la lqima.
Ur s-yezlig wawal.
Ur tbexxel ara fell-as.
Ur tebɣi ara ad iwexxer fell-as.
Ur tebɣi ara akk ad as-tesserreḥ.
Ur teɛlim s yiwen seg wakken tettkel ɣef yiman-is.
Ur tennum ara d liḥala am ta.
Ur tenwi ad s-d-yelḥeq wass am wa.
Ur tesɛi ara lḥeq ad txemmem.
Ur tesɛi ara tilelli.
Ur tesɛi ara ul ara ihedren.
Ur tesɛiḍ anda ruḥeɣ.
Ur tesɛiḍ anda truḥeḍ!
Ur tesɛiḍ d acu ara ak-d-fken.
Ur tesɛiḍ d acu ara d-nini ɣef tid yeṭṭef uxxam.
Ur tettawḍeḍ ayen tebɣiḍ.
Ur tewwiḍ ara lebɣi-s.
Ur texdim ula d kra.
Ur tezgel yiwet.
Ur tezgil yiwen.
Ur tezmir ara ad tuɣal s axxam-nsen.
Ur tezmirem ara ad ṭṭfen deg yiwen neɣ deg yiwet alamma d taggara.
Ur tezmreḍ ara ad tḥemmleḍ ?
Ur teẓri amek i as-d-yekcem neɣ s wansa i as-d-yekcem.
Ur teẓri ara amek ara teddu.
Ur teẓri ara Maziɣ.
Ur teẓri ma d imeslayen i as-yeqqar i tt-isuzunen.
Ur teẓriḍ ara.
Ur teẓriḍ d acu ik-d-ittrajun.
Ur tḥekkmeḍ ara ɣef wiyaḍ.
Ur ttaǧǧan yiwen ad ten-ixalef.
Ur ttaǧǧan yiwen bxir.
Ur ttawḍen.
Ur ttḥussuɣ ara.
Ur ttiddimeɣ ara akka.
Ur tt-id-yeẓri ara.
Ur tt-id-yuli ara wawal.
Ur ttqelliq ara.
Ur ttsetḥi ara.
Ur tt-ttaddam ara d akken furseɣ tagnit akken ad xedmeɣ i bɣiɣ deg-m.
Ur tt-yettaǧǧa ad tt-yali uɣebbar neɣ ad tewsex.
Ur tt-yuɣ uma d kra.
Ur tuḥwaǧeɣ ara.
Ur turji yiwen.
Ur tuzzil ara tidi-k.
Ur t-yeẓẓar.
Ur tzeggel ara ula d yiwet.
Ur yebɣi ara ad t-yeǧǧ iman-is seld tadyant yeḍran.
Ur yebɣi ara ad yali wass.
Ur yebni ara ɣef waya.
Ur yeḍfir ara taɣult-a deg lbaṭṭel.
Ur yeḥkim la fell-as neɣ ɣef wayen i as-yeḍran.
Ur yekcim ara ɣer daxel.
Ur yelli fessus akken ad tḥemmleḍ.
Ur yelli lɛib ma tessarem teqcict.
Ur yelli ẓẓay akken ad tkerheḍ.
Ur yenneḥtam ara alammi i as-tuker lmut gar wallen-is.
Ur yerfid kra s sdaxel.
Ur yertaḥ ara wul.
Ur yesɛi la lmelḥ.
Ur yettaǧa yiwet n tɣawsa ad t-tɛeddi.
Ur yezmir ara ad yidir iman-is.
Ur yezmir ara akk ad yessugen d acu i izemren ad yerr tilemẓit deg liḥala am tin.
Ur yezmir i tuɣalin ɣer deffir.
Ur yeẓri anda iger iḍaren-is.
Ur yeẓri anwa ara yaf dina.
Ur yeẓri d acu ara as-yini.
Ur yeẓri d acu ara d-yehder.
Ur yeẓri d acu yellan neɣ d acu yeḍran.
Ur yeẓri ɣef wacu i yettxemmim.
Ur yeẓri ma d iḍes i as-iɛerqen neɣ d ayen yeḍran i t-yerwin.
Ur yeẓri ma yella ad iqeddem neɣ ad iqqim kan din.
Ur yufi ara tameẓẓuɣt ara as-d-iḥessen.
Ur zmireɣ ara ad d-kecmeɣ acku a-t-an wwiɣ-d lqahwa deg ufus-iw.
Ur zmireɣ ara ad ḥekkmeɣ fell-as.
Ur zmireɣ ara ad ḥekkmeɣ ɣef yiwen kan akka.
Ur ẓriɣ ara a Massa!
Ur ẓriɣ ara amek ara tt-id-ssefruriɣ?
Ur ẓriɣ ara amek i sebreɣ alammi d ass-a.
Ur ẓriɣ ara ɣef wacu i tennuɣem maca ayen nwiɣ.
Ur ẓriɣ ara izen iyi-d-turiḍ.
Ur ẓriɣ ma ttqenniɛeɣ iman-iw neɣ regleɣ i wayen yellan?
Ur ẓriɣ s wansa ara ak-d-bduɣ.
Urzen yifassen.
Urzen-as allaɣ-is.
Usiɣ-d nwiɣ ad nehder.
Ussan i d-tewwi Sima yimenɣi d yiman-is.
Ussan imezwura ad asent-yeɛǧeb lḥal.
Ussan imezwura lliɣ ur t-ttamneɣ ara.
Ussan imezwura mi d-kecmen.
Ussan ttɛeddin.
Ussan zerrin.
Wa ad tefeḍ tid ara ak-d-yeḥkun.
Wa ad t-tḥemmel.
Wa d amddakel-is wayeḍ tekka-d seg twacult-is.
Wa d lǧar-is.
Wakil ad nruḥ kan ad nurar ddabex.
Wakil d iḍ s tebrek-is i aɣ-d-yettakken tabɣest?
Wakil ɛerqen-ak imeslayen.
Wakil nettu belli imdanen akk n umaḍal am nekkni neɣ ɛeddan-aɣ kra.
Wakil tennuɣem?
Wakil tettum d nekk i d ayaziḍ n dduminu.
Wala ma teqqimeḍ iman-ik.
Wama abrid sneɣ-t.
Wama a-t-an nemlal.
Wama ayen-nniḍen ad d-yas iman-is.
Wama dayi deg tesdawit.
Wama tamuɣli-w ɣur-m teqqim d tin yellan.
Waqil teɛyiḍ?
War ma nettu anecraḥ d uqessar d yimddukal.
War ma nettu win yesɛan lulu akken ad iserref mebla cceḥḥa.
War ma tga lḥed i tiktiwin-is.
Wayeḍ ad s-yeɛǧeb.
Wayeḍ ad yečč ad igen.
Wayeḍ akken ad iḥewwes.
Wayeḍ ḥsu belli ad s-d-yenni.
Wayeḍ yettwali-tt kan d amkan n temɛict.
Wellah alukan deg umaḍal i lliɣ.
Wellah alukan ur ttagadeɣ ara idamen.
Wellah ar acḥal ma steqsaɣ fell-as.
Wellah ar acḥal ma steqsaɣ ɣur-s.
Wellah ar ɛyiɣ.
Welleh ar d ɛemrayen.
Werǧin tefra-tt d yiman-is.
Wid akk iyi-d-ittqerriben.
Wid i asent-ittakken tilelli-nsent mebla aḥras neɣ imenɣi.
Wid i d-iteddun.
Wid i tent-iẓaren akken llant.
Wid iceɣben allaɣ-ik.
Wid iɛelmen steqsayen amek akka zedɣeɣ iman-iw.
Wid ixeddmen leqder d lḥerma i yixxamen-nsen.
Wid kerhent akk teqcicin.
Wid teǧǧa rreḥma.
Wid tesɣaray tetten-tt s wallen-nsen.
Wid ur neẓẓar amdan d amdan.
Wid yeǧǧa lexrif.
Wid yeḥwaǧen.
Wid yellan d igerdan la ttimɣuren.
Wid yellan zewjen deg tmurt.
Win aɣersiw axir-is.
Win ara irefden lixsas yellan deg wayeḍ.
Win ara iyi-ikksen tilelli-inu.
Win ara ten-yawin ɣer tesdawit.
Win ara t-id-yawin ɣer uxxam.
Win ara yaf deg teswiɛt n ddiq.
Win d-yennan ḥader.
Win i as-d-yeffeɣen d uɛkis ɣef wayen tennum.
Win iten-isɛan deg lawan-nni.
Win iten-yesɛan isem-is mechur
Win testeqsaḍ.
Win ukkud ara tent-nferreq.
Win ur nesɛi.
Win ur nestehzay deg leqray-ines.
Win yebɣan kan ad ihder fell-i.
Win yeffuden yeswa.
Win yeɣlin ad tiliḍ sdat-s.
Win yellan am nettat.
Win yesɛan idrimen. ɣas yeskadeb. yenna-d tidet.
Win yettaran akk imdanen tteklen ɣef yiman-nsen.
Win yezgan yettaf-d awal ilaqen i yal tadyant.
Wisen anda yewweḍ akka?
Wisen ma yebɣa ula d netta ad yemeslay d yid-i?
Wissen anda yunag.
Wissen iwacu ur ttilin ara am nekki.
Wissen ma yettxemmim ɣef temlilit-nneɣ?
Wwḍen ɣer useggas wis kraḍ.
Wwḍen-d imddukal-nniḍen.
Wwin-tt-id d amqelleɛ ma yella ad ruḥen ɣer lebḥer neɣ ala.
Xeddmen ayen bɣan.
Xedmeɣ fukeɣ.
Xersum ma ulac akk d acu ara texdem.
Xersum ulamma s wallen.
Xusen-as wafriwen kan ad tafeg.
Ya ad tent-yegleb neɣ ad glunt yes-s.
Ya Rebbi!
Yah ayen yeḍran mačči d sseḥ!
Yak alamma tebɣiḍ ara tḥemleḍ!
Yak bxir i telliḍ!
Yak bxir?
Yak ččiɣ kulec.
Yak d nekk i ak-d-yennan akka!
Yak d nekk i k-id-ɛerḍen.
Yak iɛǧeb-ak umkan-a?
Yak iɛǧeb-ak wayen teččiḍ!
Yak ixdem akk ayen yebɣa yes-s.
Yak kulec iban.
Yak labas i tettiliḍ!
Yak nhedder nettfaka.
Yak nniɣ-ak-d asma ara ak-d-iniɣ ad tbeddel tmuɣli-k ɣur-i.
Yak qqaren ayen yuran ad iɛeddi.
Yak qqaren yecbeḥ kulec ɣef urgaz.
Yak tesɛiḍ imddukal d wacu i teɣɣareḍ akked wid n tddukli.
Yak tesneḍ taqcict-nni d wacu i ttedduɣ?
Yak ulac draɛ deg wannect-a!
Yak ur aɣ-tettuḍ ara?
Yak zzin yettfakka.
Yakan acḥal-aya ur ḥdireɣ i tceqquft.
Yal amdan yesɛa azal-is.
Yal ass d acu-t amaynut ara ten-id-iqablen.
Yal awal i as-d-yenna.
Yal mi ara ad d-yali wass.
Yal mi ara ad tt-iḥaz.
Yal mi ara d-mmektiɣ.
Yal mi ara d-taweḍ akken ad d-temmeslay as-truḥ tebɣest.
Yal mi ara d-tekcem ad as-tessiwel akken ad qesrent.
Yal mi ara nennaɣ akka i ttximimeɣ.
Yal mi ara nennaɣ qqareɣ-as wellah ma tɛawed-as.
Yal ssenf yufa-t.
Yal tagnit ara iɛeddin tessaram tayeḍ.
Yal tagnit tesɛa awalen-is.
Yal tamsalt tettqisiḍ-as-d lehdur-is.
Yal taswiɛt.
Yal wa iswan-is deg ddunit.
Yal wa iswan-is.
Yal wa lutu i yebɣa ad d-yenǧeri yiman-is.
Yal wa lutu i yexdem i yiman-is.
Yal wa s anda yebɣa ad yaweḍ.
Yal wa s anda yenǧer ixef-is.
Yal wa tudert-is.
Yal wa yeṭṭef abrid-is.
Yal win ara qqimeɣ.
Yal yiwen anda yenta.
Yal yiwen d acu ara iẓer deg-s.
Yal yiwen d acu i ad ittserriḥ.
Yal yiwen d acu i as-d-yettɣenni.
Yal yiwen d acu i yesɛa d iswi deg wallaɣ-is.
Yal yiwen d acu i yessaram.
Yal yiwen d acu ixeddem.
Yal yiwen deg wacu i yenta.
Yal yiwen deg-nneɣ iṭṭalay ɣer zzin n tfekka.
Yal yiwen deg-sen yuɣal ɣer ṭṭbiɛa-s.
Yal yiwen ɣer ccɣel-is.
Yal yiwen ɣer umdebber anda ara iɣer.
Yal yiwen s anda i yettmil.
Yal yiwen s ccɣel-is.
Yal yiwen s lxedma-s.
Yal yiwen s tigawt-is.
Yal yiwen s ubrid-is.
Yal yiwen s wacu ara yesḥus.
Yal yiwen takerza-s.
Yal yiwen tikti-ines ɣef wayen iselmad.
Yal yiwen yettazen asirem-is.
Yal yiwet tessen abrid-is d umkan iɣer tettuddu.
Yarbaḥ a Ɛemti.
Yarbaḥ a Sima!
Yarbaḥ a wladi.
Yarra-as-d tili.
Yaxi ccetla n ukmaz yaxi.
Yaxi llant temɣarin.
Yebɣa ad d-yini ayen t-yehwan.
Yebɣa ad t-iẓer.
Yebɣa ad yemmeslay d ḥed.
Yebɣa ad yemmeslay yid-s.
Yebɣa ad yesɛu azal-is deg tmetti.
Yebɣa ad yessers allaɣ-is akken ad yili seg wid ifazen.
Yeddem-d akersi.
Yeḍra waṭas!
Yeḍra wayen yeḍran.
Yedrem-as lferḥ i d-tewwi deg yiḍ iɛeddan.
Yeɛmeq lbir anda tekcem.
Yeɛna-iyi-d akken nqesser.
Yeɛni asmi i t-id-rran ɣer tmurt acku ur yesɛi ara lekwaɣeḍ.
Yeɛni d nekk i yebɣan ad qqimeɣ yid-s.
Yeɛni ur ẓriɣ ma yella d sseḥ d tafekka-nneɣ i yeɛyan neɣ deg wallaɣ kan itent-nuɣ.
Yeɛweq amek ara yexdem.
Yeɛweq anda ara yerr.
Yeɛweq d acu ara d-yini.
Yeɛweq d acu ara ixemmem.
Yeɛweq yiles d acu ara d-yenṭeq.
Yeffeɣ tawwurt.
Yeffeɣ-as-d d uɛkis.
Yeffeɣ-d seg texxamt.
Yeffeɣ-d seg wanda yella.
Yefka lqima i yal taluft.
Yefka-yas aman.
Yefna akk temẓi-s deg lɣerba ur yeksib ur yeḥsib.
Yefreḥ wul-is.
Yeǧǧa-d amkan-is i tezdeg n wass.
Yeǧǧa-d deg-i ala ccwami.
Yeǧǧa-d later deg-s.
Yeǧǧa-d lweḥc meqqren wadeg-nni yeṭṭef baba-s.
Yeɣɣar ɣef yizerfan n umdan.
Yeɣɣar ɣer yiselmaden i yesɣran ɣef temsal i iqqnen ɣer uẓref n umdan.
Yeǧǧa-ten ad frun timsal yellan gar-asen.
Yeǧǧa-ten deg rrif.
Yeǧǧa-tt ad tettru war ma yesseḥbes-itt-id.
Yeǧǧa-tt mebla lehdur.
Yegguma ad yali wass win i d-yettawin tafat.
Yeɣra ayen i as-d-tura Sima.
Yegra iman-is ɣer yiwet n tdukkli taseddawant i yellan tqeddec ɣef yizerfan n umadan.
Yeḥka-yas taluft akken tella.
Yeḥka-yasen taluft akken tella.
Yeḥsa d akken ur yettaf ara lkar ara t-id-yawin s axxam.
Yekcem ɣer fasebbuk-is.
Yekcem srid ɣer texxamt-is.
Yekkat s leɛjlan.
Yekkes ula d netta iqbac deg wacu i yečča.
Yekkes-iyi ayen ɣlayen.
Yekkes-iyi-tt s draɛ.
Yelha ma akka i teẓẓareḍ.
Yelha mliḥ.
Yella d aɣbalu n laman i d-yettak i yal yiwen deg uxxam.
Yella d aqehwaǧi.
Yella d tayet iɣef serseɣ aqerruy-iw.
Yella d yid-s uṭwayci-nni n Massi.
Yella ɣer wuɣur yeqqen.
Yella kulec yeshel.
Yella wayen i ak-d-uriɣ d wayen i ak-d-ceyɛeɣ ɣef usentel i teddmeḍ.
Yella wayen i xedmeɣ ur am-yeɛǧib ara?
Yella wayen ibeddlen.
Yella wayen tebɣiḍ neɣ tesseqsaḍ-d kan?
Yella win yegzan ayen d-yeqqar.
Yella yeqqim iman-is deg uxxam anda tella tdukkli.
Yella yettmeslay kan d yid-s s ttawil n fasebbuk.
Yella yeẓẓar annect-nni d ayen i t-ibeɛden.
Yella-d ujdid fell-as neɣ ala?
Yella-d ujdid.
Yemlal d Massi deg lqahwa.
Yemma teǧǧa-iyi d teqcicin am nekki.
Yemmal-d ayen ur yezmir uqemmuc ad t-yerfed.
Yemmekta-d ayen yeḍran laɛca-nni.
Yemmeslay kra n wawalen d yid-s.
Yemxalaf s waṭas ɣef wiyaḍ.
Yenɣa timgreḍt neɣ yeǧǧa-d lɛib.
Yenna deg wul-is ad ikemmel d Sima alamma fuken lehdur.
Yenna deg wul-is. “ad reɣ ɣer berra.
Yennum yettmeslay d tcixet-is.
Yenṭeq Massi.
Yenwa ala lutu ara yexdem i yiman-is.
Yenwa ala yes-sen i tzemreḍ ad ttɛiwneḍ medden.
Yenwa dayen yettu ayen i yettezzin seg wasmi meẓẓi;
Yeqqar deg wul-is.
Yeqqar-as .
Yeqqen ɣer lferḥ ara s-d-yawi Maziɣ mi ara heddren.
Yeqqim-d ɣef umeṭreḥ.
Yeqsed yiwet n teɣmert anda llant tedruǧin.
Yerḥa-tt.
Yerna ad ttedduɣ s tfenṭazit.
Yerna akken itt-yebɣa lxaṭer-nwen.
Yerna akken kan i keffunt i d-rennunt.
Yerna ax ad ak-d-ǧǧeɣ fasebbuk-inu.
Yerna bɣiɣ akem-steqsiɣ.
Yerna d nekk i as-yefkan ttiɛad.
Yerna ddunit tettkemmil.
Yerna kra zgiɣ xeddmeɣ akken.
Yerna mačči ɣef leqraya kan ara nehder.
Yerna mi ara teṭṭalayeḍ akka deg lebḥer.
Yerna nekk d amyurar ameqqran.
Yerna nettat gar ifasen-is.
Yerna nniɣ-ak isem-iw Sima.
Yerna nniɣ-ak-d ma tuḥwaǧeḍ kra.
Yerna nwiɣ-as ad am-d-siwileɣ akken mi ara nili kan gar-aneɣ!
Yerna tettqenniɛ lhedra-s.

Ur tewwim ara amḍiq-nwen.
Ur tewwimt ara amḍiq-nkent.
Ur tewwimt ara amḍiq-nwent.
Ur wefqeɣ ara tikti-nni, acku am zik am tura yal yiwen ɣef wacu i yebbuṣa.
Ur wwiɣ ara amḍiq-iw.
Ur wwin ara amḍiq-nsen.
Ur wwint ara amḍiq-nsent.
Ur yewwi ara amḍiq-is.
Ur yi-d-qqar ara kan belli tesselmadeḍ tamaziɣt?
Wali ar tedmarin-is!
Win i d-yewwin awal ɣef tezlatin d umezruy n Maɛtub Lwennas.
Win yeṭṭfen taqacuct n umḥezwer s lqidar n 88 di miyya.
Yes-s i trewwi irij akken ad d-yefk cwiṭ n uzɣal.
Yettawi aɣyul-is.
Zik, imdanen keččmen ɣer leḥbas acku ttakren, ma d tura keččmen-ten acku qqaren-d tidet.

Taɣrast
Leεzib mellaḥ
Aɣ abrid ayeffus.
Asemres n tgemmi.
Anamek n tetrarit.
Awi abrid ayeffus.
Agbur akked isental.
Ṛuḥ g ubrid ayeffus.
Ad ruḥeɣ akin i tagut.
Ṛuḥ deg ubrid ayeffus.
Tudert n Ben Muḥemmed.
Tzemrem ad terǧum kra?
Tzemrem ad tṛajum kra?
Anamek n usefru ilelli.
D acu i d asefru ilelli?
Din-a i tegzem tmiḍt-is.
ladɣa ayen yeɛnan talɣa.
Tifunasin sɛant acciwen.
Ufan anejmuɛ yebda yakan.
Akatay n taggara n Master.
Tom ur d-yettaɣ ara aɣṛum.
Tifunasin sɛant timaẓẓagin.
Cedhaɣ tamurt n yiqbayliyen.
Ɣezzif webrid, wezzil ubrid.
Tagreɣlanit, tirawit, Talɣa.
Tamedyazt taqbaylit tatrart.
Ur d-tettaɣ ara Marie aɣṛum.
Aḥeric wis sin: Asefu ilelli.
Tura ur uɣaleɣ ad amneɣ yiwen!
Ferḥat Mhenni d mmis n umeɣras.
Ɣriɣ ɛecra n yidlisen agur-agi.
Tagrayt, ammud, tiɣbula, amawal
Xedmeɣ-d ticraḍ, snat n tecraḍ.
Yerna aṭas n ubeddel i d-yewwi.
Afyir, tameɣrut, taseddart, akat.
Agezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ.
Yal wa yebɣa ad yezzenz sselεa-s.
Acu i t-yeǧǧan ad yilli d ilelli ?
Armi i d-tewweḍ ɣer tizi n wass-a.
Tesqeṛqiṛ tfunast izan s tseṭṭa-s.
Aɣlif n ulmud unnig d unadi ussnan.
Tafunast tettezzeɛ izan s tseṭṭa-s.
Tesɛa tfunast taseṭṭa d taɣezzfant.
Yal yeqqaṛ d ibawen-iw i yettewwan.
Zemreɣ ad m-slemdeɣ amek ara taruḍ.
Melmi i d-ilul deg tsekla taqbaylit?
Zemreɣ ad ak-slemdeɣ amek ara taruḍ.
Zemreɣ ad m-sḥefḍeɣ amek ara tecnuḍ.
Zemreɣ ad m-slemdeɣ amek ara tecnuḍ.
Tasdawit Akli Muḥend Ulḥağ n Tubiret.
Tulmisin n tmedyazt taqbaylit tartar.
Zemreɣ ad ak-sḥefḍeɣ amek ara tecnuḍ.
Zemreɣ ad ak-slemdeɣ amek ara tecnuḍ.
Sfuglen yemdukal-iw tameɣṛa n umuli-w.
Talalit n tmedyazt taqbaylit tatrart.
Tallit n tensayit d tallit n tetrarit.
Tigduda tazzayrit tamagdayt taɣerfant.
Zemreɣ ad ak-sḥefḍeɣ amek ara tnehṛeḍ.
Zemreɣ ad ak-slemdeɣ amek ara tnehṛeḍ.
Ɣef aya ilaq ad nwali d acu i tatrarit.
Ttekkan yemdukal-iw g tmeɣṛa n umuli-w.
Aman n tala Umalu d ddwa ḥellu i yimuḍan.
Taṣleḍt n talɣa n yisefra n Ben Muḥemmed.
Tura akken d-fɣaɣ seg ttberna deg Ukfadu.
Ur yerri aqerru-s ar wanida yebɣa baba-s.
Zik tayerza tettili-d s tyuga n yizgaren.
Ad ruḥeɣ ad bedleɣ tamurt, ad nadiɣ tafat.
Aɛaned ur iwulem, tikwal d aḥbib n twaɣit.
Teḍra-as am uḥuli, yefkan azuɣer ɣer zdat.
Tulmisin n talɣa n usefru ilelli deg tama.
Ad ninig tuffɣa uberiq, nzad ad neǧǧ amkan.
Anida ara d-gren idrimen n ddewla, tarewla!
Argaz-nni yetɛeğğeb, yal ass syin i zegger.
D acu-tent tulmisin timuta n usefru ilelli?
Ad ruḥeɣ ad rewleɣ i lmut, Ad bedleɣ taswiɛt
Ama deg tsekla taɛrabt neɣ tin n tefaransist.
Yella zik yiwen n urgaz, yetteddu am ugellid.
Zemreɣ ad ak-sḥefḍeɣ yiwet n tɣawsa neɣ snat.
Zemreɣ ad ak-slemdeɣ yiwet n tɣawsa neɣ snat.
D wayen akk icudden ɣer lebni n usefru sumata.
Ddan acḥal deg yiberdan, ulin acḥal d tiɣalin.
Deg ddunit ad d-naf amdiq, anida medden walan.
Din kan lmelḥ akk yefsi, aman deg-s mi ttawin.
Imi d taḍuṭ i iɛebba, wayeḍ idda kan s leɛqel.
Skud yettaẓ ɣer daxel, taɛkemt iɛebba tneqqes.
Ttɛebga n weɣyul tefsusi, tuyat-is d tilmawin.
Yiwen di tikli iɣawel, ishel-as ubrid, yuzzel.
Aɣyul yeddan ɣer zdat, yebɣa ad yexdem rray-is.
Di tikli iḥwağ aḥellel, yewwi lmelḥ ɣef tbarda.
Galɛum i wid d-isellen, mi d-neḥka ayen yellan.
Tecnam akk ɣef zzin-iw, tecnam lḥerma i kesbeɣ.
Tura mi d-llint wallen-iw, yid-wen ad mḥasabeɣ.
Zegren aṭas n yiɣezṛan, suggten tikli ayen din.
Mi ixulef abrid yeğğa-t, di lkaf yewḥel uḍar-is.
Talallit n usefru ilelli deg tmedyazt taqbaylit.
Am akken neɛdel-d aggazen iɣef tebna tamukerrist.
Imezwura-nneɣ mara ten-id-yerr lḥiḍ, ǧǧan-d awal.
Xuylen, dɣa bedden di rrif, ugin ad aẓen iḍaṛṛen.
Yenwa ad izger s laman ,yuzzel, yengez ɣer waman.
Amdakel-is mi d-yettwali, yettu acu ɛebbant tuyat.
Ɛelqeɣ aseggas-a dekkeṛ i tneqlin deg Iɣzeṛ Ḥesna.
Ijemɛ-d ugar n settemya u waḥed uɛecrin n yisefra.
Amaynut id-tewwi tetrarit ur yili ara deg tensayit.
Ameksa yufa agerruj deg iger-nni n Maxluf Uεetman.
Ḥedd ur d-yemmetkti lḥeqq-iw, d lmal i ttuneḥsabeɣ.
Imi tekcem tmedyazt-a ɣer tira ɣef ufus n Hanoteau.
Seg tama n tmeɣrut, tiseddarin, d yifyar d wakaten.
Si kra n wayen ara yexdem, ṛṛay, yelha ma iwzen-it.
Weḥlen deg yiwen n lawan, deg yiwet n tegnit raben.
Aɣyul yettwaxneq, yezder, S ttɛebga iwḥel deg wasif.
Amaynut-a yeslal-d ayen i wumi qqaren asefru ilelli.
Ɣer ɣur-s id-yewwi tikli, yenwa abrid n ṣṣeḥ yufa-t.
Wi icqa anwa-t wi t-ilan, seg wayen id-walan wallen,
Yuzzel-d ɣer ɣur-sen yiwen, ma yella kra ara iɛiwen.
Ihi d acu akk n ubiddel i d-yerzan ɣer wunar-a udyiz.
Akken armi wwḍen s asif, tiqenṭert akken ad tt-zegren.
Ay asmi teǧǧel telkett, mi s-yenna ukured ad kem-aɣeɣ!
Mačči am ass-a am uzekka i yettbeddil wudem n taddart.
Mi akken i d-yenher s uɛekkaz, sin n yeɣyal deg ubrid.
S ttɛebga d win tt-irekben, ur yebni ɣef taḍuṭ yeswan.
S yin d asawen tekcem tmedyazt taqbaylit deg tatrarit.
Bab-is yessuyes ad t-yenher, yegguni-t, yebla-t wurrif.
Isellek-d iman-is, yerwel, yeṭṭef abrid, yezger weḥd-s.
Seg wayen id-neḥka ad nefhem, d akken yal wa di ddunit.
Ur yessaweḍ ara ad yezger, yesselqef, immut di ttnaṣif.
Iḍelli meggleɣ tineqlin-iw, rniɣ rekkleɣ kra n yisegman.
Mulud Mɛemri yefka-d anamek-nniḍen ɣef wawal n tatrarit.
Si tallit tamensayt yettuɣalen armi d lqern wis sbeɛṭac.
Siwlen-d i yilmeẓyen akken ad d-mudden afus di tmecreḍt.
Aḥric wis kraḍ: Taṣleḍt n wammud n yisefra n Ben Muḥemmed.
Ɣef wi yewwin taḍuṭ, yerkeb, ma d wayeḍ zdat-s i t-yenher.
Ilmend n temsirin d tɣuriwin nexdem ɣef tmedyazt taqbaylit.
Yal tamenaḍt n ddunit tesɛa ammud-ines n tsekla s lesnaf-is
Tatrarit d awal yesɛan aṭas n yinumak, d lemɛani yemxalafen.
Tasekla tamaziɣt d tamesbeɣrut s tewsatin-is ladɣa tamedyazt.
Tasekla taqbayli ula d nettat tegber ammud aseklan d alqayan.
Ama seg tama n ugbur, ama deg talɣa yaɛnan lebni usefru atrar.
Anda di tazwara n usefru ibeggen-d tamuɣli i d-as-fkan twalin.
Aḥric seg tmedyaz-a ur yesɛi ara bab-is d ayla n tmetti irkeli.
Tamedyazt taqbaylit tatrart d tin yesnernan tamdyazt tamensayt.
Tettawi-d asnulfu deg ugbur d talɣa ,akken yenna Ǧebur Ɛebdnur.
Ad bennun di leǧwameɛ akken ad dɛun Ṛebbi ur ttaḍnen ara. Alḥif!
Akken ad nessaweḍ ɣer yiswi-nneɣ nebḍa anadi ɣef tlata yeḥricen.
D isastalen igejdanen iɣef ad d-nerr fell-asen deg unadi-a-nneɣ.
Imi yufrar-d deg unnar aseklan ayen i wumi qqaren asefru ilelli.
Nɣan-t iḥerkiyen imi yegguma ad d-yezzene imjuhad di tallit-nni.
Tella d tameṭṭut tamezwarut ara d teḍeqqer Fransa si tmesrifegt.
Tamedyazt d tin yellan d lemri n wayen akk yettidir umdan aqbayli.
Tamedyazt-a tɛedda-d ɣef waṭas n taliyin ,yal talit s wacu tufrar.
Aql-i tedduɣ ad tt-id-ẓreɣ. Ammer ad twaliḍ amek i cedhaɣ udem-is.
D  wayen yettḥulfu,telḥa-d seg tallit ɣer tayeḍ seg tsuta ɣer tayeḍ.
Seg yimezwura i yegren asurif deg usefru ilelli ad naf Ben Muḥemmed.
Sbeḥ meddi d arkaɛ, d asjad. Lemer d tayerza neɣ d tamegra mačči xir?
Iqbayliyen negren mmawin, ass-a ččan-tt Ibeɛtiyen, iɛerbuben inselmen.
D tussna,timsal n ddunit ama d amezruy n tmurt n tmazɣa ladɣa leqbayel.
Tamedyazt taqbaylit sumata tedder am waken tɛedda-d ɣef snat n taliyin.
Amedyaz ur yeṭṭafar ara nḍamat n usefru amensay d utrar deg isefra-nsen.
Tamedyazt tamensayt yettwasnen di taliyin timensayin teqqen ɣer timawit.
Si tama n talɣa ad d-naf aṭas i d-yellan d amaynut,di lebni n usefru atrar.
Tafaska n ufexxaṛ neɣ n talaxt tettili-d di temnaḍt n Mɛatqa di Tizi Wezzu.
Tɛedda-d si tallit ɣer tayeḍ tegla-d s waṭas n tmusniwin yurzen yal taɣult.

Aḥric wis sin ad d-yawwi ɣef unamek n usefru ilelli deg tsekliwin tigraɣlanin

Armi d talit n wass-a anda tedla s lebsa-nniḍen d tamaynut i wumi qqaren tatrarit.
Neɣ ayen iccuden ɣer tulmisin n ugbur ama d isental,asemres n tgemmi ,tagreɣlanit.

Tewwi-d abrid amaynut ama deg wayen iccuden ɣer tulmisin n talɣa neɣ lebni n usefru.
Yal yiwen ɣef acḥal i tt-yebḍa, yal yiwen i ɣer yettara talalit n tmedyazt tatrart .

A-t-an dagi win yugaren Yuna.

A-t-an wayla-k, ddem-it!
A-t-an, ad wen-d-iqqim uxxam-nwen d lxali.
A-t-aya win ara y-isellmen.
A-ten-an ad d-teddun zziyaṛ.
A-ten-an iṛebbiten-nwen i ken-id-issufɣen si tmurt n Maṣer.
A-ten-an la ten-nettwali.
A-ten-an warraw n Bussaɛd: Ḥmidan, Qasi, Muḥdameqṛan akked Muḥdameẓyan.
A-ten-an warraw n Dican: Ɛuṣ akked Aran.
A-ten-an warraw n Luṭan: Ḥuri akked Umam.
A-ten-an warraw n Raɛuwil: Naḥat, Ziraḥ, Cama akked Miza.
A-ten-an warraw n Ṣibɛun: Aya akked Ɛana.
A-ten-an xemsa-nniḍen, rebḥeɣ-ten-id.
A-ten-an ɣur-wen, fkiɣ-awen-ten.

A-tt-an dɣa yelli-s Meɛǧuṭa anda i d-tewweḍ s lmal.
A-tt-an la tessirid takarust.

A-tt-an tarwa n Yeɛqub.

Abbuh a Lmumnin!
Abbuh a lɣaci, nɣant-iyi temsal.
Abbuh a medden, ma drus i as-yeḍran.
Abbuh dayen tewweḍ tyerza s aḥdid.
Abeddel n ccɣel d astaɛfu.
Abeddel n ccɣel, d asteɛfu.
Abeddel n tmuɣli gar yimferǧen.
Abelluḍ d yirden, leɛmeṛ zdin.
Abelɣenǧur d yiwet n tewsit n tbexsisin, lɣella-s d taberkant tmal ɣer tezweɣ.
Aberhuc n tsedda qqaren-as aqlalas.
Aberkan n uqeṛṛu, sḥeq-it, ulac daɛwessu.
Aberkan-nni d ayla-w.
Aberkan-nni inu.
Abernus ɣef tuyat, deg berra ala abeḥri d uskiɛu n wuccanen.
Abernus ɣef tuyat.
Abernus-nni dinna i t-teggar yemma.
Aberrani ad iwexxer.
Aberray d allal swayes ẓẓaden azemmur, yemmug s uẓru.
Aberrez d tixsi d uqelwac.
Aberreḥ s wahruḥu gar kra n yimezdaɣ
Abeɛda imi, ur yelli d uffir.
Abeɣḍi ur iḥemmel agwḍi.
Abeɣḍi ur iḥemmel agḍi.
Abeḥri n lḥif ad yettzad.
Abeṛnus yettwakkes-iyi.
Abeṛṛani ur itett ara seg wayen iqedsen.
Abeṛṛani ur itett ara seg-s.
Abeṛṛeɛqu d gma-s n ujṛad.
Abhim-nni εerqent-as.
Abidun-agi yeqqers.
Ablaḍ iɣummen lbir-nni, d ameqran.
Abrid Welleh ar tessen-it, Ɛmiruc ɣer udran n Luris.
Abrid akken yebɣu yiɣzif, mkul wa ileḥḥu akken i s-yehwa.
Abrid ameqqran.
Abrid ameẓyan.
Abrid ar d ad t-nawi.
Abrid aɣelnaw.
Abrid duga duga.
Abrid gar wallen, berrik i t-ẓerreɣ.
Abrid i medden yella.
Abrid i reglen, ad s-nerreẓ asalu.
Abrid itecceḍ.
Abrid mi tzeglem, fell-aɣ i treffum.
Abrid n Bgayet yehruri.
Abrid n Sbiṭer tesneḍ-t, ma tebɣiḍ ad tḥadreḍ iman-im.
Abrid n Tizi yezzi.
Abrid n baylek i tkerrusin akk.
Abrid n baylek.
Abrid n lɛezz ad t-yawi.
Abrid n timunent, ass-agi yenǧeṛ.
Abrid n uḍar.
Abrid newwi imi nedderɣel.
Abrid yergel s udfel.
Abrid yessan.
Abrid yessawen.
Abrid yessekser.
Abrid ɣezzif, kkrem ad nebdu tikli ma tebɣam ad naweḍ.
Abrid ɣur-m ur yeqrib.
Abrid-a i d-tewwid ad k-issegrireb.
Abrid-a yegdel i tkeryas.
Abrid-a yegdel i yikumya.
Abrid-a yessufuɣ.
Abrid-a yettawi ɣer wurti.
Abrid-a.
Abrid-agi d-yuɣ urgaz-a, ur yessufuɣ ara ɣer liser.
Abrid-agi la yettwaxdamen, amur ixeddem ugezdu n Tizi Uzzu, imuhal-is imeqqranen kfan.
Abrid-im itett.
Abrid-is n umennuɣ tella-d s tẓuri.
Abrid-iw iban-iyi.
Abrid-nni ur yessufuɣ ara.
Abugaṭu ar tura ṛṛay ur t-yeddim, seg akken ur yesɛi akaram ikemlen.
Abuhal inefɛen iman-is.
Abuseqqi mebɛid i yettseqqi.
Abɛaḍ a mmi ad d-yerzu ɣer ɣur-k.
Abɛaḍ neɣ kra yuɣal deg umkan n tfekka-w d wallaɣ-iw.
Abṛaham akked Luṭ mfaraqen Abṛaham yuɣal-d si Maṣer ɣer Nigib, netta akked tmeṭṭut-is d wayen akk yesɛa.
Abṛaham di tmurt n Maṣer iwala iɣli-d laẓ ɣef tmurt.
Abṛaham inna-yas: Aql-i ggulleɣ.
Abṛaham iqqar ɣef tmeṭṭut-is Ṣara: D weltma.
Abṛaham irra-yas: Anɛam!
Abṛaham irra-yas: A Sidi!
Abṛaham irra-yas: Anɛam, a mmi!
Abṛaham iru ɣef Ṣara, iḥzen fell-as.
Abṛaham issufeɣ ṛṛuḥ.
Abṛaham isɛa-d Isḥaq.
Abṛaham itlef, Hagaṛ akked Ismaɛil, Ṣara twala aqcic-nni i d-tesɛa Hagaṛ tamaṣrit i Abṛaham, ittaḍṣa.
Abṛaham izdeɣ di Bir Cibaɛ.
Abṛaham iɛac aṭas di tmurt n Ifilistiyen.
Abṛaham iɛenna ɣer Yillu, dɣa Illu yesseḥla Dda Ḥemmu, tameṭṭut-is akked tqeddacin-is: uɣalent ttarwent.
Abṛaham iṛuḥ, am wakken i s-t-id-inna Umeɣlal.
Abṛaham iẓẓa ṭṭejṛa n umemmay di Bir Cibaɛ, indeh dinna s yisem n Umeɣlal, Il Ɛulam, yeɛni Illu n dayem.
Abṛaham! Yya ɣer da!
Abṛam akked Naḥuṛ zewǧen.
Abṛam illa d ameṛkanti.
Abṛam inna i Luṭ: Xaṭi!

Acki-t!
Acku ad d-temmeslayeḍ seg yal tama.

Acḥal?
Ad d-ffɣen seg-k igelliden.
Ad nesdakklet iɣallen-nneɣ.
Ad agaden.
Ad ak-bruɣ.
Ad ak-d-iban win ɣef i treggleḍ.
Ad ak-d-ifk Rebbi Ccfa!
Ad ak-d-teḍleq mebla tuɣmas.

Anecreḥ ɣuri yezga.
Anect tesɛiḍ n cci, i tesɛiḍ iḥessaden.
Anect-a ad d-yekk sɣur-wen.
Anect-a ttwalin-t d aseɣli i wazal n tirrugza n yigazen.
Anect-a, ur as-idum ara imi tiwaculin n tullas, faqent i wassaɣ i yellan gar-asent.
Anect-agi irkelli, sebba-s d nnif d lḥerma.
Anect-nni yessaki-yi-d seg targit i d-ddreɣ.
Anef ad inin, anef awal yellan ɣef sin ad tarren ɣef xemsin.
Anef ad ḍebbreɣ aqerru-iw.
Anef akka ay amedεus!
Anef i uqjun, ad isseglef!
Anef i wul ad am-yeḥku.
Anef i wul ad yawi iri.

Anef-as ad yenced ayyur.

Anef-as kan i tinna.
Anef-as kan... yessewway lexrif s yimi.

Aneft-asen!
Aneggaru ad yemdel tawwurt n ubalku.
Aneggaru-a s yis-s i d-yufrar deg warraz n Asya Ǧebbar n wungal ifazzen.
Aneggaru-nni d mmi-s n wletma-s.
Aneggaru-nni iwumi mliɣ tikti-iw, iɣill-iyi mxelleɣ.
Anegmu n unagraw n tuddsa n tmetti taqbaylit taqburt.
Anejmuε i d-yellan deg waggur n yebrir ɣur i tessawel tddukkla n yimawlan n tnezduɣin n Salḥi.
Anelmad ad yili am ccix-is, beṛka-t.
Anelmad-a tikwal yettarra iman-is yuḍen.
Anemhal iḥemmel ayen xeddmeɣ yezga yennecraḥ.
Aneqneq n tefremliyin d lqablat.
Anez-iyi, ad k-anzeɣ.
Aneǧǧaṛ ur nesɛi taṛbut!
Aneɣlaf amezwaru ijmeɛ-d ineɣlafen n lḥukuma-s s leɛjel.
Aneɣlaf n tdamsa akked win n tmerrit mlalen iwakken ad snarnin tamerrit di tmurt.
Aneɣlaf n usegmi, yerra-d i usiwel-nsen s uɣiwel.
Aneɣlaf n yemjuhad yeḍleb deg iɛeggalen n tegrawla ad ṛuḥen ad votin ɣef Butefliqa.
Aneɣlaf ur yuklal amkan-is s tidet.
Aneɣmas d win id-yettḥawacen isallen sya d sya.
Aneɣmas-nni d ameɣnas.
Aneḥḍur n waṭas n twaculin tiqbayliyin i izedɣen deg temdint-a.

Annar-a, yesɛan azal meqqren deg unegmu deg ugezdu n Tizi Uzzu.
Annaɣ a Sidi Ṛebbi, err-iyi ɣer taddart.
Annaɣ a yelli, i yeḍran yid-m.
Annaɣ a yemma ad mmteɣ.
Annaɣ a Ṛebbi!
Annaɣ i yeḍran d warraw-iw, annaɣ i yexdem ufus-iw.
Annaɣ lemmer cbiɣ tizya-w.
Annaɣ txedɛem taqbaylit ay iḍemmaɛen!
Annect-a ihi, s wudem ibanen, icudd ɣer yidles n tmetti, n ugdud, d tɣerma s timmad.
Annect-a ur yelli d ayla-k.
Annect-a yakk, akken ur d-ttuɣalen ara yineḍruyen yellan deg yiseggasen-a yezrin, d wayen yeɛnan asuffeɣ n yisental.
Annect-a, yelha i tmeẓriwt, yelha i tmesliwt daɣ, acku meqqer, yeɛmer.
Annect-agi, ad ibeggen belli tutlayt d tasudut tanmettit, ur yezmir ara yiwen umdan weḥd-s ad tt-ibeddel.
Annect-agi, yella-d s lemɛawna gar Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Ugezdu d yiselwayen n tɣiwanin d yimezdaɣ-nneɣ diɣen.

Apapas yeččur d lecɣal.
Apidyatr d amejjay n igʷerdan.
Apidyatṛ d amejjay yettdawin arrac.
Apsikyatr d amejjay n idarwicen.
Apulaṛ yezmer ad yili d asaru neɣ d ungal.
Aqader n yilugan n tenhert ɣas ini-d ulac-it.
Aqaruy-iw, seg zik, yeččur d tikta n tnemḍar.
Aqbayli efk-as isem aqbayli.
Aqbayli i yefkan tudert-is i taɣuct taqbaylit.
Aqbayli irfed aqerru-s.
Aqbayli ma ixuṣṣ-it udrar, azzayri kan ara s-semmin.
Aqbayli n tidet d win iḥemmlen tutlayt-is.
Aqbayli yettwet ɣer tkatut, teḍṛa-as am win ihelken alzaymer.
Aqcic am uwri, ma ur iddiz, ur iberren.
Aqcic ittimɣur ddaw n leɛnaya n Yillu.
Aqcic yella yeṛwa.
Aqcic yewhem!
Aqcic yewhem.
Aqcic-a ur tban ara yakk fell-as tugdi.
Aqcic-a yuḍen anezyuf.
Aqcic-a, yella iḥemmel medden aṭaṣ, imi yettwassen s terbiyya d teḥdeq-is, yettqadaṛ ameqqṛan d umectuḥ.
Aqcic-agi d lmesk.
Aqcic-nni d imciṭṭen.
Aqcic-nni yekkat afus aḍar.

Arraw n Bariɛa: Ḥibir akked Malkiyil.

Aselkim-iw yeḥwaǧ iseɣẓanen atraren.

Aselway n Unejmuɛ i yidles akked tugdut yessawel-d i tikli di lezzayer tamanaɣt.
Aselway n tegduda ibeddel tamendawt iwakken ad yeḥkem ugar.
Aselway n tigduda yessawel-d s wudem unṣib ɣer tefranin.
Aselway n ubarlaman yefka awal i terbaɛt n isenslmen.
Aselway n unabaḍ Mass Ferhat Mehenni.

Asemmiḍ la deg-s yettazu.
Asemmiḍ ur k-id-yeṣṣawaḍ.
Asemmiḍ, agris, lehwa terna tekkat fell-i.
Asemmiḍ, leɛra, cceṛ.
Asemsawi i yellan gar urgaz n tmeṭṭut yefka-t-id ugama.
Asemt-d ɣer da akken ma tellamt.
Asenduq n cchada, iɛmuden-is akked uɣummu n usuref.
Asenfar i uheggi n yisura n teqbaylit.
Asenfar wis sin, d abrid ameqqran ara yeqqnen gar temdint n Tizi Uzzu ɣar ubrid Asammar-Amalu.
Asensi-nni tt-yewwin ɣer uxxam.
Asensu yelhan d win yebnan ɣef yiri n yilel.
Asentel iɣef tettezzi tmedyezt-iw d tilelli n umeslay.
Asentel iɣef uran fell-as aṭas yimedyazen d tayri.
Asentel n tuget n yisefra-inu itezzi ɣef tnagmit tamagant.

Avyulunsal meqqer, zur ṣṣut-is.
Aw!
Awackan i d-yegga ufus-im, mačči aweckan i d-tegga tnuḍt-im.
Awadem-iḍen deg "Akal d idammen", d yiwet n tṛumit qqaren-as Marie.
Awah! Ayɣer d nekk i yefren?
Awah a yiger-iw, ad tifeḍ iger n medden!
Awah awah a tuğğal yeǧǧlen.
Awah, diri lexdeɛ.
Awah, ilaq-ak ad teldiḍ amiḍan-iḍen.
Awah, wayi axir.
Awal Zzayer  yekka-d seg wawal-nniḍen:  Tiziri.
Awal ajdid iteqqes.
Awal am talast n wakal.
Awal am tamment, lhedṛa am tummeṭ.
Awal am terṣaṣt, mi iffeɣ ur d-ittuɣal.
Awal am terṣṣaṣt.
Awal aneggaru iddem-it waḍu.
Awal d aciri mačči d asmiri.
Awal d amezwaru, aneggaru iwwi-t waḍu.
Awal d aḥerfi.
Awal d tenfalit d yizen d umennuɣ ɣef yizerfan n tmeṭṭut.
Awal i d-tefkiḍ, ɣur-s azal d ameqqran.
Awal isefsay uzzal.
Awal ittawi-d wayeḍ.
Awal ma wezzil tefra, ma ɣezzif ad d-yarew kra.
Awal ma wezzil yefra ma ɣezzif ad d-yawi kra.
Awal ma wezzil yefra, ma ɣezzif ad d-yernu kra.
Awal ma wezzil yefra, ma ɣezzif ad d-yini kra.
Awal ma yeffeɣ, ula wi ad t-i-d yerren.
Awal ma yexṣer-d, dɣa ad tɛeddiḍ ɣer lfinga.
Awal n taggara i tdiwennit-agi.
Awal n taggara swayes ara nessali tadiwennit-a.
Awal n tsummta, d win i ifeṛṛqen.
Awal n Ṛebbi ur ittuneqḍaɛ.
Awal s uqerru, tbeɛ-it ar d ikfu.
Awal s wayes i ɣ-ssumnen.
Awal sin teḍṛa-d tɣawsa i ɣef ur bnin ara.
Awal uffir?
Awal ur ilaq.
Awal ur t-id-terni, teffeɣ s zɛaf.
Awal ur t-id-yuli, yebra i wallen-is, yerra d akessar.
Awal ur yeffiɣ imi-m.
Awal yeqsed win yeɛna, tarṣaṣt teqsed win tenɣa.
Awal yeswan alef, sexseṛeɣ-t deg umṣeṛṛef.
Awal yeḥwağ asefru.
Awal yuwi-t-id ɣef udlis yura.
Awal yuɣal d asefru.
Awal ɣef tdamsa.
Awal ɣef tesnilest timserwest.

Awal ɣef usmeskel amutlay.
Awal ɣef yedles d tutlayt.

Awal, ssu-yas di tidet, rrnu-yas.
Awal-ik ad yili: Ih.
Awal-ik aneggaru?
Awal-ik d ccfa yettḍur.
Awal-ik n taggara.
Awal-im d awal, yenta deg ul, yeggugem yimi.
Awal-im d lwiz, ṣṣut-im d abeḥri n tefsut.
Awal-im melleḥ.
Awal-is aneggaru deg ttɛa u ɛcrin Yunyu alef u ttɛemya u tniyen u ttɛin.
Awal-is d asxertem ur nettwafham.
Awal-is sennin maca ixf-is d ajeǧǧig.
Awal-is ur yettεeddi.
Awal-is ḥusseɣ-as s telqey, yeɣza deg ul-iw.

Awal-nni, la yeqqaz deg-i irennu.
Awalen yellan gar tuccar mačči d urkiden.
Awalen, awalen...
Awalen-a d ineggura-ines deg Uxxam n yidles n temdint n Ɛennaba.

Awer d am teǧǧuǧeg!

Awit-aɣ yid-wen.

Awit-d yid-wen imru i ukayad-nwen, ttxil-wen.
Awit-iyi yid-wen.

Ax a yelli els imeqyasen-a.

Ax!

Ax, iqqaṛ-it, meɛna ittɛuccuṛ.
Axaṭer Ameɣlal ikkes dderya i tlawin meṛṛa n twacult n Dda Ḥemmu ɣef ddemma n Ṣara, tameṭṭut n Abṛaham.
Axaṭer Ameɣlal iwala-d i lḥif-im.
Axaṭer Ibeṛquqen d iqeddacen-iw.
Axaṭer Illu iburek-iyi aṭas, ur yi-ixuṣṣ wacemma.
Axaṭer Illu yexdem amdan ɣef ṣṣifa-s.
Axaṭer Si Salaḥ ittwaɛzel d imqeddes i Yillu-is.
Axaṭer ad k-rreɣ d ababat n waṭas n yigduden.
Axaṭer ad t-rreɣ d lǧens ameqran.
Axaṭer akka i yi-d-ittunefk lameṛ.
Axaṭer akken i tettḥasabem ara tettuḥasbem.
Axaṭer anda yella ugerruj-ik, dinna i yella wul-ik.
Axaṭer annect-nni n wussan i yelaqen i uɛeṭṭer n lmegget.
Axaṭer aql-ak am Ferɛun.
Axaṭer axeddam yuklal lqut-is.
Axaṭer d aqeddac-ik, i yeḍemnen baba ɣef uqcic-agi.
Axaṭer d aseggas n ṣṣab, ad wen-yili d imqeddes.
Axaṭer d ayen iqedsen nezzeh.
Axaṭer d iqeddacen-iw i d-ssufɣeɣ si tmurt n Maṣer.
Axaṭer d leḥsab n lɣellat i k-d-izzenz.
Axaṭer ddnub n Imuriyen mazal ur iwwiḍ ara ɣer lḥedd-is.
Axaṭer deg unagraw n tutlayin, tufa-d iman-is teṭṭef tama n wadda.
Axaṭer di setta n wussan, Ameɣlal ixleq-d igenwan, lqaɛa, lebḥuṛ akked wayen meṛṛa i ten-iɛemṛen.
Axaṭer dinna i s-d-iḍher Yillu, mi akken yerwel ɣef gma-s.
Axaṭer inna-d: Nekk, d Mmi-s n Yillu.
Axaṭer iɣli-d laẓ di tmurt n Kanɛan.
Axaṭer lliɣ lluẓeɣ, tefkam-iyi ččiɣ.
Axaṭer lliɣ lluẓeɣ, ur yi-tefkim ara ad ččeɣ.
Axaṭer lɣaci ḥesben-t d nnbi.
Axaṭer mi ara ṛuḥent ad swent, ulli-nni sseḍfarent.
Axaṭer nedmeɣ imi i ten-id-xedmeɣ.
Axaṭer nnuɣen yid-s.
Axaṭer s ided n lmefṣel n taɣma i yettwet Si Mḥemmed.
Axaṭer seg urrif-nni i rfan, nɣan irgazen;
Axaṭer tettwadehnem s zzit timqeddest n Umeɣlal.
Axaṭer tikli n yemdanen meṛṛa tefsed di ddunit.
Axaṭer tudert n mkul lxelq deg idammen i tella.
Axaṭer tudert n mkul lxelq, d idammen-nni yellan deg-s.
Axaṭer tugwad dɣa inna-yas: Nniɣ-am teḍṣiḍ!
Axaṭer ul n ugdud-agi yeqqur!
Axaṭer ur tt-fkiɣ ara i mmi Cila, ad izweǧ yid-s.
Axaṭer ur tt-iɛqil ara belli d tislit-is.
Axaṭer walaɣ ayen akk i k-ixdem Laban.
Axaṭer wid yebɣan ad ddmen leɛmeṛ n uqcic, mmuten.
Axaṭer win yebɣan ad isellek taṛwiḥt-is ad tt-isṛuḥ.
Axaṭer zewǧen akk yid-s.
Axaṭer ɣef ddemma n wayen akken i xedmen i ten-keṛheɣ.
Axaṭer ɣef ddemma n yemdanen, ddunit teččuṛ d lbaṭel.
Axaṭer, kečč d aɣebbaṛ, ad tuɣaleḍ alamma d aɣebbaṛ.
Axaṭer, kra n win yessuturen ittaṭṭaf-d.
Axaṭer, s Isḥaq ara tesɛuḍ tarwa ara irefden isem-ik.
Axaṭer, ɣur-i, d kečč i walaɣ d aḥeqqi di lǧil-agi.

Axxam ajdid issewḥac.
Axxam akk gnen.
Axxam akk yerɣa.
Axxam ara tkecmeḍ, am yiṭij n ṣṣbeḥ.
Axxam bla tameṭṭut am lebḥer bla lḥut.
Axxam bla tameṭṭut am ujdar n lluḥ.
Axxam bla tameṭṭut am useggas bla tafsut.

Axxam bla tamɣart am yiger bla tadekkart.
Axxam bu iselqam, izga innelqam.
Axxam d axxam-nneɣ iqjan la seglafen fell-aneɣ.
Axxam d axxam-nneɣ, iqjan la seglafen fell-aneɣ.
Axxam d leɛyub yeččur, iɛeẓẓugen, iderɣalen.
Axxam d tamda, at Ṛebbi d tiregwa.
Axxam deg i yezdeɣ Ṛebbi.
Axxam i t-ibennun d tayri d lebɣi.
Axxam iḍyeq, ul iwseɛ.
Axxam iṣeḥḥan akked uxxam yehtutan.

Axxam n leḥwaṣ, d axxam n lexṣaṣ.
