Ay Aqbayli ur ttakk ara lwi, ur ɣeffel ara, aki.
Ay Aqbayli yettaǧǧan gma-s yeɣli.
Ay At yiɣil n At Ɛissi.
Ay abeckiḍ bu snesla, mi ara iɛelleq di tesga.
Ay aberwaq, lḥal iḍaq.
Ay abrid i d aɣ-icfan.
Ay abrid ttun medden.
Ay abuhal!
Ay abuneqqar: kečč ur d-qqar, nekkni ur d-neqqar!
Ay administratif teǧǧel telkett yenaya-s ukured akem aɣeɣ.
Ay adrar err-d awal!
Ay adrar gar idurar, a wi yeccfan ɣef sser.
Ay adrar n at Yiraten, a win ɛlayen ɣlayen.
Ay adɣaɣ ad ak-ḥkuɣ.
Ay afenǧal n lqahwa, a win i d-yettaldayen allen.
Ay afrux ɣef ṭṭaq bedd-as.
Ay afus yecban tiwzet.
Ay afṛux εjel εelli.
Ay agellid ay aḥnin.
Ay aggur lemmer ad tt-teẓṛeḍ.
Ay agu i d-yewwi waḍu.
Ay ahṛuḥu, ay d-ittṣaren ass-a.
Ay ajebbar a lewli.
Ay ajeǧǧig n uzaɣar.
Ay akal n lejdud-iw, win i d-ifkan irgazen.
Ay akken i ktaleɣ ur telhi.
Ay akken i tecbeḥ tjeǧǧigt-a!
Ay akken nebɣu nɣenni, nessefruy nettmenni, zik d zik, tura d tura.
Ay aman senset times, times tugi ad tečč aɛekkaz, aɛekkaz yugi ad iwwet Tehriruc.
Ay amaɣbun-iw ah.
Ay amcum deg-neɣ yeffɣen.
Ay amehtuf!
Ay amesbaṭli iṛuḥen.
Ay ameɣbun-iw ah.
Ay ameɣcuc, i k-isbezgen ad ɣ-iṛuc.
Ay amjahed serǧ i uɛudiw, timlilit s Aqbu.
Ay ammer ad ḥluɣ.
Ay amsebrid s at Yanni.
Ay amuḍin ma ad teččeḍ.
Ay anda tebɣuḍ tawḍeḍ.
Ay aneznaz yekkaten, nekk yufa-yi-d di berra.
Ay aqcic wilan-k?
Ay aqermud n tala, yelli-s n familya.
Ay aqlalas ssbeɛ bu tissas.
Ay argaz, a taɣaṭ!
Ay argaz, ḥemmel tameṭṭut-ik.
Ay arrac n tmurt, ayɣer?
Ay asenduq n teslit, awi-d tiwiztin.
Ay asmi ffudeɣ ur swiɣ.
Ay asmi iččiɣ baba!
Ay asmi nbedd am yiwen.
Ay asmi rran uccen d imḍebber!
Ay ass fell-i yefran.
Ay ass mi d-turew tyaẓiḍt aẓru, tṛebbat yuɣal d ablaḍ!
Ay ass mi la ttnadiɣ i ṭṭlam.
Ay ass mi terɛed ur tewwit, ɛamayen ur d-teɣli tiqit.
Ay at Umalek, welleh ar ulamek.
Ay at ccemla.
Ay at laɛraḍ n Rebbi!
Ay at lebḥur, wiss d anwa i aɣ-yeggan leɣṛuṛ.
Ay at leɛraḍ! Amnet ma ad tamnem.
Ay at llebsa n leḥrir.
Ay at lḥif xas cfut.
Ay at sin wudmawen!
Ay at tmurt-iw, erret-iyi-d azref-iw.
Ay at wurar.
Ay atma a wi i d awen-yemlan.
Ay atma ffudeɣ a wi yeswan si tala yebna Uṛumi.
Ay atma ṣubbeɣ d wasif, ufiɣ lferk ijeḥmam.
Ay atmaten zedɣeɣ axxam ur ksibeɣ.
Ay awal iwzil tura.
Ay awḥid wayeḍ ur yelli.
Ay axalaf ijenjar.
Ay axelxal uḍbiɛ n rryal.
Ay axxam-iw yexlan!
Ay ayetma a wi ur neḥdir, i wass n ṭṭrad n yiḥerqan.
Ay ayetma a wi ur nḥir, i wass n ṭṭrad tumlilin.
Ay aytma! Ur neḥḍir, i wass n ṭrad n yiḥerqan.
Ay azger sew aman, aman ugin ad sensen times, times tugi ad tečč aɛekkaz.
Ay azger!
Ay aɛekkaz wwet Tehriruc! Yugi ad yečč imensi, ma d imensi semmeḍ.
Ay aɛessas n uxxam.
Ay aɛǧar n ccac.
Ay aɣanim n uẓeṭṭa.
Ay aɣyul!
Ay aɣṛib-iw, uɣal-d.
Ay aεziz melmi ara k-ẓreɣ.
Ay aḍaṛ jbu, a tiṭ cfu!
Ay aḥbib n tegrawla, ddu-d yid-i.
Ay aḥlili, argaz ur yelli.
Ay aḥnin sufeɣ-aɣ ɣer lber.
Ay bɣiɣ deg wurar-a.
Ay d-mmugreɣ d iman-iw.
Ay gar-ak d lǧennet, a yamẓallu!
Ay gar-ak d lḥuṛat-is!
Ay ggummaɣ ad ten-mḥuɣ.
Ay hujṛeɣ rewleɣ.
Ay ibekki!
Ay iddew!
Ay iderɣalen!
Ay imawlan εzizen.
Ay imedyazen.
Ay imehbal yedreɣlen!
Ay imeksawen.
Ay imelqaḍen.
Ay imsaḍ!
Ay imɣi n ṣṣaba.
Ay imḍebbren iderɣalen!
Ay ineɣ zman, d asfel-is.
Ay isli ay amekyus.
Ay iwiziwen.
Ay ixef-iw rfed asefru.
Ay izem anda teddiḍ.
Ay izem anda telliḍ.
Ay iɛessasen n taddart, rnu-iyi-d winna.
Ay iṭij rujaɣ, ad d-teffleḍ tuyseḍ.
Ay iṭij ṛğu ur ɣelli.
Ay iṭṭij ḥader ad teɣliḍ.
Ay mennaɣ ur d iyi-d-yettṣaḥ.
Ay neẓra, mazal ad nẓer!
Ay nudaɣ deg imeslayen, acḥal ɛawdeɣ d asefru!
Ay teferneḍ deg yiɛeqqayen, wid kan imaɛnen.
Ay tenniḍ d way m-nniɣ.
Ay tent-ijemεen d lbeṛṛani.
Ay terriḍ ar daxel a yul!
Ay teḥzen tmeddit-nni mi tt-nerra deg ubrid!
Ay tugadem ad d-temlilem.
Ay tṛemleḍ a lqaɛa!
Ay uccen, akken newwi meṛṛa imεerḍen ara ak-nawi.
Ay uccen, ɛass taɣaḍt!
Ay udem n baɛbaɛ!
Ay udem n ikerri!
Ay udem n izirdi!
Ay udem n taɣaṭ!
Ay udem n tfekrunt!
Ay udem n tixsi!
Ay udem n tqejjunt!
Ay udem n ufekrun!
Ay udem n uqelwac!
Ay udem n uzger!
Ay udem n uḥuli!
Ay udem uqejjun!
Ay ugiɣ-ten bɣan-iyi.
Ay uḥric fhem ḥesses.
Ay ul ru, ad ruɣ fell-ak!
Ay ul yebḍan ɣef sin!
Ay ul-iw nehhuɣ kul ass.
Ay ul-iw yebɣan tigi.
Ay ul-iw yettxemmimen.
Ay ungif!
Ay ur rriɣ aḍar, ayen ibɣun iṣar, imi d leqbayel.
Ay urar n wass-a, d irgazen lɛali i d-yusan.
Ay urar n wass-a.
Ay urweɣ, qqimeɣ-d weḥd-i!
Ay uzyin serǧ i uɛudiw, zwir-d ay itbir.
Ay uzyin, ḥader iman-ik!
Ay yeḍran d wayen ara yeḍrun
Ay ččiɣ deg yir amɛic.
Ay ɛemṛent temsal agraw.
Ay ḥemmleɣ tibuɣarin n yemma.
Ay ḥkan d way nnan, imɣaṛen n zzman!
Ay ẓriɣ weddreɣ temẓi-w.
Ay-ṭfen ma fɣeɣ-d ɣef teqbaylit-iw.
Aya d ayen i d-isbeyyinen belli d amelsi i yella.
Aya d ayen ur qebbleɣ ad yili!
Aya d ttbut ɣef tmelsa-s.
Aya giɣ-t.
Aya i kemm.
Aya i kečč.
Aya imi anda tnuḥ tḥanut neɣ d taneččit, ad tent-yaf umuḍin medlent lawan n tzeggant n wass.
Aya issebgan-d d akken tettaẓ tira.
Aya ixreb tudert-iw.
Aya nesɛa-t d ccetla.
Aya neẓra-t si zik.
Aya ur d-iḍerru s lqerb.
Aya yeqqim d lbaḍna gar nettat d xwalti-s.
Aya yettcemmit mliḥ aḍris.
Aya yezmer ad d-yeḍru i win yellan d ccaṭer.
Aya, ad aɣ-yessiweḍ ad d-nini: Ɣas aṭas i ibeddlen deg tmetti-nneɣ, maca mazal abrid ɣezzif aṭas.
Ayagi ad d-iqqim i tarwa-nsen d asaḍuf, i lebda.
Ayagi ad d-iqqim i wat n Ṣṣumam d asaḍuf i lebda.
Ayagi ad wen-d-iqqim d lqanun i lebda.
Ayagi ad yessifsus taɛkkemt n uɣbel n waman n tissit.
Ayagi akk iḍra-d iwakken ad iffeɣ wayen uran lenbiya.
Ayagi ala di tnafa.
Ayagi d asebɣes i yi-d-yerna.
Ayagi d asfel n uḥussu n ddnub.
Ayagi d ayen i yeɛeǧben i Ferɛun akked iqeddacen-is.
Ayagi d ayen iwumi teḥwaǧ teqbaylit nezzeh.
Ayagi d ayen yesserfan Kayin, dɣa yexseṛ wudem-is.
Ayagi d leɛqed ara ḥerzen wat Igawawen i lebda.
Ayagi d lwajeb fell-aneɣ.
Ayagi d lweɛda.
Ayagi d tidet!
Ayagi meṛṛa, d beddu n leɛtab.
Ayagi meṛṛa, inna-t-id Yasuɛ i lɣaci s temɛayin.
Ayagi xedmeɣ-t s wul yeṣfan, ur ḍlimeɣ ara!
Ayagi yakk d asirem.
Ayagi yeffeɣ ɣef warrac, imi εyan mliḥ seg wahil yeččuṛen.
Ayagi yegla-d s wugur-nniḍen n lexṣaṣ n yimukan n lembat n medden.
Ayagi, i wakken ad asen-fken afus n tallelt i yinelmaden n uswir wis semmus.
Ayakka tzeyneḍ a Ddayxa, tgiḍ amzun d taɛelǧet!
Ayan akk ara neɛteb ad yili i tutlayt taqbaylit.
Ayay!
Ayaziḍ idden i yixf-is.
Ayaziḍ ičča afalku.
Ayaziḍ yeskuɛu.
Ayaziḍ yeɣɣar ṣṣbeḥ.
Aydi aṭarus ittsaɛaf aseyyad ɣer ssyada.
Aydi yesseglaf ma yuggad.
Aydi, iḥemmel win i t-ixenqen.
Ayefki n tsedda di tyeṭṭit n mmi-s.
Ayen
Ayen a syadi lɛulam, tawim abrid mi t-tessnem.
Ayen akk ara d-ifk, ad wen-yili d lqut.
Ayen akk ara nexdem ad yili i teqbaylit.
Ayen akk ara tedεum ad yettwaqbel
Ayen akk ara teqqim texla, ad teṛtiḥ.
Ayen akk ara tt-innalen ad yuɣal d imqeddes.
Ayen akk ara yekk wass netta ad tafeḍ yettẓala neɣ ad yeṭṭef adlis n leqran gar yifasen.
Ayen akk ara yekk ɣur-s, ad yili d axeddam n useggas.
Ayen akk i d am-n-uriɣ efk-as azal i yuklal.
Ayen akk i d am-nniɣ leqqem-it aru-t d ungal.
Ayen akk i d-am-nniɣ yella deg umezruy yakkan.
Ayen akk i d-nniɣ n d tidet.
Ayen akk i iyi-d-tenniḍ ad yaweḍ ɣer yemma, kkes aɣilif.
Ayen akk i yesɛa n ddwa temmeɣ tečča-t.
Ayen akk ideg ara teṭṭeṣ mi ara tili s tarda, ad inǧes.
Ayen akk iɣef ara teqqim, ad inǧes.
Ayen akk iɣef ara yeqqim ad inǧes.
Ayen akk tesɛedda fell-i.
Ayen akk ttmenniɣ yerẓag deg tegnit-nni.
Ayen akk yellan d tassemt d ayla n Umeɣlal.
Ayen akk yellan di ddunit ad immet.
Ayen akk yerzan tudert n tmetti, ad t-tafeḍ deg wass n ssuq.
Ayen akk, ar ad ak-iniɣ.
Ayen akka i d-teqqareḍ merra εelmeɣ yess.
Ayen akka i tettwaliḍ meṛṛa, d ayla-w.
Ayen akka i txedmeḍ deg-i, ur ilaq ara.
Ayen akka i yi-iruḥ yiḍes?
Ayen akken i d-nnan, iɛǧeb i Ḥamur akked mmi-s Caxim.
Ayen akken i s-ḥeṛmen wussan.
Ayen akken yeswa n ccrab, yerra-t-id.
Ayen akken yexdem, d ayen ur iqebbel leɛqel.
Ayen akken yeḍran yeḍra.
Ayen akkit tettugadem, ataya deg aqerru-iw.
Ayen ara d-iqqimen ass wis tlata, ad yerɣ di tmes.
Ayen ara d-iqqimen, ǧǧet-tt i uzekka.
Ayen ara d-tessutrem deg-i, ad wen-t-fkeɣ.
Ayen ara theggi i wussan n urgigi.
Ayen ara yeqqim ɣer ddel, imi d dunnit meqqret.
Ayen ay ul-iw yezdeɣ-ik lxiq.
Ayen d-icudden γer twuri taḍeblant.
Ayen d-ifka igenni, tezmer-as lqaɛa.
Ayen d-ifka waxux, ičča-t ujaxux.
Ayen d-ikkan seg usaɣuṛ d abaɣuṛ.
Ayen d-ittasen s tmara, ur ittdum ara.
Ayen i as-ternam terẓeg?
Ayen i as-yernan ccbaḥa d tirza n twaculin i itebɛen taceqquft-nneɣ s wazal.
Ayen i aɣ-d-ijemɛen ass-a, d tasalalt n tezrawt n turagt.
Ayen i aɣ-yettraǧun ad t-nbeddel, yugar i d-ḥellant tid i aɣ-d-yezwaren.
Ayen i d ak-mennaɣ.
Ayen i d-ifka wass, yečča-t yiḍ.
Ayen i d-ittaken tabɣest.
Ayen i d-ixeddmen kra n temsirin ɣef Tfizikt taɣisant.
Ayen i d-iɛeddan deg uqerruy-iw ad t-aruɣ.
Ayen i d-nreṭṭel yugar ayen i nettaɣ.
Ayen i d-tenniḍ akk meqbul.
Ayen i d-yernan sser i tceqquft-a, d isefra-nni i d-tettawi.
Ayen i iruḥen ur d-yettuɣal.
Ayen i k-iggunin, zwir deg-s!
Ayen i k-ixḍan, xḍu-as.
Ayen i k-yexḍan, yexḍa-k.
Ayen i tebɣa ur as-d-iṣaḥ ara, anagar lweḥc n tudert.
Ayen i tesɛiḍ, eǧǧ-it i yiman-ik.
Ayen i tgiḍ axxam?
Ayen i tt-yuɣen, mačči d ayen i ḥekkun medden.
Ayen i txedmeḍ ad t-tafeḍ.
Ayen i tzerεem ad t-tmegrem.
Ayen i wen-qqareɣ di ṭṭlam, init-tt di tafat.
Ayen i wen-qqareɣ s ameẓẓuɣ, berrḥet-tt ɣef lesqaf.
Ayen i y-ittrajun, ɛaceɣ-t yakan.
Ayen i yi-ifuten iɛedda.
Ayen i yi-teǧǧiḍ.
Ayen i yi-ḥejben fell-am.
Ayen i ɣef temsefham tejmaɛt nekk qebleɣ-t
Ayen i ɣef yemmeslay akk, yessen-as.
Ayen icerken, am tlaba iterken.
Ayen icudden ɣer wansayen n Leqbayel.
Ayen idergen i tiṭ, idreg i wul.
Ayen iflen i tizi, ur d-itezzi.
Ayen ifuten ifut, wid iɛeddan yeǧǧa-ten zzman.
Ayen illan di tasilt, ad t-id issali iflu.
Ayen irsen ɣef tzeqqa, tettawi-t tgerfa.
Ayen isseblaɛ lebḥeṛ, ay sbelɛeɣ.
Ayen ittaran asemmiḍ, ittara iṭij.
Ayen ittwaksen i tezdemt, yifsus.
Ayen iwumi cfiɣ nekk d wayen iɣef i d-ḥekkun yimenza-nneɣ.
Ayen ixdem umger di texsayt.
Ayen izeynen leɛmeṛ yeṛxis.
Ayen iɛeddan ur zmireɣ ara ad am-t-tbeddleɣ
Ayen merra i riɣ msel-it err-it d inzan.
Ayen nemmeslay akk ɣef umdan drus.
Ayen nettqellib, tečča-t tmeqbeṛt.
Ayen nniḍen d ccɣel-nneɣ.
Ayen nɣan yisɣanen deg yimdanen yugar wayen yenɣa ddexxan.
Ayen ssaramaɣ, d wayen i yi-iceɣben.
Ayen tebɣiḍ iqḍa, ayen tugadeḍ ixḍa!
Ayen tebɣiḍ tefkeḍ-as, ad inazeɛ.
Ayen tebɣiḍ yella.
Ayen tebɣu telsa-t ilaq ad tt-qadreɣ.
Ayen tebɣum tinim-t-id, ma d nekk ṭṭfeɣ deg wawal i fkiɣ.
Ayen tebɣuḍ tekkeḍ ay iḍ, d ulaqrar ad yali wass.
Ayen tebɣuḍ tiɣzifeḍ ay iḍ, d ulaqrar ad yali wass.
Ayen tesliḍ ur yelli ara deg-s!
Ayen tettbibbi tmeṭṭut tugar adrar.
Ayen texdem ass-nni yessemɣer-itt deg tiṭ-iw.
Ayen texdem deg yal amkan.
Ayen teɣriḍ deg yedlisen d tidet yella.
Ayen teṛwiḍ, ad t-tectiqeḍ.
Ayen tufiḍ i nekK, ddem-it.
Ayen tugadeḍ, ad yes-s temmteḍ.
Ayen tuḥwaǧeḍ steqsi-d ḥaca aseɣti.
Ayen txedmeḍ ad t-tafeḍ.
Ayen txedmeḍ, ad t-tafeḍ.
Ayen ur k-nenɣa, d lǧehd ara k-d-yernu.
Ayen ur nelli deg ufus-ik, ulayɣer ma tesḥassfeḍ fell-as.
Ayen ur nfukk armi t-terra tillut Izis ɣer ṣṣifa-s tanaṣlit n wemdan.
Ayen ur tessineḍ yezmer ad k-iḍurr.
Ayen walan yimdanen deg temsikent i yekfan ass n sḍis deg yulyu-a, di Oxford, tamurt n Tgelda Yedduklen.
Ayen xeddmen d nekkni i t-yettxellisen.
Ayen yakk i d-nniɣ, ɣur-s assaɣ akked tmetti.
Ayen yebɣu niwleɣ-t-id yettcekkir-it-id.
Ayen yebɣu yenna-t-id, ur t-ttamen ara.
Ayen yellan deffir n turart-a, d ayen i d-yettakken asɣenter n wawal d umawal.
Ayen yellan eǧǧ-it deg ul-ik.
Ayen yellan fell-as ixdem-it.
Ayen yellan yettas-d s usdukel n yiɣallen.
Ayen yemger iḍelli, ass-a seg wallaɣ yenser.
Ayen yerzan awrat d wangal n twacult.
Ayen yerzan yakan tutlayt d uselmed-is, d wayen yerzan idles akk icudden ɣur-s.
Ayen yesserẓagen leɛmeṛ-iw.
Ayen yeɛnan afras d lemḥadra n yigran.
Ayen yeɛnan isafaren n wučči.
Ayen yiflen i tizi, ur d-itezzi.
Ayen yufa ad t-yaker, ɣas ffer iceṭṭiḍen-ik.
Ayen yufa ad t-yexdem, mačči d win iɛeddzen.
Ayen yuran deg twenza, ur yezmir yiwen ad t-yekkes.
Ayen yuran deg usenduḥ, ula aniwer iṛuḥ.
Ayen yuran, ur yezmir ḥedd ad t-yekkes.
Ayen yuɣ n tiytiwin, yal ass d taḥkayt.
Ayen ḥkuɣ, ayen sefruɣ drus.
Ayen-d-tenniḍ yelha.
Ayen-nni akk i yi-iǧǧan.
Ayen? Akken ad aɣeɣ aceffar niḍen am netta?
Ayes-iyi ad kem-ayseɣ.
Ayhuh a yyi! Teẓrid ass-a d aneggaru.
Ayhuh!... aqcic-ayi akken d ikɛeb!
Ayis, ur yelli d amellal.
Ayla n medden besmelleh!
Ayla-nsen ur ḥudren fell-as.
Ayla-s ad t-id-yekkes ula seg teẓrut.
Ayt Smaεel.
Ayt Tizi d taɣiwant taqbaylit deg ugezdu n Sṭif.
Ayt Yeḥya Musa.
Ayweq?
Ayyur deg yigenni yecher.
Ayyuz.
Ayɣer ad ak-d-slen atnin ceṭḥen.
Ayɣer ad nraju?
Ayɣer ay iqeffafen i d-tusam ad tt-tawim?
Ayɣer i iyi-d-tettakkeḍ afus n talalt?
Ayɣer i k-ttamneɣ?
Ayɣer i kem-ḥeǧben?
Ayɣer i tegneḍ almi d azal?
Ayɣer i telliḍ weḥd-m?
Ayɣer i tettaḍsaḍ?
Ayɣer i tettezriri nettat zeɛma s lḥiǧab?
Ayɣer i tettqudureḍ?
Ayɣer i tugademt?
Ayɣer i tṣebreḍ i wakka?
Ayɣer tettqazameḍ?
Ayɣer tura?
Ayɣer ur zmireɣ ara ad iliɣ am yimdanen akk?
Azaglu-iw leggaɣ, yerna taɛekkemt-iw fessuset.
Azal n sin wussan uriɣ-d aḍris yecban wa maca yemxallaf deg usentel.
Azal n teqbaylit mačči deg teɣzi n tqendurt-is i yella.
Azal n tlaba ittban di ccetwa.
Azal n tmanyin deg meyya n yidlisen ara yersen di temkarḍit tamaynut, ad d-ttwaddmen seg tsekla taqbaylit.
Azal n tmeṭṭut yerna, iɛedda i usigna, abrid-is metwal itri.
Azal n umdan yegrareb, Kennu yuɣal d lεada.
Azal-nsen ad ittwaḥseb akken yella lexlaṣ n uxeddam.
Azalen yesɛa uḍris.
Azalen, fessin am udfel deg yiṭij.
Azawad, d tamennaṭ ideg zedɣen Yimaziɣen n Mali.
Azaɣar n Sidim iččuṛ d lebyur n uselɣaɣ.
Azberbur d tiẓurin urɛad wwint, mazal-itent d tisemmamin.
Azeggaɣ axir.
Azegḍuf d yiwen n yimɣi iteqsen.
Azekka ad asent-d-yaɣ akk ayen steḥqent.
Azekka ad dduɣ ɣer lbilaǧ akked baba.
Azekka ad hedreɣ i Tom.
Azekka ad iliɣ di lbiru alarma d setta.
Azekka ad kecmeɣ ɣer lakul i tikelt tamenzut.
Azekka ad rewleɣ.
Azekka ad ruḥeɣ. Anwa ara yeddun yid-i?
Azekka ad truḥ ad taf tilelli-s d talwit-is dinna.
Azekka ad tuɣaleḍ d tameṭṭut n umarkanti.
Azekka ad uraren ddabax n uḍar.
Azekka ad yexdem
Azekka ara d-ruḥeɣ ɣer temqeddemt n tmurt n Kanada.
Azekka d ass n usteɛfu, d ass wis sebɛa yettwaɛezlen i Umeɣlal.
Azekka d ass nniḍen.
Azekka iɣeṭṭel-d lxuf, uggadeɣ ad nessesel am uzrem.
Azekka n ttlata ad tili tmeɣra meqqren ara d-yilin i lfayda n yimeḍharen.
Azekka ulac amahil.
Azekka ṣṣbeḥ tzemreḍ ad d-tuɣaleḍ.
Azekka ṣṣbeḥ zik, mi d-tekkrem ad tkemmlem abrid-nwen.
Azekka, ad d-nawi tislit.
Azekka, nekk ad beddeɣ ɣef tiɣilt, aɛekkaz n Yillu deg ufus-iw.
Azekka-nni daɣen, yerra ɣer lqahwa yexdem.
Azekka-nni kkreɣ-d zik akken ad rewleɣ.
Azekka-nni lewhi n tesɛa nemlal-d ɣer lḥara n tseddawit.
Azekka-nni sudaba terǧa sdat n uxxam n urgaz n Zahra.
Azekka-nni yekker-d mmi-s n uciban iruḥ srid ɣer lqahwa.
Azekka-nni ṣṣbeḥ, Ferɛun ikker-d itqelleq.
Azekka-nni ṣṣbeḥ, d nnda i d-izzin i umkan-nni anda i llan.
Azekka-nni ṣṣbeḥ, mi iṛuḥ Yusef ɣur-sen, yufa-ten tqelqen.
Azekka-nni, Ameɣlal ixdem akken i d-inna.
Azekka-nni, kkren-d ṣṣbeḥ zik, mɛahaden.
Azekka-nni, krent ad ruḥent, ɣer wasif.
Azekkan-nni tasebḥit tbed-as i wemjay ɣef umnar.
Azelmaḍ yettḥami ɣef uyeffus.
Azemmur d aseṛṛaǧi.
Azemmur n usammar yif win n umalu.
Azemmur-nneɣ tečča-t tmes.
Azemz n yikayaden.
Azen-asen tabrat.
Azen-d ṣwab i cnawi.
Azgen ameqqran deg Leqbayel txuṣṣ-iten tefrit ɣef tamagit-nsen.
Azgen deg-sen ttawin-ten-id kan d timucuha deg tallit-nni tanammast.
Azgen ɣer tqecwalt, azgen ɣer tɛebbuṭ-is.
Azger acerqi ittḥadar icc-is.
Azger d awlay n tfunast.
Azger ičča atemmu, tayuga tečča atemmu.
Azger-is ikkat, wi iḥuza iṛẓa-t.
Aziḍud yettcabi ɣer yitbir.
Azlalam n Maziɣ d amaynut.
Azlem ay iḍaṛṛen-iw!
Azmez-a, ad yeqqim deg umezruy n umennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt.
Azmumeg d afessas kan.
Azmumeg s wacu i tesfeǧǧeǧ zik axxam, yemzel.
Azmumeg yeqḍeɛ igezzem, acebbub d awezzlan d aqehwi d ubrin, d ilelli.
Azniq yettak-it i wayeḍ.
Azrem d azrem, ɣas ittbeddil taglimt.
Azrem ileḥḥu ɣef uɛeddis.
Azrem inna i tmeṭṭut: Xaṭi!
Azrem muhabet lḥaṛa-s.
Azrug yeččur d tikeṛṛusin.
Azul a mmi! D acu i k-id-yuwin akka? Yak d lxir kan.
Azul a yelli, d wagi i d axxam n Si Yeḥya?
Azul a yemma, ad teḥwijem afellaḥ?
Azul fell-awen, ay imesfliden εzizen.
Azul i kra n win ara yeɣren tabrat-a.
Azul, amek tettilim?
Azul, i d as-d-tenna teqcict-nni.
Azul, isem-iw Tom. Amek i ak-qqaṛen?
Azuḥ neɣ ciṭuḥ, lbaraka deg drus.
Azwel n udlis-is: Sani i tetteddu Zzayer?
Azwel n ungal amezwru yura umaru Ɛmar Mezdad d Iḍ d wass.
Azwel n usarag-agi-nsen.
Azwel usarag: Akala agrawal d tnaya taɣerfant.
Azwel yedda d usentel d tidet d azabuq.
Azwu yesɛa taẓẓayt akked tufsin.
Azzel deg tsawent, ma tebɣiḍ ad tefsi tassemt-nni.
Azzel!
Azzelemt.
Azɣal n wass-nni yettlaɛi-d ɣef yismawen.
Ačewčew azewwaɣ ur t-ḥmmilen ara wayetma-s.
Ačewčew azewwaɣ yennejla.
Aččadur aberkan ur nemgarad ɣef yiččaduren niḍen s wacemma.
Aɛalṭar n lebxuṛ akked yeɛmuden-is heggan.
Aɛalṭar-nni, ixdem-it s tencirin, yerna yeqqim d ilem.
Aɛalṭar-nni? ad t-txedmeḍ s tencirin, ad yili d ilem.
Aɛdaw am lexṛif mi iwwa teččeḍ-t.
Aɛdaw am turet, ansi tewɛiḍ bbi-t.
Aɛdaw i izerɛen aẓekkun-nni, d Cciṭan.
Aɛdaw iqṛeḥ, aḥbib ifṛeḥ.
Aɛdaw ur igi imendi.
Aɛdaw ur itettu ara tigad-is.
Aɛdaw yuẓ-d di tikli-s.
Aɛdaw-ik, qsed-as asulef.
Aɛdaw-nneɣ d aferṭas, acciwen d nekni.
Aɛebbuḍ d akal kan ara t-yeččaren.
Aɛebbuḍ d arɣib.
Aɛebbuḍ d ilemẓi, uglan d imɣaṛen.
Aɛebbuḍ d lebḥar, ad as-tiniḍ d tinifift.
Aɛebbuḍ-is, d bu tɣemmaṛ.
Aɛebbuḍ-iw qrib ad yeṭṭerḍeq.
Aɛeddi seg tillas ɣer tafat din din.
Aɛeggun!
Aɛekkaz ad yečč aksum.
Aɛekkaz n wulmu, ur ikkat, ur ittfukku.
Aɛekkaz yugi ad yewwet Tehriruc.
Aɛeqqa n lǧawi, a yul-iw awi!
Aɛeqqa n yirden deg yimi.
Aɛeqqa, aɛeqqa, ad immed meqqa.
Aɛeqqa, aɛeqqa, ad yemmed meqqa.
Aɛewdiw yesneḥniḥ.
Aɛeṛḍi idda d ubrid n Ṛebbi.
Aɛmud n tlemmast ad iɛeddi si ṭṭerf ɣer ṭṭerf n tencirin.
Aɛni mačči d tameṭṭut yurǧan aya?
Aɛrab, anda yekka trab.
Aɛraben d Wudayen d tarwa n leɛmum.
Aɛraben ḥeṛsen Iqbayliyen, ḥaren ad ten-ssufɣen si tmurt-nsen, axaṭer qqaren: Nedder, nedder!
Aɛrur-ik senned-it ɣer lḥiḍ.
Aɛwin yettawi-t yid-s.
Aɛziz am lkil n wudi.
Aɣ awal i Ṣara, xdem ayen akk ara k-d-tini.
Aɣ awal-iw.
Aɣ i yiman-ik, taɣeḍ i ssuq.
Aɣ-d sin n yizgaren ad trebḥeḍ.
Aɣ-itt-id a yiblis, ad ak-nefk nnefṣ-is!
Aɣ-iyi kan awal, awi-yi-ten-id.
Aɣamac, lgerra, teṣleb lɣella.
Aɣanib-im ibeddel akka deg wungal-a wis sin.
Aɣaref d bu ccwami.
Aɣbalu n leḥnana-nsen.
Aɣbel a-t-an ulac wid ara iɛassen imestjaren-agi.
Aɣbel n umɣaṛ d isɣaṛen.
Aɣbel ur t-sεiɣ maḍi.
Aɣbel ur yelli.
Aɣbub yuɣal d adalku.
Aɣebbar meṛṛa n lqaɛa yuɣal d tilkin di tmurt n Maṣer.
Aɣedluj d iqcer ibawen neɣ ujilban.
Aɣeggad izerreb.
Aɣella-nni, ahat yeɛdez, yessendeh tarbaɛt-is ad tkemmel abrid-is.
Aɣerabu-nni ideg d-yedda yemderkal yufa-d teftist.
Aɣerbal ajdid iḥwaǧ aɛelleq.
Aɣerbal ajdid, yettḥibbi aɛellaq.
Aɣerbaz-nneɣ yezleg.
Aɣerbaz-nneɣ yuḍen.
Aɣersiw aɛlayen akk deg ddunit d amdeɣ.
Aɣet awal i yiselmaden-nwen.
Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Efk-aneɣ-d tamuɣli tamatut ɣef yisenfaren n usideg d wanda wwḍen?
Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen yesteqsa mass Awcic Yusef.
Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Ahat ad tessisneḍ i yimeɣriyen-nneɣ d anwa-t Muṛad Meẓri?
Aɣmis n yimaziɣen: Deg tazwara, mmeslaɣ-d ciṭ ɣef tlalit n tuddsa-nwen.
Aɣref ileḥḥun s tɛellamt n weɣref-iḍen, ḥseb-it yemmut.
Aɣrib i yeǧǧan tamurt.
Aɣrim-agi menhut? Wissen d acu yexdem?
Aɣrum neɣ seksu ur nedhin ara s zzit n uzemmur mačči d učči.
Aɣrum ur t-tenǧim temcumt, la tettɛettib deg lemsemmen.
Aɣyul? Welleh ar ukren-t akken s tbarda!
Aɣyul anezzaf!
Aɣyul atan deg leḥder-is kan meskin.
Aɣyul axir n kra n yemdanen.
Aɣyul inehheṛ wayeḍ.
Aɣyul isebber.
Aɣyul ittzeqiṛen d tisegelt kan i as-ilaqen.
Aɣyul ittḥazam aɣyul.
Aɣyul iḥemmel win i t-ikkaten.
Aɣyul ma yeɛya, yessefk ad yesgunfu.
Aɣyul n baba d jeddi, rniɣ rrekba ɣer deffir.
Aɣyul n leɛbas, ɛebbi u rkeb fell-as.
Aɣyul n leḥbas, ɛebbi u rkeb fell-as.
Aɣyul ttawin-t-id d anzi, yettcebbiḥ deg yimeslayen.
Aɣyul yettjuɛu.
Aɣyul, menwala iɛebbi fell-as.
Aɣyul-iw iṛuḥ, tabarda fell-i tettfuḥ.
Aɣyul-nni ǧǧan-t ifad.
Aɣṣab d yiberdan yekkren i d timentelt n twaɣiyin.
Aγlif n ttṛebga taγelnawt.
Aεebbuḍ, akken tebɣuḍ ččar-it.
Aεeṭṭar ameẓyan: Ayγer akka?
Aεeṭṭar ameẓyan: Ma ulac uγilif, bγiγ ad dduγ yid-k xersum ad nemwanas.
Aεeṭṭar-nni yemmekta-d bab-is, yuγal yeqbel.
Aεidiw-is ineggez nnig isefreg.
Aεjel
Aεsekriw yeqqar: ttif ad tettru yemma-s wala ad tettru yemma.
Aḍad ur issenɛat ara ar yiman-is.
Aḍad-iw d kemm.
Aḍar iruḥ deg uccuḍ.
Aḍar ma yuzzel afus ad t-yetbeɛ.
Aḍar yugad asawen.
Aḍar-ik d uḍar-iw afus-iw deg ufus-ik.
Aḍar-iw yenfel.
Aḍar-iw yettembiwil.
Aḍaṛ ileḥḥun ittawi-d, neɣ ittaǧǧa-n.
Aḍegger n waman i iwesxen ɣer din.
Aḍref yellan d asuki.
Aḍris-a ɣezzif, ɣur-s nnig n semmuset n tseddarin.
Aḍu ad s-d-ikeččem.
Aḍu i d-iruḥen ad t-yawi.
Aḍu i yetthubbun si yal tama.
Aḍu yetthuzu afriwen.
Aḥbac ur t-ikkat buseṭṭaf.
Aḥbib bu uɛebbuḍ, tif-it lgelba n ubellud.
Aḥbib d lxezna n lbaṛud.
Aḥbib n ulqim, ar din iqqim!
Aḥebbas ulac.
Aḥeddad n taddart igerrez-as tisemmiṛin.
Aḥeddad ur nesɛi tafrut!
Aḥeddad ur nesɛi tafrut.
Aḥeddur d uggan, abeṛnus d ulman.
Aḥeddur iqsed i teslit.
Aḥeffaf ur yelli deg temdint-nni.
Aḥelbebbu yettemcabi ɣer tzermemmuyt.
Aḥemmel ass mi i t-id-bedreɣ.
Aḥemmel war tilisa.
Aḥeq Ccerfa.
Aḥeq Sidi Ɛic.
Aḥeq kra yekkan gar-aneɣ.
Aḥeq taɛbuṭ-nni ik-id-yesɛan ar iruḥ, ar yekfa fell-as ubiṭun.
Aḥeqqaṛ, kkes-as neɣ rnu-yas.
Aḥezzeb ad t-nefḍeɣ.
Aḥezzeb yugar leqḍeɛ.
Aḥiwel, aɣiwel!
Aḥkim ur nesεi aḥkim.
Aḥlil lewḍen abaɛli, yenzan d asuki!
Aḥlil win icban aɣbub.
Aḥlil win ihenna wul-is, yusa-t-id naddam yeṭṭes.
Aḥlil win iẓran, aḥlil win ur neẓri.
Aḥluli n tɛebbuḍt d aṭan yettaɣen aɛeddis n umdan neɣ n uɣersiw.
Aḥmam yersen di lxaṭer-iw.
Aḥreḍman, d win yettagaden, ur nesɛi tabɣest.
Aḥric amezwaru send ara t-tenɣeḍ, aḥric wis sin seld ara t-tenɣeḍ.
Aḥric ayeffus n yidis asamar.
Aḥric iqublen allel ɣer yidis anẓul.
Aḥric n tesleḍt.
Aḥric wis sin.
Aḥric-agi, yesɛa assaɣ adamsan.
Aḥric-agi, yesɛa assaɣ adelsan.
Aḥuddu, aḥunnu!
Aḥulfu ur as-teldi ara tiwwura n wul-is.
Aḥulfu-nni iyi-ittqelliqen yettnerni deg yiḍ.
Aḥulfu-s d uḥdiq yessen melmi ara d-yesṭebṭeb.
Aḥḥu!
Aṛan isɛa-d Luṭ.
Aṛeṭṭal itbeɛ-it lexlaṣ.
Aṛeẓqi Muḥend Ṣaleḥ, yemmut ur d as-teččur.
Aṛwaḥ ar daki ma ulac aɣilif.
Aṣuni yesɛa lmaɛna mačči d aketti kan.
Aṣurdi ur teḥbis texriḍt, ur ḥesseb d ṛṛas lmal.
Aṭan n teqbaylit yuɣ iẓuran-nsen.
Aṭas ara d-islen.
Aṭas ara d-iṛuḥen.
Aṭas ara d-yasen.
Aṭas ara d-yeddun deffir.
Aṭas ara ibeddlen deg tudert-ik d ttexmam-ik mi ara teɣreḍ adlis-a.
Aṭas ara inadin.
Aṭas ara iḥewsen ar Ṭelyan.
Aṭas ara iṛuḥen ar Ṭelyan.
Aṭas ara s-yecfun.
Aṭas ara yebɣun.
Aṭas ara yecfun.
Aṭas ara yecnun.
Aṭas ara yeddun.
Aṭas ara yeffɣen tamurt-nsen.
Aṭas ara yi-d-yinin ass-nni: A Sidi!
Aṭas ay d-smenɛem d idles, tasnagt d tilin n wat zik.
Aṭas aya i ibeddel tamurt.
Aṭas aya segmi i iruḥ.
Aṭas aya segmi i kem-teqreḥ tɛebbuḍt-im?
Aṭas aya segmi ttaruɣ taqbaylit.
Aṭas aya tura i nesɣaray taqbaylit.
Aṭas aya ur as-hdireɣ ara.
Aṭas aya ur d-yewwit udfel.
Aṭas aya ur k-neẓri.
Aṭas aya ur myeẓren ara.
Aṭas aya ur nemẓer, ḥareɣ ad nemlil.
Aṭas aya ur ḥulfaɣ ara akka.
Aṭas i awen-yessan taẓerbit, seddaw-as d isennanen.
Aṭas i d-ittmennin tarewla.
Aṭas i d-ittusawlen, lameɛna drus i yettwaxtaṛen.
Aṭas i d-nenna.
Aṭas i d-nesɛedda.
Aṭas i d-yenna.
Aṭas i glalzent deg wannar n taddart.
Aṭas i glalzeɣ deg wannar n taddart.
Aṭas i iɛawden, yettwareqɛen deg-s.
Aṭas i iḥemmel tudert.
Aṭas i nezha.
Aṭas i neḍsa.
Aṭas i neẓra deg-sen, win ten-yifen rran-t yesleb
Aṭas i nudeɣ lḥiɣ.
Aṭas i nurar deg wannar n taddart.
Aṭas i qqimeɣ d yemɣaren.
Aṭas i ruɣ.
Aṭas i s-yenwa lɣerba d turart.
Aṭas i s-yenwan lɣerba d urar.
Aṭas i tecmet.
Aṭas i teglalzem deg wannar n taddart.
Aṭas i teglalzeḍ deg wannar n taddart.
Aṭas i teksa taɣaṭ, tura teqqen takrabaṭ.
Aṭas i teksa tixsi, tura tezdeɣ lasiti.
Aṭas i telḥa weḥd-s, tura la iteddu yid-s.
Aṭas i ten-iwalan.
Aṭas i tessefruruy tqemmuct-ik.
Aṭas i tettmenniḍ, ay ul-iw!
Aṭas i tezḍa yemma n yitrikuyen.
Aṭas i tt-ḥiwten wat uxxam ad d-tenṭeq.
Aṭas i uraren deg wannar n taddart.
Aṭas i walaɣ seg wasmi i lliɣ...
Aṭas i yebɣan ad ǧǧen tamurt-nsen.
Aṭas i yenwan teshel lɣeṛba.
Aṭas i yesεedda di sbiṭar.
Aṭas i yettarun isefra ɣur-neɣ, d acu imedyazen xuṣṣen.
Aṭas i yettmettaten s uḥbas n wul.
Aṭas i yettneɛtab deg uxeddim.
Aṭas i yettɣilin amezgun d taḍsa kan neɣ d ahuzzu n ifassen d isuɣan.
Aṭas i yezha di lexrif.
Aṭas i yezha lexrif, yedda εeryan di ccetwa.
Aṭas i yečča lebḥer.
Aṭas i yeɛebba yeččur, ẓẓay ur yezmir ara.
Aṭas i yeɛyan si tmurt-nsen.
Aṭas i yeṣber ugdud, yiwen wass ad d-yeṭerḍeq.
Aṭas i yeṣber.
Aṭas i yi-tgiḍ leɣruṛ.
Aṭas i yuḍnen aṭṭan n sskeṛ.
Aṭas i ǧǧiɣ si lḥeqq-iw armi i qqleɣ seg yilexxaxen.
Aṭas i ɛerḍeɣ ad ɛiwdeɣ ttrebga i wul-iw uqbel ad gezmeɣ asirem.
Aṭas i ḥemmleɣ yemma.
Aṭas imeɣnasen i teṭṭef temsulta tazzayrit deg Iɣil Ɛli.
Aṭas iyi-d-icekkren.
Aṭas iyi-d-yettaḍsan deg ubrid.
Aṭas n iberdan i iderɛen.
Aṭas n iberdan i iwessiɛen.
Aṭas n iberdan i yessuffuɣen.
Aṭas n imeɣnasen i yettwaḥebsen di tallit-nni n tmanyin.
Aṭas n lecɣal yettwaxedmen deg ugezdu n Tizi Uzzu.
Aṭas n lenbiya n lekdeb ara d-ikkren.
Aṭas n lexṣaṣ i yellan.
Aṭas n medden i yestḥussayen am kemm.
Aṭas n medden i yettrajun deg berra.
Aṭas n medden i yettrajun yakan.
Aṭas n medden i yettḥulfun am kečč.
Aṭas n tefyar i d-mazal.
Aṭas n temliliyin i d-yellan yakan uqbel.
Aṭas n temsal i d-iḍerrun deg ssuq.
Aṭas n tiktiwin i d-iberrqen ɣer wallaɣ-iw.
Aṭas n tiɣriwin i usemsawi gar urgaz d tmeṭṭut i d-yeffɣen i lmend n tnekkra-a taɣerfant.
Aṭas n tlawin ara d-yecfun.
Aṭas n tlawin i s-yecfan.
Aṭas n tlawin i t-ixeddmen.
Aṭas n tlawin i t-ixedmen.
Aṭas n tlawin i t-yessnen.
Aṭas n tlawin i t-yeẓṛan.
Aṭas n tlawin i yellan dinna, ttmuqulent si lebɛid.
Aṭas n tlawin i yessnen seksu.
Aṭas n tyuzaḍ i yenɣa waṭan n bucḥiḍ.
Aṭas n tɣawsiwin i bɣiɣ mazal ur tent-xdimeɣ ara.
Aṭas n ukermus i yellan.
Aṭas n ukermus i yeẓẓa.
Aṭas n usisnu i d-yemɣin.
Aṭas n usisnu i nečča.
Aṭas n usisnu i tečča.
Aṭas n usisnu i yellan.
Aṭas n usisnu i yečča.
Aṭas n uwennet i ufiɣ.
Aṭas n wawalen imzikiyen ur nessexdam ara.
Aṭas n wid ara d as-yinin.
Aṭas n wid ur neddir.
Aṭas n wungalen i d-iteffɣen s tutlayt taqbaylit.
Aṭas n yexxamen yehrurin.
Aṭas n yicernanen i ixedem.
Aṭas n yidammen i yeddan.
Aṭas n yilmeẓyen i yečča lebḥer.
Aṭas n yimura i yettarun s teqbaylit.
Aṭas n yiqeddacen imuḍan i yettruḥun d iseflan n waya acku uggaden ad ččen ɛinani deg yisragen n uxeddim.
Aṭas n yiqerray imelsa i teɣḍel lfinga.
Aṭas n yisaragen i d-yettilin ussan-a.
Aṭas n yiselmaden i yettcetkayen ɣef ubeddel n tmawalt n uselmed sya ɣer da.
Aṭas n yitran i imeqqren ugar ɣef yiṭij-nneɣ.
Aṭas n yiḍan imneṭriyen i yellan dagi.
Aṭas n yiḍrisen i mazal ad d-kkseɣ seg-sen tifyirin.
Aṭas ur numin ara s teqbaylit.
Aṭas ur yessinen ara neɣ ur yebɣin ara ad arun taqbaylit akken i iwata
Aṭas!
Aṭer-d syin!
Aṭremt-d syin!
Aṭret-d syin!
Aṭṭan d awal ur nemɛin mačči d ayen i ibelɛen.
Aṭṭan i t-yulin.
Aṭṭan n lḥubb d timqestin.
Aṭṭan n tbuzeggaɣt.
Aṭṭan n temẓi d ussan.
Aṭṭan n tisselbi icuba ɣer lfinga.
Aṭṭan-a, ihelken yigerdan, ineṭṭeḍ seg ugrud ɣer wayeḍ, yezmer ad yezreɛ, acku aṭas n yigerdan mazal ur criḍen ara.
Aṭṭan-is d ɛeggu di tuzuft.
Aẓ akkin fell-i!
Aẓ-d akka!
Aẓ-d ɣer da!
Aẓar ittabaɛ tara.
Aẓawan d tutlayt icerken talsa.
Aẓawan daɣen win ur nsell i uẓawan yemmut wul-is.
Aẓay, ad tteččeḍ ayen yewwan!
Aẓekkun d imɣi i ḥemmlen wakraren.
Aẓem-d!
Aẓemt-d!
Aẓet akkin fell-i!
Aẓeṭṭa mi iger yefra.
Aẓeṭṭa n wawalen n Mhenni Xalifi.
Aẓrem ameqṛan d win deg yettaṭṭaf waṭan n Krhon.
Aẓru-agi i sbeddeɣ d ccahed, ad yili d axxam n Yillu.
Aẓru-nsen d llajuṛ, tixmiṛt-nsen d aselɣaɣ.
Bab n ddreɛ itett nnfeɛ.
Bab n leqṛan ittɛaṛṛeb.
Bab n lxiṛ ittenjaḥ, wali ɛad aburaysu!
Bab n lxiṛ ittenǧaḥ, a waliɛad abṛaysu.
Bab n lɣella, ur iɣelli.
Bab n twizi ad d-yini.
Bab n ukembas d ttemyiz.
Bab n wakal, izwar bab n wawal.
Bab n ṣṣenɛa d sselṭan.
Bab-is d amedyaz d aḥeddad n wawal.
Bab-is yezga deg uɣilif, amzun d rraǧ i yeswa.
Baba d yemma tessewhem-iten tgella n yemma Daɛda.
Baba ihedder tafransist, ma d yemma xaṭi.
Baba iḥres-itt nezzeh.
Baba lwali.
Baba yebɣa ad d-fɣeɣ d abugatu.
Baba yebɣa ad iliɣ d aqcic imeɛnen.
Baba yebɣa ad iḥriceɣ di lakul.
Baba yebɣa izerfan akken ad kecmeɣ ɣer teɣdemt.
Baba yella izeṭṭ tidencin i wat taddart.
Baba yesɛa ṭumubil d tazeggaɣt.
Baba yewwi-yi-d cakula taberkant.
Baba yuɣ-iyi-d lqec ajdid i wass n lɛid.
Baba yuḍnen dima yeṭṭef ussu.
Baba Ɛli Musa izem.
Baba! I d-tenna s tugdi.
Baba, d argaz bu-lhiba akked laɛqel.
Baba-k d ayrad n lexla.
Baba-k d ayrad, yemma-k d tasedda.
Baba-m yettgalla.
Baba-s Isḥaq inna-yas: Anwa-k, keččini?
Baba-s ilumm-it, inna-as: D acu-tt targit-agi i turgaḍ?
Baba-s ixeddmen di lebni yeẓga d iɣimi.

D acu i ḥesbent iman-nsent?
D acu iɣef ara ḍillent wallen?
D acu k-yeṭṭfen?
D acu kan abrid-a n timawit ur idum ara.
D acu kan greɣ tamawt tesxedmeḍ awalnuten.
D acu kan, mi ara yesexdam umdan tameslayt-nni, igellu-d s ubeddel deg tseddast.
D acu kan, sḥassfeɣ imi asefru-nni amezwaru i uriɣ, iruḥ-iyi, ur ẓriɣ anda yerra.
D acu kan, tikelt-agi mači am tin-nni iɛeddan, serkdeɣ allaɣ-iw.
D acu kan, ur ttawi ara mmi ɣer dinna.
D acu kem-yuɣen?
D acu n ddnub i xedmeɣ armi i tt-teddiḍ akka fell-i?
D acu n ddwa i k-d-ifka umejjay?

D acu nesεa da?

D acu teččamt daɣen?

D acu teččiḍ daɣen?

D acu txeddmeḍ deg uberṭiṭ-nni?
D acu ugadeɣ imennan.
D acu ur tesɛiḍ?
D acu ur tesεiḍ?
D acu yellan deg tqerεet-nni?
D acu yellan deg ukaram-nni?
D acu yellan gar-i yid-m?

D acu yeḍan d yelli-m?
D acu yeḍran akka? Atan aman kkan-d axxam merra.
D acu yifen tudert? Kra! Ala win i tt-icebḥen s wayen yelhan.
D acu yuɣen akka taɣect-im? tbeddel!
D acu, d tidet kan, deg lweqt-nni lliɣ d ungif.
D acu, yirbeḥ a baba".

D acuddu i ttcuddun yifassen-iw.
D acḍaḍ zeddigen iɣef ittban wammus.
D adfel i t-yenɣan.
D adfel.
D adlis i d-yeǧǧa baba.
D adlis kan i bɣiɣ ad ɣreɣ i ubeḥri.
D adlis-a.

D adrar-nni n Tsegdelt i yettarran iɛdawen.
D afellaq!
D afellaḥ seg wasmi i d-yekker.
D afenṭazi.
D aferdis n lbaḍna anda amaru ad d-yefk timseɛreqt.
D afermas.
D afeṭṭaḥ n lembaḍen.
D affug i yuffeg mi yesla s lexbaṛ.
D affug i yuffeg, mi yesla s lexbaṛ.
D afṛux, i yeleqḍen iwzan.
D agdud ur nesɛi tilelli deg idles-is.
D agellid n Isṛayil i yella!
D agerbi kan ay zedɣen, ikemmel yeɣli.

D ajdid kečči?
D ajeɣlal.
D akayad.
D akeswaḥ!
D akka i t-id-nnan sin n yimɛawnen n leqdic-a.
D aklucaṛ, meɛna ur t-tettkellixeḍ ara.
D akraren i yennuɣen, ihi erret uzal s axxam.
D aksum i icebbḥen iɣes.
D akud i d ddwa n leǧruḥ.
D alef u xems meyya u ɛecra.
D alim gar iqellalen.
D allaɣ-iw i t-id-ittexlaqen.

D allen n tfunast i yesɛa.

D allen n weɣyul i yesɛa.

D allen n wuccen i yesɛa.
D aluḍ anda i terriḍ.
D alɣem aɛeẓẓug.
D amahil-iw kan iyi-ččuren akud-iw.
D amalas.
D amaynut kečči?
D amaɛlal yerna ṭṭaglal.
D ambaddal n ṣṣifa n Yasuɛ ɣef udrar.
D amcic?
D amcum.
D amdan i ibennun amezruy, mači d amezruy i ibennun amdan.
D amdan kan ad s-nsemmi.
D amedyaz n tidet.
D amedyaz s tutlayt tafransist.
D amelsi yerna anagi ur t-yesɛi.
D amendil s i begseɣ ixf-iw.
D amennuɣ ur yettwafham ara

D amesfizik.

D amur-iw.
D amɣaṛ.
D amɣid seg wasmi i d-ikker, leɛmer i inuda ad yerbeḥ.
D amḥaddi i tent-ittaɣen.
D amḥaddi itent-ittaɣen!
D anagem, yinɣa fad.
D anaẓur, si zik-is iḥemmel ccna aqdim, isell aṭas i radyu tis snat, ladɣa tidwilin-nni n ccna.
D anebdu.
D anect-a ara xeddmeɣ.
D anect-a kan.
D anehhar n lεali
D anelmad i lliɣ.
D anezgum meqqren.

D annect-a?

D annect-en?
D anserni n teqbaylit i nebɣa.
D anta-tt tagi ihi?
D anwa ara ad yegren tamawt i tɣawsa am taki.
D anwa ara yeddun d uderwic?

D anwa i yeffɣen?
D anwa i yessnen axiṛ-as?
D anyir ugenduz.

D aqbayli.
D aqcic n ccuq.
D aqcic neɣ d taqcict i d-tesɛa?
D aqcic neɣ d taqcict?
D aqdim.

D aqemmuc ičibib, i d-iberrun i yizan.

D aqjun-is i t-yufan.
D aqumbeε.
D argaz d uzgen!
D argaz i d-yebnan iman-is s yiman-is.
D argaz i tent-ittṣuḍun.
D argaz i yesεan tazmert n yifadden i tetteḥwiğ txeddimt n tmurt.
D argaz neɣ d tameṭṭut?
D argaz u nnefṣ!
D argaz yelsan llebsa icebḥen?
D argaz-nni i d-temlaleḍ ass-nni.
D argaz-nni temlaleḍ ass-nni.
D arrac i d asirem n tutlayt-nneɣ.
D arraw n Busmat, tameṭṭut n Ɛisu.
D arraw n Ɛada.
D arraw-is Ɛisu akked Yeɛqub i t-imeḍlen.
D aruy i d-yeffɣen syin.
D arṭayan Tom.
D arẓaz inebbcen deg leḥcic.
D asarag amenzu i d-thegga tddukkla-a deg waggur-agi n Remḍan, deg usɣim n Waggur Azeggaɣ Azzayri.
D asaru amenzu n Rida Amrani akked ara d-iɛeddin, ad d-yeglu s uskasi ɣer tagara n usaru.
D asaru amsultan i d-neẓra.
D asawen ad yeẓḍem wasif.
D asayes yettḥazen ddeqs-is.
D asaḍuf n yidrimen i yesseddawen ddunit.
D asbeqbeq.
D asebɣes n yimdanen akken ad uɣalen ar laṣel-nsen.
D aseggas ajdid ara ilalen.
D aseggas ara aɣ-d-yawin ala ayen nebɣa.
D aseggas n tumert.
D aseggas.
D asehlan.
D aselmad n Tmaziɣt.
D asemmaḍ am tgersa.
D asenfaṛ yelhan.
D asensu n terfeht.
D aseɛdi win iwumi ur ttiliɣ ara d ssebba n tuccḍa.
D aseɛreḍ kan i sseɛraḍen, uma ur t-ḥemmlen ara.
D asfel n uḥussu n ddnub.
D asfel, neɣ d aɛalṭar yettarran asfel d imqeddes?
D asfuǧǧeɣ i sfuǧǧuɣen.
D asfuǧǧeɣ i sfuǧǧuɣent.
D asfuǧǧeɣ i tesfuǧǧuɣ.
D asfuǧǧeɣ i tesfuǧǧuɣem.
D asfuǧǧeɣ i tesfuǧǧuɣeḍ.
D asfuǧǧeɣ i yesfuǧǧuɣ.
D asgunfu i yal tafekka yeɛyan, d wul yenuzegmen.
D asgunfu n lebda.
D asif i yettakken aman i lebḥeṛ.
D asif n Nnil i imeqqren akk deg ddunnit.
D asikel iεeddan akken ilaq.
D asirem i ddwa n facal.
D asirem i yi-d yeqqimen.
D asirem tettceyyiɛem a wid ireclen akked tmedyezt.
D askiddeb i tella tiskiddib.
D aslaɣ i yesleɣ, mačči tuslin.
D aslemad asdawan deg Uɣerbaz Agtatwil.
D asmekti-s i yi-d-yegran.
D asmermed i tt-smermden meskint.
D asnerni n teqbaylit i bɣiɣ.
D asnerni n teqbaylit i tebɣam.
D asnerni n teqbaylit i tebɣiḍ.
D asqizzeb i yesqizzib.
D ass n uzɣal yesruɣen deg unebdu.
D asteqsi i nezmer ad neg ass-a n wussan.
D asugen kan i tessuguneḍ.
D asugen kan, d tarewla kan seg tillawt.
D asumer ara k-d-imenɛen si lmut.
D asurif meẓẓiyen di tira.
D asuter i yerzan lebni n tesdawit deg wakal n Bgayet seld mi yella wawway-ines ɣer temnaḍt n Jijel.
D asɛuggen.
D asɣar i tḥeqreḍ ara k-isderɣlen.
D asḥissef imi ur tezmireḍ ad d-taseḍ.
D asṭerṭer kan i tesṭerṭirem.
D asṭerṭer kan i tesṭerṭireḍ.
D at Ṛebbi, i as-d-iqeṭṭun.
D atmaten.
D avilu-inu.
D awal-is aneggaru.
D awal-iw ara iɛeddin
D awennit n yiwen uneḍfar usebter-nneɣ.
D awessar.
D awezɣi ad aɣ-d-tḥerr yiwet tewwurt ɣer daxel.
D awezɣi ad bruɣ i ṭbel deg waman.
D awezɣi ad crurdeɣ daxel n uzabuq-a ineqqen i tis kraḍ.
D awezɣi ad ibeddel udabu azzayri.
D awezɣi ad idireɣ yid-s
D awezɣi ad iliɣ am tiyaḍ i nniɣ deg yiman-iw.
D awezɣi ad tili si tid ixeddmen yid-s, neɣ si tid i d as-yettilin.
D awezɣi ad tselkeḍ seg ifassen-iw.
D awezɣi ad tt-ibeddel ḥedd tura.
D awezɣi ad tzewǧeḍ kečč akked Ferruǧa.
D awezɣi ad wenseɣ askiɛew n wucanen.
D awezɣi, ur cukkeɣ ara a tt-yexdem.
D awezɣi, win i k-d-yennan akka, yeskaddeb.
D awezɣi.
D awfayan uqjun-ik.
D axbac i ixebbec, mačči d anqac.
D axeddam nniḍen i d-yerran deg Umkan-is.
D axeddim.
D axenfuc n yilef.
D axerfi-nni i d-iṛebba, i yečča.
D axiqi i xaqeɣ ɣef yimawlan-iw.
D axlaf, lǧil-agi!
D axxam bu yicbula d lqeffa.
D axxam i ixedmen lexla.
D axxam n tezyiwin.
D axxam-im i kem-inefεen, a tislit.
D aya i kem-yesserfan?
D aya i kkateɣ ad k-d-iniɣ.
D aya iwmi mmugen yimdukal.
D aya kan, nwiɣ ad iyi-d-tessutreḍ kra iwimi ur zmireɣ ara.
D aya umi tzemrem?
D ayagi i t-yeɛman.
D ayagi i yi-fnan!
D ayaẓil i ɣ-izzuzfen lḥif, i ɣ-izzin.
D ayen akk tebɣiḍ kemm.
D ayen akken iẓẓa i d-imɣin.
D ayen ara yelhun kan.
D ayen i aɣ-yesferḥen aṭas.
D ayen i bɣiɣ ad geɣ.
D ayen i d aɣ-yeǧǧan, nxeddem anect-agi.
D ayen i d-ittarran rruḥ i wul.
D ayen i d-ntekkes seg tudert n yal ass.
D ayen i d-yeglan s tyitiwin d uḥbas n waṭas n yimeɣnasen.
D ayen i d-yeglan s usṭerḍeq meqqren, slan-as-d yakk wid i izedɣen tamdint-a n Arezyu.
D ayen i d-yewwin syin ɣer sdat aṭas n temliliyin deg yakk tamurt n Leqbayel.
D ayen i ilaq ad qableɣ weḥd-i kan.
D ayen i ilaq ad qableɣ weḥd-i.
D ayen i ilaqen ad t-xedmeɣ, i xedmeɣ.
D ayen i ixeddem ass-agi.
D ayen i izemmren ad ten-iḍuṛ.

D nekk.
D nekki.
D nekkni i d Aseqqamu amenzu i yuran tilwiḥin akk yellan daxel n Useqqamu-agi-nneɣ s tmaziɣt.
D netta ara iheddṛen i ugdud deg umkan-ik.
D netta d i d sebba mi temsebḍa d temdakelt-is akked tirga-nsent akken.
D netta i d Illu n baba, ad ssaɛliɣ di lɛaḍima-s.
D netta i d Illu-iw, ad t-ḥemdeɣ.
D netta i d aqerru n uxxam.
D netta i d tayri-s tamezwarut.
D netta i d-iǧǧan At Ɛamun, i mazal ar ass-a.
D netta i d-iǧǧan At Ɛibir.
D netta i d-iǧǧan Imuwabiyen, i mazal ar ass-a.
D netta i d-iǧǧan wid ikkaten snitra akked tjewwaqt.
D netta i d-sebba mi tettaxer seg uɣerbaz.
D netta i d-yemmalen azrireg n tigawin.
D netta i d-yessutren deg-i akken ad yettdawi ɣur-i deg uxxam.
D netta i d-yusan tameddit-a yettraǧu-yi dihin.
D netta i sen-igan leqrar.
D netta i yebnan lecqaf, ayen ixzen deg-sen yessen.
D netta i yebɣan akka.
D netta i yi-isellken.
D netta i yuran asefru “Mass aselway” i yecna Meɛtub Lwennas deg yiwet gar tezlatin-is icebḥen.
D netta i ɣef tettezzi tmacahut.
D netta iwumi i yefka ayen akk yesɛa.
D netta kan i izemren ad tt-yefrun.
D nettat ara yeẓren sser-aki ameqran iḍerrun deg ass n tmeɣra uqbel-is.
D nettat i as-tt-imlan.
D nettat i d-ineǧren abrid i ddeqs n tlawin-nniḍen.
D nettat i d-ssugneɣ yid-i dinna.
D nettat i d-yelhan s yikufan.
D nettat i yettlawin iman-is s yiman-is.
D neyya Meskint.
D neyya meskin.
D nfeɛ-ik i yebɣa.
D nna Faḍma i yeggaren ustu.
D nnger-ik!
D nnger-im!
D nnmara n uẓrem di lkanun.
D nnuba n ḥedd nniḍen.
D nnuba-nwen tura?
D nnuba-w.
D nnḥas i yetthuddun assaɣen.
D nutenti ara d-yekkren zik azekka.
D nutenti i d-iɛellmen aɣanib-inek cebbḥent-tt almi kan.
D nutni ara d-isbeggnen temɣer-iw zdat n ugdud meṛṛa.
D nutni ara d-yekkren zik azekka.
D nutni ara ken-iḥasben.
D nutni daɣen i iteffɣen imuṛaṣ uqbel.
D nutni i d imeqranen n leɛṛac-nsen.
D nutni i d-yuwḍen d imezwura, nekkni nerna-d deffir-sen.
D nutni i t-id-irebban seg wasmi i d-tebra yemma-s.
D nutni i yefkan afus.
D nutni i yesɣarayen, d nutni i d iεessasen n warrac.
D nutni ur nettbeddil ara idis, neɣ d nettat ur nttwexxir ara?
D sselɛa ixesren.
D ssqef mellulen.
D ta i d leɣna tḥemmleḍ?
D ta i d tafyirt taneggarut i wass-a.
D ta i d tameṭṭut ad ak-imlen tudert.
D ta i d yemmat-nsen, tin akken i ɣef ur ndimeɣ.
D tabaḍnit gar-as akked win teɛna temsalt.
D tacennayt tameqrant ma ur teẓriḍ ara.
D tacḍaṭ-ik ay nettraǧu.
D taddart gar tudrin, i d-yefkan aṭas n wudmawen n tsekla taqbaylit.
D taddart n Saḥel, di tɣiwant n Buzgan sebεin n yikilumitren ɣef temdint n Tizi Uzzu.
D tafat n wallen-iw, yess ay ttɛiciɣ.
D tafsut.
D tagara.
D tagi i d Dihia
D tagi i d lkalafa-nneɣ neɣ i d tamasit-nneɣ.
D tagi i d lɛada n yirgazen, ḥessben iman-nsen sdat n tlawin-nsen.
D tagi i d ṣṣyada n wukyis!
D tagi i d tagara-nni.
D tagi i d tarbaɛt!
D tagi i tarewla ɣef gma-k.
D tagnit ideg mlalen akk yinelmaden ɣer tama n yiselmaden-nsen akked yiselmaden d yinemhalen iqdimen ixedmen deg uɣerbaz-a.
D tagnit ur nlaq ara ad tt-sruḥeɣ.
D tagnit, daɣen, i usebɣes n yinelmaden-nneɣ i d-yufraren deg yikayaden-nsen.
D tagrawla i yesseɣlin adabu amnekdan.
D tagrest.
D tahuskay s tidet.
D tajapunit kemm?
D tajdidt kemmi?
D tajmilt ara yuɣalen s tfaska-a i tnaẓurt Anisa i d-yelḥan yiwen n umecwar igerrzen di tẓuri.
D tajmilt i umussnaw ameqqran Mulud Mɛemmri.
D taksumt d nnefs, d umenzay iɣef iteddu.
D takuct.
D tallit yebḍan ɣef sin yiḥricen.
D taluft.
D talwit i awen-d-ǧǧiɣ.
D talwit i nebɣa.
D tamacint usired yettεemmiren sufella.
D tamara i iteggen nnmara.
D tamaynutt kemmi?
D tamcumt tenɣa iman-is.
D tamcumt teqcict-nni.
D tamcumt.
D tamdint n Ucwaya deg Arjantin i d-yezgan deg unẓul maḍi n umaḍal.
D tameddakelt n temẓi.
D tameddit.
D tamelḥant.
D tamerbuḥt tmeɣra yes-s.
D tamettan di tudert.
D tamezwarut d tneggarut.
D tameɛlalt n tedmarin mmi-s iɣunza tuṭṭḍa.
D tameɣra n Nnbi ṣṣaleḥ.
D tameɣra n taddart.
D tameɣra n tejmilt, ideg ara cennun ddeqs n yicennayen imeqqranen.
D tameɣra n wuḍrif.
D tameṭṭut i tella, ayen i as-yehwan ad t-texdem, ur cliɛeɣ ara deg-s.
D tameṭṭut tamcumt i yettassmen si tarbibt-is.
D tameṭṭut tamzwarut i d-yegren afus deg unnar-a n usideg n yifecka.
D tameṭṭut yesmaren leɛṭer ɣef uqerru n Yasuɛ.
D tameṭṭut-is?
D tameṭṭut-iw, tfahmeḍ?
D tameṭṭut.
D tamsalt qerriḥen mi ara nexẓer tilawt.
D tamurt n baba i cedheɣ.
D tamurt-aki I deg i d nekker, i yugin leqrar.
D tamusni n yibki awessar.
D tamuɣli ara ibedden s wudem n llsas d tumast tamaziɣt.
D tamɛayt n ixeddamen imcumen.
D tamɛayt n ufellaḥ d yinisi.
D tamɛayt n yiɣes n temtunt.
D tamɛayt n zerriɛa n uxeṛdel.
D tamɣart a d-griɣ weḥd-i.
D tamɣart i d taxeznaǧit n uxxam.
D tamɣart iɛuhden taḍsa.
D tanekkit, meḥsub tebɣa kullec i iman-is kan.
D tannumi ad tt-id-tafeḍ deg tmetti am wakken yelmed bnadem ayen nniḍen.
D tanzarin n aɛli abennay.
D taqbaylit i d idles-ik.
D taqbaylit i d idles-is.
D taqbaylit i d idles-iw.
D taqbaylit i d idles-nkent.
D taqbaylit i d idles-nneɣ.
D taqbaylit i d idles-nsen.
D taqbaylit i d idles-nsent.
D taqbaylit i d iseɣ-ik.
D taqbaylit i d iseɣ-is.
D taqbaylit i d iseɣ-iw.
D taqbaylit i d iseɣ-nneɣ.
D taqbaylit i d iseɣ-nsen.
D taqbaylit i d iseɣ-nsent.
D taqbaylit i d iseɣ-nteɣ.
D taqbaylit i d tafat-ik.
D taqbaylit i d tafat-im.
D taqbaylit i d tafat-is.
D taqbaylit i d tafat-iw.
D taqbaylit i d tafat-nneɣ.
D taqbaylit i d tafat-nsen.
D taqbaylit i d tafat-nsent.
D taqbaylit i d tafat-nwen.
D taqbaylit i d tudert-ik.
D taqbaylit i d tudert-is.
D taqbaylit i d tudert-iw.
D taqbaylit i d tudert-nkent.
D taqbaylit i d tudert-nneɣ.
D taqbaylit i d tudert-nsen.
D taqbaylit i d tudert-nwen.
D taqbaylit i d yemma-k.
D taqbaylit i d yemma-m.
D taqbaylit i d yemma-s.
D taqbaylit i d yemma-tsen.
D taqbaylit i d yemma-tsent.
D taqbaylit i d yemma-twen.
D taqbaylit i d yemma.
D taqbaylit i d-lemdeɣ ar imawlan-iw.
D taqbaylit i d-ḥefḍeɣ ar imawlan-iw.
D taqbaylit i d-ṭṭḍeɣ ar imawlan-iw.
D taqbaylit i lemden ar yemma-tsen.
D taqbaylit i lemdent ar yemma-tsent.
D taqbaylit i lemdeɣ ar yemma.
D taqbaylit i nebɣa mačči d akersi.
D taqbaylit i nelmed ar yemma-tneɣ.
D taqbaylit i nettnadi mačči d akersi.
D taqbaylit i telmed ar yemma-s.
D taqbaylit i tlemdem ar yemma-twen.
D taqbaylit i tlemdeḍ ar yemma-k.
D taqbaylit i yelmed ar yemma-s.
D taqbaylit kan i d tidet.
D taqbaylit kan i d tutlayt n imawlan-iw.
D taqbaylit kan i d tutlayt-nneɣ, fiḥel ad d-nexleq tutlayt.
D taqbaylit kan i d tutlayt-nneɣ.
D taqbaylit kan i yettezzin deg allaɣ-iw.
D taqbaylit kan i yi-islemden imawlan-iw.
D taqbaylit kan i ɣ-iceɣben.
D taqbaylit kan i ɣ-yerḥan.
D taqbaylit tlemdeḍ ar yemma-m.
D taqbylit i d idles-nwen.
D taqcict ur ṛebban yiran.
D taqcict ɛeddaɣ, d tameṭṭut ur iwiḍeɣ ara.
D taqejjirt n ugujil i tesɣersen taṛakna.
D taqejjiṛt ugujil, i yesɣeṛṣen taṛakna.
D taqerruyt n tɛekkwazt i yeɛewjen.
D tarbaɛt n yinselmen imeṭṭurfa, ineqqen s yisem n ddin.
D tarewla kan i ttargun yilemẓiyen-nneɣ.
D targit i yurga.
D tarmit ur nettwaman.
D tarwa i trebba tninna.
D tarwiḥt i terfed di tɛebbuṭ-is i tt-yesfaqayen s ubeddel-nni.
D tasa n umṛabeḍ!
D tasa uṛumi!
D tasdawit i d-yekkren d umennuɣ ɣef tugdut.
D tasnareft taserdasit i yettreṣṣin deg Lezzayer.
D tasɣunt yerzan tawennaṭ d useḥbiber ɣef Lqaɛa.
D tawejjiṭ uqelwac.
D tawenza tuɛkist.
D tawḥidt, ur tufi win iwumi ara teḥku tabaḍnit.
D tayri-ines tamezwarut i iruḥen am waman n udfel.
D tayri?
D tayuga n uwtul d uyaziḍ.
D tayuga n yezgaren.
D tazrazaɣt tasurit, tewwi-d xmesṭac seg ɛecrin deg tmaziɣt.
D taččurant am wacemma, allen d tiberkanin terna-asent tamuɣli yersen.
D taččurant d tagrurzant.
D taɛekkemt ẓẓayen.
D taɣallit kemm, neɣ?
D taɣawsa i kem-rran.
D taɣaɣa i d aɣersiw meqqren akk deg ddunit.
D taḍsa n buzelluf ɣef lkanun.
D taḥeǧǧaǧt n tmes ur nettnus.
D temẓi i ixeddmen ɣef temɣer.
D temẓi-k i d-temmektiḍ?
D temẓi-w i d-mmektiɣ.
D tewnef kan i y-iwwin.
D teɣrit s tuqna.
D tibbulɛeḍt i tesbbulɛuḍeḍ.
D tibkit n zzan, i yeɣeẓẓen izan.
D ticraḍ ɣef uglim, d awal ur nerdim.
D tid yezrin neɣ tid i d-iteddun.
D tidet dɣa, iberdan akk ssufuɣen?
D tidet dɣa, tettuḍ amulli-k?
D tidet i d-nenna;
D tidet ibeddel mačči d cwiṭ.
D tidet tzewǧeḍ? ur iyi-d-sxurruḍ ara, ini-d tidet.
D tidet ur iyi-tesxaṣṣeḍ deg wacemma.
D tidet, akken i d-kkren amzum d atmaten neɣ xir.
D tidet, d yiwet n tebrat ɣezzifen.
D tidet, kemm d tahuskayt.
D tidet, s imal yettnerni wegraw.
D tidet, uguren-is ggten s waṭṭas.
D tidet, yella wayagi imi ttɣimin deg udrar kra ara yekk wass.
D tidet.
D tidyanin akk i d-yettuɣalen.
D tigi i d lbaṛakat swayes i ten-iburek baba-tsen.
D tigzirt ur yezmir ad yaweḍ yiwen ala s teflukt.
D tijdidin kunemti?
D tijdidin?
D tikci.
D tikci?
D tikelt taneggarut deg i as-sliɣ.
D tikelt tis tlata ara d-tɛeggdeḍ fell-i.
D tikerkas!
D tikkelt tamezwarut ara d-nerzu ɣer da, maca nwala-d yiwen n uzayez aqbayli i iḥemmlen idles.
D tikkelt tamezwrut i d-yusa ɣer Tazmalt.
D tikkelt taneggarut i t-walaɣ.
D tikli i d-heggan yiseqquma n yisnawiyen akked yigensasen inmula n Bgayet.
D tikti n ḥedd nniḍen?
D tikti timegzit.
D tiktiwin tizedganin.
D tilawin i iḥudden.
D tilemẓit iḥemmlen tudert.
D timaynutin kunemti?
D timaynutin?
D timdehhebt n lekmam.
D timdukal-ik merra-nsent?
D timdukal-im merra?
D timelḥanin.
D timenɣiwt n Yuḥenna Aɣeṭṭas.
D times n walim kan.
D timeyyatin n tlawin, yal yiwet di taɣult-is.
D timsebridin kan ara yegnen gar iɣallen-iw
D tin ara ixedmen axxam-is.
D tin i cedheɣ i yi-ittun.
D tin i d-inedhen deg yiwet n tmacint uṭṭun rebεemya, uqbel ad teffeɣ anda-nniḍen.
D tin i d-yewwin amaynut i tezlit taqbaylit.
D tin i yi-yeḍṣan i d i yi-yesrun.
D tin n diri yakk.
D tin n zik, d tin n tura.
D tinna i d tameddakelt-ik?
D tinnuzya, tid yenɣan idles, tussna akked d Mass Budyaf.
D tinuḍin, meɛna d tiyissetmatin.
D tiqcicin i terza temsalt n zzwaj.
D tiqeccaḍin i yesserɣayen izeɣwṛan.
D tiqit seg umaḍal.
D tirgin ḥafi.
D tiririt kan i nerra i yesteqsiyen-is.
D tisin n Mmi-s n umdan.
D tislatin iḥerzen.
D tisukraf naɣ d aqerdun.
D tisuqqas i d-yettmirin deg wuglan n tlafsa.
D tixsi ay n udem-ik.
D tiyita izemten.
D tiyita n qli u qleb.
D tiyita n uwanek i iga Gayed Ṣaleḥ.
D tiyita ur d-nettak idim.
D tiyitwin n lmut.
D tizemmrin i yellan s waṭas deg tmurt n Leqbayel.
D tiɣin n ṣṣrima, uqbel aserdun.
D tiɣirdemt ddaw uẓru.
D tiḥerci-s i as-yettaken sser.
D tiẓgi Tamaẓunit i imeqqren akk deg umaḍal.
D tiẓgi yemseččen.
D tnaẓurt Malika Dumran.
D ttebcira l-lxiṛ.
D tuccḍa-w.
D tudert i ččureɣ.
D tudert n Amadou yessishilen abrid i tkeṛyas d medden di tɣaltin n Maristes.
D tuffra n uɣyul deg utemmu.
D tugniwin.
D tukerḍa i yi-d-ukren si tmurt n Iɛebṛaniyen.
D tukksa n unẓaḍ seg uqeṛṛu.
D tukyist.
D tullist i d-bdiɣ rriɣ-tt ɣer rrif am yiḍrsen-iw akk.
D tumert a wid iḥemmlen taẓuri.
D tuqqda i d ddwa n uqraḥ n uzagur.
D tutlayt ay d asalel n yidles.
D tutlayt taqbaylit i d asirem n imawlan.
D tutlayt taqbaylit i d asirem n wegdud.
D tutlayt taqbaylit i d asirem-is.
D tutlayt taqbaylit i d asirem-iw.
D tutlayt taqbaylit i d asirem-nneɣ.
D tutlayt taqbaylit i d asirem-nsen.
D tutlayt taqbaylit i d asirem-nteɣ.
D tutlayt taqbaylit i d tafat-is.
D tutlayt taqbaylit i d tafat-iw.
D tutlayt taqbaylit i d tafat-nneɣ.
D tutlayt taqbaylit i d tafat-nsen.
D tutlayt taqbaylit i d tafat-nsent.
D tutlayt taqbaylit i tafat-nwen.
D tutlayt-nneɣ i nebɣa ad tali.
D tuylayt ay itteqqnen iɣerfan ɣer yimezwura-nsen, ɣer umezruy-nsen.
D tuzyint n tidet
D tuzzya ara xedmen ɣer ukkuẓet n twilayin i usenɛet n tmezgunt.
D tuɣalin s akal.
D tuṭṭḍa i nteṭṭeḍ ilili, neqqar-as telha lbenna-s.
D tzeqqa n tmeɣriwin n Laɛzib Uheddad ara d-yesdurin tameɣra-a.
D ubeḥri-nni ḥlawen.
D uccen.
D ucmiten i yettcemiten.
D uffir.
D ufrik i t-id-tesɛa yemma s.
D ugur ameqqran!
D ugur!
D ul-ik i tt-ibɣan mačči d keččini.
D ul-iw i tmeḥneḍ.
D ul-iw i tt-ibɣan mačči d nekkini.
D ul-iw yes-m i d-imeǧǧden.
D umennuɣ ɣef tutlayt d yidles.
D umennuɣ ɣef yidles d yiles d tumast n ugdud ur ntettu.
D umlan yelhan i as-fkiɣ.
D urar kan.
D urawen n ulac i d-nufa deg-sen.
D useffud yesmentagen.
D ushil.
D usnerni n tutlayt tamaziɣt di tmetti.
D ussan n lyali, yettneqlab yigenni.
D ussan nettat tekkat.
D ussan ur yeḥbis ugeffur.
D uḍan i kerheɣ ad d-mmektiɣ.
D uḍuḍ af leḥyuḍ.
D uḥṛic.
D wa i d annay i fernen yiqbayliyen.
D wa i d asaḍuf ar ɣur-neɣ.
D wa i d axxam-nneɣ.
D wa i d lmektub-iw.
D wa iwumi qqaren s umata: Tasnilest tasenselkamt.
D wagi i d asirem n yal taqcict yewwḍen ɣer tizi n zzwaǧ.
D wagi i d isem-iw ay at leɛraḍ.
D wagi i d isem-iw swayes ara d-tneddhem ɣur-i, si lǧil ɣer lǧil.
D wagi i d iswi n yal amejjay i yettqadaren tawuri-ines.
D wagi i d lexlaṣ-iw.
D wagi i d lqanun yeɛnan lberṣ.
D wagi i d lqanun yeɛnan ṣṣfa n igellil i ihelken lberṣ.
D wagi i d Ɛisu i d-iǧǧan Idumiyen.
D wagi i yes-s tebna tfekka?
D waki?
D waniwa i tennuɣeḍ?
D wanwa ara d-tedduḍ?
D wanwa ara temlileḍ tameddit-a?
D wayen akk i ɣ-icudden.
D wayen akk yezgan yid-neɣ.
D wayen deg-s yellan.
D wayen i d aɣ d-iṣaḥen.
D wayen i iɛeddan.
D wayen ur nelhi.
D wayen ɣef̣ i ɛetbeɣ.
D weltma-k di tuṭṭda.
D weltma-s i as-tt-imlan.
D weltma.
D wezɣi ad idireɣ d urgaz yecban wagi seddaw yiwen n ssqef.
D wid uɣerbaz alemmas i ixeddmen ikayaden d imezwura.
D wid yessusemen ɣef lmerta-s i s-yettarran tajmilt assa.
D widak i d isefra imezwura n Ben Muḥemmed.
D wigi i d arraw n Busmat, tameṭṭut n Meẓyan.
D wigi i d arraw n Meẓyan, i s-d-ilulen di tmurt n Kanɛan.
D wigi i d arraw n Ɛada, tameṭṭut n Ɛisu.
D wigi i d arraw n Ɛisu.
D wigi i d iderman n Sidi Ɛic akked tarwa-nsen.
D wigi i d iderman n wat Betṛun.
D wigi i d iderman n wat Cimɛun.
D wigi i d iderman n wat Quṛaḥ.
D wigi i d idlisen akk yura Zinun.
D wigi i d imeqranen-nsen.
D wigi i d lehduṛ i sen-inna baba-tsen, mi ten-iburek.
D wigi meṛṛa i d arraw n Qatura.
D wigi meṛṛa i d arraw n Yuqtan.
D wigi meṛṛa i yuɣalen d tnac n leɛṛac n Isṛayil.
D win akken i d-ilulen deg uxxam-iw ara yi-iweṛten.
D win ara d-yawin lehna.
D win ara s-d-yerren awal i uɣref.
D win i as-d-iseɣlin tuɣmas-is.
D win i d iswi-w.
D win i yettarran tamawt i kullec.
D win i yettnawalen i yessawalen.
D win i yextar ad s-yili d amεiwen deg icaliyen-is.
D win kan i sεiɣ.
D win tettṛebbi i teṭṭef deg irebbi.
D win yennumen lahyuf.
D win yeččan lkacir.
D winna iwmi qqaren ungif n taddart.
D winna kan a Ɛacur!
D yelli-k ɣriba.
D yemma-k, ur teṭṭilliḍ ara ɣef leɛra-s.
D yemma-s akked watmaten n Yasuɛ.
D yemma-s, ur teǧǧi aman ad nneɣlen!
D yir bnadem i iṛekzen.
D yir lfal, ma yerreẓ ubuqal.
D yiwen i d-yeǧǧan leqdic meqqren u mazal yezmer ad yeqdec sya ar sdat.
D yiwen i yumnen s umennuɣ ɣef tutlayt-is.
D yiwen n umdan yettaṭṭafen dima deg wawal-is
D yiwen n uqcic yettaɣen awal.
D yiwen n uqcic yettsetḥin.
D yiwen n urgaz asebri, yettarra kan s ul-is.
D yiwen n urgaz i ibedden mliḥ ɣef leqdicat.
D yiwen n useggas i d-yeǧǧan ccwami.
D yiwen seg iwudam n tmucuha-nneɣ.
D yiwen uklucaṛ kan itessen lbira.
D yiwen urgaz yuklalen tajmilt tameqqrant.
D yiwen uɣbel ameqqran i d-ttmagaren akk meden.
D yiwet gar tddukkliwin timezwura di tmurt-nneɣ deg wayen yeɛnan leqdicat i t-xeddem.
D yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun i d-tturaren yimezdaɣ n taddart.
D yiwet n tegzemt m snat n tigawin.
D yiwet n terbaɛt i icennun akken i iwata.
D yiwet n tmacahut tamecṭuḥt i iyi-d-tettmal yemma mi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ.
D zheṛ i d yir amcum.
D zzin n tidet.
D zzit timqeddest, ḥesbet-tt d timqeddest.
D zzyada kan ara d-griɣ
D Ɛemru ben Lɛaṣ i yestɛemren Maṣer s yisem n tneslemt.

Dayi?
Daymi i as-fkan azal meqqṛen tmura n umaḍal.
Daymi i d-thegga isragen uziggen n tɣuri d uwehhi n yiselmaden-a.
Daymi i ffreɣ.
Daymi i iqeddec ula deg yiṣenfaṛen n usideg n kra n yidigan d yifecka n tsenselkimt.
Daymi i ttwalin kra n waggagen, yewwi-d aḥader seg tikti-a i izemren tegber tikti-nniḍen.
Daymi i εerrḍen ad skecmen deg wallaɣ n yimdanen abaɣur n ugama d yimɣan-is.
Daymi tt-kerhent akk tullas.
Daymi ur iyi-d-yerri ara tiyita.
Daymi yessaweḍ ad d-yedlu ɣef ayen yeffren deg tmetti.
Daɣ netta akka i d-kkren wid terza taluft n tissulya.
Daɣen ad as-nefsi.
Daɣen d tagnit akken ad qerben acemma ɣer tudert icudden ɣer tmetti daɣen ad ttun lemḥan d tmental iɣef ttwarzen.
Daɣen d tagnit i usekfel n yimedyazen imaynuten yuɣen abrid n usefru.
Daɣen!
Daɣen, ad yesɛu tamkarḍit akked tzeqqa i tɣuri d uselmed n teqbaylit.
Daɣen, i wanwa uɣur ara d-teggri tedrimt n yiqeddicen-is yenzan?
Daɣen, ussan-a kan i yeldi yiwen n lǧamaɛ d amaynut.
Dda Amer Mezdad
Dda Bṛahim inna i iqeddacen-is: Qqimet dagi kenwi d uɣyul.
Dda Bṛahim inna-as: Ɣur-k ad tawiḍ mmi ɣer dinna!
Dda Bṛahim irra-as i Feṛṛuǧa, inna: a-tt-an tqeddact-im ɣur-m.
Dda Bṛahim iǧǧa-d ayen akk yesɛa i Isḥaq.
Dda Bṛahim iɛezl-d si tqeḍɛit-is sebɛa n tzamarin.
Dda Bṛahim yerna yenna: Ahat ad ilin dinna ṛebɛin?
Dda Bṛahim yumen Ameɣlal, dɣa Ameɣlal iḥesb-it d aḥeqqi.
Dda Mḥend yesserwet iḍelli irden.
Dda Sliman d amedyaz ifazen akk.
Dda Sliman iceyyeɛ afrux ifirelles ad s-d-yawi lexbar n tmurt.
Dda Ɛli isɛa-d: Karim akked Ḥamid, akken i llan iderman-nsen.
Dda Ḥemmu inna-yas: D acu i ɣ-txedmeḍ akka?
Dda Ḥemmu isawel i Isḥaq, inna-as: Ziɣ d tameṭṭut-ik!
Dda Ḥemmu, agellid n Girar, iceggeɛ ad s-d-awin Feṛṛuǧa.
Dda Ḥmed yesbedd-d aɣerbaz Axxam n Tmussni.
Ddabax n uḍar yuɣ-d amaḍal d tirni.
Ddac, ddac!
Ddan akken d acu i ddan.

Ddumt-d deffir-iw.
Ddunit am lmesbeḥ, tettaɣ, txessi.
Ddunit d lmaɛira.
Ddunit i yelhan ad am-tt-id muddeɣ.
Ddunit la tettirẓig, iṭij la ixeṣṣi.
Ddunit mecṭuḥet, tudert wezzilet.
Ddunit merra d tamurt-is, d inebgi i ḥemmlen medden.
Ddunit tesɛa sebɛa iqudam.
Ddunit tettezder cwiṭ cwiṭ deg tiselbi.
Ddunit tewseɛ, tudert anda ma teddiḍ tella, anda tensiḍ ad yali wass.
Ddunit trennu ur tettaẓ di lbaṭel.
Ddunit trennu, tettaẓ di lbaṭel.
Ddunit ur tebni deg yiwen wass.
Ddunit yečča-tt lbaṭel.

Ddunit, d mm leɣṛuṛ.

Ddunit-a merra teqleb, amzun tuḍen i lebda.

Dduzan-nni ixdem-iten meṛṛa s nnḥas.

Ddwa n uɣyul d aɛekkaz.

Ddwawi d iwellihen n yimejjayen.
Ddwawi iyi-sganen.
Debdebeɣ fell-am.
Ded uḥeggan ur ttɣafaṛ, ur ttmenṭaṛ ay aḍaṛ!
Deffir n yimensi d tamɛayt.
Deffir weɛrur-is Neɣ ɛinani?
Deffir-s kan, ulin-d kra n yinelmaden yeqqaren deg uɣerbaz-a, cnan-d imsiɣret “Aɣerbaz-iw”.
Deffir-sent kan tecna-d tlemẓit Bundawi Anya, tizlit-nni “Asaru” n Malika Dumran.
Deg tawant iman yerreẓ.
Deg Fransa, tetten imekli leǧwahi n tis snat n tmeddit.
Deg Leqran yenna-d itran mmugen ad trejmeḍ yes-sen ccwaṭen.
Deg Lezzayer, anda teddiḍ d araju.
Deg Maṣer tura d lɛesker i iḥekmen.
Deg Tizi Wezzu, arraw n Bgayet, ternuḍ Tubiret.
Deg Tizi-Wezzu, arraw n Bgayet, ternuḍ Tubiret.
Deg Tlemsan tettili-d yiwet n tfaska iwimi semman: Ayrad.
Deg Usammar, yal mi d-ilul wayyur.
Deg Uxxam n umezgun Ɛebdelkader Allula i nwulef nettabaɛ ticeqqufin n umezgun.
Deg Uxxam-a n Tmussni, ttwajerrden akka tura tesɛin n yinelmaden, gar warrac d tullas.
Deg acu tebɣiḍ ad temmuzgeḍ deg tesdawit?
Deg acu temxalaf tmuɣli-k ɣef ayla-s?
Deg allaɣ-iw i s-giɣ tilas.
Deg anwa asensu ara tittiliḍ?
Deg ass amynut nessaram.
Deg ass n lǧemɛa i nella?
Deg ayen ara rren i tikta s ifukal, tteggzen bab-itsent.
Deg ccna n usaran, yella Sliman Cabbi, Ḥmed Ḥemmu, Ccix Nurdin, d wiyaḍ.
Deg dqiqa yuli wagu ɣef wudem-is.
Deg igenni i la tettqissiḍ.
Deg iqiḍunen kan i ttɛicin.
Deg iseggasen-nni n sebɛin ccumren akk iḥeffafen imi medden ttaǧǧan acekkuḥ.
Deg iḍudan-is i yettɛuddu.
Deg lawan n uzemmur deg tissirt n ugummu-a i yettmahal.
Deg lawan-nni, nettagad tiqcicin.
Deg lemsaq-a i tzedɣeḍ?
Deg leqdic-nwen.
Deg leǧwayeh-a i tzedɣeḍ?
Deg leɣben kan i yeggan, i d-yettenkar.
Deg leεnaya-k εreḍ amek ur iteffeɣ uqjun-nni ɣer berra.
Deg leεnaya-m εreḍ amek ur iteffeɣ uqjun-nni ɣer berra.
Deg lweqt swaswa!
Deg sbiṭar ttmektiɣ-d kan acḥal d tisegnatin iyi-ičexxben.
Deg seṭṭac Yennayer alef u ttɛemya u tniyen u ttɛin, yejbed Cadli Ben Jdid iman-is deg tselwayt n tegduda.
Deg sin abrid ur ɣezzif.
Deg snat n tmeslayin-a yeggugan i ttekkan ɣer yiwet n tutlayt.

Hattan tura d tamɣart!
Hattan, tayi d tikti.
Haṛun ad isserɣ daɣen si lerwayeḥ-agi gar lmeɣreb akked lɛica, mi ara yettṣeggim tiftilin n lmeṣbaḥ.
Haṛun ad iṛucc s idammen-is idisan meṛṛa n uɛalṭar.
Haṛun d warraw-is xedmen akken i sen-d-inna Musa.
Haṛun irra-as: Di leɛnaya-k, ur reffu ara, a sidi!
Haṛun issusem, ur d-inni acemma.
Haṛun izweǧ akked Ilicaba, yelli-s n Ɛaminadab, weltma-s n Naḥcun.
Hder akken tebɣiḍ.
Hder cwiṭ, fhem aṭas.
Hder tura ɣer umikru.
Hdeṛ-as, d kečč ara s-ittaken lehduṛ ara yini.
Heblen ɣef teqbaylit.
Heblent ɣef teqbaylit.
Hebleɣ ɣef teqbaylit.
Hedden, hedden, akka yakk medden!
Heddren akk ɣef tikkelt.
Heddren kan s yimi, deg unnar ulac!
Heddren kan ɣer yiri n lkanun.
Heddreɣ tahungrit.
Heddreɣ-ak, tugiḍ ad tfehmeḍ.
Heddreɣ-am, tugiḍ ad tfehmeḍ.
Heddreɣ-as ɣellin-as.
Heddreɣ-as, tugi ad tefhem.
Heddreɣ-as, yugi ad ifhem.
Heddreɣ-asent, ugint ad fehment.
Heddreɣ-awen, tugim ad tfehmem.
Heddṛen akk medden ɣef tsertit.
Heddṛen akked Yasuɛ.
Heddṛen s teqbaylit.
Heddṛen ur faɛlen.
Heddṛent s teqbaylit.
Heddṛeɣ s teqbaylit.
Heddṛeɣ ṣṣwab, ismeɛṛiq.
Hedren ala γef uyennat, ayen i nnan inin drus.
Hedṛet!
Hedṛeɣ-as i mmi, ifhem mmi-s n ɛemmi.
Heggan akk iman-nsen.
Heggan asuref.
Heggan waman-is.
Heggan-as akeṛṛus-is i Ferɛun, dɣa iṛuḥ, s netta, s lɛeskeṛ-is.
Heggant i waffug.
Heggant-d leqdicat i lmend n yennayer.
Heggaɣ iman-iw s lemɣawla.
Heggi usu uqbel naddam.
Heggi usu, uqbel ad tennudmeḍ.
Heggi-aɣ icriḥen.
Heggi-iyi-d imensi.
Helkeɣ lehlak d imexfi, wehmen ṭṭebba, ɛewqen.
Hennan-as i yelli-tsen.
Henni iman-ik seg-sent!
Henni iman-im seg-sent!
Herrsen-as-d tikedt ad tt-isew.
Hess-iyi-d qbel ad truḥeḍ.
Heyyan-as-d asarag.
Heyyaɣ-ak-d tanatamt.
Heḍren yid-neɣ.
Hitler yenɣa ugar n setta imelyan n wudayen.
Hraw ubrid-nni agejdan.
Hraw userwal-is.
Hraw yixebbic-is yuɣal d aḍṛef.
Hudden akk axxam-nsen.
Huru, huru.
Hus ay aɛudiw, kulci d tanaṣlit, tissit n ccrab d tanamit.
Huz adaw-im.
Hḍer!
I Iɛeggalen n tddukkla n twennaḍt Amgud d wid n tdukkla n waddal n taddart Taḥanut.
I ak-in-uzneɣ d talwit ay aɛziz-iw.
I ak-yefkan lerbayeḥ aṭas.
I am-yefka lbext teṭfeḍ-t.
I as-buddeɣ d iqcicen.
I asen-d-yeqqimen ḥala ssber.
I aɣ-xedmen.
I baba-m-aki anida yezdeɣ?
I baba? Mazal-it idder?
I bniɣ d wi ɛellaɣ, yal ṭṭaq deg-s lemri.
I bniɣ d wi ɛellaɣ, yal ṭṭaq ɛedleɣ ladris.
I bniɣ wi ɛellaɣ, yal ṭṭaq s dheb iruc.
I d as-nnan yiḍulan-is.
I d-bnan yispenyulen.
I d-greɣ mmi ɣer dduḥ.
I d-iddan s leswam ɣali.
I d-isuli yiwen n ufus.
I d-ittaǧǧan taɣawsa, d tukksa.
I d-iḥal s tezmert-is.
I d-iḥmel wasif, i d-yewwi d lelwaḥ.
I d-iḥmel wasif, ur d-yewwi ara.
I d-iḥmel wassif, yewwi-d ariḥan.
I d-nejbed seg ufniq aspenyuli n Simancas.
I d-nudaɣ deg tmura, rniɣ-d tiɛwinin.
I d-tettheyyi tdukkla tadelsant adrar n fad.
I d-tewwi d lmuǧahdin, ad nečč imensi ad nezhu.
I d-tewwi d lmuǧahdin, ad nečč imensi ad nqesser.
I d-tuzneḍ a Nnbi s axxam.
I d-tuzneḍ a Nnbi ɣer-sen.
I d-yefkan aṭas i ssinima d tezlit taqbaylit.
I d-yegra ɣur-k ass-a.
I d-yegran yeshel.
I d-yellan deg tallit taterkit.
I d-yeqqaren ma yella tantaliwin n Tefriqt Ugafa d yiwet n tutlayt?
I d-yeqqaren timsirin lqayen.
I d-yernan lferḥ i wul-iw.
I d-yerzan ɣur-s.
I d-yesduqqusen wid yeǧǧa yiseɣ.
I d-yettmenni lxaṭer-iw.
I d-yettmeslayen ɣef tmerniwt n Bgayet.
I d-yewwi uɛemṛani.
I d-yurew ṭṭir lḥeṛ, terna-d lfeṭṭa.
I icebḥen, d isɣi.
I icelɛan, ala win terza tyita.
I icennun d urrif, i iceṭṭḥen d lkif.
I iceṭṭḥen d aserwal.
I iɛeddan d tletmiyya u xemsa u settin n wussan.
I iɛeddan deg lmuǧahdin, ay igeḍman n uteffaḥ.
I iṛebba lqayed di leɛli.
I iṛuḥen, ur teddiḍ!
I kem i iɛegben temẓi-w.
I kem, a Kafar Naḥum, tewwḍeḍ igenni?
I kemm?
I kemm d acu i txeddmeḍ dagi?
I kenwi?
I kečč d acu d rray-ik?
I kečč d acu i k-id-yewwin ɣer da?
I kečč, acuɣer i tnekreḍ sgellin mi k-id-steqsaɣ fell-as?
I kečč, d acu i zemreɣ ad k-t-xedmeɣ, a mmi?
I kečč?
I lamara-ni i ɣef nemsefham?
I laẓ n tezmert yunez.
I lbaz imkeḥḥel, cbu-yas taɣeggaṭ.
I lbiε?
I lebda ad am fkeɣ lferḥ.
I lebda am llufan.
I lebɣi-nneɣ ad nessnerni.
I lehna n twacult-nwen.
I lemmer ur telliḍ
I limer ad aɣ-ifaq a Tasedda?
I lmend n tfaska-nni dɣa, yettunefk-ak warraz Kaysa Xalifi n usideg.
I lqerḥ akked lferḥ.
I lufan ur ak-t-id-tettakk ara.
I ma d taluft ur nesɛi ara tifrat?
I ma nnan-iyi-d Isem-is?
I ma nniɣ-k ar melmi aselmeds tmaziɣt deg ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu?
I ma tḥemmel argaz d aberkan, acu yellan deg-s?
I ma yella ur tt-ufiɣ ara?
I ma yessuter-as aḥutiw, ad s-ifk azrem?
I ma yeẓra-t d uletma-s, dayen tenger?
I nekk, anwa ara y-id-iqedcen?
I nekk i d-uɣeɣ adlis-a, mačči i tmeṭṭut-iw.
I nekni!
I neqma n tbenɛemmet.
I neqma sut lḥara.
I nesedhaw dderya-nneɣ.
I nessaram d tujjya iɛǰlen i kra yellan d amuḍin.
I netta i neǧǧa rray aneggaru.
I nudaɣ deg temdinin.
I sebɛa yid-sen, d dderya i s-d-tesɛa Bilha i Si Mḥemmed.
I seṭṭac yid-sen, d dderya i s-d-tesɛa Zilfa i Si Mḥemmed.
I sin ttbinen-d xedmen-tt.
I snat di leɛqeli-iw reggint.
I tafat-im ttwaliɣ.
I taggara ad kem-ẓreɣ.
I tecbeḥ!
I telha!
I tessexdem Fransa.
I teɛmer temdint.
I teḍra yid-i a yemma.
I tikkelt tamenzut deg tudert-iw i ḥulfaɣ i wabɛaḍ yeqbel-iyi akken lliɣ s tidet.
I tin yuɣen sin, acu ur tessin?
I tiwin?
I tiṭ tkeḥḥel-d, qrib ur tt-neɛqil ara.
I tmeṭṭut d umennuɣ.
I tmeṭṭut rran lekben nnan-as kemm d taɛkumt.
I tmeṭṭut rran lekben, nnan-as kemm d taɛkumt.
I tmeṭṭut yefka lqima, d tayemmat am Lezzayer.
I tneṭweḍ anda?
I trebḥeḍ a tudert llan wid i kem-iḥemmlen!
I tt-id-yewwin d at nnif ɣer taddart-nneɣ.
I tudert!
I tudert-nsen sɛan aɛwin.
I tuffɣa yelhan seg tezɣent ideg nella.
I tura amek i d ixef-is?
I tura d acu i d tifrat?
I tura melmi ara ssiwḍeɣ akka ayen i bɣiɣ?
I tura mi d-tiwim taqbuct-a acu ara txedmem yis-s?
I tura tfarḥem?
I tura tzemrem ad d-telhum d yelli?
I tura ur tettfakkam ara?
I tura, d acu tenniḍ?
I tura, melmi ara xedmeɣ ɣef wexxam-iw?
I txeddem ddunit taɣeddart.
I tyerras deg ulawen.
I tɛencuṛin-iw, acuɣer i tent-id-tukwreḍ?
I tḥeṛceḍ ay Iblis, tečča-k tmes.
I tḥeṛceḍ ay iblis, tečča k-tmes.
I ubrid usennan, arkas azuran.
I ubrid win i yeffɣen, ur k-yettɣiḍ ma yegrireb.
I ubɣur ad n-yekcem.
I udellaɛ i mu yekkes lqaɛ, d acu ara as-d-gen yifassen.
I umbeɛd?
I umrar yettara i feẓ.
I urgaz terna tmeṭṭut.
I urgaz-im? iɛemmed-am akka ad tettalliḍ di tkerwas ?
I usemekti, yetturaǧu ukayad n taggara n uɣerbaz amenzu seldazekka n larebɛa.
I userwet?
I usmekti d usiweḍ, tameddit-agi deg lwilaya n Bgayet.
I usmekti, yiwet n tmes yecban ta, tekker deg temdint n Skikda sin n yiseggasen aya.
I usmekti, ɣef wawal n yimḍebbren n Uxxam-a.
I uzekka anwa i yeẓran?
I uzenzi?
I wacu ara uẓumeɣ?
I wacu i tɛeṭṭleḍ annect-a?
I wacu i yekcem lḥebs?
I wacu iṣleḥ Buzid? i waman d yiẓid.
I wacu, d acu n ssebba mi tt-yeɛzel deg wusu.
I wacu-t tura wagi?
I wahil i d-yellan deg wussan-agi n Remḍan akked unebdu?
I wakka i lhan yemdukal.
I wakken ad arunt tilwiḥin n tnilwin s tmaziɣt.
I wakken ad nessiweḍ ɣer yiswi n tezrawt-a.
I wakken ad nẓer amek i d-yella usmekti.
I wakken ad taf amkan i as-ilaqen, ilaq ɣef tsedduyin d yimḍebbren d yimezdaɣ, ad xedmen ayen zemmren.
I wakken ad yili beddu unṣib, ad d-yili usenɛet n yisura imecṭaḥ.
I wakken anelmad ur ihellek ara iman-is s ttexmam, d tɣuri ur d-nettawi agemmuḍ.
I wakken tamεayt ad tεeddi, ad taweḍ γer yiswi, ttadren-d yal tikkelt iγersiwen akken ad sen-tishil tegnit.
I wakken, tasuta-agi tamirant neɣ tid i d-iteddun ad issinent amezruy-nsent.
I wanwa teqqazeḍ aẓekka-nni?
I wass mi ffɣen s adrar, amek ara ten-iɣḍer lemnam.
I wass-a mi yi-d-thesseḍ.
I wass-a yella kra n umaynut
I wawal aqesḥan, err awal aẓidan!
I wawal ma ad iyi-d-yali.
I wayen yuran fell-as?
I wid ixesren, ɣur-wat ad tfeclem!
I wid yebɣan ad slen aẓawan aḥlawan n teqbaylit d yisefra zeddigen
I wihida amek tura sser-nsen.
I win yebɣan ad yafeg.
I win yesṭebṭuben, tleddi-as-d.
I wudem n Feṛṛuǧa, Ferɛun ixdem-as leḥsan i Dda Bṛahim.
I wudem n Rebbi, fehmet tasa n tyemmat.
I wudem-im ad yeslufu, aẓegdef i yeḍla i wuzzu.
I wugar n yisallen, siwlet ɣer wuṭṭun-a.
I wul-im uqbel ad tkellxeḍ-t.
I wul-iw deg-m ufiɣ.
I wumi taɣerma n Maṣaṛ ma s ukraf i tebna.
I wumi yefka awal?
I y-iɣaḍen d leɛmer-iw.
I yeksan ddaw n udrar.
I yelha!
I yelli ur tḥarem ara deg-s?
I yemma-k ad d-tegg abazin.
I yessetma-s? Mačči yid-neɣ i llant?
I yessnen lmesk, d aɛeṭṭaṛ.
I yettimɣuṛen ala agudu.
I yettmeččan d ulawen mačči d udmawen.
I yettqelliben, d win iḍṛuṛan.
I yettuɣaḍen d ageswaḥ-nni n Ṣayddu akked yixeddamen-nni i t-yecban.
I yettwaḥerzen.
I yettɛawaden d ameyyal.
I yeɣriɣ d lefhama.
I yi-d-yefnan kan d imeṭṭawen.
I yimaḥbas-aki ḥuq ur ten-ttɛassan ara?
I yinexḍaben i d-yettasen.
I yisteqsiyen-aki akk ihi mebla lmaɛna?
I yiɛeggalen irkkeli.
I yuɣen irgazen ur ttrun!
I yuɣen irgazen, ur ttrun!
I ɣef tres tikti n ureqqeɛ n ugadir n Lqesba n yimweḥḥden.
I ɣileɣ d lmalayek.
Iaɛdel ma thudd neɣ teɛmeṛ.
Iaɛdel n wass d yiḍelli.
Iaɛdel n wayrad d inisi.
Ibabaten n warrac umren ayendin s leqdic-a igerrzen, ladɣa imi iselmaden-a ur d-ssutren ara lexlaṣ.
Iban Tom yusem.
Iban ad tt-yexdem kan Tom.
Iban akk!
Iban akka ara teffeɣ.
Iban d axxam n Yillu, d tabburt n igenwan.
Iban d aɣrib ara mteɣ.
Iban kan d kra n tlufa meqqren i d-yiwi.
Iban mačči d ayen i kem-yecqan.
Iban sani ileḥḥu..
Iban sani leḥḥunt.
Iban sani tleḥḥum.
Iban sani tleḥḥuḍ.
Iban ulac iḍes daɣen ass-a.
Iban ulac win ara yagin tunṭict am ta!
Iban ur d-tecliεeḍ.
Iban ɣef wudem-is yefreḥ.
Iban ɣef wudem-is yeskiddib.
Iban ɣef wudem-is yesmesxir.

Iban ɣef wudem-is yezɛef.
Iban ɣef wudem-is yeɛya.

Iban ɣef wudem-is yuḍen.

Iban.
Ibat, ur yefhim acu yeḍran.
Ibecc deg userwal-is.
Ibecc-it Ṛebbi.
Ibedd Masil yeqqar anazal ɣef tewwurt.
Ibedd Tom.
Ibedd af tfednin.
Ibedd yibellireǧ ɣef yiwen n uḍar.

Ibedden yetwehhem
Ibeggen-as-d Yillu i Ferɛun, ayen ara yexdem.
Ibekkem-it Ṛebbi.
Ibellireǧ ixla lɛeṛc.
Ibennu mebla aqbuc, mebla aqnuc.
Ibennu mebɣir takurt.
Ibennun lebṛuj ɣer cceṭ.
Iberdan akk kkren, zun drus aya mi tɛedda tegrewla.
Iberdan akk sufuɣen.
Iberdan d ilmawen, abeḥri d asemmaḍ.
Iberdan mačči yiwen, win tebɣiḍ awi-t.
Iberdan merra sufuɣen.
Iberdan n tudrin akk kif kif-nsen, zzin, nnḍen, ḥerṣen.
Iberdan n usirem d tudert.
Iberdan ruḥen mxalfa.
Iberdan-nneɣ ttgelgilen d aman m'ara twet lehwa.
Iberriqen teffɣen-d deg lexrif mi teṣḥa lehwa.
Iberru i yimeẓẓuɣen-is.
Ibeɛɛacen d iqelwacen, kkren-d s izem ad t-qqacen.
Ibeεbayen-nni, ttaǧǧant-ten din.
Ibeẓẓed i medden s ameẓẓuɣ.
Ibgaytiyen i tettwalim akka, ur tettuɣalem ara ad ten-twalim.
Ibki yettɛanad.
Ibn Xeldun mačči d amaziɣ, si Lyaman i d-yefruri.
Ibn Xeldun; amusnaw n tmetti anmezray.
Ibn Ɛarabi; ussnan n taderfgama n wandalus.
Ibna dinna aɛaltaṛ i Umeɣlal, dɣa yendeh s yisem n Umeɣlal.
Ibna dinna aɛalṭar i Umeɣlal.
Ibna dinna aɛalṭar, isemma-as Il, Illu n Isṛayil.
Ibra i ṭṭbel deg waman.
Ibren yiles-iw.
Ibren-d agaru, ikyef-it.
Ibubb ini azeggwaɣ.
Ibunda kkaten-d deg tsemhuyt n umwan.
Iburek-iten, mkul yiwen s lbaṛaka-s.
Ibɣa ad iweṣṣi mmi-s.
Ibɣa ad iḥkem deg-k, lameɛna, kečč ɣleb-it.
Icab am yilis.
Icab weqcic ur yuklal.
Icay isɛa-d Dawed, agellid.
Icaḍ-as akka, azekka ad d-rnuɣ tifyirin niḍen.
Icaṭ!
Icbuyla ččuren d zzit.
Iccelqaf imeslayen.
Iccer ur iban d aksum, ur iqqim d iɣes.
Icceɛṛef, am burebbu.
Iccuɛben ttexmam yeqruref seg wayen isummet d tissi.
Icebba-yi Ṛebbi yella kra n yiwen di texxamt-nni n zdat.
Icebba-yi Ṛebbi yella wi yellan di taxxamt-nni n zdat.
Icebbuben-is, d imezran iwraɣen.
Icedha ad tt-iwali.
Icedha aṭas arraw-is.
Icedha tayri n tala.
Iceffaren d yisekranen yettmenṭaren deg yiberdan.
Iceffu mliḥ.
Iceggeɛ-iten i baba-s, ifka-as-ten d aɛwin i ubrid.
Icelbaḍ, tifiriwin akked ccwami ɣef wudem-is.
Icemmeɛ-it Ṛebbi.
Icenga ad ffɣen, ih, neẓra nezmer.
Icennayen n unebdu fkan tiyita i teqbaylit.
Icennayen n unebdu rẓan ccna aqbayli.
Icennayen n unebdu rẓan taqbaylit.
Icennu "A tamurt-iw", syin yeqqar "Awi-d lviza ad nruḥ"!
Icennu akken i ilaq.
Icennu dima mara iteccef.
Icennu s teqbaylit.
Icennu s tutlayt taqbaylit.
Icennu s ṭṭelq n ugerjum-is.
Icennu tizlit tamḥaddit.
Icennu ɣef tmurt-is.
Icennu γef tegmat u yekkat di tmettan i yettawin ḥala wid lεali.
Icerreg lebḥeṛ, mwexxaṛen waman.
Icerrew-d azemmur ɣer ucellaf.
Icerrew-d azemmur ɣer ucerraɛ.
Icerrew-itt meṛṛiɣet.
Icerriqen n yiṭij ɛeddan-d si ṭṭaq.
Icettiḍen, akken llexsen, nettawi-ten-id deg yiqaẓalen ɣef yizugar-nneɣ.
Iceyyeɛ-ak-n Tom kra n tɣawsa.
Iceyyeɛ-am-n Tom kra n tɣawsa.
Iceyyeɛ-awen-d Tom kra n tɣawsa.
Iceyyeɛ-iyi baba ad as d-aɣeɣ ccemma.
Iceyyeε ixeddamen-is i wakken ad as-d-muqqlen uccen.
Iceɣɣeb-aɣ yimal-ik.
Iceḥḥed mliḥ ublaḍ-nni.
Iceṛṛeɛ deg wayen ur yelli.
Iceṛṛeɛ deg wur yelli.
Icfa-d i lebḥeṛ mi yeṛɣa.

Irgazen am wigi, ɣas ḥerkin, lsan, ddan d Fransa, mazal tezdeɣ deg-sen teqbaylit.
Irgazen d tlawin d yigerdan.
Irgazen kettben, iḥezzazen ḥettben.
Irgazen lxalat, wwin-d abrid la cennun.
Irgazen n tura d ttimina.
Irgazen seḥsaben fell-am awal.
Irgazen-agi d imeksawen, ttṛebbin lmal.
Irgazen-nni tɛeǧǧben, nnan: Anwa-t wagi?
Irgazen-nni ugaden, iffeɣ-iten leɛqel.
Irgazen-nni ṛuḥen syenna, rran ɣer Sudum.
Irka di ddunit.

Kečč ad tt-tfakkeḍ deg idlisen umezruy.
Kečč ay isli, ay amnay aras.
Kečč d amakar.
Kečč d amakur.
Kečč d amasay.
Kečč d amdakel-iw.
Kečč d amezzgar n lxiṛ.
Kečč d amẓad neɣ d aṛeḥwi?
Kečč d aqezzab!
Kečč d asaḍ-iw.
Kečč d aṛumi.
Kečč d bu sin wudmanwen.
Kečč d ilemẓi.
Kečč d imɣi-w n ṣṣaba.
Kečč daεdaw-iw.
Kečč mačči n da, neɣ?
Kečč s timmad-ik ur teẓriḍ ara anda i tegreḍ iman-ik.
Kečč tessneḍ mliḥ taqbaylit aru kan taqbaylit.
Kečč tettneɛtabeḍ ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit.
Kečč tetturebbaḍ i ccwal!
Kečč tettxemmimeḍ kan ɣef teqbaylit.
Kečč ur tsɛeddaḍ ara tabuzeggaɣt.
Kečč ɣur-k lḥeqq, ma d nekk ḍelmeɣ.
Kečč, anezzarfu n ddunit meṛṛa, ur tḥekkmeḍ ara s lḥeqq?
Kečč, d amenḥus.
Kečč, d ugur deg ubrid-iw!
Kečč, s timmad-ik, tessneḍ agdud-agi, iḥemmel ad ixdem ayen n diri.
Kečč, ur tufiḍ d acu i ak-yettruḥun.
Kečč, wet aẓru-nni, ad d-ffɣen seg-s waman, imiren ad isew ugdud.
Keččini a gma, a bu sebɛa teḥzamin.
Keččini am zzit, dima s ufella.
Keččini ay isli, a ddeḥ bu lmerǧan.
Keččini ay isli, tissas n yizem aweḥci.

Lameɛna aseggas wis sebɛa, ur ttxeddmeḍ ara, eǧǧ-it ad isteɛfu.

Lameɛna ur iṛuḥ ara.
Lameɛna win ara yenɣen amdan, d lmut ara yemmet.
Lameɛna win iɣef ara d-iɣli, ad t-imḥeq.

Lameɛna xedmen-asen am imezwura.
Lameɛna yerra afus-is ɣer daxel, dɣa yeffeɣ-d gma-s.
Lameɛna yuli-d yiwen n wagu si lqaɛa, issew akal meṛṛa.
Lameɛna, Ferɛun ur wen-d-ittḥessis ara.
Lameɛna, a tawaɣit n win ara yilin d ssebba n uɣelluy!
Lameɛna, ad ḥasbeɣ lǧens-nni i ten-irran d aklan.
Lameɛna, di leɛnaya-k, mmekti-yi-d ass mi ara tiliḍ di liser.
Lameɛna, mi iwala yekker-d waḍu, yugad.
Lameɛna, nekk ad wen-iniɣ: ur ttgallat s wacemma.
Lameɛna, netta yugi.
Lameɛna, nutni ɣilen d akeɛrer kan i yettkeɛrir.

Llan akka tura yirgazen iwumi nezmer ad nsemmi iseflan.
Llan daɣen sin n yisenfaren i icudden ɣer usesfer awurman n tutlayt akked ulqaḍ n tefyar;
Llan daɣen wiyaḍ, am Evernote i zemren ad sqedcen medden meṛṛa.
Llan daɣen yisenfaren ɣer sdat, maca ɣef wakken ttwaliɣ ad ɛeṭṭlen.
Llan dinna yid-s?
Llan imawlan ttaken-aɣ-d affud s wawal yelhan.
Llan imawlan ur ḥemmlen ara tiremt n tmaziɣt.
Llan isertayen iteddun ala ɣef yiɛebbaḍ-sen.
Llan iwudam imugilen.
Llan kra n warrac ur nhedder tafransist deg terbaεt-nneɣ.
Llan kra n wawalen ttawin yid-sen idles.
Llan kra n yiberčečča neqqen wid i ten-itetten.
Llan kra n yisensa ideg ur ddin ara lecɣal akken iwata neɣ ɛad ur bdin ara maḍi.
Llan lulen-d akken ad ččen kan.
Llan mmuten yagi.
Llan qqaren igider, llan qqaren ijider.
Llan sin n yiεeṭṭaren akken kan i ddukkulen.
Llan sin neɣ kraḍ n yimra ɣef tnarit.
Llan ssexlaḍen gar tullist d tmacahut.
Llan tetten ala bibṛas d tzuḍla neɣ tasemmumt ma ufan-tt.
Llan tura yilemẓiyen ur nessin d acu d tidnect.
Llan waman n wasif.
Llan waman.
Llan wid d-yuḥnanen fell-asen.
Llan wid ifehmen, ttaɣen idlisen n teqbaylit, i lemɛawna kan.
Llan wid yebɣan ad sizedgen amawal n tutlayt-nneɣ.
Llan wid yegganen deg ass, xeddmen deg iḍ.
Llan wid yekkaten ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit.
Llan wid yeqqaṛen tinijwal i tujjal.
Llan wid yeqqaṛen ulac Ṛebbi.
Llan wid yettfaṛaṣen tagnit i wakken ad d-jemεen aṣuṛdi.
Llan wid yettnaɣen ɣef teqbaylit.
Llan wid yettruḥun akken kan ad walin, neɣ ad ɛiwnen ma zemren.
Llan wid yettɛassan ɣef teqbaylit.
Llan yagi mmuten d tirni.
Llan yeḍrisen ur ddin ara d temsirin n tjerrumt.

Maca ayɣer?

Mary d tamɣart-iw.
Mary tɛawen Tom.
Marzuq Tewwati yettwaḥbes ɣef ulac di lawan deg wid yesdermen tamurt ttḥewissen deg iberdan.
Masin d Weṛdiya rewlen si taddart.
Masinisa yella iseɛɛu aṭas inebgawen igrigiyen.
Mass Aselway, iɛeggalen n tesqamut inebgawen n lɛez d lḥerma.
Mass Caɛban Mahdi, yemmeslay-d ɣef wayen yettilin seg umnar n tewwurt ɣer daxel.
Mass Deḥman At Ɛli i yuran amawal n tfizikt.
Mass Mebruk Sennun, Farid Idrisi akked tnaẓurt Bahiya Ḥamdi i yi-d-ixedmen unuɣ i wammud-iw n yisefra.
Mass Neṣṣaḥ Ɛmer, i d-yennan: “S lferḥ meqqren i d-nezdi tawcult-nneɣ tis snat."
Mass Neṣṣaḥ Ɛmer, yerra tajmilt i kra n win i d-yerran i teɣri n uɣerbaz.
Mass Seguin yuɣ-itt-id d tiɣideṭ.
Massa, err-d ɣef yisteqsiyen-iw.
Massinissa d agellid n Numidiya.
Massinissa d mmi-s n Gaya
Massinissa isɛa-d: Yuba, Yugurten, Dihya akked Tiziri.
Mazal ad nezhu ad nqeṣṣer
Mazal ad ternu terwiḥt-is ineẓmi d unegzuzem.
Mazal ayefki teṭṭḍeḍ ɣur yemma-m di tqemmuct-inem.
Mazal aẓar yuɣen di lǧedra yeqquṛen.
Mazal camma deg-i.
Mazal deg-neɣ tekkat.
Mazal ffudeɣ.
Mazal kra ur t-teččiḍ, neɣ?
Mazal llan wid yettnaɣen ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit.
Mazal llan wid yettɛassan ɣef teqbaylit.
Mazal llan widak i yekkaten ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit.
Mazal llant tidak i yekkaten ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit.
Mazal lxir ɣer sdat.
Mazal nesnernay tutlayt taqbaylit.
Mazal nettkemmil leqdic ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit.
Mazal nettwali taqbaylit s wudem n wansayen.
Mazal ssewwayyen timellalin deg lkanun?
Mazal taftilt-nni n tayri tettreqriq deg wul-ines.
Mazal taqbaylit-nneɣ ad tebbeɛzeq.
Mazal tettali tutlayt taqbaylit.
Mazal tettaẓ ar zdat teqbaylit-nneɣ.
Mazal tettkemmil tigawt n usiḍen n yigḍaḍ n waman.
Mazal teḥluli granṭiṭa-nni, err-itt ad ternu tiwwi.
Mazal tidukkla tadelsant Imnar n Tdukli n At Ɛisa Mimun, tettkemmil leqdic-is deg usuddes n yisaragen yemxalafen.
Mazal trennu-d isteqsiyen ay at laɛraḍ.
Mazal ttkemmilen yiminigen leqdicat-nsen.
Mazal tutlayt-nneɣ ad tebbeɛzeq.
Mazal tutlayt-nneɣ taqbaylit ad tebbeɛzeq.
Mazal tuḍneḍ?
Mazal ula d tarda ur tt-id-tusi ara.
Mazal ur d-terrim ara s lexbaṛ?
Mazal ur d-ufiɣ ara yiwen akken
Mazal ur d-uɣalen ara s axxam.
Mazal ur ddimeɣ ula d rray.
Mazal ur fhimeɣ ayen i d-teqqareḍ.
Mazal ur fukkeɣ ara, ihi ad kemmleɣ.
Mazal ur iyi-d-terriḍ ɣef usteqsi-inu.
Mazal ur iyi-tessineḍ ara.
Mazal ur kfiɣ lehduṛ deg wul-iw, mi d-teffeɣ Ribika, tacmuxt ɣef tayet, tṣubb ɣer lɛinseṛ ad d-tagwem.
Mazal ur t-ssarden, mi t-yeɛna ɛezṛayen.
Mazal ur tewjiḍeḍ ara?
Mazal ur teɛyiḍ ara?
Mazal ur tt-yeṛwi ara s tmuɣli
Mazal ur ufiɣ ara ayen i ttnadiɣ.
Mazal ur wulfeɣ ara beṭṭu
Mazal ur yefri uɣbel n tnezduɣin.
Mazal ur yeɣli ara yiṭij.
Mazal yeccelbeḍ wul-iw.
Mazal yeqqar ssneɣ!
Mazal yeḥma uɣrum.
Mazal yiwen, seg mi i d-yusa yeṭṭef amkan ur iḥerrek ara akk.
Mazal ɣur-k i yella ssiwan n Tom?
Mazal ṣṣut-nneɣ ad yebbeɛzeq.
Mazal ṭṭseɣ.
Mazal!
Mazal! Yefka-yi-d ɛecra n wussan ad xemmeɣ.
Mazal-aɣ nlemmed s tmucuha.

Mazal-ikem tuḍneḍ?
Mazal-it d aɛezri.
Mazal-it idder?

Mačči ad tezwarem kenwi.
Mačči akk wid i yi-d-iqqaren: A Sidi!
Mačči akka ara teḍru!
Mačči akka ay ḥṣiɣ ad d-tas.
Mačči akka i tɣil ad teffeɣ tudert-is.
Mačči akka.

Mačči d lǧennet ur bɣiɣ, anida akken llan warrac.

Mačči d tidi i itekksen tiṭuksinin seg tfekka.

Mačči d timenɣiwt i yenɣiɣ.

Mačči d tisdawiyin ara d-iseknen i medden amek ara meslayen.

Mačči d urar.

Mačči da.

Mačči win yekkren yili d ameɣnas.
Mačči yiwen i imxellen deg zzman am wa.
Mačči yiwen n usefru i yura.

Mačči yiwet n tikti i yellan deg uqerruy.

Mbaṭel.
Mbeɛb, irna-d gma-s, afus-is iṭṭef deg ugerz n Meẓyan.
Mbeɛd ad d-ffɣen syenna s ssɛaya tameqrant.
Mbeɛd aneḥbus ɣef leqraya i wazal n ddurt.
Mbeɛd as-d, tebɛ-iyi.
Mbeɛd awal n tazwara n unemhal n uɣerbaz-a amenzu.
Mbeɛd ayagi, ad ffɣeɣ.
Mbeɛd aḥemmal-nni ameqran, sɛan-d arrac.
Mbeɛd indem, dɣa iṛuḥ.
Mbeɛd iṛuḥ izdeɣ di Girar.
Mbeɛd iṛuḥ si tmurt.
Mbeɛd leqdic d unadi d leɛtab n wacḥal d aseggas.
Mbeɛd mi cnan ihellilen ulin s iɣil n Uzemmur.
Mbeɛd mi mḥezwarent snat n tuddar-a Saḥel di Buzgan akked Lqelɛa n At Ɛebbas deg Yiɣil Ɛli di Bgayet.
Mbeɛd mi t-ṣellben, ferqen llebsa-s s tesɣart.
Mbeɛd mi teɛedda twaɣit-agi, teḍra-d tayeḍ i tt-yecban.
Mbeɛd mi yekker uxxam ad yelḥu deg ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles n tmaziɣt n tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmeri.
Mbeɛd neffu ɣer Babil, Yaxunya yesɛa-d Caltiyil.
Mbeɛd sebɛa n wussan n tikli, ilḥeq-it s adrar n Gilɛad.
Mbeɛd talalit n Dda Crif, Ramḍan iɛac mitin n iseggasen.
Mbeɛd talalit n Mahalalil, Qiynan iɛac tmen meyya u ṛebɛin n iseggasen, yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas.
Mbeɛd talalit n Nuḥ, Limix iɛac xems meyya u xemsa u ttsɛin n iseggasen, yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas.
Mbeɛd talalit n Qiynan, Anuc iɛac tmen meyya u xemseṭṭac n iseggasen, yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas.
Mbeɛd talalit n Sarug, Raɛu iɛac mitin u sebɛa n iseggasen.
Mbeɛd talalit n Yirid, Mahalalil iɛac tmen meyya utlatin n iseggwasen, yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas.
Mbeɛd yuɣal-d ikemmel lhedṛa yid-sen.
Mbeɛd, Isḥaq iserreḥ-asen, uɣalen di lehna.
Mbeɛd, iceggeɛ-asen mmi-s.
Mbeɛd, iderman n Kanɛan mfaṛaqen.
Mbeɛd, imudd asfel-nni n ugdud.
Mbeɛd, tesɛa-d taqcict, tsemma-yas Dina.
Mbeɛd, tizlit-nni “Tulawin” n Crif Ḥamani, i d-ɣennant tullas n terbaɛt n ccna n Tdukkkla Imnar n Tdukli.
Mbeɛd, ttarran ablaḍ-nni s amkan-is, ɣef yimi n lbir.
Mbeɛd, uɣal ad tefkeḍ lweɛda-k.
Mbiwel sya!

Melmi kan.

Melmi?
