Melslay-aɣ-d ɣef twacult-im!
Memmi ad ak-telhu.
Menaɣ-ak tamettant ara k-iqeffɛen!
Mendas akked Zehwa llan qqaren akken deg yiwet n tesnawit.
Mendas yeqbel awi-d kan ad mlilen.
Mendas yezdeɣ ɣur xwali-s.
Mendas yuɣ-as awal i ṭṭbib-nn.
Menhu?
Mennan-d ad ḥewwsen ar Legniz.
Mennant-d ad ḥewwsent ar Legniz.
Mennaɣ deg-k a lxaleq, ɛawen-iyi di temcumt-a.
Mennaɣ di Sidi Ṛebbi, a wi yeččan timellalin.
Mennaɣ i teslit lehna.
Mennaɣ-d ad ḥewwseɣ ar Legniz.
Mennaɣ-n deg-k ay aḥnin, a wi yeččan kilu n tasa.
Menneɣ di Sidi Ṛebbi a wi yesɛan kulci deg ufus-is.
Menni-d kra n tɣawsa.
Menwala ad yelhu.
Menwala iɛelleq ssaɛa.
Menwala yerna abuṛṛef.
Menwala yundi taqlaḍt.
Menyif ad ḍseɣ wala ad ttruɣ.
Menyif nnmara taryalt.
Menyif takemmict n tzizwa wala aḍellaɛ n yizan.
Menyif tameṭṭut iḥerzen wala tayuga ikerzen.
Menyif targit yelhan wala yir targit.
Menyif tidet iqerḥen, wala lfuruḥ n lekdeb.
Menyif tidet isseqraḥen wala lekteb issefraḥen.
Menyif tuṭṭist wala tuffiẓt.
Menyif xir ma tessusmeḍ.
Menyif yiwet n tɣawsa sɛiɣ-tt wala snat ad tent-sɛuɣ.
Meqqar mi nella akk da, ad nemcawar ɣef melmi ad nerzu ɣer At Waɛli.
Meqqer anzaren-im.
Meqqer ccmini-ya.
Meqqer gar yimeqqranen.
Meqqer wungal-nni, ahat yewweḍ alef isebtar.
Meqqer, yugar akk medden uderwic-nni.
Meqqert tfawet, aṭas i aɣ-cergen.

Meqqeṛ.

Meqqreɣ.

Merrgeɣ-tt.
Merrḥen.
Meryem tettaḍsa deg-s.
Meskin yeɣli-d si tzemmurt, dɣa seg wass-nni yewwet-it karaf ɣer iḍaren.
Meskin, ulac win i t-id-iwalan.
Meskin, yettagad tili-s.
Meskint terwa lḥif d terẓaganin.
Meskint tettwet yerna tessusem.
Meskint, ulac win i tt-id-iwalan.

Meskud ur medlent wallen-iw.

Messus axxam segmi truḥ.
Mesɛud isɛa-d: Yidir, Amaṛa akked Smaɛil.

Meyyez qbel aneggez.

Meččḥen iḍebsiyen.
Meɛna ad yeglu yes-i ah!
Meɛna ilaq ad yezger tamurt n Lezzayer.
Meɛqulit, at iɣezfanen n ufus.
Meɛtub Lwennas ilul deg Tewrirt Musa deg At Dwala.

Meɣres d ayyur n tefsut diɣen d win n tmedyezt.
Meεna akken iqqar yinzi: limmer i tt-iẓra ufellaḥ tili ur tt-izerreɛ ara.
Meεna ayen akken isεa izreε-it.
Meεna d asurif meqqren i teqbaylit!
Meεna iwεer akken ad t-id-yessufeɣ bnadem imi ɣlay nezzeh.

Meεna temɣi.
Meεna tga asurif.

Meḥrumet ad tettwissel.
Meḥsub argaz ad d-yuɣal d tameṭṭut, tameṭṭut d argaz.
Meḥsub aɣyul ur yuklal ara timẓin?
Meḥsub ilaq ad teqqimem?
Meḥsub ilaq ad teqqimeḍ?

Meḥsub tteɛǧaben-asent?
Meḥsub ur tetteɣ ara akk igumma.
Meḥsub ur yezmir ara ad yerwel Tom.
Meḥsub.
Meṛṛa ṭṭsen, ḥala nekk, ayen akka tqelqeɣ?
Meṛṛa-nkent kunemti d sut miḥyaf.
Meṛṛa-nwen kunwi d at miḥyaf.
Meẓyan iruḥ maca yeǧǧa leḥzen deg taddart.
Meẓyan yeffeɣ-d d argaz iẓewren di ṣṣyada, iḥemmel lexlawi.
Meẓyan yenna-as: I wacu annect-nni n tqeḍɛiyin i d-mlaleɣ?
Meẓyan yenna-as: Kker ad nṛuḥ, ad zwireɣ zdat-k.
Meẓyan yenna-as: Rebḥeɣ, a gma, ur xuṣṣeɣ deg wacemma.
Meẓyan yenna: Ɣef wayagi i yettusemma Yeɛqub!
Meẓyan yeqqar deg wul-is: Qrib ad immet baba.
Meẓẓi deg leεmer, meqqer deg allaɣ.
Meẓẓi meqqer, ilaq ad ɣren!

Mi aken i ttruɣ.
Mi akken i ferḥeɣ.
Mi akken tihint fell-as.
Mi ara ad ikṛeh yiwen, ad iḥemmel wayeḍ.
Mi ara ad iṭṭef deg yiwen, ad iḥqer wayeḍ.
Mi ara ad nili d imecṭaḥ kullec yettban-aɣ-d meqqer.
Mi ara alin s akantu.
Mi ara awḍeɣ ɣer uxxam, ad am-d-ssiwleɣ.
Mi ara d-iḍelq usigna.

Mi ara d-tban gar watma-s.
Mi ara d-tessers twacult učči, tetten deg yiwen n uḍebsi.
Mi ara d-teḍilleḍ a tiziri.
Mi ara d-tlal d teqcict, berrun i wallen-nsen.
Mi ara d-tuɣaleḍ, εeddi-d si tḥanut.
Mi ara d-yaweḍ tura lweqt-ayi n rrbiɛ, ad d-kksen taḍuṭ, ad d-llsen ikerri.
Mi ara d-yaweḍ useggas n tmegra, ur itteffeɣ ara.
Mi ara d-yaweḍ useggas n tyerza, win yuɣen ad iffeɣ.
Mi ara d-yekcem ad t-waliɣ amek ara nexdem akk.
Mi ara heddren teffẓen imeslayen.
Mi ara heddrent teffẓent imeslayen.
Mi ara heddreɣ teffẓeɣ imeslayen.
Mi ara ihedder iteffeẓ imeslayen.
Mi ara iliɣ yid-k ferḥeɣ.
Mi ara imɣureɣ, ad d-ffɣeɣ am kečč swaswa.
Mi ara iǧǧuǧeg lemleḥ, ad isɛu uɛdaw ṣṣeḥ.
Mi ara leqḍen azemmur zik, yettεedday-d γef sin n yiberdan, mgaraden, γer wanda leḥḥun.
Mi ara mɣareɣ, ad d-ffɣeɣ am kemm swaswa.
Mi ara nebdu ccɣel, ḥman idammen, ur nettḥulfu ara s ɛeggu.
Mi ara nexdem akk anect-a, ad nekcem imir ad nẓeḍ.
Mi ara nezmer akka ad tt-neṭṭasi, ad tt-nessed akkit akkayi.
Mi ara nwali acḥal i yettmettaten deg yiberdan.
Mi ara nwali asegzawal aynutlay i d-iga Mass kamel Buεmara.
Mi ara nɛedi ɣer yiḍes, mi ara nsers aqerruy-nneɣ ɣer tsumta.
Mi ara s-ɣerqent i wuccen, yettarra-tt i yibeɛɛucen.
Mi ara slen yegduden, ad rgagin, ad d-teɣli rrehba ɣef Ifilistiyen.
Mi ara sɛuɣ akud, ad d-ceɣleɣ yid-s.
Mi ara tawḍeḍ ɣer uxxam, siwel-iyi-d.
Mi ara tebduḍ taɣuri-s nekk ad iliɣ bdiɣ rekkuɣ ddaw n wakal.
Mi ara terwiḍ tamda, ad d-ikker wallaɣ-is.
Mi ara tetteddu, tettecrurud am tsekkurt.
Mi ara tettmuquleḍ ad tinigeḍ.
Mi ara tettẓallam, ur xeddmet ara am wat sin wudmawen.
Mi ara teṭṭṣem, yiwen ur kwen-isfeɛfiɛ.
Mi ara theddrem, ur teffẓet ara imeslayen.
Mi ara theddreḍ tteffẓeḍ imeslayen.
Mi ara theddreḍ, ur teffeẓ ara imeslayen.
Mi ara tibɛid fell-i ugar dɣa ẓriɣ ad iyi-tettu maḍi.
Mi ara tiliḍ gar wallen-iw.
Mi ara tleḥqeḍ ɣer tlemmas n ubrid, ɣiwel cwiṭ kan.
Mi ara tnehrem, ur hedret ara deg tilifun.
Mi ara ttnaɣen sin, ttḥuddu-ten!
Mi ara tuɣaleḍ, εeddi si tḥanut.
Mi ara wwen yigumma, ɣellin-d ɣef tmurt.
Mi ara wwent tbexsisin akken i ilaq, ttuɣalent d iniɣman.
Mi ara yeffeɣ yiwen seg wid ixeddmen di tiddukkla ɣer unnar, d acu i ilaq ad yini.
Mi ara yelhu lḥal, Tom yettaǧǧa asfaylu-s yeldi.
Mi ara yezweǧ, d taɛezrit ara d-yawi.
Mi ara yeččar yiẓdi-nni, ad t-id-nekkes d afus.
Mi ara yeɣli yiṭij, iyuzaḍ ɛennun akantu-nsen.
Mi ara yi-d-yini umɛellem-iw xdem aya neɣ aya.
Mi ara yili yid-s, akud ur as-yettaki.
Mi ara yuɣal, ad t-yaf d ilem, zeddig yerna yecbeḥ.
Mi ara ɣreɣ aḍris aseklan ad afeɣ awennet di tazwara yettvan-iyi-d icemmet aḍris-nni.
Mi as-ḥkiɣ ɣef wayen i yeḍran terfa aṭas fell-i.
Mi bdiɣ gezzuɣ tuzzuft i fehmeɣ gar urgaz d tmeṭṭut kan i tettili.
Mi bdiɣ ḥelluɣ, suffɣen-iyi-d seg sbiṭar n yimexlal.
Mi d iyi-teǧǧiḍ weḥceɣ.
Mi d tewḍeḍ ɣer sdat n sbiṭar ur ttṣuni ara, d imuḍan i yellan.
Mi d-ddan yidi i teɣzi n wayyur n Remḍan.
Mi d-ddant tlufa ad texreb tnafa.
Mi d-ffɣen si Yariḥu, aṭas n lɣaci i t-itebɛen.
Mi d-ffɣen sɣur Ferɛun, mmugren-d Muḥend akked Mḥend i ten-yuṛǧan di beṛṛa, dɣa ɣlin deg-sen.
Mi d-ffɣen, burken agdud.
Mi d-iffeɣ seg uqiḍun n Nna Feḍmuca, ikcem s aqiḍun n Meɛǧuṭa.
Mi d-iffeɣ, iqqar i wat Iwaḍiyen lumuṛ i s-d-ifka Umeɣlal.
Mi d-ikcem uday n mmi-m, terriḍ iman-im d lmumen.
Mi d-ilul uqcic-nni, Yahuda yufa-t-id lḥal di Kazib.
Mi d-inna ḥatt, ini-as batt.
Mi d-inna, baba yečča yeṛwa.
Mi d-iwweḍ yisɣi, tban tefsut.
Mi d-kkreɣ ufiɣ yiwen agḍiḍ deg texxamt.
Mi d-mmektaɣ ad iyi-d-tali tegrint.
Mi d-nusa, nufa-d agezdu n Tizi Uzzu, yesɛa agellel d ameqqran deg unegmu.
Mi d-teffeɣ seg tesdawit, abrid i as-yehwan taɣ-it.
Mi d-tefli gar tizya, tecba tiziri n ṣṣbeḥ.
Mi d-tefrari tafat, nettat ad tt-yaɣ lḥal deg tebḥirt.
Mi d-teggra weḥds tesɛa lweqt ad txemmem.
Mi d-teldi tawwurt n texxamt-iw, tella tlehhet.
Mi d-teqqimeḍ ɣer tama-w, ad am-iniɣ ṣebb ay amcic.
Mi d-ters tnafa ad dunt tlufa.
Mi d-tewweḍ tmeddit, yufa-t-id lḥal weḥd-s dinna.
Mi d-teḍra tedyant-a.
Mi d-tkecmeḍ deg yimi n tewwurt.
Mi d-tnehreḍ takerrust, muqel deg lemri alemmas d yiqerniyen.
Mi d-tsumreḍ awal, yezmer ad ak-d-iban ixuss ar deqqal.
Mi d-tuddreḍ aqjun, ɣas heggi-d aɛekkaz.
Mi d-tufiḍ amecṭuḥ, aderɣal, tamɣart, amɣar, ɛiwen-it ad yezger.
Mi d-tuki i tikelt tis snat iɣegdan-nni ttwaksen.
Mi d-tusa ɣur-neɣ, d acu i aɣ-tenna?
Mi d-tɛeddaḍ sdat n uɣerbaz d tesnawit, nher s lemḥadra.
Mi d-tṣuḍeḍ s wanzaren-ik, ad nnejmaɛen waman.
Mi d-uɣalen warraw n Si Mḥemmed si lexla, slan s wayen yeḍran.
Mi d-uɣaleɣ ad d-jebdeɣ ayla-w s lfayda.
Mi d-wwḍen imezwura, ɣillen ad awin akteṛ.

Mi d-yekker ad yuɣal.

Mi d-yuki, yaf-d iman-is deg yiwet n tegzirt yestexlan.
Mi d-yusa ɣur-neɣ d acu i aɣ-d-yenna?
Mi friɣ ttuzma-w fukeɣ.

Mi k-walaɣ ad feṛḥeɣ.

Mi sliɣ i lxiḍ yeṣṣerser
Mi sliɣ i uṭaksi yuɣwas, ḥṣiɣ yewweḍ-d wass.
Mi ssulin awal-nsen, yella-d uskasi sɣur wid yellan deg tzeqqa-nni.
Mi sɛiɣ tnac n yiseggasen.
Mi sḍefrent wulli zdat n iɛekkzan-nni, ttarwent-d imecṭuḥen iberqacen, yesɛan izaggen, yerna reqmen.
Mi t-id-ixleq, isemma-yas Adam.
Mi t-iɛreḍ, yugi ad t-isew.
Mi t-qqareɣ ruɣ ɣas akka ur d-ddireɣ ara lewjeɛ n tmeṭṭut-a.
Mi t-teẓra yeffeɣ, tewwet deg tewwurt.
Mi t-walan, seǧǧden, lameɛna kra seg-sen cukken.
Mi t-walan, ttḥellilen-t ad iṛuḥ si tmurt-nsen.
Mi t-walaɣ, d taḍsa-s i d tugna tamezwarut.
Mi t-yewwet ubeḥri, yerra-tt ala i uɛḍas.
Mi tbaɛdeḍ, beɛdeɣ fell-am.
Mi tbeddeḍ medden akk yinek.
Mi tebda tfehhem tuzzuft, tfaq d tullas i as-yetteεjaben mačči d irgazen.
Mi teffeɣ seg temdint, terǧa s yibeddi ɣer ṭṭerf n ubrid.
Mi tefra ad neẓdem.
Mi tefra, ad neẓdem.
Mi tekker ad truḥ, ad taker aḍar.
Mi tella akken deg ssuq, nekk qqareɣ.
Mi temmut tegmert, iɛalleq-as asegres.
Mi temmut yemma-s, iffer aqabac!
Mi ten-iwala, Si Mḥemmed inna: Tagi d leḥmala n Yillu!
Mi ten-iwala, ikker, immuger-iten, dɣa iseǧǧed zdat-sen.
Mi tenheq a d-tebru i tala.
Mi tenṭeḍeḍ s aseɛdi, ad k-inṭeḍ seɛd-is.
Mi teqquṛ teẓgi, cɛel-as!
Mi terfed tmeṭṭut-is s tadist.
Mi tesla m yiɣiɣden izeggen yiḍ, truḥ imir-nni kan.
Mi teswa, ad d-ḍehṛen waman.
Mi tettuḍ lḥaǧa, ad tettwaɣbu.
Mi tewweḍ ɣer din, tebda tḥekku-as-d ɣef lḥif tesɛedda akk si zik s yiznen igerrzen.
Mi tewwiḍ, medden ad k-awin.
Mi teɛreḍ ad temmeslay ad tt-teṭṭef tɛuggent.
Mi teɛya dayen deg ucali, telsa lḥiǧab, tuɣal tettẓalla.
Mi teɣliḍ, ḥedd ma k-yeɛnu.
Mi teṭṭes tessirt, tṛuḥeḍ ad teẓdeḍ.
Mi tfukkem iluɣma ad nɛeddi ɣer usteɣsi-nsen.
Mi tiweḍ yesteqsa-tt-id umsaltu ɣef laɛmar-is.
Mi tjerḥeḍ agrez-ik mačči d tisselbi i tselbeḍ.
Mi tnudaḍ meṛṛa lqecc-iw, illa wacu i tufiḍ inek?
Mi tqerreb s aḍebsi n lḥenni am tin yettqerriben s izem.
Mi truḥ tekfa, ad as-yexlef.
Mi tt-bniɣ, thudd ɣer llsas.
Mi tt-id-kecmen yemnayen, s lferḥ akk d zhu.
Mi tt-iwala akken s taqendurt-nni tenṭeḍ ɣef yedmaren-is, iger-d nnehta.
Mi tt-iwala yebda wul-is yedduqqus.
Mi tt-iɛebba ad as-tmil.
Mi tt-iɛebba, ad as-tmil.
Mi tt-sɣefleɣ ad d-akreɣ iselsa i gma.
Mi tt-teččiḍ, ad tt-iẓid a mmi.
Mi tt-tkemceḍ, Ṛebbi ad tt-ikmec fell-ak.
Mi tt-yefka umnar n tewwurt ɣer ufrag temmuger-itt-id yemma-s s taḍsa.
Mi tt-yekkes zzman si nṣib-iw.
Mi tt-yeẓra s wallen-is neɣ yesla i ṣṣut-is, yettruḥu-yas ɛeggu n lxedma.
Mi ttnadin γef rrif n lebḥeṛ, walan yiwen n wuccen la yeddewwiṛ din, ssawlen-as.
Mi tufiḍ tabexsist, heggi tiqceṛt.
Mi tufrar tagut.
Mi tuner ḥedreɣ,mi yeggul umneɣ.
Mi twala aqcic-nni, yecbeḥ, teffer-it tlata n wagguren.
Mi twala iman-is s tadist, tuɣal teḥqer lalla-s.
Mi tweffreḍ lḥaǧa, ad ak-d-tini anɛam.
Mi txedmeḍ lxiṛ, ad ak-yuɣal d ixmiṛ.
Mi tzegreḍ abrid dayen, ur d-ttuɣal ara ɣer deffir.
Mi tɛedda lɛid, tezluḍ ufrik.
Mi walan itri-nni, feṛḥen yiwen n lfeṛḥ d ameqqran.
Mi waleɣ seg-m.
Mi wwten atemmu, ad t-zeglen.
Mi wwḍen meyya uxemsin n wussan, aman neɣsen.
Mi wwḍen watmaten n Yusef, seǧǧden zdat-s.
Mi wwḍen ɣer Ḥaṛan, zedɣen dinna.
Mi yal yiwen deg-sen yufa tbarat n wayeḍ, mi tt-yeɣra a tt-yeffer, akken ad as-iɛiwed taɣuri.
Mi yebda llaẓ la t-yettḍurru, yemmekta-d taxeddamt-nni n unebdu.
Mi yebges yebda tikli, abrid i yewwi ɣezzif.
Mi yebna lḥaǧa ad tedrem.
Mi yedla Rawubin ɣer lbir, yufa Yusef ulac-it.
Mi yeffeɣ ad ikes lmal-is, yuwi yid-s tajewwaqt-is.
Mi yeffeɣ ɣer lecɣal-is, tesserwateḍ deg yiɛeggalen.
Mi yefka Yasuɛ timɛayin-agi, ittaxxeṛ syenna.
Mi yekcem s axxam, qerrben ɣur-s iderɣalen-nni.
Mi yekfa Yasuɛ lehduṛ, lɣaci dehcen deg uselmed-is.
Mi yekfa iteddu ad iruḥ ɣer tejmeɛt.
Mi yekfa lhedṛa d Abṛaham, Ameɣlal iṛuḥ.
Mi yekfa lhedṛa d Abṛaham, Illu iɛella nnig-s.
Mi yekfa lhedṛa yid-sen, Musa iɣumm udem-is s leḥǧab.
Mi yelluẓ, ad iɣenni.
Mi yelḥeq Luṭ ɣer temdint n Ṣuɛar, icṛeq-d yiṭij.
Mi yemmut, ad nɣeɣ gma Yeɛqub.
Mi yendeh lbuq, ad d-qerrben s adrar.
Mi yendeh unayna, ffɣen-d yinelmaden ɣer ubraḥ ad uraren.
Mi yerfed allen-is, iwala ileɣman teddun-d.
Mi yesla Selṭan.
Mi yesla werǧeǧǧi i tewwurt teṣṣerbek, tebreq tkerciwt-is zun s ujenwi teftek.
Mi yesraḥ aɛdaw.
Mi yessers uḥeddad afḍis, irefd-it mmi-s.
Mi yeswa tiqit yettḥulfu i yiman-is amzun akken yettferfir.
Mi yetti idis yuɣal ɣer tnafa-s ad d-griɣ din waḥdi am bururu. Baba-s yeffeɣ yakkan seg texxamt.
Mi yettwaqecceɛ lǧenn-nni, agugam-nni ihdeṛ-d.
Mi yewweḍ Yusef s atmaten-is, kksen-as aqendur-is.
Mi yewweḍ lewhi n lmeɣreb, ɣef tewwurt n lalla yesqerbeb.
Mi yewweḍ nnig umkan anda yella uqcic-nni, iḥbes.
Mi yexneq iman-is s umrar, yid-s yuwi lbaḍna-s.
Mi yezgen wass, d nnuba n yirgazen ad qegglen.
Mi yezger Si Mḥemmed i usaka n Finyil, icṛeq-d yiṭij.
Mi yezger umecṭuḥ ḥbes, bla aṣuni, eǧǧ-it ad ifak abrid-is.
Mi yezger umeqran ruḥ s ttawil kan.
Mi yečča aṭas, yerra-tt ala i ugergeɛ.
Mi yeččuṛ, ad t-id-jebden iḥewwaten ɣer rrif n lebḥeṛ.
Mi yeɛra yiɣes, ad ak-t-id-yefk.
Mi yeɛya yeqqim fell-as ad yesgunfu.
Mi yeɣli uzger, ṭṭuqqten tferyin.
Mi yeɣli yiṭij, iɣli-d ɣef Dda Bṛahim yiwen n naddam d ameqran.
Mi yeɣli yiṭij, iɣli-d ṭṭlam uṭellis.
Mi yeḥma yiṭij, ayen i d-ittɣimin ifetti.
Mi yi-d-tenna akka, ɣliɣ-d deg nnheq n yimeṭṭi am uqcic amecṭuḥ.
Mi yi-d-tesɛeddaḍ sya.
Mi yuker ḥedreɣ mi yeggul umneɣ!
Mi yuweḍ ɣer lɣerba, yettxemmim kan fell-as.
Mi ččan am yizgaren, ṭṭsen.
Mi ččiɣ imensi, ffɣeɣ ɣer berra ad dduɣ cwiṭ.
Mi ɛeddan kraḍ waguren terfed tadist.
Mi ɛeddan sḥab n tmenṭac, ay igeḍman n remman.
Mi ɛeddan ɛecra n wayyuren, uɣaleɣ ɣer uxeddim.
Mi ɛellqent aẓeṭṭa, ɛeddant snat sneltent-d ilni syen grent-d asaru.
Mi ɣaben yizmawen, ad sreɛrɛen yiḍan.
Mi ṭṭuqtent, gganent.
Mi ẓdiɣ, ad ig Ṛebbi tsaq!
Midyan iǧǧa-d: Ɛiyfa, Ɛifiṛ, Ḥanux, Abidaɛ akked Ildaɛa.
Milmi ara-dd yuɣal?
Mitin alef n yimdanen i t-yesseqdacen akka tura s teqbaylit.
Mitin n wulli d ɛecrin n wakraren i s-yefka d tuččit.
Mjellaben ar wayen iɛeddan.
Mkarracen sin yiɣyal, yiwen ikkat s uzenqeṛ wayeḍ s tkerrac.
Mkerracen sin yeɣyal di tala mi ṛuḥeɣ ad ad d-agmeɣ.
Mkul adar ad isɛu setta n teḥbulin.
Mkul asemekti ad tt-id yesru.
Mkul ass ad itteffeɣ ugdud iwakken ad d-ijmeɛ ayen i s-ilaqen i wass.
Mkul ass ad tefkeḍ aɛejmi d asfel n usuref n ddnub.
Mkul ass s uɣilif-is.
Mkul ass, d nutni i yeferrun timsal n ugdud.
Mkul awal s nnehta.
Mkul ddkeṛ seg warraw n Haṛun ad yečč seg-s.
Mkul dkeṛ ad yili d ayla n Umeɣlal.
Mkul duṛu deg-s ɛecrin n uṣurdi.
Mkul tafsut s tefsut-is.
Mkul tagwest s uzduz is.
Mkul tamurt, ad wteɣ deg-s tameɣra.
Mkul wa amek I as-yufa aqeṛṛu-s.
Mkul wa anida i t-ḍegren.
Mkul yiwen ad d-yawi i wat uxxam-is, akken i tella twacult-is.
Mkul yiwen ad yexdem ccɣel-is s ṣṣwab d lqanun, ad naweḍ ɣer wanda nebɣa.
Mkul yiwen d acu yurga, mkul targit s lmeɛna-s.
Mkul yiwen deg-wen ad iqqim deg umkan-is, yiwen ur itteffeɣ seg uxxam-is ass wis sebɛa.
Mkul yiwen ijmeɛ-d kan ayen ara yečč.
Mkul yiwen ixelleṣ iman-is.
Mkul yiwen s targit-is, mkul targit s lmeɛna-s.
Mkul yiwet txelleṣ iman-is.
Mkul ṣṣbeḥ Sadeq ad isserɣ si lerwayeḥ iẓidanen, mi ara d-ilehhu d teftilin n lmeṣbaḥ.
Mlalen sin igehguhen.
Mlalen yiqerra d yiḍarren yiwet teẓẓel aka, yiwet akken nniḍen.
Mlalen-d meṛṛa deg uzaɣar n Sidim, yeɛni lebḥeṛ amerɣan.
Mlaleɣ yid-sen.
Mlaleɣ yid-sent.
Mlaleɣ-d imawlan-ik iḍelli.
Mlaleɣ-d tabaḥant-iw iḍelli.
Mlaleɣ-t deg yennayer.
Mlaleɣ-t ɣur usensu n Madala, deg Bgayet.
Mlaqacen lhedṛa.
Mlelliɣ.
Mlem-iyi-d d acu i d-tesnulfam.
Mlet-iyi-d abrid ɣer lḥaṛa-s.
Mliɣ-ak d acu ara txedmeḍ.
Mliɣ-am d acu ara txedmeḍ.
Mliɣ-as d acu ara texdem.
Mliɣ-as d acu ara yexdem.
Mliɣ-as nnfeɛ-is, ixdem nneḍṛ-is.
Mliɣ-asen d acu ara xedmen.
Mliɣ-asent d acu ara xedment.
Mliɣ-awen d acu ara txedmem.
Mliɣ-awent d acu ara txedmemt.
Mliɣ-tt i udrar inhez.
Mm twenza n ureɣ, yessawalen i rbeḥ.
Mmaren waman ɣef uselkim-iw dɣa tura yelluɣ wegdil-is.
Mmektan-d?
Mmektaɣ-d ayen i iyi-d-tenniḍ.
Mmektaɣ-d mmi-s n taddart-iw.
Mmekti-d amek i telliḍ zik.
Mmekti-d rriḥa imawlan
Mmekti-d!
Mmektimt-d!
Mmektit-d!
Mmektiɣ-d ussan-nni.
Mmel lwelha i win ur nessin ara tamnaḍt-nni.
Mmel-as a targit, mmel-as.
Mmel-iyi-d igran, ad ak-mmleɣ tilisa.
Mmesfalten taxessaṛt.
Mmeslay!
Mmeslayen-d deg-s ɣef usuter agejdan n tikli-a.
Mmesteqsan amek ttilin, imiren kecmen s aqiḍun n Aderbad.
Mmet!
Mmet, mḍel iman-im.
Mmi Yusef mazal-it idder!
Mmi ad yeǧǧuǧǧug ad yettnerni.
Mmi ad yeṭṭes deg tɣurfatin.
Mmi ad yidir yili.
Mmi amecṭuḥ yesɛa tusut, iḍ kamel yettusu.
Mmi ass-a yettnerni.
Mmi cteddu imɣur.
Mmi d ayazi n tili.
Mmi d itri deg yigenni.
Mmi d izem aheddal.
Mmi d izimer aksas.
Mmi d ssbeɛ bu lkeffat.
Mmi d tamuɣli n ufalku.
Mmi d ṭṭir abeḥri.
Mmi deg yirebbi-inu.
Mmi ileqqeḍ ikesman.
Mmi ur ittṣubbu ara yid-wen!
Mmi ɛzizen yuẓam.
Mmi ɣer yirgazen ifaz, nniɣ-asen d ayen i as-yemla zik baba-s.
Mmi-k ḥseb-it, ḥaseb-it!
Mmi-s n Dan d Ḥucim.
Mmi-s n Uciban.
Mmi-s n medden, d mmi-s n medden, alemma yečča deg ufus-ik.
Mmi-s n sbeɛ ay aḥmam.
Mmi-s n taɣaṭ yečč-it wuccen!
Mmi-s n taɣaṭ, yečč-it wuccen!
Mmi-s n uciban.
Mmi-s n umdan ad ittusellem iwakken ad ittwaṣelleb.
Mmi-s n umdan ad iṛuḥ akken yura fell-as.
Mmi-s n xali yeɣli s uvilu yeṛṛeẓ uḍar-is, dɣa wwint ɣer sbitaṛ.
Mmi-s-nni yenṭeq, inna: Ad ṛuḥeɣ, a sidi!
Mmugen am yiberriqen.
Mmugent kra n lɣelṭat.
Mmugren-iyi-d watmaten-iw di tlata ɣer tewwurt.
Mmugreɣ-d kra n wuguren akken ad d-afeɣ aṭaksi.
Mmugreɣ-d tamesbanit n Yijiliyen Iwraɣen.
Mmugreɣ-tent s tumert.
Mmutent tgeẓẓal-is.
Mmuteɣ s ɛeyyu.
Mmuteɣ si laẓ.
Mmuteɣ.
Mqeṛṛacen cclaɣem.
Mqidec bu lehmum.
Msanfen i iberdan.
Msawalen.
Msawalent.
Mseblan ur ttuhennan.
Mseblaɛen awal.
Msebran ilindi.
Msebɛaden am yigenni ɣef tmurt.
Msefhamen ɣef yiwen wawal.
Msefhamen ɣef yiwen n wawal.
Msefhamen.
Msefhament ad iyi-ceggɛent ɣer texxamt n Kahina.
Msefhament ayen yebɣun yeḍru ur qebblent ara ad zewǧent d yiwen seg yiɛeṭṭaren-nni.
Msefhament.
Msekṛahen am warraw n takniwin.
Mselxiṛ.
Msenfalen s yidim.
Msentan iḍudan deg allen.
Msenɣalen iẓeṛman.
Msenṣalen tiɣeṛdin.
Msenṭaḍen ljayḥa n wa i wa.
Mseččen izerman.
Mseḍfaren wuccanen deg uḥriq.
Mseḥṛaqen taswin.
Mseṭṭalen timira.
Msudanen wid yemḥemmalen.
Msudanen.
Muqel! Ayen ara nemmeslay da gar-aneɣ, ad yeqqim da, ad yemḍel da.
Muqel afus-iḍen ma yeṭṭef aɛekkaz.
Muqel anida ara tegreḍ leεmeṛ-im.
Muqel ass-a ɣer wid yellan yid-m.
Muqel ddexan-ihin.
Muqel deg usinaryu-ya.
Muqel iman-ik!
Muqel iman-im!
Muqel kan anwa i d-ikecmen?
Muqel kan d acu tferneḍ d tagara i umecwar-ik.
Muqel kan d acu txeddmeḍ.
Muqel kan iman-ik ay ameɣbun…
Muqel kan lqut-nni ɣef lmelḥ.
Muqel kan ma yewwa yimensi?
Muqel kan s aqcic-a!
Muqel kan.
Muqel kra ɣer deffir
Muqel ma d ṣṣwab.
Muqel mliḥ.
Muqel s udem-is, ad tissineḍ ul-is.
Muqel san!
Muqel txedmeḍ akken yella lemtel i twalaḍ deg udrar.
Muqleɣ-d!
Muqqel ayen i ak-d-izzin.
Muqqel!
Muqqel-itt.
Muqqel.
Muqqlem!
Muqqlemt.
Muqqlet-tt.
Muqqlet.
Muqran akked Dehbiya ddren tayri-nsen di lbaḍna.
Muqran yerfed aqrab-is, iṣub ɣer ugezdu anda yeɣɣar.
Muqran yettnaɣ akked yiman-is: ul-is yessaram, allaɣ-is yuyes.
Muqran yezga yečča-t wul-is ɣef liḥala n tmurt.
Musa akked Haṛun kecmen s aqiḍun n temlilit.
Musa akked Haṛun xedmen akken i d-yessendeh Umeɣlal.
Musa akked Haṛun xedmen akken i sen-d-yumeṛ Umeɣlal.
Musa akked Ilya ḍehren-asen-d.
Musa iburek-iten.
Musa ihdeṛ i wat Uɣrib.
Musa iheddeṛ, Illu yettarra-as-d si tlemmast n ṛṛɛud.
Musa iɛawed i Umeɣlal ayen akken i s-d-inna ugdud.
Musa iɛeggeḍ ɣer Umeɣlal, inna-as: D acu ara xedmeɣ i ugdud-agi?
Musa iɣawel ikna ɣer lqaɛa, iseǧǧed.
Musa iɣumm udem-is, axaṭer yugad ad imuqel ɣer Yillu.
Musa iḍegger asɣar-nni s aman, imiren aman-nni uɣalen ḥlawit.
Musa iṛucc s idammen-nni, idisan meṛṛa n uɛalṭar.
Musa iṛuḥ, iɛawed i Umeɣlal ayen akken i s-d-inna ugdud.
Musa iṣubb s agdud, ihdeṛ-asen.
Musa tekcem-it tugdi, inna: Slan akk medden s temsalt-agi!
Musa yeddem tameṭṭut-is d warraw-is, isserkeb-iten ɣef yiɣyal, dɣa ṛuḥen ɣer tmurt n At Jennad.
Musa yeffeɣ-d sɣur Ferɛun, iɛenna ɣer Umeɣlal.
Musa yekker netta d Yacuɛa, amɛiwen-is, yuli s adrar n Yillu.
Musa yekker-d isellek-itent seg-sen, dɣa yessew taqeḍɛit-nsent.
Musa yenna i Ferɛun: Ḥaca-k, ay agellid!
Musa yenna i Haṛun: D acu i k-ixdem ugdud-agi armi i t-teǧǧiḍ ixdem ddnub yecban wagi?
Musa yenna i Umeɣlal: A-t-an tenniḍ-iyi-d: Awi agdud-agi!
Musa yenna i Umeɣlal: Di leɛnaya-k, a Sidi!
Musa yenna-asen: D ayen i d-yumeṛ Umeɣlal.
Musa yenna-asen: Ur ttagadet ara!
Musa yenna-asen: ɣur-wat win ara d-iǧǧen seg-s i ṣṣbeḥ.
Musa yenna-yasen: wwtet-tt ihi, ass-agi.
Musa yenna: ad d-zziɣ i inijel akken ad waliɣ d acu-t leɛǧeb-agi!
Musa yeqsed ad izdeɣ s argaz-nni.
Musa yerra afus-is deg iciwi-s, mi t-id-ikkes, yuɣal ufus-is d amellal am udfel si lberṣ.
Musa yerra-as: Mi ara ffɣeɣ seg uxxam-ik, ad ɛenniɣ ɣer Umeɣlal.
Musa yerra-as: Wagi d aɛekkaz.
Musa yerra-asen: Acuɣer akka i tettnadim ccwal?
Musa yesbedd aqiḍun n temlilit, isers tikersiyin, issuli tincirin, isɛedda iɛmuden, isbedd tigejda.
Musa yexdem akken zdat n imeqranen n Isṛayil.
Musa yexdem ayen akk i s-d-yumeṛ Umeɣlal, akken i yexdem.
Musa yezla-t, iṛucc s idammen-is aɛalṭar meṛṛa.
Musa yuli s adrar, dɣa tagut tɣumm adrar.
Musa yura ayen akk i s-d-inna Umeɣlal.
Musa yuɣ awal i uḍeggal-is, ixdem ayen akk i s-d-inna.
Musa, iqbel ayen akken i s-d-inna Haṛun.
Muten
Mutent.
Muḥ Lmulud isɛa-d: Tiyman, Umar, Ṣafu, Gaɛatam akked Qanaz.
Muḥal ad iɛṛeq wudem-im.
Muḥal ad yeddu ɛeryan.
Muḥal fell-am ad beddleɣ.
Muḥal!
Muḥemmed Buḍyaf d aselway n lezzayer yettwanɣan srid ɣef tilivizyu tazzayrit.
Muḥemmed Buḍyaf nɣant di Ɛennaba.
Muḥemmed Uharu d yiwen deg-sen, ɣas ulac-it, maca s wayen i d-yeǧǧa d leqdic d yigerrujen yella.
Muḥemmed Uharun d yimdukal-is, d wid ur nerri ara aḍar ɣer deffir.
Muḥemmed Uharun, ikemmel deg ubrid n tira, dɣa yura ammud n tmedyazt “Abrid n tlelli”.
Muḥemmed netta yenna d lǧenn i d-yerzan ɣur-s ɣer yifri-nni.
Muḥemmed yekka tleṭṭac iseggasen d tiɣri s wamek ddan mya n medden yid-s.
Muḥend Belqasem: Isenfaṛen n usideg n yifecka mačči d leqdic ara ifakken.
Muḥend Belqasem, d amsenselkam.
Muḥend Saɛid Amlikec, d ageldun n yimedyazen.
Muṛad Meẓri: Iwεer s tidet ad d-yemmeslay yiwen ɣef yiman-is.
Mxellen.
Myagren iḍelli d Lwiza.
Myagrent iḍelli d Lwiza.
Myagreɣ iḍelli d Lwiza.
Myaɛjaben, iḍleb-d afus-is.
Myecbaken tiqellaɛin.
Myeffin-d aman si tala n tzerzert.
Myefkan taqemmuct widak yemḥemmalen.
Myeftaḥen tibbura iseqfan.
Myegren tiɣemmaṛ.
Myejguglen am iselfan.
Myejlaqen awal.
Myejraḥen.
Myejraḥent tasa d turet.
Myejraḥent.
Myelhin-d di tyita wa deg wa.
Myelḥaqen.
Myelḥaqent.
Myencaden.
Myencadent.
Myendahen s tyitiwin.
Myenjaṛen, am iɣuṛaf n tessirt.
Myenɣen.
Myenɣent.
Myeqmacen icifaḍ.
Myerjamen.
Myerjament.
Myezɛafen.
Myezɛafent.
Myeǧǧen.
Myeǧǧent.
Myeḥmalen mačči d lhedra n yiles.
Myeḥmalen?
Myeḥmalet gar-awen akken i ken-ḥemmleɣ.
Myeḥmmalen asmi llan meẓẓiyit.
Myeḥmmalen.
Myeḥmmalent.

Nessa agertil ɣer lqaɛa.
Nessaram ad bnun sbitaṛ amaynut di tizi wezzu.

Nessaram d ayen ara ikemmlen.
Nessaram d yiwen n useggas ara d-yeglun s wayen nebɣa.
Nessaram dayen ur ittɛawad ara ad d-yili wannect-a.
Nessaram mačči d taneggarut, acku ad neɛreḍ amek ara nemcarak, ad nemɛawan di kra n leqdic i ubaɣur n timmuzɣa.
Nessaram timnaḍin-nniḍen ad ddment taɣiwant n Iderginen d amedya.

Nessaram ur d-iḍeṛṛu ara i tikkelt-nniḍen.

Nessawaḍ di taggara.

Nnal wa!
Nnan asif ma iḥmel-d, ur t-id-iḥebbes wuffal.
Nnan awal d lfeṭṭa, tif-it tsusmi, d ddheb.
Nnan axxam ur nesεi llsas, ur ittdumu i yimawlan.

Nnan diri wi iqeṭṭεen layas, ccedda d talwit i tt-itebεen

Nnan i Yasuɛ: Tesliḍ d acu i d-qqaren wigi?
Nnan iṣubb-d luṛu.
Nnan iṭij ma icreq-d, ur t-iteffer ara uɣerbal.
Nnan kulci d idrimen, wi ten-yesεan kullec ad t-yekseb.
Nnan kulci ḥudden-as tilas, yelha leḥsab d lmizan.
Nnan medden mačči kifkif, kul wa amek yettak lfetwa.
Nnan tagmat ma teǧhed, yiwen ur yezmir ad tt-yennal.
Nnan takadidralt d axxam n Rebbi.
Nnan temẓi tettufaraṣ, s lḥir i ttεeddin wussan.
Nnan times ma tecɛel-d, tessefsay ula d uzzal.
Nnan ur d-itekk usalas, seg uxalaf umagraman.
Nnan ur yettali wass, ɣef win yewwin daεwessu imawlan.
Nnan ur yettdum lḥif, mkul aṭṭan yesεa ddwa.
Nnan ur yettwakkes sser, ɣef win yellan d lmumen.
Nnan wi isebbeben i leflas, tagara yedda εeryan.
Nnan wi iḍeεfen yettweḥqer, nekkren-t ula d atmaten.
Nnan win ijerrben lmeḥna, yeẓra meskin rẓaget.
Nnan win yeεran di ccetwa, yeḥṣa ccetwa semmḍet.
Nnan yemmut deg ṭṭrad, ma d tidett neɣ d tikerkas

Nnan ḥṛam ɣef tmeṭṭut ad teddem agiṭar.
Nnan, nnan, ad d-yuɣal ar wi t-innan.
Nnan-as Ih, a Sidi!
Nnan-as i uclim: yya ar tessirt.
Nnan-as i uqjun, ad ak-nefk ccɣel n tmeṭṭut. Yenna-as, axir ad gganiɣ amnaṛ.
Nnan-as i wuccen ax ad tekseḍ ulli, yettru.
Nnan-as iwacu telsiḍ short deg taddart.
Nnan-as: A Ccix, neẓra-k belli d aṣeḥḥi.
Nnan-as: A Sidi, ad d-ldint wallen-nneɣ!
Nnan-as: Anda-tt tmeṭṭut-ik Ṣara?
Nnan-as: D amezwaru.
Nnan-as: Di Bit-Liḥim n Yahuda.
Nnan-as: Illu n Imaziɣen iḍher-aɣ-d.
Nnan-as: Kra qqaren: d Yuḥenna Aɣeṭṭaṣ.
Nnan-as: Nezmer.
Nnan-as: Ulac win i ɣ-isxedmen.
Nnan-as: Ur aɣ-d-tewqiɛ ara lmeɛna!
Nnan-as: Wexxeṛ syenna!
Nnan-asent mačči d lawan n umeslay ɣef usemsawi gar urgaz d tmeṭṭut.
Nnan-d Mennad yuɣal-d ɣer ccna, maca ɣas ini tura ifat lḥal.
Nnan-d amek?
Nnan-d d acu yeḍran?
Nnan-d d netta i d yiwen akken
Nnan-d d takumidit usaru-nni ziɣ d adṛam.
Nnan-d daɣen d awezɣi ad tceḍḥeḍ.
Nnan-d deg lpuṣt ccetwa useggas-ayi ad texdem luheṛ.
Nnan-d iruḥ.
Nnan-d nettkukru-ten seg zik.
Nnan-d sṭaxren-kem.
Nnan-d tewteḍ tameṭṭut-ik daɣen ay udem n uḥuli.
Nnan-d tiqcicin kerhen tusnakt, wissen ma d tidet?
Nnan-d tuɣaleḍ d Aqbayli n sserbis ɣer tneggura-yi.
Nnan-d yemmut s fad yiwen umsebrid deg twilayt n Wadɣaɣ.
Nnan-d.
Nnan-iyi-d ad k-d-fkeɣ aya.
Nnan-iyi-d amkan-im mačči gar-aneɣ.
Nnan-iyi-d diri-tt, d taɣezfant iḍudan.
Nnan-iyi-d kemm ur teffeɣ ara.
Nnan-iyi-d susem.
Nnan-iyi-d taɣect-im, tettuɣal-d deg meẓẓuɣen-nneɣ.
Nnan-iyi-d ur xeddmeɣ ara annect-a.
Nnan-iyi-d ur xeddmeɣ ara aya.
Nnan-iyi-d yemmut Tom.
Nnan-iyi-d ɣur-m ad tecnuḍ.
Nnan-t-id widak iɛeddan.
Nnan-t-id yakan yella.
Nnant-d.
Nnaqsa d aqraḥ n umelɣiɣ, yettili-d ugar ɣer tlawin wala irgazen.
Nnaɛma iluqeb-itt walim.
Nnbi Muḥemmed yejreḥ deg umennuɣ n Uḥud, qrib yemmut.
Nnbi Muḥemmed, tazwara d Lquds i yerra d lqebla.
Nndama ur telli.
Nnecraḥeɣ s teḍṣa.
Nnecṛaḥa n uɣyul, d aɣẓaẓ.
Nnefsusiɣ.
Nnegzant akk tirga-nneɣ.
Nnejmaɛen wat n taddert xeṭṭan-t, yeḍreg-asen tala.
Nnejmaɛen-d Ifarisiyen.
Nnejmaɛen-d warrac deg ufrag.
Nnejmaɛet-d, tḥessem-d, ay arraw n Yeɛqub!
Nnekwa-s iddem-itt waḍu.
Nneqs ur t-nseεεu.
Nneqḍaɛent teɣratin deg taddart-nneɣ.
Nneyya tekka di tḥila.
Nneyya teɣleb tiḥeṛci.
Nnezlazeɣ.
Nneɛlat d awal, tisusaf d aman.
Nneɛma teffeɣ-asen afus.
Nneɣ awal-im, kben taɣect-im.
Nneɣlen waman.
Nneṣṛaɛeɣ.
Nnfu, d gma-s n lmut.
Nnif d lḥerma ɣlayen, ur ttnuzzun ara s ddheb.
Nnif izwar lexṛif.
Nnif iḥwaǧ lḥeṛma.
Nnig lewqam, d axeṣṣar.
Nnig wul.
Nniya ulac, rrbaḥ ulac.
Nniɣ ay ulu-inu, kra i ak-yuɣen, henni-yi.
Nniɣ deg yiman-iw ahat d lawan fell-i ad imɣureɣ.
Nniɣ-ak abrid i d-tuwiḍ akka ur yelhi.
Nniɣ-ak ad tt-neddem ad tt-nerr ɣer yimceḍ.
Nniɣ-ak ad yeddu.
Nniɣ-ak ad yelḥu.
Nniɣ-ak kečč a mmi.
Nniɣ-ak yusa-d yiwen ass-a! d aberrani.
Nniɣ-ak-d acḥal d tikelt, ur xeddem ara akken.
Nniɣ-ak-d yagi ur ssnuzu ara.
Nniɣ-am akka, maɛna ɣur-m wi isellen. Ḥader ad as-tiniḍ i ḥedd!
Nniɣ-am kemm a tamɣart, a mm igecrar wessaren.
Nniɣ-am kemm a tamɣart, ay imɣi i d-yurew lḥentit.
Nniɣ-am kemm a yelli.
Nniɣ-am s ssebḥan llah ixelqen, urweɣ tamellalt!!
Nniɣ-am xaṭi!
Nniɣ-am, kemm a yelli, a taxeddact n uzanzu.
Nniɣ-am, kemm a yelli, a taxeddact n yibawen.
Nniɣ-am, kemm a yelli, a taḥbult n yirden mi tnuṛ.
Nniɣ-am, ḥemleɣ-kem a ddin uqabac!
Nniɣ-am-d ttɛassa imeslayen-im.
Nniɣ-as acḥal aya belli taqbaylit mazal ɣur-s irgazen
Nniɣ-as ad iheggi iman-is.
Nniɣ-as ad k-yeεǧeb.
Nniɣ-as ad m-yeεǧeb.

Nniɣ-as ad tiliḍ da lawan n lefḍur.
Nniɣ-as ahat akken i yella lḥal.
Nniɣ-as ahat d ayen yessehbalen.
Nniɣ-as ahat tuɣalemt s axxam.
Nniɣ-as ass-a ad iyi-yawi, ah ya ddin qessam!
Nniɣ-as dayen ad hebleɣ.
Nniɣ-as i Tom Mary tenna-d tidet.
Nniɣ-as i Tom acimi Mary ur telli ara da.
Nniɣ-as i Tom ayen iss i εelmeɣ.
Nniɣ-as i Tom d acu i ttxemmimeɣ fell-as.

Nniɣ-as i tselmadt-iw d acu i ilaq ad xedmeɣ syin d asawen.
Nniɣ-as iwulem ad t-id-ssiẓergeɣ acku d tamsalt i nettidir yal ass.
Nniɣ-as kkes aɣilif.
Nniɣ-as lḥeb yeḍar-as.
Nniɣ-as ur yesɛi ara azref ad iyi-iṣewwer s liḥala-nni.
Nniɣ-as yella kra i ẓriɣ.
Nniɣ-as ṛwaḥ, tenna-d ih!
Nniɣ-as.
Nniɣ-as: Di leɛnaya-m, efk-iyi-d ad sweɣ.
Nniɣ-asen ayen akk ur ḥemmleɣ ara.
Nniɣ-asen kullec.
Nniɣ-asen!
Nniɣ-asen: Win yesɛan ddheb, ad t-id-ifk!
Nniɣ-awen-d: Ad tweṛtem tamurt-nsen.
Nniɣ-d ala lmeɛna-s ala!
Nniɣ-d allaɣ-is yeččur dayen-kan.
Nniɣ-d ayen i bɣiɣ ad d-iniɣ.
Nniɣ-d ih neɣ xaṭ, ul-iw ur yettagi.
Nniɣ-d iẓekwan, mačči izeḍwan!
Nniɣ-d kan zewǧeɣ akken ad d-baneɣ meqqreɣ.
Nniɣ-d tanemmirt.
Nniɣ-d.
Nnmara tezdeɣ deg-i.
Nnumeɣ ḥedd ur y-iḥemmel.
Nnuɣen.
Nnuɣent.
Nnuɣeɣ.
Nnwal n yemma Daɛda d aziḍan.
Nnwaḍer-ik ɣlint ɣer lqaεa.
Nnwaḍer-im ɣlint ɣer lqaεa.
Nnwiɣ truḥeḍ, tilaq ddiɣ.
Nnḍeɣ-am lemlaḥ s uyeffus, tiṭ deg-m ur tettnus, deg laɛnaya n nnbi amekyus.
Nnḍeɣ-am lemlaḥ yeffusi, tiṭ deg-m ur tensi, wwin-tt leǧnun d imensi.
Nnḍeɣ-am lemlaḥ, s ufus aẓelmaḍ, tiṭ tezger akkin agemmaḍ, deg laɛnaya n nnbi Ɛumar.
Nnṣib n lɛebd, am tili-s.
Nqebbel tilawt akken tella.
Nqeddec ɣef teqbaylit, mačči ɣef tutlayt ur nelli ara.
Nqeddec ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit.
Nqesd-ik-id s lfutuḥ.

Nrennu-as di telqi.
Nreqq nettaẓ am usafu.

Nru i sin.
Nruḥ ad nwali asalay n urgaz, maca nufa-t yeqfel.
Nruḥ ass-nni.
Nruḥ deg usikel iḍulen.
Nruḥ gefgafi!
Nruḥ neɣra-d i iɛeggalen n lkumiti ad ɛebbin aɣyul-nni yemmuten.
Nruḥ-d asif asif, lḥal d tameddit.
Nsan deg udrar i yetran, tettfuḥ amzun d lqahwa.
Nsellem-as tazzla i fuffu.
Nsureg-asen i waman.
Nteddu merra ɣer uxxam.
Nteddu ntekkes-d zzeɛter.
Nteddu s yisuḍaf akk, yal wa deg umkan-is, am teɣrast n tzizwit.
Nteddu ɣer tiẓgi akken ad d-nekkes tujjal.
Nteddu-yak di nneqma.
Nteddu-yam di nneqma.
Nteddu-yas di nneqma.
Nteddu-yasen di nneqma.
Nteddu-yasent di nneqma.
Nteddu-yawen di nneqma.
Nteddu-yawent di nneqma.
Nteg!
Nteg.
Nteqqen timeḥremt, nrennu tamendilt ɣef tuyat.
Ntezzi i lebda, ur sani.
Ntteddu s axxam yiwet n tmeddit.
Nudan ad t-ṭṭfen, lameɛna ugaden lɣaci.
Nudan zzayed, ufan nnaqes.
Nudan-as-d anwa ara s-d-ifken tigẓelt.

Nudaɣ fell-awent, ufiɣ-kent.

Nuker-asent tikti-nsent.

Nuli asawen.
Numen s tutlayt taqbaylit.
Numidya tella teṭṭef-d agafa n Lezzayer n tura d tuget seg Tunes.
Nunef i wegraw nerra-tt ar leǧwameɛ.
Nunef-asen kan sfuǧǧuɣen.
Nurar tiqqar ass mi nella meẓẓiyit.
Nurez iman-nneɣ.
Nusa-d yakan akken ad naǧew lqut.
Nutenti ttneɛtabent ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit.
Nutenti ttxemmiment kan ɣef teqbaylit.
Nutni akk d imellalen, ala netta i d azewwaɣ.
Nutni cuban-kem s iḍan.
Nutni ttneɛtaben ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit.
Nutni ttxemmimen kan ɣef teqbaylit.
Nutni ur ssinen acu d tugdut, s ddin kan i leḥḥun.
Nutni wehmen, ttmesmuqalen gar-asen.
Nutni zhan.
Nutni ɣur-sen akud yesɛa azal.
Nutni, d iqeddacen-iw, i d-ssufɣeɣ si tmurt n Maṣer.
Nuɣ axxam.
Nuɣ-d agmer i tessirt d amellal.
Nuɣal d tameṭṭut d tmeṭṭut-is.
Nuɣal d timeddukal.
Nuɣal nbeddel tikli, nettu wid leɛmer ṛwan.
Nuɣal ntteddu afus deg ufus.
Nuɣal-d ɣer llekka qbel ad d-yeɣli yiḍ.
Nuɣal-d, netta neǧǧa-t.
Nuɣeɣ akked gma fell-am.
Nuḥ ibda ixeddem akal, iẓẓa yiwet n tfeṛṛant.
Nuḥ ibna aɛalṭar i Umeɣlal.
Nuḥ ikkes ssqef i lbabuṛ, dɣa iwala ddunit meṛṛa tekkaw.

Nuḥ itteddu akked Yillu.
Nuḥ ixdem ayen akk i s-d-yumeṛ Yillu.
Nuḥ iɛac tseɛ meyya uxemsin n iseggasen.
Nuḥwaǧ idrimen.

Nwan akk medden tamaziɣt d tutlayt.
Nwan d agerruj i yellan ddaw wakal.

Nwan ddunit d awal kan.

Nwant ddunit d awal kan.

Qabel.
Qader iman-ik ad ak-qadren medden.
Qadret ass n westeɛfu, axaṭer ad wen-yili d ass imqeddes.
Qaren argaz bu nnif, ɣlay ɣer medden, yeswa.

Qasi akked Waɛli ulin ɣer taddart.

Qimeɣ.

Qleɛ!
Qqaren akken nebɣu nḥebbeṛ, d Rebbi i yettḍebbiren.
Qqaren d Ḥewwa iwumi meqqer aɛebbuḍ-is tessuṭer-aɣ-d seg lǧenna.
Qqaren ibawen n wuccen, lakin uccen ur ten-itett.
Qqaren lfatiḥa.
Qqaren lmut tettak rraḥa i umdan.
Qqaren yelha leqyas, diri wi i tefṛen iberdan.
Qqaren yewεer nnger, w’ur nesεi dderya yeḥzen.
Qqaren yura d azmam.
Qqaren zik win ur nesɛi aɣyul, d netta ay d aɣyul.
Qqaren ṭsen waman d yisɣaṛen.
Qqaren, ma telha ṭṭejṛa, lfakya-s ad telhu.
Qqaren-as abɛuc neɣ abexxuy.

Seg igenni ad tɣab tafat-im.

Seg ul.

Swiɣ yiwet n lattay ɣer itargiyen tekkat ɣer uqeṛṛu.
Swiɣ yiwet n tberkant, ukiɣ-d din din.
Swiɣ yiwet n tebyirt yekkes-iyi fad.
Swiɣ ḥala mi xbabḍeɣ di lqaɛa.
Swiɣ, sekṛeɣ, ɣliɣ, imir kreɣ.
Swiɣ, yerna tefka i ileɣwman-iw, swan.
Sxesṛen-aɣ zzhu yiḍan.
Sya ar sdat, ad d-yili ula usuffeɣ n tesɣunt ɣef ssinima taqbaylit.
Sya ar yimir, s umedyez ad d-nettmlil deg Yiflisen Umellil.
Sya ar yimir, yegra-d kan ad awen-d-nini afud igerrzen.
Sya d afella, ad d-nheggi yiwen.
Sya d asawen ur ttɣamaɣ ara din.
Sya ɣer da ad tẓebreḍ, ad tessusiḍ.
Sya ɣer da yegguni-iyi leḥbis d ustaɛfu.
Sya ɣer da, tettali-d ɣef usayes deg tmeɣriwin i d-yettilin deg Uxxam-a.
Sya ɣer da, ttilint-d tnagiyin n yiselmaden d yinemhalen i ixedmen yakan deg uɣerbaz-a.
Sya.
Syen akkin ad zellin tisigert i ugdud.
Syenna Yasuɛ ikemmel abrid.
Syenna ara s-d-tawiḍ tameṭṭut i mmi.
Syenna yexfa, axaṭer iṛfedɛ-it neɣ irfed-it Yillu.
Syenna, iṛuḥ, yuɣal s axxam-is.
Syin akin deg unebdu, ad tili yiwet n tesɣert taɣelnawt.
Syin akkin d anamzul n uselway deg walef u ttɛemya u waḥ€d u settin.
Syin akkin, yebda ufraq n warrazen ɣef yinelmaden i d-yufraren deg yal tasmilt.
Syin akkin, yuɣal s axxam.
Syin deg unebdu, ad nruḥ ɣer teftisin anda ara yili, daɣen, leqdic meqqren i yeɛnan awellah n umsider.
Syin ikemmel amennuɣ deg urebbi n umussu adelsan amaziɣ.
Syin tebda teqqar aẓawan n cceɛbi deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu.
Syin yedhem-d ccwal, yerẓa-d tiwwura, yenneqlab uxxam-a ɣef uqerru-is, yiwen ur yefhim d acu i iḍerrun.
Syin yennerna unamek n wawal deg uḍris.
Syin yuɣal-d ɣer tmurt deg walef u ttɛemya u ṛebɛa u xemsin.
Syin ɣer-s ɣer yimerẓi i d-yellan gar yiwen n usdawan d yiwen n uselmad deg ugezdu-a.
Syin ɣer-s, ad yili wass-nniḍen, ad nemmeslay ɣef lemḍarrat n yisufar n tgella ladɣa deg unebdu.
Syin ɣur-s, yeqqim ɛecra n yiseggasen, i wakken ad yernu tasfift-is taneggarut, iwumi iga isem Fliksi-as-d.
Syin, ad nefru taluft akken i d-tewwi.
Syin, ikemmel abrid d asawen akked Mennad, cergen lebḥer d abrid ɣer tmurt n tirga.
Syin, ssawlen i Budyaf ɣer Merruk i waken ad yuɣal d aselwaya n Lezzayer imi ttwaḥebsent tefranin.
Syin, tigzi n tmacint i as-yettwaskecmen ad d-teṭṭef tugna akken ad tsuneḍ i yiɣil-is ad yebdu asuneɣ.
Syin, yessawel-d i yiwen n lǧar-is yeččuren d nneyya daɣ am netta.
Syin, yettwanɣa srid deg wass n tesɛa uɛecrin yunyu alef u ttɛemya u tniyen u ttsɛin deg temdint n Ɛennaba.

Tal tuttra ɣur-s tiririt.

Tamda umalus yugar din mkul ɣerrus.
Tamdakkelt-iw Karima tewwi-iyi-d akadu ass n umuli-w.

Tamdint tamecṭuḥt anida tezdeɣ mazal teṭṭes.
Tamdint-is isem-is Faɛu.
Tameddit akk nettat tessewway.
Tameddit igerrzen.
Tameddit n wass-nni n larebɛa i iɛeddan, tlata deg yulyu zuǧ alaf u seεṭac.
Tameddit ula i nawi.
Tameddit, mi d-yekcem testeqsa-t ɣef wahil n lxedma-ines n uzekka-nni.
Tameddit, ulint-d tjirra, ɣumment amkan-nni anda i sbedden wat Ɛebbas iqiḍunen-nsen.
Tameddit-a, ad ak-n-ceggεeɣ tansa n usmel-nni.
Tameddit-a, ad am-n-ceggεeɣ tansa n usmel-nni.
Tameddit-agi ad asen-iniɣ deg uxxam.
Tameddit-agi d amrar.
Tameddit-nni kan, Cabḥa isserzef-itt urgaz-is s axxam n yimawlan-is.
Tameddit-nni ččiɣ akk tiremt-iw n lmakla.
Tameddurt n temẓi-s di taddart d ttin mu yecfa.
Tamedyazt tjeggeḥ ul-is, d leslaḥ-is gar yifassen.
Tamedyazt, sneɣ-tt lwaḥi d ccna n teqbaylit.
Tamedyezt d iḥulfan n umdan.
Tamedyezt, d awalen neɣ d inzan i d-yeffɣen seg yimi n umdan aqbayli.
Tamegra s isennanen.
Tamegra, d taggara n ddunit.
Tamejjayt-is tegguma, tewwet akk s tezmert-is, terfed ifassen i temsalt-a.
Tamellalt ur tessin ad tt-id-tesseww!
Tamellalt-ik teṭṭeṛḍeq, lɛin-ik iɣeṛṛeq.
Tamendawt tamenzut n Lezzayer tettwaxdem di tzeqqa n sinima di tmanaɣt.
Tameqrant isem-is Nna Feḍmuca, ma d tamecṭuḥt isem-is Meɛǧuṭa.
Tamesbanit-agi uɣur i d-yessawel Umazday ilelli n yinelmaden, tebda seg tesdawit Akli Muḥend Ulḥaǧ armi d lwilaya.
Tamettant d yiwet, d imdanen I yettmettaten.
Tamettant n Ɛebdelḥafiḍ Idres.
Tamettant tezga d tili n umdan seg tlalit-is, armi d tamettant-is.
Tamexluqt n Ṛebbi, ur teṭṭif deg yiman-is.
Tamezwarut, taseddast d tagruma n tnummiwin yellan deg tmetti.
Tamezwarut: Ur kkat tameṭṭut alemma teqneḍ-tt.
Tameɣbunt ur tuksan ara.
Tameɣra meqqren i lfayda n yimeḍharen n tɣiwant-a.
Tameɣra n ccna deg taddart n Taḥanut.
Tameɣra, yiwen wass, aḥebber-is aseggas.
Tameɣra-w? Wi yecfan aya!
Tameɣrast n tayri.
Tameγra n lebḥer urğin telli.
Tameγra n lebḥeṛ urğin telli.
Tameṭṭut ad teḥbes tarrawt anda kan tezmer s uḥebber.
Tameṭṭut cergen akk igerzan-is d tifexsa ad ten-tmerri di tfezza.
Tameṭṭut d amdan, ur tettwaxdem ara kan i warraw.
Tameṭṭut d lsas, argaz d ajgu alemmas.
Tameṭṭut d nettat i d lall n uxxam, tazmert ad tt-id-tesnulfu ɣas akken tefna.
Tameṭṭut d tagersa n uxxam.
Tameṭṭut d tagrawla.
Tameṭṭut d tamda, argaz d targa.
Tameṭṭut d wawal.
Tameṭṭut di tmetti-nneɣ ḥala imeṭṭi i tettaf d arfiq-is.
Tameṭṭut ilaq ad tqader argaz-is ɣas yeɣleḍ.
Tameṭṭut iḥerrzen, tif tayuga ikerrzen.
Tameṭṭut iḥerzen axxam-is, fiḥel lḥerz fiḥel aɛessas.
Tameṭṭut lɛali, ḥseb-itt d aterras.
Tameṭṭut mači d selɛa ay azger, d amdan am keč d nek.
Tameṭṭut mm tbejbujin.
Tameṭṭut mm tikliwin.
Tameṭṭut mm tnebḍatin.
Tameṭṭut mm ubuḥcic.
Tameṭṭut n lexla texla.
Tameṭṭut s yimeṭṭawen d lxuf: D taqcict.
Tameṭṭut tamezwarut n Adem.
Tameṭṭut taqbaylit, tesɛa tabɣest s wayes ara tqabel akk tudert-is.
Tameṭṭut taqbaylit, xas akken aṭas i terfed, maca lqed-is yezga yezdi
Tameṭṭut tekka deg leɛqel-is ɣef urgaz yesnusun mmi-s deg tejmeɛt!
Tameṭṭut twala belli ṭṭejṛa-nni telha i wučči, teɛǧeb i tmuɣli, yerna d tin izemren ad d-tefk tamusni.
Tameṭṭut ulac d acu tessutur ala tayri.
Tameṭṭut ur nezmir ara i yiman-is tettsennid ɣef urgaz-is.
Tameṭṭut ur nteffeɣ ara qqnent wallen-is ulamma tefhem.
Tameṭṭut ur tessalay ara taɣect-is.
Tameṭṭut ur tzeddi, ur tfeṛṛeq.
Tameṭṭut yellan d yelli-s n laḥlal ɣur-sen, d tin ur ẓerren ara.
Tameṭṭut yesɛan dderya turez s tasa.
Tameṭṭut, terra-tt i lwaɛd n yimeṭṭi.
Tameṭṭut, ur d-tenni awal, tefhem d acu i d-yewwi lḥal, maca mačči d lγerḍ-is, tettru tessusem.
Tameṭṭut-agi d asif ur nettwazgar.
Tameṭṭut-is d tafransist.
Tameṭṭut-is d taṛumit.
Tameṭṭut-is, ur tettqerribeḍ ara ɣur-s: D ɛemmti-k.
Tameṭṭut-iw tella temxell.
Tameṭṭut-nni fessusen, iḥedqen.
Tameṭṭut-nni i d-yekkren seg uẓekka, tbedd-d s ṣṣifa n tekɛebt.
Tameṭṭut-nni terfed s tadist, tesɛa-d aqcic.
Tameṭṭut-nni terra-as: D azrem i yi-iɣurren, dɣa ččiɣ.
Tameṭṭut-nni tewwi aqcic, tessuṭṭeḍ-it.
Tameṭṭut-nni teɛya deg tudert yid-s.
Tamhersa tessedrem tajmaɛt taqbaylit ɣef lsas.
Tamhersa texdem axessar deg yimawlan n tmurt.
Tamnaṭ i zedɣen wat Ismaɛil, teṭṭef si Ḥawila armi d Cur, i yequblen Maṣer, deg ubrid ittawin ɣer Acur.
Tamsalt n tifin n tifrat i wugur n tira.
Tamsalt n tririt n ttar tecɣeb-it aṭas.
Tamsalt n tudert, d tussnant, d tafelsafit, iḍul fell-as umeslay.
Tamsalt n uqcic yettnusun deg tejmaɛt ur nezmir ara ad tt-nesɛeddi kan akka.
Tamsislit tagsusrant.
Tamsislit tuddsant.
Tamsulta ur tɛeṭṭel ara twet imesbaniyen s rrṣas.
Tamtilt-is werǧin telli.
Tamurt ad teṛtiḥ, ad teṛwu asteɛfu.
Tamurt attan tseggem, agdud yefreḥ.
Tamurt i deg ara naf talwit.
Tamurt i yerran luḍa d asawen.
Tamurt ideg cergen yimawen.
Tamurt idurar.
Tamurt meqqert, imezdaɣ drus.
Tamurt n Legrig terka s uzemmur.
Tamurt n Maṣer akked tmurt n Kanɛan issenzef-itent laẓ.
Tamurt n Waεraben attan deg Tegzirt Taεrabt kan.
Tamurt n leqbayel teǧǧa-d izmawen.
Tamurt tebḍa ɣef tmanya urebɛin n lwilayat, yal lwilaya tesɛa lwali.
Tamurt tegguma ad d-terfed ixef-is seg wass mi tewwi timunent.
Tamurt tekcem di miḥlal.
Tamurt tettenfal deg lxir, arraw-is ur llin bxir.
Tamurt teččur d lxiṛ agdud yectaq talqimt.
Tamurt, bnan-tt ɣef lekteb, tamcict tuɣal d tasedda.
Tamurt-inu tezga deg ul-iw.
Tamurt-nneɣ di tefsut tettak acbi ɣer tebḥirt-nni n Virṣay.
Tamusni d aɣilif.
Tamusni n wass-a d tafat n uzekka
Tamusni-nsen d aɣilif, lemḥiba-nsen d asawen.
Tamussni d tawwurt.
Tamuɣli d leɛḍil, rnu ɛad ibeddi.
Tamuɣli s aqeṛṛu, mačči s iḍaṛṛen.
Tamuɣli s imal teɣḍem.
Tamuɣli tedderɣel i tafat.
Tamuɣli-m d asafu.
Tamuɣli-w ɣur-m am tmuɣli n wuccen s wulli.
Tamuḥeqranit n yiberkanen d uɣanfi-nsen.
Tamɛayt i ḥemmleɣ aṭas.
Tamɛayt n imeɛraḍen n tmeɣra.
Tamɛayt n sin n watmaten: D acu i tennam?
Tamɛict n liser, talaba n sser.
Tamɛict teṣɛeb i lefḥel.
Tamɣart d tamɣart, yewwi-tt wass-is.
Tamɣart d teslit, am umcic d uɣerda.
Tamɣart twala kan lṭufan-nni amelḥan tekker tuɣ-it s tiṭ.
Tamɣart yeḍruran si lḥif n tmetti.
Tamɣart-inna temger-d tirkimin si tmazirt.
Tamɣaṛt n lǧahennama, tettɛeṛṛiḍ zzwaǧ.
Tamεellemt-iw teḥreṣ-itt mliḥ.
Tamḍelt n Yasuɛ tella-d ass-nni.
Tamẓabit d tutlayt mačči d tantala.
Tanalt, nreffed-itt gar yimekli d yimensi.
Taneggarut akken ur yettruḥu ara ɣer ssuq.
Taneggarut, iseqqef-as s ssuq.
Tanelmadt-nni tazrazaɣt n Surya, teqqar deg uɣerbaz alemmas.
Tanemmirt
Tanemmirt a Cabḥa, walaɣ-kem-id tefkiḍ-d tameẓẓuɣt akken i ilaq.
Tanemmirt a Kahina.
Tanemmirt a Tom, ad t-ddmeɣ daki.
Tanemmirt daɣen i uɣmis n Yimaziɣen i yi-d-yefkan tagnit-a.
Tanemmirt i mi yi-d-teɣṛiḍ.
Tanemmirt i tmeṭṭut tamaziɣt s umata.
Tanemmirt i tmeṭṭut taqbaylit s demma.
Tanemmirt i win i d-yefkan afus.
Tanemmirt i yal tayemmat.
Tanemmirt imi d-tḥebsed.
Tanemmirt imi i iyi-tḥudreḍ acku Nna Yamina ur as-zemmreɣ ara.
Tanemmirt mi tebḍiḍ ayagi yid-i.
Tanemmirt si tura.
Tanemmirt ɣef leεtab-ik.
Tanemmirt ɣef twissi-k.
Tanemmirt ɣef usteqsi-agi.
Tanemmirt ɣef učči-nni.
Tanemmirt ɣef uεaruḍ-nni.
Tanemmirt-nwen imi aɣ-tefkam tagnit ad aɣ-d-tesmeḥsem.
Tanemmirt.
Taneqqiṭ-a d taxatart mliḥ.
Tanezzayt ssalayen akenyal; tameddit ttsubbun-t-id.
Tanezzayt, llan-d yikayaden n umezruy d tussna i wid yesɛan aswir n tesnawit.
Tanezzayt, send ad d-yali yiṭij.
Taneɣlaft n usegmi aɣelnaw temlal akked imḍebbṛen n tkadimiyin iwakken ad heggin ikayaden Bakaluṛya.
Tanfem-aɣ i nekkni deg nniya, ad yegg Sidi ad yesteḥsen.
Tannayin i nga deg snat n tesnawiyin yemgaraden deg temnaḍt n Bgayet.
Tanqelt d aseklu i d-imeqqin anda yella uzɣal.
Tansa n Yuba d Tazmalt n ugafa.
Tantala taɛrabt n Ccam tebna ɣef tutlayt taseryanit.
Tanyirt inisi urǧin teḍsi.
Tanyirt n yinisi.
Tanzarin d timeẓyanin d tiɣunǧranin.
Tapurtugit d tutlayt tunṣibt deg xemsa n tmura n Tefriqt.
Taqabact n leqḍiɛ tettwaxdem i yesɣaren mači i uḥemmeṛ.
Taqaɛet n wurar tefra.
Taqbaylit ad tesɛu amkan-is gar tutlayin n ddunit.
Taqbaylit ass-a mačči d tin n zik.
Taqbaylit ass-a tegra-d gar ujerbub d uεerbub.
Taqbaylit ass-a tekcem gar tutlayin n umaḍal
Taqbaylit d leqdic mačči d awal.
Taqbaylit d tinna i heddṛen medden.
Taqbaylit d tissas.
Taqbaylit d tutlayt am tutlayin-nniḍen.
Taqbaylit d tutlayt mačči d tantala.
Taqbaylit d tutlayt n imawlan-iw.
Taqbaylit d tutlayt n tyemmat-nneɣ.
Taqbaylit d tutlayt n usirem.
Taqbaylit d tutlayt n yemma akked baba.
Taqbaylit d tutlayt, d yiwen seg yifurkan n useklu amaziɣ.
Taqbaylit d tutlayt-nneɣ.
Taqbaylit d ṛṛay, ddin d neyya.
Taqbaylit i nebɣa ad neddari d tin n tayri d tqemmucin εinani.
Taqbaylit i nebɣa ad nemmeslay d tin n tidet.
Taqbaylit i nessaram ad tt-nidir d tin n tlelli d usnefsusi n leqyud.
Taqbaylit i tt-irefden d arraw-is.
Taqbaylit ladɣa i mi teddem amennuɣ ɣef teqbaylit.
Taqbaylit megreɣ-tt-id ɣer lejdud-iw.
Taqbaylit mi ara tger abernus, tettnawal seksu deg uxxam-is.
Taqbaylit n tid d wid irɣan, zzan fell-as s wudem usnan.
Taqbaylit n wid i tt-ḥemmlen s tɣuri d tira.
Taqbaylit tatrart, ass-a, deg tmurt n Leqbayel lemden-tt yinelmaden d tutlayt n tyemmat.
Taqbaylit tesɛa iɛessasen.
Taqbaylit tesεa sser.
Taqbaylit tettali.
Taqbaylit tettkel ɣef warraw-is yettxemmimen dima fell-as.
Taqbaylit tettnadi wid yesɛan tadrimt.
Taqbaylit tettnernay.
Taqbaylit teḥwaǧ asefti n tedrimt.
Taqbaylit teḥwaǧ aṭas imusnawen ara yedduklen ad gen imawalen n tussna.
Taqbaylit teḥwaǧ aṭas n isura i warrac.
Taqbaylit teḥwaǧ imɛelmen-nneɣ.
Taqbaylit tufrar, tennerna teẓweṛ.
Taqbaylit, ma tebɣa tarwa-s, tezmer ad taɣ abrid n tussna tumḍint.
Taqbaylit, tacawit, tatargit...rtg d tutlayin i llant mačči d tantaliwin.
Taqbaylit, tuɣ amḍiq wis tlata deg umaḍal deffir n teglizit akked telmanit.
Taqbaylit, win i s-yessnen, teččur d igerrujen.
Taqbaylit-iw, ṭṭḍeɣ-tt-id ɣer yemma.
Taqbaylit-nneɣ, tura ad tt-nɣeṛ.
Taqburt tella ɣer yidis azelmaḍ.
Taqcict deg laẓ d lḥif d ddaɛwessu.
Taqcict mm tebbura, leɛṛeḍ-is inza.
Taqcict mm ukebbuḍ azegzaw d yelli.
Taqcict n tmanya n yiseggasen tennejla.
Taqcict tameɣbunt teffeɣ-d si tzeqqa ideg tella akked baba-s.
Taqcict terwel ɣer baba-s akken ad tt-iḥudd.
Taqcict tettwaɛlleq, ur teddi, ur tebri.
Taqcict tura kra neɣ kra ɣef usebter n udlis.
Taqcict yesɛan zzin am wa d cwal.
Taqcict-a tuḍen imsigman.
Taqcict-a ẓriɣ-tt yakan.
Taqcict-agi d leḥrir n temdint.
Taqcict-agi tuɣal d acu-tt a Cabḥa?
Taqcict-nni ixedmen am urgaz, I asen-selleɣ qqaren deffir-i.
Taqcict-nni tceffu mačči d kra.
Taqcict-nni ur tesɛi ara dderya, dɣa yemma-s yenɣa-tt uɣbel-is.
Taqcict-nni ẓriɣ-tt yakan.
Taqecwalt n tmellalin, tiɣratin a tulawin.
Taqellaɛt ad aɣ-tezgel.
Taqellaɛt yeṭṭfen aɛeẓẓi, ur txab.
Taqemmuct d taxatemt.
Taqemmuct tesseblaɛ, ṣṣuṛa tessexlaɛ.
Taqendur-is tacebḥant i tt-yugaren.
Taqendurt n teslatin.
Taqendurt tettemles s lfuḍa.
Taqendurt-nni n leḥrir ad-am-teɛṛeq.
Taqendurt-nni n teslatin ɣur-s amzun d lekfen.
Taqewwadt!
Taqsiṭ-a teḍra s tidet.
Taqsiṭ-a tṣeḥḥa.
Tarbaɛt, tekkin deg-s mraw d yiwen n yimwuraren.
Tarda n leḥwal, seg umnaṛ ar daxel.
Tarda, aniwel d wayen nniḍen.
Tarewla seg ccer ɣer tmura n liser.
Tarewla tessemneɛ bab-is.
Tareɣla n llebsa akked treɣla n yexxamen neǧsent.
Tarfed iman-is.
Targa i d-yenǧer kennu.
Targit n Alexandra, yeǧǧan lḥif n tmurt-is Ikwaṭuṛ, d targit Tamarikant.
Targit-agi-nsen teffeɣ ɣer tafat.
Targit-is teffeɣ.
Targit-nsent n trewla ɣer tudert niḍen tiweḍ ɣer tagara-s.
Targit-w urǧin teffiɣ.
Tarifit d tutlayt mačči d tantala.
Tarifit tettemcabi ɣer teqbaylit.
Tarikt ur tesɛa ara ṭṭfuṛ am tbarda.
Tariḥt-nni lɛali tettmenṭar, tuɣ-d yal adeg.
Tarubut-a, yesnulfa-tt-id Aidan Meller.
Tarwa n leḥlal inejren abrid i tlelli.
Tarwa-k ad tuɣal d aṭas, am uɣebbar n lqaɛa.
Tarwa-k ad ṭṭfen timdinin n yeɛdawen-nsen.
Tarwa-m ad teṭṭef timdinin n yiɛdawen-is!
Tarwa-m ad ɛassen fell-am, i wakken cedda ad tixfif.
Tarwa-nneɣ ad lemden ɣur-neɣ, ayen yebnan ɣef ṣṣaḥ.
Tarwa-nneɣ ad tebɛen abrid-nneɣ.
Tarwa-w zeddigit lsan, ččan rwan, i leqraya sekfan.
Tarwiḥt ad yi-d-tcetki.
Tarwiḥt deg inijel i teṭṭef.
Tasa tendef-d mi tt-walaɣ tezzi s axxam.
Tasa tettqiṛṛi.
Tasa tɣucc ay turew.
Tasa ur tettɣunfu tasa.
Tasa ur tettṛebbi cceḥna.
Tasa-w tɛebbed aḥliles.
Tasaḥlit tbeddu seg Tizi n Berber akkin metwal Sṭif d Jijel.
Tasdawit Mulud Mɛemmri.
Tasdawit n Tizi Uzzu, agezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ.
Tasdawit n Uṭawa d yiwet seg tesdawiyin timeqqranin di ddunit.
Tasebbalt ma tneggi, asagem iwumi?
Tasebḥit, yenṭeq urgaz γer uεeṭṭar ameẓyan: Ay arfiq.
Tasedda d tawtemt n yizem.
Tasedda tetturebba-d deg twacult i as-d-iheggan immal-is d ubrid ara taɣ send ad d-tlal.
Tasedda, d yiwet n tlemẓit taqbaylit i d-yekkren am tullas akk n tudrin.
Taseddast teḥkem, axaṭer ma ur tettmeslayeḍ ara akken ur tt-fehmen ara medden.
Tasekkurt n ṣbeḥ.
Tasekkurt timellalin.
Tasekla d azekka n uɣlan.
Tasekla d wayen akk i icudden ɣur-s.
Tasekla n tmaziɣt tamensayt.
Tasekla tamaziɣt s umata, taqbaylit ladɣa d timawit daɣen d tamerkantit.
Tasekla taqbaylit akken kan i tebda.
Tasekla tarusit d yiwet si tid meqqren deg umaḍal.
Tasekla ur tesɛi tilisa.
Tasekla-ya tesɛa aṭas n tewsatin.
Tasemhuyt n ugeffur, adfel akked usemmiḍ tfuk, teǧǧa nnuba-s i cbaḥa n wussan.
Tasemrest-a, mazal-itt ar ass-a teqqim deg waṭas n tudrin.
Tasenselkimt d yiwet n tussna yeggaren isurifen imeqqranen.
Tasentanalt.
Taseqqamut n uktazal textar taddart-a n Saḥel ɣef temɣer-ines akked usuddes-ines n waṭas n leqdicat idelsanen.
Tasertit tabaḍnit n Mozilla.
Taseṭṭa, taseṭṭa, ad temmed taffa.
Tasga n umuḍin, a tamettant!
Tasiwant teddem tayaziṭ.
Tasiwant, afalku d wid akk yellan si ṣṣenf-is ur yettmačča.
Tasleḍt-nni tgiḍ txuṣṣ acemma deg tmeẓla.
Tasnuddirt.
Tasumta mebla aɣanim.
Tasuqilt n ugbur ilelli
Tasuqqilt sɣur Ɛebdnnur Ḥamituc.
Tasuret n Tfunast tusa-d d tis snat deg Leqran.
Tasusmi tettcebbiḥ imi.
Tasusmi tif tamusni.
Tasusmi!
Tasut.
Tasuta n tmanyin ɣef tmaziɣt i twet, mačči ɣef teqbaylit.
Tasuta tettales-itt-id i tayeḍ.
Taswiɛt kan ata yuɣal-d umcic-nneɣ, yeṭṭef-d azrem d azeggaɣ.
Taswiɛt-a deg nella tewɛer nezzah.
Taswiɛt-a, ters-d cwiṭ n lehna, ttkemmilen yisdawanen ikayaden-nsen, yetturaǧun ad fakken ass n lexmis-a sdat-nneɣ.
Taswiɛt.
Taswiεt tewεer.
Taswiεt-a aɣbel ur yelli.
Taswiεt-a mazal-it meẓẓi.
Tasɣimt-a terna akken i iwata ɣef uselkim.
Tasɣunt Aselmad.
Tasɣunt-a d agzul ɣef leqdicat yeḍran deg tfaska.
Tateffaḥt-a d tasemmamt.
Tatergit d tutlayt mačči d tantala.
Tatiknulujit tura tezzi-aɣ-d si yal tama.
Tavitamint A telha i yiẓri.
Tawacult n Iɛemrucen, d yiwet n twacult iman-is.
Tawacult n Tsedda, teḥbes-itt deg uxxam, ayen i tt-yeǧǧan tegzem asirem, terra lḥedd i tudert-is.
Tawacult-a tamesbaɣurt ɣur-s aṭas n yiqeddacen.
Tawacult-is meṛṛa, iwwi-tt yid-s ɣer Maṣer.
Tawacult-is tecreh, tettmagar-it s ucmumeḥ yal tameddit mi d-yennejmaɛ.
Tawacult-iw n Iwaḍiyen.
Tawant n wallen, tif tin uɛebbuḍ.
Tawaɣit yeḍran yid-s ḥed ur yezmir ad as-tt-yefru.
Tawaγit d lmeḥna d-yeγḍel ṭrad γef tmurt.
Tawekkiwt, ha-tt daxel n ugummu.
Taweṭṭuft mi d-teldi tawwurt tettɛeǧǧeb.
Taweṭṭuft tezzuɣer alɣem.
Taweṭṭuft-nni dɣa tekna, ɣer uxemmuj-is i teččur d tamečča.
Tawnafit-is ad t-tessegrireb.
Tawriqt ɣer tayeḍ alma tellem-d.
Tawriqt-nni ara d-nekkes akkenni seg yimi n uqreḍac, ad tt-nefreq.
Tawwi-d aqenṭar n smid, terna-d wayeḍ d irden.
Tawwurt n tzeqqa temdel, bururu ɣef useklu.
Tawwurt teldi, mqabalen udem s udem.
Taxazabit yugaren tawaɣit.
Taxdeɣ fell-am
Taxessaṛt teshel, i yeṣṣeɛben d lewqama.
Taxsayt-iw duḥ duḥ.
Taxsayt-iw gar yimsenda.
Taxxamt deg-s kra n yijeqḍuren d wallalen n uxxam.
Taxxamt mačči yesεa-tt.
Taxxamt-nni ideg yeggan teččur d izan.
Tayaziḍt tesqaqay.
Tayaziḍt tezdel ɣef tmellalin-is.
Tayaziḍt turew-d tamellalt.
Tayaziḍt ur tettafeg ara.
Tayaẓiḍt n taddart wala tasekkurt taberranit.
Tayemmat d tameṭṭut yesɛan dderya.
Tayemmat tettrebbi d tamezwarut, send ara yakcem uqcic ɣer tejmeɛt.
Tayerza n ulɣem, ayen ikrez ad t-yeɛfes.
Tayerza s ṛṛwa, tissulya s ṛṛḍa.
Tayerza-w tewweḍ s aḥdid.
Tayeḍ d iceṭṭiḍen izeddganen i d-ssardent tlawin n taddart n Tewrirt.
Tayi d taḥawact tis xmesṭac.
Tayri d azref, tettalasem deg-s merra.
Tayri d rrezg i sɛeddan di sin.
Tayri d tlelli n tekti.
Tayri tecbeḥ am ujeǧǧig n tefsut.
Tayri tella, tin iwumi ara tt-fkeɣ ulac.
Tayri teqqel d nneqma.
Tayri zeddigen, yeṣfan am tmeqwa-nni n yimeṭṭawen i d-yeffɣen seg wallen-is.
Tayri-m? Eǧǧ-itt ɣur-m.
Tayri-nni n tidett i s-fkiɣ.
Tayri-nsen ur tesɛi ara azemz n tlalit.
Tayri-s tezger-d igarawen.
Tayri-w ad tt-teddem.
Tayri-w tamezwarut n tidet d tilawt.
Tayrim d ilel yelha i uɛumu.
Tazarzayt d aṭan yettwanṭaḍen seg umdan ɣer wayeḍ, tiḥebuyin-is cbant ticlibaḍ.
Tazdayt tugar tadmayt
Tazemmurt tcudd s akal-is d ungal i yura Belqesem At Maɣzuccen
Tazemmurt-nni akken i ẓẓiɣ tuɣ.
Tazeqqa n rruz.
Tazeqqa n tneɣda.
Tazeqqa n udɣaɣ d tilemt.
Tazeqqa n uraju teččur d imuḍan.
Tazeqqa-agi ur tesɛa ṭṭaq wala lecqayeq.
Tazitma d tamrart s wayes ttarzen atmun ɣer uzaglu.
Tazmamt gar yifassen-is.
Tazmert yellan ɣer yemdanen n zik, tugart tin n yemdanen n tura
Tazmert-im tettrejdil.
Tazrigt tamenzut, tella deg zuǧ alaf u rebεa deg At Yanni.
Tazwara n tmacahut d tasneknayt.
Tazwara teεreq-iyi.
Tazwara ur yefhim ara.
Tazwara yewhem, sin akin yewwi-d zuǧ kilu n lebṣel yuɣ-itt, yewwi-tt.
Tazwert n ttejṛa, d iɣes.
Tazzla ur yeǧǧi kra, ma d tassemt tugi ad tefsi.
Taǧǧalt taberkant d tin ineqqen irgazen ukud tzeggej.
Taǧǧaɣ allen-iw ldint.
Taɛeggunt!
Taɛekkazt n Ṛebbi leɛmeṛ teɣli.
Taɛekkemt-iw d leḥmala-m a Seɛdiya.
Taɛelǧet-iw tif akk tid n teḥdayin-nniḍen.
Taɛeǧǧaǧt i d-iṣuḍen thudd s kra i ssaramen.
Taɛrabt akked tineslemt qqeṛsen-d i Ṛebbu deg uzal qayli ɣer tudrin-nneɣ.
Taɛrurt telsa, taɛebbuḍt terwa.
Taɣara n yiḍrisen-is tuweḍ s igenni.
Taɣawsa akk tamezwarut i ibeddlen deg tudert-iw d iḍes.
Taɣawsa tif azal-is.
Taɣawsa-nni tenǧes.
Taɣaḍt d tafunast n yigellil.
Taɣaṭ-ik ad d-tarew izimer.
Taɣaṭ-im ad d-tarew izimer.
Taɣaṭ-is ad d-tarew izimer.
Taɣaṭ-nni taberquct am uṭarus.
Taɣbalut yellan teqqur.
Taɣdemt n tmurt-nneɣ tettɛaqab kan imeɣban.
Taɣect d tagamant.
Taɣect n wid i cennun, d yiɣersiwen deg tẓegwa.
Taɣect-im d tazefrant.
Taɣiwant n Ayt Yeḥya Musa.
Taɣiwant n Saḥariǧ n Tuviret.
Taɣiwant n Tizi wezzu tefka ixxamen i wid yenḥafen.
Taɣulin yecban tasenselkimt d tetiknulujit i yebdan tettemhaz akken ilaq.
Taɣult n tdamsa.
Taɣult-is i deg ixeddem yessen-as mliḥ.
Taɣult-iw teldi-yi akk tiwura.
Taɣuri d tira s teqbaylit uɣalen d aɣan fell-aneɣ.
Taɣuri n tefyar meẓẓiyen i d-nesskanay yal ass.
Taɣzalt i mennaɣ a leḥbab, tezweǧ truḥ.
Taɣzut d akal n luḍa ɣef yiri n waman.
Taɣṛast yellan d lxali.
Taḍsa n wuccen s iɣiden.
Taḍsa n wuglan, aṭas ay teǧǧa ɛeryan.
Taḍsa war tilas.
Taḍsa ḍsan-tt, s yimeṭṭi n widak yettrun.
Taḥanut, aɣerbaz amenzu Hacmi d warraw-is.
Taḥawact n wahil-ik, seg wasmi telliḍ ɣef uqerru n Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Ugezdu n Tizi Uzzu.
Taḥbult iγer ad ttmenγan γef lwert.
Taḥkayt n yelli-s n Selṭan d waɣzen.
Taḥrem ma rniɣ-tt ula d dqiqa yid-m a Nasima.
Taṛbut ittwanejṛen teḥwaǧ aneqqi.
Taṛbut tettqiṛṛi, wala lɛibad.
Taṛwiḥt, ur tif ara lqut?
Taṣebḥit aya i d-nemlal.
Taṣebḥit mazal itran, yesseglaf ur yettsetḥi.
Taṣebḥit, inelmaden am tweḍfin i d-ttefɣen seg texxamin-nsen.
Taṣebḥit, isčenčen rrabay.
Taṭṭucin tizegzawin.
Taẓallit tfeddu, ssadaqa tneǧǧu.
Taẓayt n uɣyul, tixidas n wuccen.
Taẓrigt tamezwarut n tfaska taɣelnawt n usefru amaziɣ iwumi fkan azwel n “Amedyez Iflisen Umellil”.
Taẓuri trennu deg leɛmer n umdan.
Taẓuri tḍul, tudert wezzilet.
Tban d taqaḥbit niḍen i yettwanɣan.
Tban d yiwet seg terxisin n tqaḥbiyin.
Tban teḍsa tawraɣt.
Tban yunnag wallaɣ-is.
Tban-d yiwet teqcict d tacebḥant, d tamelḥant, tzad di thuska.
Tban-iyi tmuɣli akkin.
Tban-iyi-d tewwurt n texxamt-iw am wakken deg taggara n ddunit i d-tezga.
Tbaneḍ mačči am tid-nni i d-ttceyyiɛen ussan-a iɛeddan.
Tbaneḍ-iyi-d d yiwen yessnen mliḥ taqbaylit.
Tbecc aserwal-is.
Tbeccem aserwal-nwen.
Tbeccemt aserwal-nkent.
Tbecceḍ aserwal-ik.
Tbed, tqubel lemri.
Tbeddel teswiεt.
Tbeddel ula di ṣṣifa.
Tbeddeḍ deffir n Tom.
Tbeggen-d belli tameṭṭut taqbaylit tezmer ad tecnu s wudem zeddigen.
Tberru i yimeẓẓuɣen-is.
Tberrum i yimeẓẓuɣen-nwen.
Tberrumt i yimeẓẓuɣen-nkent.
Tberruḍ i yimeẓẓuɣen-ik.
Tbezgem.
Tbezgemt.
Tbezgeḍ.
Tbeɛ Tom!
Tbeɛ akeddab ɣer tebburt.
Tbeɛ!
Tbeɛ-aɣ-d!
Tbeɛ-it.
Tbeɛ-iyi-d.
Tcedha-t.
Tceggeɛ-aɣ d agraw ɣer yiwet n tdukla tadelsant.
Tceggeḍ-iyi temcucmt n Nasima.
Tceggɛeḍ-asen-d urrif-ik am tmes, ičča-ten am wakken d alim.
Tcelεeḍ?
Tcemmṛem iɣallen-nwen.
Tcemmṛemt iɣallen-nkent.
Tcemmṛeḍ iɣallen-ik.
Tcemmṛeḍ iɣallen-im.
Tcemtemt.

Tcennu?

Tcennumt s teqbaylit.
Tcennumt s tutlayt taqbaylit.
Tcennuḍ s teqbaylit.
Tcennuḍ s tutlayt taqbaylit.
Tcetka fell-as ar wexxam n ccṛeɛ.
Tceɣleḍ d lǧemεa deg yiḍ?
Tceɣɣeb-iyi taluft-is.
Tceḍḥem.
Tceḍḥemt.
Tceḍḥeḍ.

Tdegger-d tafekka-s yeḥman fell-i s tqendurt-is tawezlant.
Tdehhu.
Tebbehbaḍ?
Tebbeḥbeḥ taɣect-iw seg usuɣu.
Tebbeḥbeḥ taɣect-iw.
Tebbi-t.
Tebbuneḥ di teɣmert.
Tebda Guli aḥewwes ɣef yelli-s.
Tebda amermeɣ d ujbad deg tɣeggaḍin i tt-yurzen ɣer umeṭreḥ.
Tebda asnuffes d usuḍu s lemɣawla amzun yenneqḍaɛ deg-s wuffu.
Tebda kan tekkat lehwa, yemmekta-d mm uxelxal.
Tebda la d-tettales tamacahut.
Tebda taẓẓalit uqbel ad tessaweḍ tesɛa n yiseggasen.
Tebda terwiḥt n teqcict tettarkad.
Tebda tettbeddil ciṭ ciṭ.
Tebda tettmeslay d yiman-is.
Tebda tettḥemmil argaz-is, teɣli di tayri-s, tḥemmel-it.
Tebda tikli d yiwen n yilemẓi tuɣal teǧǧa-t ɣef yidra-w.
Tebda tmeɣra s tezlit “Taɣribt-iw” n ucennay Idir.
Tebda tḥesseb-itent-id s yismawen-nsent akken ma llant.
Tebda.
Tebdam tettissinem imdanen.
Tebdiḍ tettissineḍ imdanen.
Tebges s uzrem, txellel s tɣirdmiwin.
Tebha.
Tebra i wemzur-is, yerwel.
Tebra i yimeẓẓuɣen-is.
Tebra-yas.
Tebra-yaɣ.
Tebra-yi.
Tebram i yimeẓẓuɣen-nwen.
Tebram-as.
Tebram-aɣ.
Tebrek netteqqen-itt dima ɣer lmut.
Tebrek tebrek ɣef tiɣmi
Tebren-as aqeṛṛuy i tyaẓiḍt-is.
Tebren-as aqeṛṛuy.
Tebriḍ i yimeẓẓuɣen-ik.
Tebriḍ-as.
Tebriḍ-aɣ.
Tebɛem Tom!
Tebɛem takeṛṛust-ayi.
Tebɛemt takeṛṛust-ayi.
Tebɣa ad as-teffeɣ seg uxxam akken meqqar ad as-teǧǧ listeɛ netta d tmeɛzuzt-is.
Tebɣa ad d-tawi akanic ar wexxam.
Tebɣa ad d-taɣ akanic.
Tebɣa ad d-teggri tameddit, d tamurt-nni n leqbayel.
Tebɣa ad d-teɣḍel tadist-is.
Tebɣa ad iyi-tessebleɛ lqaɛa si leḥya.
Tebɣa ad s-tefkeḍ kra n wazal.
Tebɣa ad s-tezweǧ i mmi-s.
Tebɣa ad teffer, xas ma weḥdes i tella.
Tebɣa ad tennaɣ.
Tebɣa ad testaɛfu.
Tebɣa ad tečč seksu.
Tebɣa ad tečč.
Tebɣa ad tqenneɛ tamdakelt-is ad teǧǧ ddin n tneslemt.
Tebɣa ad tzuxx s ukanic-is.
Tebɣa tizit ad aɣ-tessufeɣ seg uxxam.
Tebɣa tutlayt taqbaylit.
Tebɣa-iyi nek ugiɣ-tt.
Tebɣa-t.
Tebɣam ad d-taɣem takeṛṛust.
Tebɣam ad d-tinim yelli n tɛebbuṭ-iw mačči d yelli?
Tebɣam ad teddum yid-neɣ?
Tebɣam ad teffɣem azekka?
Tebɣam ad teččem.
Tebɣam ad teǧǧuǧeg teqbaylit.
Tebɣam ad tissinem asewwi.
Tebɣam ad tkesbem imelyaṛen.
Tebɣam ad tlemdem taqbaylit?
Tebɣam ad tuɣalem ansa i d-tekkam?
Tebɣam ad tṛebbim iwtal.
Tebɣam kra?
Tebɣam tutlayt taqbaylit.
Tebɣamt ad d-taɣemt takeṛṛust.
Tebɣamt ad teffɣemt azekka?
Tebɣamt ad tesɛumt takeṛṛust.
Tebɣamt ad teččemt.
Tebɣamt ad tissinemt asewwi.
Tebɣamt ad tissinemt tanhaṛt.
Tebɣamt ad tkesbemt imelyaṛen.
Tebɣamt ad tṛebbimt iwtal.
Tebɣamt tutlayt taqbaylit.
Tebɣes s wawal kan.
Tebɣiḍ a d-tiniḍ Si Yeḥya?
Tebɣiḍ a tenɣeḍ mmi-tneɣ?
Tebɣiḍ ad d-taɣeḍ takeṛṛust.
Tebɣiḍ ad d-tiniḍ iruḥ ar Marikan?
Tebɣiḍ ad d-tmeslayeḍ? Ala fiḥel ulac d acu ara d-iniɣ.
Tebɣiḍ ad ffɣeɣ azekka?
Tebɣiḍ ad k-t-id-sseḥmuɣ?
Tebɣiḍ ad kem-nawwi s ibibbi ɣef yeɛrar-nteɣ.
Tebɣiḍ ad m-d-aɣeɣ lewṭer
Tebɣiḍ ad m-d-sseḥmuɣ winna?
Tebɣiḍ ad nembaddal imukan?
Tebɣiḍ ad neskasi fell-as?

Tebɣiḍ ad tesɛuḍ takeṛṛust.
Tebɣiḍ ad teččeḍ.
Tebɣiḍ ad teǧǧuǧeg teqbaylit.
Tebɣiḍ ad teɣreḍ tasɣunt-a?
Tebɣiḍ ad tissineḍ akter n waya.
Tebɣiḍ ad tissineḍ asewwi.
Tebɣiḍ ad tkesbeḍ imelyaṛen.
Tebɣiḍ ad tlemded taqbaylit?
Tebɣiḍ ad truḥeḍ ɣer Tahran neɣ ala?
Tebɣiḍ ad tuɣaleḍ ansa i d-tekkiḍ?
Tebɣiḍ ad tuẓumeḍ?
Tebɣiḍ ad tṛebbiḍ awtul.
Tebɣiḍ ad ǧǧeɣ tafat tecεel?
Tebɣiḍ ad ɣ-tḥekmeḍ?
Tebɣiḍ kra isehlen ugar?
Tebɣiḍ kra?
Tebɣiḍ tutlayt taqbaylit.
Tebεen addal, ǧǧan leqraya.
Tecba akk tisekliwin yellan deg ddunit.
Tecbam iẓekkwan ijeggren si beṛṛa.
Tecbeḥ ddunit.
Tecbeḥ s wayen yellan deg-s, nettqabel yes-s ayen yuɛren.
Tecbeḥ tira-s.
Tecbeḥ, ugar n wayen iɛeddan.
Tecbeḥ.
Tecbiḍ izimer imenza.
Tecbiḍ iṭij unebdu, teskaweḍ ifadden-iw.
Teccetka yiwet seg tǧiratin-ik.
Teccetka-d yiwet si tǧiratin-nwen.
Tecceḍ.
Teccuṛ.
Tecfa-d fell-as lmeḥna.
Tecfa-d i ṭṭrad iɛeddan.
Tecfam i ṭṭrad iɛeddan.
Tecfam ɣef ssuq-lfellaḥ?
Tecfam?
Tecfamt i ṭṭrad iɛeddan.
Tecfamt?
Tecfiḍ i ṭṭrad iɛeddan.
Tecfiḍ teẓriḍ-iyi uqbel?
Tecfiḍ?
Tecmumeḥ Dihya s usmesxer ɣef wayen i as-tenna tmeṭṭut-nni.
Tecmummeḥ-as-d kan iɣill dayen.
Tecna iḍelli tameddit ad ternu azekka d yiḍ.
Tecrek-aɣ tagella d lemleḥ.
Tecrek-aɣ tgella d lemleḥ.
Tecrek-iten ula d tarwa.
Tecɛel tmes deg wul-is seg wass mi iṛuḥ.
Tecɣeb-iten yiwen n taluft, iɣef i ten-id-iwessa nnbi.
Tecεel tmes deg uxxam n Tom.
Tecḍeḥ yid-s.
Tedda akkenni armi d ṣṣḥur.
Tedda d tislit, ddren akken kra n wagguren, taqcict tcedha imawlan-is.
Tedda yid-sen ar yiger.
Tedda ɣef teflukt-nni.
Tedda-yak di nneqma.
Tedda-yam di nneqma.
Tedda-yas di nneqma.
Tedda-yasen di nneqma.
Tedda-yasent di nneqma.
Tedda-yawen di nneqma.
Tedda-yawent di nneqma.
Tedda-yaɣ di nneqma.
Tedda-yi di nneqma.
Teddam-as di nneqma
Teddam-asen di nneqma.
Teddam-asent di nneqma.
Teddam-aɣ di nneqma.
Teddam-iyi di nneqma.
Teddamt-as di nneqma
Teddamt-asen di nneqma.
Teddamt-asent di nneqma.
Teddamt-aɣ di nneqma.
Teddamt-iyi di nneqma.
Teddeggirem wid ur nelhi.
Teddem ayeddid, teffeɣ ɣer tala ad d-tagem.
Teddem tarwa-s tuɣal ɣer taddart-is.
Teddem tilikumund.
Teddem-d tisegnit tewwet-as-tt deg ujeɛbub-nni i yettawin ssirum ɣer yiɣil-is.
Teddem-it tsiwant.
Teddem-it-id.
Tedder akken acḥal d aseggas armi d ass i deg-i d-temlal tin yellan am nettat.
Teddewwil s ilemẓiyen akken tebɣa.
Teddiḍ-as di nneqma.
Teddiḍ-asen di nneqma.
Teddiḍ-asent di nneqma.
Teddiḍ-aɣ di nneqma.
Teddiḍ-d ula deg yidlisen n yimusnawen.
Teddiḍ-iyi di nneqma.
Teddmeḍ-t-id.
Teddun, wḍen ad zegren asif, yella iḥmel-d wasif-nni.
Teddun-ak di nneqma.
Teddun-am di nneqma.
Teddun-as di nneqma
Teddun-asen di nneqma.
Teddun-asent di nneqma.
Teddun-awen di nneqma
Teddun-awent di nneqma.
Teddun-aɣ di nneqma.
Teddun-iyi di nneqma.
Teddunt slulayent.
Teddunt-ak di nneqma.
Teddunt-am di nneqma.
Teddunt-as di nneqma
Teddunt-asen di nneqma.
Teddunt-asent di nneqma.
Teddunt-awen di nneqma
Teddunt-awent di nneqma.
Teddunt-aɣ di nneqma.
Teddunt-iyi di nneqma.
Tedduri akken ur tt-id-iẓer yiwen.
Tedduɣ akked jeddi ɣer taksawt.
Tedduɣ dima.
Tedduɣ-ak di nneqma.
Tedduɣ-am di nneqma.
Tedduɣ-as di nneqma.
Tedduɣ-asen di nneqma.
Tedduɣ-asent di nneqma.
Tedduɣ-awen di nneqma.
Tedduɣ-awent di nneqma.
Tedleḍ iman-ik d tesnakta-k sdaxel n tmuɣli d tesnakta n yiwudam-ik.
Tedreg tidet, s ddaw tiret, nger-d tukket, tekkerfef d tizizet
Tedrewcem?
Tedrewcemt?
Tedrewceḍ?
Tedɛa i Yillu ad as-d-yefk llufan yesɛan tazmert yelhan.
Tedɛa-yak yemma-k s lxir.
Tedɛa-yakent yemma-tkent s lxir.
Tedɛa-yam yemma-m s lxir.
Tedɛa-yas yemma-s s lxir.
Tedɛa-yasen yemma-tsen s lxir.
Tedɛa-yasent yemma-tsent s lxir.
Tedɛa-yawen yemma-twen s lxir.
Tedɛa-yi yemma s lxir.
Tefcel.
Tefciḍ i ḥlawit lxeẓrat-nni zik?!
Teffer igenni, tegguma ad tekkes.
Teffer ɣef medden ayen ara texdem.
Teffeɣ Sudaba zik seg uxxam, uqbel ad d-taki yemma-s.
Teffeɣ i tfekka-s tamcumt.
Teffeɣ nuna deg wackanen.
Teffeɣ seg iger s asuki.
Teffeɣ seg-sen leḥnana.
Teffeɣ-ak-d teεrurt.
Teffeɣ-am-d teεrurt.
Teffeɣ-as-d teεrurt.
Teffeɣ-asen-d teεrurt.
Teffeɣ-asent-d teεrurt.
Teffeɣ-awen-d teεrurt.
Teffeɣ-d d tidet.
Teffeɣ-d seg temda la tettiqi d aman.
Teffeɣ-d temɣart-nni tettmeǧǧid.
Teffeɣ-d ɣer tebḥirt ad tessumer cwiṭ n tafukt.
Teffeɣ-d ɣer tesga, wehment amek tga.
Teffeɣ-iyi-d teεrurt.
Teffud ur teswi.
Teffɣem-d akk deffir-i.
Teffɣem-d akk s iberdan.
Teffɣemt-d akk s iberdan.
Teffɣent-d tuɣac n tulawin deffir n uɣṛab
Tefka ifukal yesseqnaɛen.
Tefka irden ar tessirt ur ten-tefri.
Tefka irden ar tessirt, ur ttwafernen.
Tefka-as cbaḥa s ssut-is ḥlawen ḥninen i yeččuren d asirem.
Tefka-as taqeddact-is Bilha, ad tili d tameṭṭut-is.
Tefka-t tebburt.
Tefka-tt i jjiḥ.
Tefka-yas ddḥis.
Tefka-yas kra n tuttriwin, maca yegguma ad d-yerr.
Tefka-yas rrkel.
Tefkam aṭas n wazal i yiman-nwen.
Tefkam-as ddḥis.
Tefkam-iyi i uwessar yecban winna?
Tefkam-tt i jjiḥ.
Tefkamt-as ddḥis.
Tefkamt-tt i jjiḥ.
Tefkiḍ-as abadaṛ.
Tefkiḍ-as ddḥis.
Tefkiḍ-asen abadaṛ.
Tefkiḍ-asent abadaṛ.
Tefkiḍ-aɣ abadaṛ.
Tefkiḍ-iyi abadaṛ.

Tefkiḍ-iyi axessaṛ.
Tefkiḍ-tt i jjiḥ.
Tefrawes tasa-s tenna-as yelli-s.
Tefrawes tasa-s.
Tefreq-iten lmut.
Tefrest-it tarwa-s, lebɣi ad isaṛ.
Tefreḥ aṭas yemma-s n teslit.
Tefreḥ merra taddart. Dayen, Yidir ilul-d.
Tefreḥ s tadist-is, xerṣum ad tesɛu tura win ara tezzuzen.
Tefriḍ-tt dacu ara txedmeḍ daɣen?
Tefser seksu anda i t-iweɛɛa yiṭij d ubeḥri, akken ur yettismum ur yettjinjiṛ.
Tefḍeḥ-ik-id tmeslayt-ik.
Tefṛeḥ.
Tegduda ara d-ilalen.
Teggan ɣef udekkan.
Tegganem ɣef udekkan.
Tegganemt ɣef udekkan.
Teggarem tiɣri i yinelmaden n tesdawiyin akken ad d-kecmen deg terbaɛt n usideg.
Teggez-it.
Teggul ur tuɣ bab n nnif.
Teggul-as s laman i tesɛa deg-s.
Tegguma ad teṭṭef imi-s.
Tegguǧ taffa s aqettun.
Tegnem ɣef udekkan.
Tegnemt ɣef udekkan.

Tegrurzeḍ.
Tegzam?
Tegzamt?

Tekbel tamacwart-is akken ilaq.
Tekcem s axxam-nni, tufa-n snat tlawin.

Tekcem ɣer texxamt-is terra-d tawwurt ɣef yiman-is.
Tekcem-d Mary.
Tekcem-d ass-nni ɣer tneɣrit-nneɣ, dɣa teɛreq-iyi tɣuri.

Temmut
Temmut Dabuṛa, tin akken i d-iṛebban Ribika.

Temmuteḍ?

Tenheṛ.
Tenmmirt ɣef temεiwna-ak.
Tenna i uqeddac-nni: Anwa-t urgaz inna di lexla?
Tenna tebburt : err-iyi, ad rreɣ lada!
Tenna tewwurt: "Err-iyi, ad rreɣlada".
Tenna tyaẓiḍt i yefrax-is: jebdet ɣenbu, yemma-twen ur tesεi bubbu.
Tenna-as i urgaz-is awi-yi ɣer yimawlan-iw ad ten-id-ẓureɣ. yeqbel.
Tenna-as tteryel: "Kullec rniɣ-t, ar ttṛebga terna-yi."
Tenna-as: "Kkret ula d kunwi ad tegnem, azekka ad tt-nkemmel."
Tenna-as: A nnaɣ a yelli, tasa-w fell-am tettergigi.
Tenna-as: a-tt-an tqeddact-iw Bilha, ṭṭeṣ yid-s.
Tenna-d mazal ur tennudem ara.
Tenna-d tḥemmel tawuri-a.
Tenna-d yelli: "ḥemleɣ-k".
Tenna-d yelli: "ḥemleɣ-kem".
Tenna-d.
Tenna-iyi-d ur k-d-heddreɣ ara.
Tenna-yas belli yemmut baba-s.
Tenna-yas kerheɣ widak ittcummun, dɣa yeǧǧa-tt ; meḥsub ccemma-nni.
Tenna-yas kker syin ay aneggar n medden!
Tenna-yas xẓer-d ɣer wudem-iw, mačči ɣer yedmaren-iw.
Tenna-yas yelha ma yeṭṭef abugaṭu, daymi yexdem akken.
Tenna-yasen deg uxxam d netta kan ay bɣiɣ.
Tenna-yi-d.
Tenna: "Macahu!" Rran-as: "Ahu."
Tenna: Ameɣlal ad yi-d-irnu aqcic-nniḍen!
Tennam-d lehmum, teddrem-ten d wid i awen-d-yezzin.
Tennam-d.
Tennamt-d.

Tenniḍ ad beddleɣ amḍiq
Tenniḍ-d.
Tenniḍ-iyi-d ay ibki, neɣ?
Tenniḍ-iyi-d tḥewseḍ akk iberdan.
Tenniḍ-iyi-d, nniɣ-as.
Tenniḍ-t-id yakan kečč s yiman-ik acḥal d abrid.

Teǧǧa-yi.
Teǧǧam-as-d tarda leḥwal.
Teǧǧam-asen-d tarda leḥwal.
Teǧǧam-asent-d tarda leḥwal.
Teǧǧam-aɣ-d tarda leḥwal.
Teǧǧam-d lεar.
Teǧǧam-iyi-d tarda leḥwal.
Teǧǧamt-d lεar.
Teǧǧel meskint d tameẓyant.
Teǧǧel mi tella mazal-itt meẓẓiyet.
Teǧǧiḍ-as-d tarda leḥwal.
Teǧǧiḍ-asen-d tarda leḥwal.
Teǧǧiḍ-asent-d tarda leḥwal.
Teǧǧiḍ-aɣ-d tarda leḥwal.

Teǧǧiḍ-iyi deg yir liḥala.
Teǧǧiḍ-iyi!
Teǧǧiḍ-iyi-d tarda leḥwal.

Teǧǧuǧug.
Teǧǧuǧǧeg tefsa di tebḥirin n wulawen-nsen.
Teɛbed-it.
Teɛjeb-asen ayendin tmezgunt-a.
Teɛqel-it, mebla ccek, d ṣṣut n Si Yeḥya.
Teɛqel-itt temɣart-is tetqelleq.
Teɛreq-as cchada.
Teɛreḍ akk ad d-tesseɣli llufan yugi lqanun d ddin d ṭebba ifettun.
Teɛreḍ-iyi ɣer uneḍru-nni.
Teɛweq amek ara texdem.
Teɛya.
Teɛyam?
Teɛyiḍ?
Teɛǧeb-as aṭas cbaḥa-s, xas akken ciṭ ciṭ kan i tẓerr iman-is deg uceqquf-nni n lemri.
Teɛǧeb-as i Muḥend.
Teɛǧeb-iyi mliḥ.
Teɛǧeb-iyi tasufeɣt-im.
Teɛṛeḍ.
Teɛṣa tɣeddiwt-a, tgumma ad teww.
Teɣleb adrar n ṣṣber.
Teɣleb tajṛadt.
Teɣleb tamcict ar lkanun.
Teɣleq-d fell-akent.
Teɣli am ubeḥnuq.
Teɣli d tinnegnit.
Teɣli deg ujeqjaq n waman.
Teɣli meskint deg ujeqjaq n waman.
Teɣli tesɣaṛt-is.
Teɣli ur teẓri anda i tedda.
Teɣli ɣef umeṭreḥ ur d-tuki ara armi d azekka-nni.
Teɣli-as tadist, yiwen ur yesli.
Teɣli-as tcacit ɣer deffir mi tt-iwala.
Teɣli-as-d Zahra gar yiɣallen-is s wudem yeddem uḥemmal n yimeṭṭawen.
Teɣli-d deg tadist umu ur tezmir.
Teɣli-d s wawal ur nlaq ara sdat urgaz-is.
Teɣli-d seg igenni, teqqen-d lḥenni.
Teɣli-d seg yigenni teẓẓel.
Teɣli-d tektabt seg igenni, tḥuza lehẓuz.
Teɣli-d yiwet n trigla makken tekkat Ḍrifa s yimceḍ.

Teɣriḍ isteqsiyen i d-yettuɣalen s waṭas.

Teεḍem-aɣ aqcic.
Teḍfer-it, ansi yekka nettat deffir-s.
Teḍleb-d ad tt-nernu ɣer ugraw-nneɣ deg Facebook.
Teḍra yid-s am tmeḥbust ikerfen s lweɛd i tefka.
Teḍra yid-sen am Tom d Jerry

Teḍṛeg tala.
Teḍṣa-d.
Teḍṣa.
Teḥbes ameslay.
Teḥbes aɣerbaz, ur tezmir ara yemma-s ad as-txelleṣ leqraya-s.
Teḥbes ddunit seg tikli, akken ad yers Ḥasan.
Teḥbes lehḍuṛ.
Teḥbes ur tettmeslay ara.

Teḥbes-itt.

Teḥluliḍ.
Teḥma lmissa.
Teḥrured tɛedda sdat n webduz akken ur yesɛi tiwwura.
Teḥsa Mary d akken ur tufiḍ d acu ara s-iruḥen.
Teḥwaǧeḍ kra niḍen neɣ zemreɣ ad ruḥeɣ?
Teḥzen leḥzen n tasaft.
Teḥzen twellit, ur ṛebban watma-s.
Teḥṣa ula s wayen itezzin deg uqerru-ines d wayen iḍarrun di lbiru-ines.
Teṛwa iḍes taṣebḥit-a.
Teṛṛeẓ.
Teṛẓen, yettiẓwiɣ wudem-is.
Teṣber ayen i wumi ur yeṣbir yiwen.
Teṣber ɣef wayen ɛzizen i as-iruḥen.
Teṣneṣlem-iyi-d seg umaḍal n yigerdan.
Teṭṭal-d s usfaylu, twala-iyi-d.
Teṭṭef ijifer nnig n tinezrt-is, tessebgan-d kan yiwet n tiṭ.
Teṭṭef aqerruy-is tettxemmim.
Teṭṭef azgen seg-sent?
Teṭṭef di lḥiḍ.
Teṭṭef kan di tidak n zik-nni.
Teṭṭef lemri-nni s yiwen n ufus.
Teṭṭef lemri-nni sdat n tebbucin-is.
Teṭṭef nnuba deg tala, lḥal d azɣal.
Teṭṭef taɣellayt deg ufus, tettraju ad terkem.
Teṭṭef tijeǧǧigin deg ufus-is.
Teṭṭef tijeǧǧigin deg ufus.
Teṭṭef-d adif iɣes.
Teṭṭef-it tawla n tlata n wussan.
Teṭṭef-it tawla seg asmi i iwala tutlayt taqbaylit.
Teṭṭef-it tbuzeggaɣt.
Teṭṭef-it tmes deg lexla, qrib yemmut.
Teṭṭef-it-id deg ufus, tejbed-it ɣer teflukt.
Teṭṭef-itt tawla n tlata n wussan.
Teṭṭef-itt tergigit, tidiwin, tugdi.
Teṭṭef-iyi liḥala am lxelɛa.

Teṭṭef-iyi tcallawt.
Teṭṭef-iyi temrart.

Teṭṭefi-t tawla.
Teṭṭeglelli teqcict.
Teṭṭerḍeq Guli d imeṭṭi.
Teṭṭerḍeq d taḍsa.
Teṭṭerḍeq deg izenqan n Karakas.

Teẓda nanna abelluḍ akked d lbecna.
Teẓdem fella-s, temmeɣ-as ɣef temgerṭ akken a tt-texneq.
Teẓdem ɣef tewwurt-nni, tekkat deg-s s ifassen d iḍarren, tettsuɣu.

Thegga iman-is teslit?
Thegga-d ifeggagen, tirigliwin, iɣunam. Txuṣ-itt kan tyaẓilt.
Thegga-d tenmehla n tɣellist taɣelnawt ibulisen akken ad sseḥbibren, ad ɛassen ɣef yikayaden n taggara n useggas.

Thuddeḍ-t.
Thuzz aqerru-ines.
Tibaktiryin mgarradent ɣef ivirusen.
Tibbura n Ṛebbi ur ttwamdalent.
Tibeḥyar ttwaqelɛent.
Tibuwaḍin n ddwa tilmawin.
Tibṣelt ma tẓiḍ, ad tt-tɣeẓẓeḍ.
Ticcert mačči i ucebbeḥ kan i temmug deg tira.
Ticcert-nni ad telhu i ufeṣṣel kan ma yerna-d yiwen kra deg awal.
Ticcet n tɣideṭ ur tewεir.
Ticci tezga-d gar Uwqas d Buxlifa.
Ticixtin deg uɣerbaz kan i llant, ma deg lǧameɛ d awezɣi.
Ticki ara fakkeɣ, ad ffɣeɣ.
Ticraḍ s idammen.
Ticraḍ s tmenɣac, mačči s tɣiɣac.
Ticraḍ tigejdanin n yisem.
Ticraḍ tigejdanin.
Ticraḍ timazzayin.
Ticraḍ tisuddimin.
Ticulliḍin n plastik ččant ddunit.
Tid ara d-ilalen.
Tid ara yeqqerṣen.
Tid i yessnen azeṭṭa akken iwulem.
Tid i yi-skersen wussan.
Tid neɣra deg uɣerbaz, neɣ tid i nferreǧ deg tiliẓri.
Tid yetteɣraṣen.
Tid-nni ur ḥemmleɣ
Tidak ara m-id-smektiɣ.
Tidderɣelt deg ul d wallaɣ.
Tiddukla n yimeddukal n twennaṭ.
Tiderray n lmeḥna ttuɣalent d lmeɛna.
Tidet ad yi-tetteẓẓem.
Tidet am tyita n tmekḥelt.
Tidet am yiṭij, win i tt-iqerben aṭas ad ireɣ.
Tidet d lɛafya yerɣan, ẓẓaẓneɣ-tt tečča-iyi nnekwa.
Tidet iqerrḥen wala lekdeb yessefraḥen.
Tidet isgaǧ-itt ṭṭmaɛ.
Tidet kan yeɛjeb-iyi wamek tkecmeḍ deg tnefsit n tmeṭṭut-a.
Tidet kan, mačči seg yiwet n tama kan i yi-tessewhem.
Tidet kan, teɛǧeb-iyi teqcict-nni.
Tidet kan, ur ẓriɣ ma ilaq ad rnuɣ ad ɛaceɣ.
Tidet ma ad as-beddleɣ lmul.
Tidet qerriḥen mačči menwala yezmer a tt-id-yessiwel.
Tidet tban-d am yiṭij i d-yettḍillin yal ṣṣbeḥ ẓran-t akk medden.
Tidet teqqel teskiddib.
Tidet tessendaf.
Tidet tettarra amdan yefreḥ neɣ yeqreḥ.
Tidet tettifrir-d am zzit ɣef waman.
Tidet ur tebḍi ɣef snat.
Tidet wezzilet.
Tidet yiwet, d tagi i d tidet ilaq ad tt-tqebleḍ.
Tidet ɣef i nreggel yal ass.
Tidet?
Tidma ayen din, ɣef twenza d ibzimen.
Tidmarin jxent lxent brant i yiman-nsent.
Tidnect tettmaga s yiẓdi, fessren fell-as tazart neɣ ayen nniḍen.
Tidukkla terra-as tajmilt, yerna tuklal-itt.
Tidukla i uḥraz d usnerni n tgemmi tagamant tamezrayt n Yiderginen.
Tifaf i ulɣem.
Tifawin!
Tifawtin deg ujerbub ay ṭṭfent.
Tifeḍ akk tilawin, s tfentaẓit terriḍ-d tili.
Tifeḍ itri deg yigenni.
Tifranin ttwasfesxent sɣur lɛeskaṛ n lezzayer ass mi i tent-rebḥen isenselmen.
Tifɣ-iyi weltma tiḥerci.
Tigawin ur ttmettatent ara.
Tigawin-a n usefqed d usiḍen n yigḍaḍ yettɛeccicen, llant-d i lmend n wass amaḍalan n yigḍaḍ imhujar.
Tigawt-nsen tamezwarut i yetturaǧun ad tili, d asarag ɣef unegmu idumen s umata d win n tɣiwant s wuzzig.
Tigedrin-nni tujjixin sbelɛent sebɛa n tgedrin-nni yelhan.
Tigejda meṛṛa yessemlal-itent s yeɛmuden n lfeṭṭa.
Tigejdit ɣef tebna tarrayt.
Tigellelt tella anda teqqleḍ.
Tigemmi tamaziɣt d tamesbaɣurt.
Tigeẓẓal d tiṣeffayin n yidammen.
Tiglubulin tizeggaɣin akked tcebḥanin sɛant azal d ameqqran deg tfekka.
Tigusa n tnezduɣt, tigusa n ufrag akked imurar-nsent meṛṛa.
Tigzirin Tiknariyin.
Tihendusit d asɣan i ṭṭafaren deg udu-menẓaw ahendi.
Tihudit d asɣan n wudayen.
Tijebbadin, ad jebdent aẓeṭṭa akken ad yeṭṭef iman-is.
Tijeǧǧigin i d-yemɣin di tqernit.
Tikci n warrazen i ukuẓ n yinelmaden imenza, i d-yufraren s tezmilt igerrzen deg ukayad n uswir wis semmus.
Tikci s teɣṛaṛt, areṭṭal s tmeḥḥaṛt.
Tikerkest tezga deg imi-nsen.
Tikkelt ad tafeḍ ikerrez, tikkelt imegger neɣ isserwat.
Tikkelt-a azemmur yurew ma d ilindi ulac maḍi.
Tikkelt-a dɣa, s tallelt n tɣiwant n At Smaɛel, wwin-ten ɣer teẓgi n Takkuct.
Tikkelt-a, ufraren kraḍ n yimyura deg warraz n tullist i yettuɣalen d tajmilt n Belɛid At Ɛli.
Tikkelt-agi mačči d netta i d as-d-yerran.
Tikkelt-nni d tayaẓiḍt i d-yuker.
Tikkwal yettcawar-itt ula di lumur n lxedma-ines.
Tikkwal yettinig ɣer tmura n lbarrani deg ukatar n umahil-ines.
Tikkwal yettuḥettem fell-as ad iɛeṭṭel di lxedma alarma d iḍ.
Tikli n wassa, agdud yella armi d ulamek!
Tikli n ɣriba tettqerrib ɣer tzeqqa-nni.
Tikli tis mraw d kraḍ n yinelmaden n tesdawit.
Tikli ɣef uḍar, ur tufiḍ anda ara t-tawi.
Tikli-s d asqeṛdec.
Tikta am ti ilaq ad ttwakksent deg wallaɣen.
Tikta deg uqerruy am uglaf.
Tikta-agi n ṣwab akked lmeɛqul uɣent amḍiq deg wallaɣ-iw.
Tikta-w, tezgiḍ deg-sen.
Tikti n lebni n usebddad-agi n Cacnaq, tusa-aɣ-d asmi nesfugel yennayer iɛeddan.
Tikti tatrart tettlal-d deg wallaɣ yeftin.
Tikti-a, d ayen i t-iceɣben seg wasmi i d-yekker
Tikti-k tgerrez.
Tikti-nni izedɣen allaɣ-is, yiwen ur yezmir ad as-tt-yesfeḍ.
Tikti-ya n tikli deg ass n lǧemɛa, ɣer Maṣer i tt-id-wwin.
Tiktiwin caḍent, ta tettdeggir ta.
Tikwal diɣen ttaččaren tiqrinin n ucwari d leɣber n yiɣersiwen-nsen.
Tikwal ikess ulli d wakraren-is.
Tikwal llant tmucuha ur d-tettfakka ara deg yiwen n yiḍ.
Tikwal llant tuddar s sin n leǧwamaɛ, di lawan ideg timesgidiwin ttenqasent rennunt.
Tikwal nessexdam ayen akk qessiḥen.
Tikwal nessuddus isaragen neɣ tiɣimiyin n usileɣ i lfayda n yilemẓiyen, ladɣa wid yeqqaren deg yigezda n tmaziɣt.
Tikwal nettandi tifextin akked ticeṛktin.
Tikwal tirga ttuɣalent d tilawt.
Tikwal ttakreɣ.
Tikwal ttsetḥiɣ s yiman-iw.
Tikwal ulac tamella deg ugama.
Tikwal ur yesɛi ara ula d ussan i usteɛfu.
Tikwal yessagad-iten.
Tikwal yettaweḍ almi d aseggas neɣ sin i wid iḥekmen s ɛecra n yiseggasen d asawen.
Tikwal yettbin-iyi-d lḥal qrib ad tenger.
Tikwal ɣas s lḥiǧab ad k-teɛǧeb teqcict.
Tikwal ɣellin-d yitran qqaren as i waggur aql-aɣ da.
Tikwal, llan yimestjaren i yessexsayen imsismeḍ, syin ɣer-s, ad yexser usafar-nni.
Tikwal, ttaṭṭafen-t tallit merra.
Tilas gar Waεrab d Uqbayli.
Tilawin beṭṭunt kullec.
Tilawin iteddun deg yiberdan, d tid ittennaɣen ɣef yizerfan-nsent.
Tilawin meqqren akk deg twacult-iw lsant-tt.
Tilawin yellan d tizziwin-iw ɛeyyant deg ttrebga.
Tilawin ẓewwrent deg ulqaḍ n uzemmur n leqwaɛi.
Tilaykit d afraq n ddin ɣef uwanek d lumuṛ izuyaz.
Tilelli n teflest d azref seg izerfan n wemdan.
Tilelli n tefrit ur telli deg tmurt-a-nneɣ.
Tilelli n umeslay tettwagdel di tmurt n lezzayer.
Tilelli n umeslay, ur ilaq ara ad teqqim d awal kan.
Tilelli ula i tmeṭṭut-ik d yelli-k, mačči i tiyaḍ kan.
Tilelli umeslay ur telli ɣur-sen.
Tilelli ur tesliḥ; ḥaca ma tessxedmeḍ-tt.
Tilelli ur tettwafras ara, ad temmels akken tella.
Tilemẓit, i tt-iceɣben d tayri.
Tili ad d-iban fell-i.
Tili akka
Tili gziɣ.

Tilufa ggtit, ussan wezzilit.
Tim-iyi-t a baba Ṛebbi.
Timad-is d aẓṛu n lettkal.
Timawin-nni-inu mačči fell-ak.
Timdukal ttemwallint yal ass.

Timellalin-nni-inu ur bɣiɣ ara ad wwent mliḥ mliḥ.

Timentilt neɣ leqdic i ten-id-yewwin.
Timeqqranin deg tlemmast, timectaḥ deg rrif.
Timerqemt teččur d initen.

Times!
Times-a meqqret, tendeh-d seg uqadus agejdan i yettmuddun lgaz ɣer tzeɣwa n ujmaɛ deg yiwet n ufares tapitrukimyawit.
Timeslayin yewwin ccan d yiseɣ d tiyaḍ, nettat ur tt-id-iṣṣaḥ ara umkan ameqqran gar-asent.

Timeẓri.
Timi tebren am yeqwi.

Ttkel!
Ttkellixen-aɣ wid-ak nesɣeṛ.
Ttkellixeɣ deg yiman-iw.
Ttkelliḥen-asen s “qassaman”.
Ttkemmilen deg usedrem n tmurt. Leǧwameε ṭuqten luzinat ulac.

Ttqeεεideɣ lpust-nni ufiɣ mi tedduɣ ɣer uxxam.

Ttrajun Leqbayel tamaziɣt seg Udabu am wid yessuturen tin n Rebbi.
Ttrajun-kun.

Ttraǧun yiɣallen n laman deg unnar.

Tugem-d.
Tuget deg-sent ɛerḍent ad rẓent cckal, d leqyud.

Tugmemt-d.

Tuli ssuma.

Tullas akk ttasment seg-i.
Tullas meṛṛa ad yi-qqarent taseɛdit.

Tullas tturarent paypay, nekkni netturar timestabeɛt neɣ maffur.

Tumrem yakk
Tuqeɛ-iyi seg-m! D acu teswiḍ, ala juǧ kilu n lebṣel.
