Tuqmem fell-i agdud n tzizwa.
Tura a mmi, ḥess-iyi-d, txedmeḍ ayen akka ara k-d-iniɣ.
Tura ad am-d-ssfehmeɣ tamsalt s ttbut.
Tura ad as-tiniḍ awal s yedrimen i t-id-yettaɣ.
Tura ad kemmleɣ tamɛayt-nni i d-tebdiḍ ɣef yizem d teɣyult.
Tura ad tceyyɛem ɣur-s ad d-yas s lɛejlan.
Tura ad tesseqdcem Facebook s teqbaylit.
Tura ad yebdu ixeddim.
Tura akk ibenkan sεan anasiw aqbayli.
Tura akka aql-i deg uxeddim.
Tura akka tezmer ad tettru, ma tebɣa ad ttmeǧǧed, maɛlic.
Tura akka, akken i d-tewwi teɣbalut-nneɣ.
Tura akka, aṭas i yettmesteqsayen mayella Ai-Da d tanaẓurt.
Tura akka, ha-tt-an la tettheggi i wakken ad tessufeɣ yiwen n album.
Tura amxin n tudert ibeddel.
Tura aql-aɣ di tallit tatrat.
Tura cfiɣ.
Tura d lawan n yiḍes.
Tura d nnuba-k ad d-teɣreḍ.
Tura d nnuba-k ad txellseḍ.
Tura dayen isehlen maḍi.
Tura dayen yeǧǧa tukerḍa-nni.
Tura dayen, ccna yenɣa-t Internet.
Tura deg upurṭabl kan ay qqareɣ idlisen.
Tura drus i ikeččmen tinedlisin, ttruḥun ɣer tpizziryatin.
Tura faqen belli taqbaylit d tutlayt.
Tura gnent.
Tura i d-yusa.
Tura i d-ẓriɣ yiwet n tesgilt srid deg Youtube.
Tura i ḥwaǧeɣ timεiwna.
Tura iban belli ugur deg Facebook i yella, mačči deg tuqqna ɣer Internet.
Tura iban-d belli taqbaylit d tutlayt mačči d tantala.
Tura iban-d belli taqbaylit d tutlayt.
Tura ibeddel mačči d winna tessen yakan.
Tura iblugen ɣas ini qqimen, d acu mazal lhan i teqbaylit.
Tura iggan deg texxamt iman-is.
Tura ihi ṛuḥ!
Tura ihi, ur ttagadet ara.
Tura ihi, yya ad nemɛahad, ad nexdem leɛqed ayen ara yilin d ccahed gar-i yid-k.
Tura ilaq ad d-nessuddes kra n yiskasiyen deg lqahwa taseklant.
Tura ilaq ad tkemmleḍ i ubrid weḥd-k.
Tura ixeṛṛef.
Tura kan i d-qqleɣ seg tzeqqa n waddal.
Tura kan i d-yuɣal seg tadduyt.
Tura kan i iɛedda.
Tura kan i meslayeɣ d uselmad-im.
Tura kan i yeffeɣ si lbiru.
Tura kan!
Tura kra din ur s-necfi, nerna-ten ɣer wayen iɛeddan.
Tura kullec ad ifezzeɛ!
Tura lmeḥna barka-am, ad am-ğuğgen wussan.
Tura mi temmut yemma, d acu i yi-icerken yid-k, a xali?
Tura mi tmeqqreḍ.
Tura mi twala iman-is s tadist, teḥqer-iyi.
Tura mi yenqes yiẓri-s yuɣal yettlusu tisekkadin.
Tura nekk yid-m meqqrit i sin.
Tura nettraǧu iḥricen wiyaḍ.
Tura nhedder aṭas ɣef uxnunnes n lgaz n yigenni.
Tura qbel neɣ qabel!
Tura qqareɣ-as:Win iḥemmlen tamaziɣt yeldi ablug.
Tura qqimen igennuren.
Tura s tidet, ma nessusem ad aɣ-mḥun.
Tura sawḍeɣ tmenṭac n iseggasen, ifut-iyi lḥal iwakken ad ruḥeɣ s aɣarbaz.
Tura tella tin izedɣen ul n urgaz-agi.
Tura terriḍ iman-im tessneḍ xir n baba-m.
Tura tesɛa sin n warraw-is, Tafsut d Yidir.
Tura tirza akk d trezzaf d leḥram ɣef tyemmatin.
Tura ula d tafizikt tettwaru s teqbaylit.
Tura ula d tiqcicin tettent remḍan.
Tura ur heddren ara am zik ɣef Teqbuct n Tefriqt n Waɣlanen.
Tura winna iruḥ ad yeẓẓal neɣ ad d-yaker?
Tura yeggra-asen-d kan useɣti.
Tura yegra-yi-d kan ad ssilɣeɣ arraw-nneɣ.
Tura yekker-d ufrux yesselqaḍen baba-s.
Tura yella Skype, mačči am zik d tilifun kan.
Tura yiwen ur "yettṣelli ɣef Nnbi" deg tejmaɛt n taddart-nneɣ.
Tura zemreɣ ad xedmeɣ kullec ɣef yidra-s.
Tura zrin acḥal d aseggas, segmi ten-yecrek wusu n leḥlal.
Tura ǧǧan medden tira s ustilu.
Tura ɣas imeɣriyen xuṣṣen, tella tsekla.
Tura, a yelli meqqreḍ, ad necreḍ adrim d asaku.
Tura, a-tt-an tmeṭṭut-ik, ddem-itt tṛuḥeḍ!
Tura, ayen akk i k-d-inna Yillu, xedm-it.
Tura, err tameṭṭut i wergaz, axaṭer d nnbi.
Tura, ilaq-iyi a d-afeɣ abrid ara yi-ssiwḍen ɣer tidet.
Tura, kker ad tṛuḥeḍ si tmurt-agi.
Tura, nesεa leslaḥ gar yifassen-nteɣ, nesεa tamussni d tɣuri, yis-sen kan ara nizmir ad necbu timettiyin-nniḍen.
Tura, ur ilaq ara ad nesṭuqqut isaragen, imi d asileɣ i ilaqen.
Tura, ẓriɣ belli tettagadeḍ Illu.
Tura-as tabrat.
Tura-asen tabrat.
Tura-t Nisma Tigrin deg uɣmis n yimaziɣen.

Tura-yasen tabrat iḍelli.
Tura-yi-d tabrat.
Turar deg umezgun mi tt-tuɣ d taqcict.
Turdiwin: Ma yella yiwet n tutlayt iman-is!

Tusem.

Tusmem.
Tutlayin tiqdimin am tmazight neqḍent.
Tutlayt d ayen i fehhmen medden, mačči d ayen ur fehhmen ara.
Tutlayt d tameslayt n webrid mačči d tinna n tesdawiyin.
Tutlayt n taɛrabt d tusnakt i wid yesɛan aswir amenzu deg usedwel.
Tutlayt tamaziɣt d yidles-is i ileḥḥun simmal ɣer sdat skud yettɛeddi lweqt.
Tutlayt taqbaylit d ayen i heddṛen medden deg ixxamen.
Tutlayt taqbaylit d ayen i yezdin Iqbayliyen.
Tutlayt taqbaylit tekka-d nnig n kullec.
Tutlayt taqbaylit tessuffuɣ-d afriwen.
Tutlayt taqbaylit tesɛa arraw-is ara tt-irefden.
Tutlayt taqbaylit tettali kra kra.
Tutlayt taqbaylit tettnerni kra kra.
Tutlayt taqbaylit teččur d timucuha.
Tutlayt taqbaylit tger isurifen imeqqranen.
Tutlayt tayemmat i d lsas n tmusni.
Tutlayt timawit d tamsertit tagamant.
Tutlayt ur nesɛi tira.

Tṛuḥ ad d-tessired iceṭṭiḍen seg wasif.
Tṛuḥ ad tens tmes-nni.
Tṛuḥ ad tẓer, urǧin teẓri.
Tṛuḥ tezga-d gar Imaṣriyen akked wat Isṛayil.
Tṛuḥ yemma ɣer tebḥirt ad d-tessekfel baṭaṭa.
Tṛuḥ, tettmenṭar deg uneẓruf n Bir Cibaɛ.

Tṣub lḥamu ɣer xemsa n tseddarin.
Tṣubb ɣer lɛinseṛ, teččuṛ-d tacmuxt-is dɣa tuli-d.
Tẓer tafekka-s am lbumba izemren ad teṭṭerḍeq fell-as.
Tẓerreḍ tigdi-nni i teẓẓiḍ deg ul-iw seg temẓi.
Tẓerreḍ-d argaz-im di lḥebs neɣ ala?
Uac acu iyi-yuɣen, uḍneɣ kan kra, ma d tura aql-i staḥlaɣ.
Uccayen, imnayen, ay at Yaɛqub a-ten-ayen!
Uccen ad yečč tizermatin.
Uccen am win i as-d-yefkan abeqqa.
Uccen d abrid kan i yettwaɣlaḍ.
Uccen d bu txidas.
Uccen ifuṛes asteqsi-nni: Awah!
Uccen ijemmeɛ iɣessan.
Uccen iɛeddan di tlemmast n tejmaɛt!
Uccen iṭṭammaɛ deg ulɣem.
Uccen ur d ul-is i diri, maca yettlaẓ ula d netta.
Uccen ur tt-isɛedday ɣef uccen.
Uccen yeskeɛwiw.
Uccen, abrid kan i yettukellex.
Uccen, yesderγel-it ṭṭmeε.
Uccen-nni amenzu yehzel akk, d acu d win i d azemni-nsen.
Uccen-nni iwmi qqaren Mḥend, d awadem ameqqran.
Uccen-nni yeqqummec kan, iban-d am akken yettxemmim.

Uccen: Awah!
Uccen: Dayen ttuγ-t-in.
Udad ɣur-s acciwen d imeqqranen.
Uddin-as-tt yiɛdawen-is.
Udem d aqelwac, iẓṛi d adaɛmamac.
Udem gar wudmawen.
Udem ubaqac.
Udem ubxiṣ.
Udem-im yezga gar wallen-iw.
Udem-im yezga ger wallen-iw.
Udem-is d ahrawan, d amelḥan.
Udem-is merra wwten-t yiḍerfan.
Udem-is merra yuɣal d azewwaɣ mi yenneḥcam.
Udem-is yettfeǧǧiǧ am lefnar.
Udem-iw werraɣ d asellaw am yixef n laḥbeq.
Udem-iw ṛqiq.
Udem-nni i ttcedhin-t wallen-iw.
Udi yuɣal d asafar.
Udip yenɣa baba-s, yezwej d yemma-s.

Ulamma amezruy, yefra-tt-id, isebggen-d d acu-t Uzzayri, d acu-tent tmeslayin-is.
Ulamma deg Lezzayer i d-tekkar maca mazal teḥrez tutlayt-is taqbaylit.
Ulamma nekk diri-yi, lehdur-iw d ineqqaden.
Ulamma qqaren-d tizemmar-is n usnulfu ar tura sɛant tilas, acku tenǧem kan ad tsuneɣ neɣ ad tesbeɣ.
Ulamma ur ten-qqaren ara.
Ulamma ččewčiwen yegḍaḍ, yezga wul-iw yeḥzen.
Ulamma ɣef zik n lḥal i tebda ccna s ṣṣut-is ḥlawen.
Ulansi ara tekkeḍ, iberdan gezmen.
Ulaqṛaṛ ad yali wass.
Ulawen-sen unagen ɣer yiwen n umaḍal.
Ulayɣer ad d-thedreḍ.
Ulayɣer ma tezzmeḍ iman-ik ɣef annect-en.
Ulayɣer nedɛa ma ulac illu ara ɣ-d-yeslen.
Ulayɣer nettru tura mi teḍra.
Ulayɣer tesswayeḍ afeqqus-agi, d abeɛli.
Ulayɣer tmeyyzem ma ṭṭfen-tt.
Ulayɣer twessaḍ agujil ɣef yimeṭṭawen.
Ulayɣer wid nniḍen.
Uleqṛaṛ ad d-innulfu.
Uletma tennum tettarra ijerriḍen ddaw wawalen ur tessin mara teqqar.
Ulin ar wayyur.
Ulin-d waman s ṭṭaqa, teččuṛ ddunit.
Ulin-d waman, dɣa wwin lbabuṛ, refden-t nnig n lqaɛa.
Ulint ar wayyur.
Ulint ssumat.
Uliɣ ad d-cerweɣ azemmur, ɣliɣ-d.
Uliɣ deg tmacint-nni iteddun ɣer London.
Uliɣ s adrar, snufseɣ-d azwu azeddgan.
Uliɣ taslent s waɛrur.
Uliɣ ɣef ugmer, ṛezneɣ-as aleggam, idda s taqlaqalt.
Uliɣ.
Ullah, ullah.
Ullis i d-yeddan deg-s iḥekku-d ɣef yiwen ilemẓi iwumi qqaren Lusyus.
Ulmud n uẓawan deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri n temdint n Tizi Uzzu.
Ultma Cabḥa ur tḥemmel ara udi n tfunast.
Ultma teckel tafunast send ad tt-id-teẓẓeg.
Uma d yiwen ma yesla-yas.
Umbeɛd ad tt-ddmen, ad tt-ssefsun akkit.
Umnaɣ-k
Umnen s rebbi maɛna nɣan ayen id-yexleq.
Umnen ur yezmir ḥedd ad d-yekk gar-asen.
Umneɣ awal-ik.
Umneɣ s tmelsa-ines.
Umneɣ s Ṛebbi yiwen.
Umneɣ yiwen wass taqbaylit ad d-yeflali fell-as yiṭij.
Umneɣ-k ay uccen, teččiḍ-iyi iɣiden.
Umneɣ-k.
Umneɣ-kem.
Umneɣ-ken.
Umneɣ-kent.
Umuɣ n yinelmaden n uswir wis ukkuẓ ɣezzif cwiṭ.
Umuɣ n yisenfaren i d aɣ-d-ikecmen yugar ayen nurǧa.
Unan iẓra belli dderya ara d-isɛu ur tettili ara d ayla-s.
Undrulog d amejjay n yergazen.
Unfeɣ i tfekka-w ad tefsi s uslufu-s ḥninen.
Unfeɣ-as ad teglilez deg tikta-w, deg tirga-w d yiman-iw.
Ungal tirga n wul d win i d-yeffɣen deg tiẓrigin Tafat.
Ungal yesɛa ilugan-is, mačči win yekkren ad yaru.
Ungal, mačči kan d tulsin n teqsiṭ.
Ungal-nni d apulaṛ.
Ungif ur d-gri ara deg tudert-is.
Unuɣen urmiden mačči i imecṭaḥ kan ay mmugen.
Uqbel Aseggas ɣer deffir iyi-d-yebda kullec.
Uqbel ad akem-tenṭeḍ.
Uqbel ad fakkeɣ asekfel deg wallaɣ-iw akken ad d-afeɣ leḥdaqa s wacu ara as-sfehmeɣ.
Uqbel ad medlent walen.
Uqbel ad nesali tadiwennit-a, acu n yizen i tebɣiḍ ad tessiwḍeḍ i medden?
Uqbel ad tefɣeḍ sefqed i tkerrust-ik ma ulac d acu i tt-ixuṣṣen.
Uqbel ad tekcem aɣerbaz.
Uqbel ad teldi tawwurt i trewla, iḥer-itt ɣer tbankiṭ.
Uqbel ad yaweḍ lemijal.
Uqbel ad ṭṭreḍqent tersasin n dɣel d tisselbi.
Uqbel ara t-id-yeǧǧ.
Uqbel ara tzegreḍ abrid, muqel akka d wakka.
Uqbel aya, tamdint-nni isem-is Luz.

Waqila tečča-d ul-nsen teqbaylit-nneɣ.
Waqila tikelt-a fahment iman-nsent txeddamin n tnezduɣt-a.
Waqila ula d winna yella menhu i asen-yenɣa!
Waqila yessawal uɛeẓẓi deg uqerru-inem ad am-teḍru am akka i iyi-teḍra.
Waqila yuɣ-itent akken i ilaq deg leɛqel.
War asirem, war layas
War lkaɣeḍ ad ninig.
War ma ttuɣ aselway n Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n At Smaɛel ɣef lḥir meqqren i t-izedɣen ɣef teqbaylit.
War ma ttuɣ imdanen d wid akk i yi-d-yettaken tabɣest i wakken ad dduɣ ɣer sdat.
War nnfeɛ ad immet axiṛ.
War tadist tettinit.
Warǧin ad tt-yeskeṛkeṛ akken yebɣu iḥeml-d d uguren
Warǧin refdeɣ afus-iw ɣer tmeṭṭut-iw.
Warǧin ṛziɣ tamuqint.
Warɛad teqfil snat n tmerwin n yiseggasen deg tudert-is.
Warɛad yeffiɣ, winna ikcem-d.
Waw!
Wayeḍ meskin tesseɣli-t, yedded di lqaɛa, terkeḍ-it.
Wayeḍ yennulfa-d d ajdid.
Wayi d asɛujqer, mačči d tameslayt.
Waɛli d Magnus, wa di Tizi, wayeḍ di Conpenhagen
Waɛli isɛa-d: Mḥend, Yidir akked Zira.
Waɣzen ibedd sdat n tewwurt.
Waɣzen yeffer gar yemɣan yesṭuṭṭuc-d kan.
Weddef-iten ad slefɣen tamurt.
Weddṛen-t?
Wehmen akk deg-s.
Wehmen iwacu yettṛebbi ɛecrin n yemcac.
Wehmen.
Wehment tefremliyin mi i yi-d-wallent s tadist yerna cebbḥeɣ-d.
Wehmeɣ amek armi kunt-ǧǧan yimawlan-nkunt tusamt-d ɣer weḥd-kent.
Wehmeɣ amek cennun medden deg usmekti n tefsut taberkant!
Wehmeɣ amek i kemmleɣ yid-k.
Wehmeɣ amek ur teεqileḍ gma-m s yiman-is.
Wehmeɣ d acu xeddmen iḍ-a iẓawaliyen.
Wehmeɣ deg Iqbayliyen yettḥessisen i Uziṭuṭ!
Wehmeɣ deg lqern xmesṭac.
Wehmeɣ deg-k a yiḍ.
Wehmeɣ melmi ara yebdu usaru-nni.
Wehmeɣ mi d-ufiɣ ɣer yiwet n texxamt i aɣ-ceggɛen.
Wehmeɣ mi t-walaɣ yewwi-d akanic.
Wehmeɣ mi ten-walaɣ wwin-d akanic.
Wehmeɣ mi tent-walaɣ wwint-d akanic.
Wehmeɣ mi tt-walaɣ tewwi-d akanic.
Wehmeɣ mliḥ i k-yeẓran da.
Wehmeɣ tikwal mi ara ttwaliɣ kra n tlawin s tadist cmumḥent.
Wehmeɣ.
Wehran, tendeh tmes deg yiwet n tkebbanit.
Wejdeɣ.
Wekkden-d i tikkelt-nniḍen s keffu n lebni n tnezduɣin deg taggara n useggas.
Wellah ar d taculliḍt n ṛṛay!
Welleh ar am win yettruẓen adrar!
Welleh ar i y-iɣaḍ yiman-iw!
Welleh ara ken-in-dehneɣ.
Welleh ass-nni ar nsiɣ deg berra!
Welleh ula d tafsut ma tuklalem-tt.
Welleh, a lukan ad ṭṭseɣ deg iciwi-s.
Welleh, ad iyi-ilzem!
Weltma tamecṭuḥt temmut s tbuzeggaɣt ass mi tesɛa sin iseggasen.
Werri-d.
Werğin yenna i yimawlan-is iḥemmel ccna.
Werğin yettu ass deg iwala i tikelt tamezwarut Sliman Azem.
Werǧeǧǧi azehwani, kra yekka wass la yekkat agumbri.
Werǧeǧǧi-nni yelhan deg unebdu d zzhu, ur yufi s wayes ara yessedhu takerciwt-is.
Werǧin ad ttuɣ Tom.
Werǧin ad ttwassneɣ akken.
Werǧin ad ǧǧeɣ aya ad d-yeḍru.
Werǧin d-msukkasen.
Werǧin gganeɣ ugar n snat n sswayeε.
Werǧin i as-d-teḍra taluft-a, argaz-a werǧin i t-iwala!
Werǧin i as-tekkes iḍarren-is, neɣ iɣallen-is, neɣ aqerru-s.
Werǧin i d as-sliɣ, yettru neɣ yujjaq, anaɣ ulac llufan ur nettru.
Werǧin i d-greɣ di lbal belli ahat d ameḥbus i d-irewlen.
Werǧin i d-mlaleɣ Tom armi d ṣṣbeḥ-a.
Werǧin i d-nniɣ aḥ!
Werǧin i d-rbant akken ad ḥussent.
Werǧin i d-yuɣal Tom.
Werǧin i tessin amejjay.
Werǧin i teεciq.
Werǧin i thennaḍ deg tudert-ik.
Werǧin i thennaḍ deg tudert-im.
Werǧin i tt-yufi tefreḥ.
Werǧin i twala iman-is.
Werǧin i ẓriɣ ḥedd am kemm.
Werǧin nnuɣen.
Werǧin nwala dda Sliman deg tiliẓri n Lezzayer, yerna qqaren-aɣ-d "xawa-xawa"!
Werǧin nwiɣ ad teffeɣ tayri ul-iw.
Werǧin tendem deg wayen texdem.
Werǧin tsemmeḥ deg-s ɣas akka yuɣal d takemmict deg wussu.
Werǧin tḥulfa s tayri ɣer urgaz-is.
Werǧin tḥulfa s tiẓeṭ.
Werǧin ufiɣ iman-iw d yimawlan-ik.
Werǧin walaɣ annect-a n ttjur deg tudert-iw.
Werǧin walaɣ annect-a n waddagen deg tudert-iw.
Werǧin xemmemeɣ akka ɣef annect-en.
Werǧin yendem deg wayen yexdem.
Werǧin ɣilleɣ d ayen yesseḥmawen akk annect-a.
Werǧin ẓriɣ afrigu d azeggaɣ.
Werɛad i d-yewwiḍ wass n leslak.
Werεad yebliɣ.
Wesseɛet ay imuraren.
Wessiɛ yerna yettbin.
Wexxar-d akka si ṭṭaq! ruḥ ad tɣummeḍ aqerru-m.
Weznen-as tlatin n twiztin n lfeṭṭa.
Wezzil ussan deg tegrest.
Wezzilet tudert.
Wezznent tsuraz teẓḍa Zwina i ucebbub-is aɣezzfan.
Weεrit lehdur n tsumta.
Weḥd-i kan deg-s ay rɣiɣ.
Weḥd-m gar rebɛa n leḥyiḍ.
Weḥd-s deffir-s.
Weḥda weḥda, alma teffeɣ-d d ulman.
Weṣṣan-tt imawlan-is
Wi ak-yennan yemmut?
Wi am-yennan rebḥeɣ tura?
Wi awen-illa?
Wi d-iǧǧan izli maɛduṛ.
Wi iddan d lleh, d win axiṛ.
Wi ijebden idrimen seg umiḍan-iw n tbanka?
Wi ikkren kan ad d-isnulfu awalen i tmaziɣt.
Wi ikkren kan ad d-yesnulfu awal.
Wi ikkren kan ad isfuččeḥ.
Wi inudan kra, ad t-yaweḍ.
Wi isɛan izimer, iga-s iziker.
Wi iwwten di lɛib, ad t-inṭeḍ.
Wi iɛaddan yeǧǧa ccama.
Wi k-illa?
Wi k-innan meqbuleḍ a ṛṛuḥ ?
Wi k-iweṣren ad tgeḍ akken.
Wi kumt-illa?
Wi m-illa?
Wi ten-yesεan yeṛwa amdegger, yeṛwa akkessar d usawen.
Wi tent-illan teqcicin-a?
Wi teǧǧiḍ deg wemḍiq-ik?
Wi yebɣan ad yečč timẓin, ad yaɣ agelzim d imceffaṛ.
Wi yezlan rric, ḍemneɣ-as lɛic.
Wi yeẓran?
Wi εzizen teǧǧiḍ-t di ṭṭiq
Wicqa?
Wid akk iyi-d-ittmuqulen ttaččaren kan allen-nsen.
Wid akk yeǧǧa yiseɣ, ffren tura udmawen-nsen.
Wid akken i gezzmen iberdan, wa meɛdur, wa d lḥeqq-is.
Wid ara iqqerṣen.
Wid ara ixedmen ayen ilaqen.
Wid d-iheddren yid-i.
Wid i as-d-yezzin ffɣen-d ad walin.
Wid i d-yefkan afus n tallelt.
Wid i d-yemlal gar imakaren, iqettalen, imeksawen, iεebbaden n yilluten, atg.
Wid i d-yeslan i usefru i d-ssawleɣ, tezɣeb akk tfekka-nsen.
Wid i icudden ɣer tussna d tɣerma taqbaylit.
Wid i tewwi tuzzuft-nsen armi ffɣen seg sswab d usegmi n tudert ɣef uqerruy n tmeṭṭut.
Wid icceččen ifen lḥeǧǧaǧ icewwqen.
Wid ijebbden lqus ffɣen-as-d d iɛdawen.
Wid imeggren, d lmuluk.
Wid itteɣraṣen.
Wid ixeddmen, xeddmen akken zemren s wayen ufan.
Wid teɛna temsalt n waya ad d-fkeɣ imedyaten yelhan ɣef wanect-agi.
Wid tt-id-yeḥyan mmuten.
Wid ur nettamen s tilin n kra n yillu, d arnaflasen.
Wid ur nettkeyyif ara, ass-nni keyyfen mebla cceḥḥa.
Wid yebɣan ad t-ččen.
Wid yebɣan, zemren ad d-ddun ɣer ugraw-nneɣ n usideg akken ad issinen amek.
Wid yecban Uleḥlu, Ali Ideflawen, Malika Dumran, Zeddek Lmulud akked waṭas-nniḍen.
Wid yekkin s wudem unsib deg uqeddic.
Wid yellan yakkan deg unejmuɛ amezwaru.
Widak aɣyul i ttqadareɣ fell-asen.
Widak i ɣedṛen di lbatel.
Wigi d isenfaren meqqṛen ara d-yeglun s ubaɣur urǧin yeḍra-as i tutlayt taqbaylit.
Wigi d: Ǧilali Ḥaddouc tullist Azabuq, Tiziri Ṭeyeb s tullist Tabrat i talsa akked Lyas Belɛidi s tullist Ṣayddu Mayga.
Wigi meṛṛa llan s teqbaylit.
Wigi slulen-d tiwsatin timaynutin.
Wigi ttuɣaḍen msakit.
Wigi, ur sen-ittunefk ara.
Wilan aselkim-a ufus?
Win i d-yessuffeɣ ɣer tezrigin tafat.
Win i d-yewwin awal ɣef umennuɣ n umedyaz d ucennay Meɛtub Lwennas.
Win yeččan tasekkurt ar tt-ifak, isuk talaba ɣef yimi-s.
Win akken i ɣ-yewten, yelha uɛekkaz i s-nefka.
Win akken ur neḥric d aɣyul, akka i as-ssawalen.
Win akken yugi wayla-s.
Win ara as-ifiqen i waṭṭan-a ɣef zik yezmer ad yeḥlu s lemɣawla.
Win ara idenben deg wayagi meṛṛa, iḍlem.
Win ara ineɛlen baba-s neɣ yemma-s, d lmut ara yemmet.
Win ara ineɛlen baba-s neɣ yemma-s, lmut ara yemmet.
Win ara isebblen tudert-is ɣef ddemma-w, ad tt-yaf.
Win ara ixedmen ass-nni, d lmut ara yemmet.
Win ara ixedmen deg wass n westeɛfu, d lmut ara yemmet.
Win ara izewǧen akked tmeṭṭut yebran izna.
Win ara iɛeggben wayeḍ ad ittuɛeggeb ula d netta.
Win ara iḥerzen tudert-is, ad tt-isṛuḥ.
Win ara ken-i d-yerren.
Win ara s-yinin: Ay ameslub!
Win ara ten-innalen ad inǧes.
Win ara ten-iččen, ad ittwakkes.
Win ara tt-innalen, ad inǧes alamma d tameddit.
Win ara yenɣen aɣersiw, ad t-iɣrem: Taṛwiḥt s teṛwiḥt.
Win ara yenɣen aɣeṛsiw, ad t-iɣrem.
Win ara yessanzen iman-is ad ittwarfed.
Win ara yesseɛlin iman-is, ad d-ittwanfeḍ.
Win ara yesseḍlem Yillu, ad yerr sin n imuren i wayeḍ.
Win ara yewten baba-s neɣ yemma-s, d lmut ara yemmet.
Win ara yewwten akli-s neɣ taklit-is s uɛekkaz, ma yemmut gar ifassen-is, ad ittuɛaqeb.
Win ara yeččen deg-s, ad issired llebsa-s.
Win ara yeččen seg-s, ddnub i yiri-s.
Win ara yeɣlin ɣef uẓru-agi ad irreẓ.
Win ara yeṛǧu udles, acimi i la yeddes?
Win ara yeṭṭṣen d lmal, d lmut ara yemmet.
Win ara yeṭṭṣen deg-s, ad issired llebsa-s.
Win d-ineṭqen, ad iqqen aɣyul.
Win d-iqerrben ad t-retɛeɣ.
Win d-iḥellan tasawent ad ɣ-d-ireǧǧem d akessar.
Win d-iḥellan ṣṣaba s tidi-s.
Win i ak-ibeddlen s yibiw, kečč beddel-it s yiclem-is.
Win i aɣ-d-ifkan tudert, ur yecciḍ ara.
Win i d-izzuɣren afurk, ad d-izzuɣer taseṭṭa-s.
Win i d-yeɣṛan di temɛemmeṛt ad ikker ad iqdec ɣef tmaziɣt.
Win i d-yusan ad yekkes lxiq.
Win i d-yusan yegla-d s kra.
Win i iyi-iẓẓan, iɣellet yal aseggas.
Win i k-ifkan tibṣelt, err-as ticcert.
Win i k-iẓuren yugem.
Win i kem-icekkren a tislit? Yemma teḥder xalti.
Win i kem-ikesben yertaḥ, i wul-is ad yennecraḥ.
Win i kem-ikesben yessen, fiḥel ma yessed ilisen.
Win i kem-ikesben yeɣna, fiḥel ma yuǧew nneɛma.
Win i kem-iẓran yekka lexla.
Win i kem-iẓranyekka tawwurt.
Win i s-innan lexla ixla, i yexlan d netta.
Win i t-iɛerḍen ad yecfu fell-as.
Win i t-yerran deg walef u ttɛemya u tmenya u xemsin d aneɣlaf n uwanek n Unabaḍ Uɛḍil.
Win i tebɣiḍ yugi-k.
Win i ten-yesɛan deg udrar, ur yettaggad aẓaɣar.
Win i y-iḥemmlen, iḥemmel daɣen aqjun-iw.
Win i yegganen daxel n uzeṭṭa, ad d-yas ɣur-s buberrak.
Win ibennun yettṣewwib lxiḍ.
Win ibezgen, ad yuɣal ad yens.
Win ibɣan ad icbeḥ, ur iqqaṛ eḥ!
Win ibɣan ad iraɛ, ad d-ijab ala ccḥani.
Win ibɣan ad ireɣ, ireɣ ɣef lɛali.
Win ibɣan cuccu, izlu beɛɛu!
Win ibɣan tamaziɣt, ad yissin tira-s.
Win ibɣan tidet, ur ittnadi tiḥilet.
Win ibɣan ucaf, iṣubb s iɣzeṛ!
Win ibɣan ucuf, iṣubb s iɣzeṛ!
Win icerwen tidiwin, yeṣber ur yettaf tifrat.
Win ideɛɛun i urbib, tettas-as-d deg uḥbib.
Win ifhmen ad yessuref.
Win ifukken yezmer ad yeffeɣ.
Win ifut wawal, yini-as: sliɣ!
Win igemren tament, imecceḥ iḍudan-is.
Win igezmen taseṭṭa, izzuɣer-itt.
Win ihedṛen ittwexxiṛ, bɛed-as axiṛ!
Win ihelken sekkeṛ ilaq ad yettḥadar iman-is.
Win ijehlen ad d-iɣli.
Win ijehlen ad d-yeɣli.
Win ijeṛben tasa, ad yens anida nensa.
Win ikerzen ad isserwet.
Win ikkaten lexyal, ad izgel leḥlal.
Win ileḥḥun timendeffirt, iɣelli.
Win illan d uḥdiq, inser.
Win illan yif win ilan.
Win illan, yif win ilan.
Win imennan amzun iwwet.
Win inedhen d win yeḍṛuṛan.
Win inejlan si tmurt-is, wissen ma ilaq ad nlum deg-s?
Win ineqqen arrac mačči d alsi.
Win ineǧǧṛen abrid n unelmad i yimal n lεali.
Win iqqes uzrem, ittagad ula d aseɣwen.
Win irban irab ccɣel-is.
Win irefden, awer ittwarfed!
Win isnuɣben Ṛebbi, ula as-d-ig lɛebd-is.
Win issebruyen ad d-igri deg iɛwiqen.
Win issenɣalen, ur d-ittagem.
Win isxeṛxuṛen, yessawal i imakaren.
Win isɛan irden, reṭṭlen-as awren.
Win isɛan tasa, ur ičči tansa.
Win isḥellfen, amzun iwwet.
Win iteddun ɣef tidet, yessawaḍ.
Win itellɣen, hdeṛ neɣ ssusem.
Win itewlen yif win iǧehden.
Win ittaǧǧan di leḥqq-is, werǧin indem.
Win ittnadin lhemm, ad t-yaf.
Win ittqelliben ɣef zzayed, ittaf nnaqes.
Win ittu umezruy, ttif xiṛ.
Win ittɣeẓẓen lebṣel, yettraḥ.
Win iwumi iḍul ubrid, iṣemmeṛ aɛudiw.
Win iwumi ur telli tmeslayt deg wul, ad yessexser ur as-yehwi lḥal.
Win iwwi wasif, ittaṭaf ula deg uzzu.
Win iwɛan wayeḍ, ad t-iqqes.
Win ixaḍen s umrar, yini-as ṛqiq.
Win ixeddmen s wass, ur igezzem layas.
Win ixeddmen tameslayt, yeqqen ɣer laṣel ad t-yexdem akken ilaq lḥal, mebla ma yekkat deg wiyaḍ.
Win ixedmen taɣawsa, ad tt-id-isfeḍ ɣuṛ-i.
Win izedɣen adrar ur yettagad ara azaɣar.
Win izegren asif, ur d-iɛan deg uneggaru.
Win izegren lebḥeṛ, isehl-as iɣzeṛ.
Win izemren ad ifhem, yefhem!
Win izerɛen aḍu ad imger tabuciḍant.
Win izerɛen yemger.
Win izerεen kra ad t-yemger, d lxir neɣ d isennanan.
Win izzuɣren afurk, izzuɣer taseṭṭa-s.
Win iččan ayla-s, issidir i tillas.
Win iččan lḥeqq-is, iqqen tiṭ-is!
Win iččan lḥeqq-is, issidir i wallen-is.
Win iɛeddan yewwet-it.
Win iɛettben ad iɣellet.
Win iɣef terɣa tmiḍt-iw, isderɣel tiṭ-iw.
Win iɣelben wayeḍ, yečč-it!
Win iɣlin ad ittwarkeḍ.
Win iɣlin, ad tt-ddun fell-as.

Win iεetben ad iɣellet.
Win iḍṣan ḥṣu ad iru.
Win iḍṣan, ḥadeṛ ad ten-iru.

Win iṛwan ixdeɛ Ṛebbi.
Win iṣebṛen, ittnal.
Win iṭṭalaben zzayed, ittaf nnaqes.

Win iẓewren yewwi amur.
Win n usnerni i tutlayt i yella d iẓiɣer n teywalt.
Win n usnerni n tmedyezt.
Win n uḥraz n yidles d yiles.
Win terḥa temsalt, win yettxemmimen akk ɣer temsal n uslugen aṭas aya.

Win tumneḍ, netta a k-iɣder.
Win tuɣ imma, nekk d arbib-is.
Win tɣelbeḍ, Ṛebbi iɣleb-ik.
Win umi ara temleḍ aya ad yeqbel, ɛecra n yimelyan! Mačči d cwiṭ.
Win umi yecbek wallaɣ, ad yerr ar lǧameɛ.
Win ur d-nenṭiq yeqbel.
Win ur d-neɛni ara tameslayt-is, ur yumin ara belli iman-is d amdan i yella.
Win ur iwwiḍ wawal, ayɣeṛ issawal ?
Win ur nebɣi ara tawwurt n berra teldi
Win ur nekmiz i yiman-is, anwa ara as-ikemzen.
Win ur nelli ara yid-i iqumer-iyi.
Win ur nenni amin.
Win ur neqbiḥ leɛmeṛ irbiḥ.
Win ur neqqaz ur itett.
Win ur neqḍi ṣṣbeḥ, lerbaḥ futen.
Win ur nessin lemɛani, ur iferru ddɛawi.
Win ur nessin tussna, yettarra-tt ar ddin.
Win ur nesɛi asirem.
Win ur nesɛi asuṛdi, ad tyečč ukwerdi.
Win ur nesɛi aɛdaw, ad yeṛǧu aggaw!
Win ur nesɛi ccfawat ulayɣer nettkel fell-as.
Win ur nesɛi cwiṭ deg tgemmi-neɣ, ulac d acu ara yefk i tarwa-s.
Win ur nesɛi lmal, imal.
Win ur nesɛi lwali, ittgalla s xwali.
Win ur nesɛi nnif, awer t-id-yaf lexṛif!
Win ur nesɛi nnif, yaɣ-it-id!
Win ur nesɛi tagmat meḥqur.
Win ur nesɛi tagmat, meḥquṛ.
Win ur nesɛi tarbaɛt, ur ittɣimi deg tejmaɛit.
Win ur nettagad imal.
Win ur nettaggad, ittwaggad.
Win ur nettnawal, ur as-ilzim wawal.
Win ur nezmir s tussna, yekkat s tsertit.
Win ur njemmeɛ ara yid-i, iferreq.
Win ur nsekked ara ilaq-as nwaḍer i tenhert.
Win ur nunez, ur ikeččem.

Yeqqar d amasiḥi i yella maca izellu deg lɛid

Yettfelliq deg yikiddiben, i d-yeɣlin ɣef tmurt-is.
Yettferrij i ddabex.
Yettfuktin yif tiɣezza.
Yettfuḥu-d d afelleq.
Yettfuḥu-d.
Yettfuḥu.
Yettgalla Tom ɣef Mary.
Yettgalla ala s yis-s.
Yettgalla ur iḥennet!
Yettgami ad yi-d-yas yiḍes, ah ya ddin qessam!
Yettgergiz ad yernu tiɣrit.
Yettheffif kan deg medden, ur yesɛi kra.
Yettheyyi Tom imensi.
Yettidir am netta am wiyiḍ.
Yettidir d twacult-is tameqqrant.
Yettidir deg yiwet n ddunit d taberkant.
Yettidir s teqbaylit.
Yettidir s wakal-is.
Yettiki s timmad n ucennay Crif Xeddam.
Yettili s umata, d tanga, maca yezmer daɣen ad yili d timdeswelt.
Yettimɣur usirem-nsen.
Yettismiḍ lḥal da lawan-a.
Yettiɣzif ad irennu.
Yettkel ɣef yiman-is.
Yettkeyyif baba.
Yettkeyyif sin n yipukay n ddexxan yal ass.
Yettkeḥḥil Belɛid, Tazehwanit Faḍila, Taḍsa Brahim, Lɣiḍa Lewnis.
Yettkubbu-d fell-i.
Yettkukru ad iǧelleb s aman.
Yettlussu aserwal d azeggaɣ.
Yettlusu Tom iselsa n watmaten-is.
Yettmasi Sami tiɣawsiwin-iw.
Yettmenṭar.
Yettmeslay diɣen Yuba taɛrabt.
Yettmeslay s teqbaylit.
Yettmuqul udem-is deg lemri, iḥulfa i yiman-is aṭas i ibeddlen.
Yettnadi ad d-yerr ttar.
Yettnadi ad yecfu akk ɣef wayen ara s-d-yini baba-s.
Yettnadi dima ad yefhem.
Yettnadi fell-i.

Yettnadi ɣef ubeddel.

Yettqerrib.

Yettraju ad as-d-terr awal.
Yettraju tiririt-is.
Yettraju zzher-is.
Yettraju-iyi Sami.
Yettraǧu ad d-tuɣal tafat-is.

Yettraǧu-tt ɣer tewwurt ma tgumma ad as-teldi am uqjun yettɛassan ɣef bab-is.
Yettrejdil zher-iw, ttrajuɣ-t, yegguma ad d-yaweḍ.
Yettrejdil, iteddu s tɛewwzin.
Yettriḥ-d amack-it.
Yettriḥ-d bnin.
Yettriḥ-d d afelleq.
Yettriḥ-d d asdegdeg.
Yettru Tom.
Yettru nekk ur ẓṛiɣ sebba.
Yettru uqcic d amecṭuḥ, imeṭṭawen-is d tiregwa.
Yettru uqcic, yugi ad yessusem mi as-rẓen alelluc-is.
Yettru ɣef wayyur mi yuɣal d azgen.
Yettru.
Yettruḥu ufrux anda yebɣa.

Yewqem!
Yewwa ɣef yisɣaren.
Yewwet afus-is ɣer lǧib, yeddem-d cwiṭ-nni n ṣṣarf is-d-yeqqimen.
Yewwet azrem s aqerru.
Yewwet deg uqerru-ines yeffeɣ-d.
Yewwet tameṭṭut-is dɣa truḥ teccetka, nnan-as-d:"ccah deg-m".
Yewwet udeffel aṭaṣ aseggas-a.
Yewwet udfel deg tqacuct n udrar.
Yewwet-it Rebbi, ar tura ur yessin leslaḥ-is.

Yewwet-it waḍu.
Yewwet-it wugur yeɣli.

Yewweḍ almi d tala, yuɣal-d akken ur d-yeswi.
Yewweḍ lexbar xwal-is, luɛan-d i lejmaɛ s axxam n uciban.
Yewweḍ s anda akken ara naweḍ.
Yewweḍ s anda ara naweḍ ata semmus n yiseggasen aya.
Yewweḍ uḥemmal sanga ur yewwiḍ.
Yewweḍ wass ideg ara terbu.
Yewweḍ ɣer yiwet lbaṭima d taɛlayant, yeḥbes.
Yewweḍ-ak-d ufaylu-nni i d-uzneɣ?
Yewweḍ-d lajel n yiwen seg-sen, yemmut.
Yewweḍ-d lawan ad berzeɣ kra deg umuɣ-iw n yemdukal.

Yewwi aεwin yid-s

Yezmer ala.

Yezmer lḥal ad ččeɣ imensi di berra.

Yečča Tom.

Yečča ayetma-s.

Yečča ifelfel aqeṛḥan.
Yečča imekil-s mi izeggen wass.
Yečča imekli-is.
Yečča imensi, yeqqim iluɛa-t baba-s.
Yečča imensi-is.
Yečča izem, aglim yessa-t.

Yečča weɣyul acikaw.
Yečča weɣyul ijeǧǧigen-nni.
Yečča weɣyul tuga deg udaynin.
Yečča ṛemṭan?
Yečča, mi qrib ad ifak, yenṭeq ɣer baba-s.

Yečča-t d imecwi.
Yečča-t uydi iɣelten.

Yečča-tent.

Yečča?
Yeččaɛčaɛ-d fell-i s lǧehd n taɣect-is.

Yeččur almi yettenɣal.

Yiwen yekkat snitra armi i tt-yerra d tazegzawt.
Yiwen yemmut, wayeḍ d lḥenni ara s-qqnen.
Yiwen yessuter tagazuzt, tugi-t.
Yiwen yeṭṭef deg laṣel, wayeḍ yeqqel d Afransis.
Yiwen yugad ayen yellan.
Yiwen ɣef uẓelmaḍ wayeḍ ɣef uyeffus.

Yiwet d talemmast n tlawin, tayeḍt d tilmẓit mliḥ.
Yiwet d yelli-s n temdint, tayeḍ d yelli-s n wedrar.
Yiwet deg teqrint, wayeḍ deg tayeḍ.
Yiwet n tebbuct i teṭṭdem.
Yiwet n tefyirt i tnelli.
Yiwet n tekti kan i yettezin i imelken iziɣer-is d wallaɣ-is.
Yiwet n teqcict iḥemmlen yiwen.
Yiwet n teqcict kan i yellan deg tceqquft-nni.
Yiwet n texxamt akk i nekseb imiren.
Yiwet n tikelt i tt-ẓriɣ, ur tt-tettuɣ ara.
Yiwet n tikelt ifeddex-iyi Saɛid s uẓru.
Yiwet n tikelt mi ɣliɣ ufiɣ duṛu.
Yiwet n tikelt yeṭṭef-iyi Dda Remḍan mi s-d-ttakreɣ aḍil.
Yiwet n tikkelt i tettɛedday ɣef wuccen.
Yiwet n tikkelt yeɛreḍ yiwen n urgaz i ɣileɣ d amddakel ad yetɛeddi fell-i.
Yiwet n tikkelt, ileḥḥu a-t-aya yemlal-d yiwen n uεeṭṭar meẓẓi fell-as, yenṭeq-d γur-s: Mselxir.
Yiwet n tikkelt, yiwen n urgaz, yesεa ala tullas, yerγa ad yesεu mmi-s, xersum ad d-yegri yisem-is.
Yiwet n tkebannit n uḥric n uznuzu d tiɣin.
Yiwet n tmeddit deg tefsut, nuɣal ɣer tnezduɣt nekk d Kahina.
Yiwet n tmettant maca aṭas n ssebbat.
Yiwet n tmurt i nesɛa.
Yiwet n tnezzayt iman-is kan, yekkes-as umɛuqqu-nni tt-icewlen.
Yiwet n tnezzayt tekker zik.
Yiwet n tnezzayt yeffeɣ ur d-yuɣal.

Ɣaben.
Ɣaf ass-n mazal cfiɣ.
Ɣar tama n yisenfaren-agi, aɛiwed d uṣeggem n uḥric n tmerrit d yisensuyen. Tuget deg-sen ilaq ad ttuɛawden.

Ɣas ad ixas uzemmur, yettili ddeqs n zzit.
Ɣas ad nṭerreɣ.

Ɣas akken di taddart-iw mačči d tikkelt tamezwarut i d-yella waya.
Ɣas akken lḥif, yetbeε-iten, meɛna γelben-t s tayri i yellan gar-asen.

Ɣas ruḥ!
Ɣas ssensen itran deg tudrin.

Ɣur-m!
Ɣur-neɣ tikwal kan i d-yekkat udfel.
Ɣur-neɣ yiwen ur ikesseb taɣyult.
Ɣur-neγ s Leqbayel, nessexdam uccen i tḥerci, izem i tebγest d tezmert.
Ɣur-s allaɣ yukin, yessemlalay awalen tteffɣen-d d isefra.
Ɣur-s amḍan ameqqran n yidlisen.
Ɣur-s aṭas n watmaten d yessetma-s.
Ɣur-s lexbar ɣef wayen akk i ixeddem.
Ɣur-s nettat, teddez tebrez, azekka ad t-texdem d ccɣel.
Ɣur-s snat tmerwin d tẓa n yiseggasen deg tudert-is.
Ɣur-s tayuga n yizgaren.
Ɣur-s tikerkas d turart.
Ɣur-s yiwen n udem n uneglus.
Ɣur-s yiwet n yelli-s, isemma-as Tamilla.
Ɣur-s zzit i tuččit d udhan.
Ɣur-sen "Aqbayli ilelli" d win kan isemmḥen deg laṣel-is.
Ɣur-sen kraḍ n warraw: snat n teqcicin akked uqcic.
Ɣur-wat, axaṭer ɣer twaɣit i tetteddum!

Ḥulfaɣ s uzɣab.
Ḥulfaɣ s ḥellu.
Ḥulfaɣ tikkelt-nni s tidet greɣ iman-iw di taluft meqqren.
Ḥulfaɣ wwiɣ ddnub d ameqqran.
Ḥulfaɣ yella-d umaynut deg wussan-iw yettemcabin.
Ḥulfaɣ ɣur-i kra n tzemmar.
Ḥulfaɣ-as terfed taduli-w.
Ḥum ḥum, Ḥemmama. Zub zub, Zubid. Tayaziḍt ad texnunes, a wi ččan tadmert-ines, s uɛeqqa n berkukes.
Ḥusfen tanaddalt i d-yewwin cciɛa, imi kan d taqbaylit.
Ḥusin At Ḥmed akked Muḥemmed Buḍyaf ttwanfan si tmurt acḥal d aseggas.
Ḥusseɣ i uxxam yembawel.
Ḥusseɣ iman-iw cwiya kan.
Ḥusseɣ iman-iw d tamednubt.
Ḥusseɣ-as i lehwa tekkat.
Ḥusseɣ-as i lehwa tella.
Ḥuzaɣ afus-iw s umger.
Ḥwaǧent imseftiyen.
Ḥwaǧeɣ acrik.
Ḥwaǧeɣ ad yi-d-terreḍ s leǧwab ssya ɣer wass n lǧemεa.
Ḥwaǧeɣ lkaɣeḍ d ustilu.
Ḥwaǧeɣ-t assa.
Ḥyu-yi-d ass-a, nneɣ-iyi azekka.
Ḥṛec ay agdud!
Ḥṛes afus-iw.
Ḥṣiɣ d tidet i iyi-infan, acḥal d amedyaz tenfa.
Ḥṣiɣ lɣerba-w tḍul.
Ḥṣu lemmer i k-tḥemmel, ẓẓeɛ-itt ad d-teqqel.
Ḥṣu s yir tamuɣli.
Ḥṣu yiwen ad nekini.
Ṛaju kra!
Ṛaju kra.
Ṛajum kra!
Ṛajumt kra!
Ṛaḥil tesɛa-yas-d: Yusef akked Binyamin.
Ṛaḥil tuzzel ad txebbeṛ baba-s.
Ṛbeɛ ajdid ay drus.
Ṛbiɛ n tmizar weṛṛaɣ.
Ṛebban-iyi-d ad ttaggadeɣ tafekka-w.
Ṛebbi ad isahel, ad zwiɣ tacḍaṭ xeznet lemkaḥel.
Ṛebbi ad isahel, zewreɣ-am tacḍaṭ.
Ṛebbi ad ken-iɛiwen.
Ṛebbi d argaz lɛali yerna d anaẓur.
Ṛebbi d aḥnin iẓẓehhiṛ.
Ṛebbi d bu tsuqas.
Ṛebbi di leɛmeṛ-is yeṭṭis.
Ṛebbi idda d bu tyuga, mačči d bu tnuga.
Ṛebbi illa, asif illa.
Ṛebbi imɣan am yiɣersiwen.
Ṛebbi irad, tuzzma tekfa.
Ṛebbi isserkab isrusu.
Ṛebbi iteddu di nneqma.
Ṛebbi ittak taḥeṛṛaṛt s berru.
Ṛebbi ittseqqi di lḥila iṣeḥḥan.
Ṛebbi ittxelliṣ s ṭṭul.
Ṛebbi iɛeffu, lameɛna iceffu.
Ṛebbi mačči d lɛebd ad t-tɣellṭeḍ.
Ṛebbi mi ara d isteqsi, yeɣleb llusi.
Ṛebbi ur ittɛanad ara lɛebd-is.
Ṛebbi yerra-k d asalas.
Ṛebbi ɛziz, lebṣel meqqer.
Ṛebɛin medden i d-yusan.
Ṛebɛin n wussan akked ṛebɛin n wuḍan, ageffur ikkat.
Ṛebɛin n wussan i yekka uḥemmal n waman di ddunit.
Ṛehneɣ tudert i tudert-niḍen.
Ṛemḍan zik telt yam kan i yella.
Ṛqeṣ timeṛqaṣin.
Ṛqiq am iẓḍi.

Ṛujaɣ.
Ṛuḥ a yasif di lɣerḍ-ik.
Ṛuḥ a zzman, tuɣaleḍ-d a zzman!
Ṛuḥ ad teddudiḍ!
Ṛuḥ ad tesweḍ mernuyet!
Ṛuḥ ay aɛṛab ar lexṛif, ad k-fkeɣ jajja!
Ṛuḥ ay aɛṛab ar tafsut.

Ṛuḥ tura.

Ṛuḥ!
Ṛuḥ.

Ṛuḥem tura.

Ẓran, tteklen.
Ẓrant di snat liḥala mačči akken ara tkemmel.
Ẓriɣ a taɛeggunt, ẓriɣ d tullas i tḥemmleḍ, d ayen ibanen.
Ẓriɣ acu i k-iḥerṣen.
Ẓriɣ ad d-yaweḍ wass i deg ara tebberbek fell-i tuḥsift i jemaɛen s tsusmi.

Ẓriɣ ad tt-ifhem.

Ẓriɣ amek tceɣleḍ.
Ẓriɣ amnaṛ ad t-tekkeḍ.
Ẓriɣ anwa i k-d-yefkan annect-en.
Ẓriɣ ay aḥbib tuyseḍ.
Ẓriɣ belli Tom iruḥ deg-sent.
Ẓriɣ belli tettnadimt ɣef Yasuɛ ittwaṣellben.
Ẓriɣ d acu i d-yenna Tom.
Ẓriɣ d acu yeḍran.
Ẓriɣ d ayen ur nettεawad ad d-yeḍru.
Ẓriɣ d ayen ẓẓayen fell-ak.
Ẓriɣ dadda-k ussan-a iεeddan.
Ẓriɣ dayen truḥ tura.
Ẓriɣ din uletma.
Ẓriɣ gma-k-nni ameqqran ussan-a iεeddan.
Ẓriɣ kan ma tessusmeḍ ɣef lehlak-a acku tuggadeḍ ad hedren fell-ak madden.
Ẓriɣ kullci, ɣef tiṭ-iw kullci.
Ẓriɣ leqṛaya teɣṛam.
Ẓriɣ lxir ɣef twenza-m.
Ẓriɣ mazal ad ɛettbeɣ.
Ẓriɣ mači d lxir i t-id-yewwin ɣur-i.
Ẓriɣ mačči d abidun i tebɣa.
Ẓriɣ mačči d ayen i tettmenniḍ.
Ẓriɣ nekk d tameṭṭut mačči d argaz.
Ẓriɣ netta ad ihdeṛ, ishel fell-as wawal.
Ẓriɣ qqaren-as tihin tettzuxxu.
Ẓriɣ swaswa anda bɣiɣ ad ruḥeɣ.
Ẓriɣ tecbeḥ tudert.
Ẓriɣ tesεiḍ lḥeqq.
Ẓriɣ teṭṭfeḍ abugaṭu.
Ẓriɣ tura anwi i d lejdud-iw.
Ẓriɣ tuɣ yella ḥedd din.
Ẓriɣ ur d-ttiḥnineḍ.
Ẓriɣ ur yeshil ara uxeddim-ik.
Ẓriɣ ur yeshil ara uxeddim-im.
Ẓriɣ yejreḥ wul-ik.
Ẓriɣ yiwet n teqcict tekcem ɣer tzeqqa.
Ẓriɣ ḥaca di tnafa.
Ẓriɣ-kem-id.
Ẓriɣ-t mi d-iεedda deg Uxnaq.
Ẓriɣ-ten d inelmaden n tmaziɣt, ur sɛin ara anasiw n temɛemmrit.
Ẓwer awi-d iman-ik.
Ẓwwer taruḍ-d kra n tefyar igerrzen.
Ẓḍiɣ-kem d tafsut s yimɣan deg uɣuṛaṛ.
Ẓṛan akk.
Ẓṛan belli tasertit d askeɛrer.
Ẓṛan belli ur tenfiɛ ara tsertit.
Ẓṛan dacu i xeddmen.
Ẓṛan, ssusmen, d wid yettṣeḍḥin.
Ẓṛant belli tasertit d askeɛrer.
Ẓṛant dacu i xeddment.
Ẓṛemt-tt.
Ẓṛet-tt.
Ẓṛiɣ Tom.
Ẓṛiɣ aqjun.
Ẓṛiɣ aydi.
Ẓṛiɣ belli Tom meẓẓi fell-i.
Ẓṛiɣ belli ad yerbeḥ Tom.
Ẓṛiɣ belli d Tom i imeẓẓiyen fell-i.
Ẓṛiɣ dacu i bɣiɣ.
Ẓṛiɣ dacu i xeddmeɣ.
Ẓṛiɣ kullec.
Ẓṛiɣ tesɛam lḥeq.
Ẓṛiɣ tesɛiḍ lḥeq.
Ẓṛiɣ.
Ẓẓaden, ggaren awren.
Ẓẓay ccɣel-ik.
Ẓẓay i reffu!
Ẓẓay mačči d afessas.
Ẓẓay-it ṛwan.
Ẓẓayet ur s-zmireɣ ara.
Ẓẓayeḍ i ccɣel.
Ẓẓebra n umzil ẓẓayet nezzeh.
Ẓẓebra ẓẓayet, d uzzal.
Ẓẓel afus-ik, tbeɛ-it!
Ẓẓel afus-ik, tettebɛeḍ-t.
Ẓẓerb yeqmeḍ uffu.
Ẓẓeǧǧ tacekkart n walim i uḥeggan.
Ẓẓeṭla d zzit uzemmur, iṭij abeḥri tili.
Ẓẓher bu iɣisi.
Ẓẓher i sɛiɣ.
Ẓẓher iruḥen ur iban.
Ẓẓher-is yečča-t umcic, yewwi-t deg tfesqa.
Ẓẓher-iw i ẓriɣ yeɛkes.
Ẓẓher-iw isem-is fiḥel.
Ẓẓher-iw yeẓheḍ tabburt.
Ẓẓiɣ acaruq n yiṭij mi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ.
Ẓẓiɣ baṭaṭa di tebḥirt-nneɣ akked yemma.
Ẓẓiɣ imɣi n lwerd ɣef ubalkun.
Ẓẓiɣ leǧnan d imselles, lxux d ifires.
Ẓẓiɣ tibḥirt deg Izubaq.
Ẓẓlen ɣef tgertilt.
Ẓẓu lebṣel, ad tertiḥeḍ.
Ẓẓur d lfuci imeεfan.
Ẓẓur deg-neɣ yetḥennec.
Ẓẓur fell-as yeckunṭeḍ.
Ẓẓur i lǧid, d asalas.
“At Simpson”, d amazrar n wunuɣen urmiden.Cukkeɣ d iṭij !
Seg wacu i terfiḍ?
Greɣ-d irebbi i taɛfeṛt.
Ḥṣiɣ yestufa-d i lehdur.
Iḍla-as-ten i tmeṭṭut-is.
Di tmetti ideg-i yettidir.
Eğğ-itt ad k-terğu nettat.
Ɣer tmeṭṭut-is Nna Ququ?
Yega-as isem s tefransist.
Iɣill d netta i d aɛessas.
Kkert ar tejmaɛt ad ttrebḥeem.
Ɣur winna yeznuzun tijeğğigin.
I wagi? Acu i ak-yexdem tura ?
I yi-d-terra Ḥayat s uzmummeg.
Fhem i t-yuɣen, tqeṣṣreḍ yid-s.
Ḥemmleɣ aṭas ad sleɣ i tmucuha.
Ikemmel deg wawal-is: Ay abbuh!
Ferneɣ ad mmteɣ gar yedlisen-iw.
Ihi tenna lalla-k deg uxxami-is?
Ǧǧiɣ-d ayen ara yidiren deffir-i.
Ḥebbeṛ ay aseḍṛu uqbel ad tteḍṛu.
I lemmer ad tt-erreɣ kan i yiḍes?
Iban kan akka d amennuɣ ibujaden.
Ɣas iles-is qerriḥ, uli-s zeddig.
Lemmer ad teẓrem azal n wanẓaden ?
Dda qasi, ɣur-s leḥnana akked tayri.
Ssarameɣ-as ɣas akka, afud igerrzen !
D ul-iw i kem-ibɣan, mačči d nekkini.
Ttxil-k ay itri, efk-iyi-d lexbaṛ-is.
Di tmacahut-a, Lidya teqqel d tagugamt.
Bɣant d ttar ad-terrent deg twacult-is.
Ihi ulac tiḥbulin maca llant tmeqruḍin.
D tiṭ i kem-icedhan, tebɣa ad kem-twali.
Maca anta deg-sent i yi-iḥuzan nekkini ?

Sarameɣ ad k-ɛeǧbent tewlafin-agi-nniḍen.
Idir tura kečč gar izerman d iwaɣezniwen.
Am tlawin am yirgzen, rzan-d meṛṛa ar tmeɣra.
Gar tizyiwin, ttilin-t tismin akked umyezzwer.
Iḥemmel-itt wul ɣas tettu-t, Iḥemmel-itt aṭas.
Teẓṛa tcedha-tt tiṭ-iw, ṭeswiṛa-s ur tt-teğği.
I wacu ara ileddi deg wallen-is? D ucu i yewala?
I kem amek ara tsemmiḍ i mmi-m? Briruc neɣ Ǧeḥḥa?
Ay itri igenwan, mmel-iyi-d amkan, anda tettilli.
Teẓṛa i ḥemmel-itt wul-iw, ur tezmir ad testeqsi.
Tbeddel i lqedd-iw tikli, kul ass fell-i d asemmiḍ.
Illa uzeddam ɣur-s sin warraw is, ma d aẓeddam ulac.
Tbeddel i yiẓṛi-w tammuɣli, am tin n uggujil yettɣiḍ.

Tamawt 2 : Yenna-d Mass Ḥelwan Ḥsen: ayen yellan ur t-nteffer, ayen ur nelli ur t-id-neqqar.
Cukkeɣ tikkelt-nniḍen ad nuɣal kan ɣer teḥbulin ammer i iḍerrun d yiḍudan n yinebgawen-nneɣ.
Yeɣra deg uɣerbaz aɣelnaw n tsenselkimt, sakin yedda ar Franṣa anida ihegga tazrawt n Duktura.
Yemla-yaɣ-d aɣersiw iḥercen, win ixeddɛen, win icebḥen, win ifehmen, akked win yekkaten ddreɛ.

Tamawt 1 : Tessuter Lǧuher, m ḥdac n yiseggasen di leɛmer, ma yella wamek ara d-nessenṭeq anẓaden-nneɣ s teqbaylit ?
Ahat d taswiɛt-nni n usmekti akked tmuɣli ɣer deffir, neɣ d tatut n tilawt d uckenṭeḍ di targit, neɣ d tarewla ɣef kra.
Teḍḍal-d fell-asen Ruẓa deg ugzedu n tmaziɣt, terra iman-is ur ten-twala ara, dɣa Reẓqi yeffer ddaw n ṭtabla n tmekerḍit.
Sneṭqen-d aɛeqqa uzemmur,  Sneṭqen-d iɣersiwen,  Sneṭqen-d amdan ameɛdur,  Sneṭqen-d win iselben,  Sneṭqen-d medden leḍyur.
Tikelt-a, timlilit tella-d deg Tzeqqa n Uɣerbaz Alemmas "Qasi Usmaɛil" n At Wasif mačči deg Temkarḍit n Tɣiwant am wakken i nennum.
Llant tedyanin-iḍen ara tafem deg ungal n wanẓaden msakit, mi ara t-teɣrem, ur ttkalet ara fell-i ad awen-d-feḍḥeɣ lbaḍna n Lynda Cwitem.
D nnuba-s terza-d ɣer temlilit taseklant n at Wasif mi tt-id-yenced Ǧamal Laseb akked Seddik Iɛeẓẓugen akken ad d-tawi awal ɣef wungal-is.
Ur skiddibeɣ ara fell-awen, seg wakken d tiẓidanin, d tileqqaqin maca mačči am tbexsisin n Uleḥlu, mi heǧǧmeɣ deg tis snat ɣeẓẓiɣ aḍad-iw !
Yerra-as-d: Ur ttaggad a Ḥlima, azekka ad n-aseɣ ad sutreɣ zwaǧ ar baba-m, ad d-awiɣ imawlan-iw, yiwen ur isel tseqsiḍt, teẓriḍ ḥemmleɣ-kem.
D taɣara n tira ideg sbabben yimyura d yinaẓuren tilufa n yimdanen i yiɣersiwen akken ad d-ifrirent tektiwin seg temsirin n tudert s unamek-nsent alqayan.
Lmal agugam yufa tili, lemmer zmireɣ ad ten-id-sneṭqeɣ am akken i ten-id-yessenṭeq Esope, La Fontaine d Slimane Ɛazem ahat ad d-inin : am rrezg-nneɣ iṭij, abeḥri, tili!
Ɣef cwiṭ n tewlafin-a, ur ilaq ara lḥerṣ am wa, uma nekk aql-i gar yimeddukal, lemmer ad d-txedmeḍ am nekk, ahat ad neskasi akken iwata lḥal, imi k-qerḥen waktayen ahat ur tesɛiḍ ara widen yelhan ?
